title: [Idea] New Reforge Stones
body:
So today im gonna make a idea for more reforges, reforges are a important part of the game, There is many, Yet why not make more?

NOTE: While Not all items can be Mythic/Supreme yet, i will make a version of that item rarity for all reforges even though it cant get that rarity, The last one is a exception.



Now im gonna start without any real intro, here is the list of the new reforge stones

1. Whirpool Core 

Its a Epic reforge stone for Armor, It requires Mining XXIV to be applied. It will be obtained as a extremely rare treasure from fishing (1/10000). To prevent it becoming extremely cheap, It sells for 4,000,000 Coins to NPC.

It can only be applied to the following items: Angler Armor, Water Hydra head, Squid Boots, Sponge Armor, Shark Scale Armor, Divers Armor.
It has the prefix Whirpool

The goal of this reforge is to make armor sets that seem to only be for fishing more respectable for combat.

This is the stat list.

RarityHealth BuffStrength BuffCrit Damage BuffIntelligence BuffAtack Speed BuffSpecial AbilityCostCommon+10+3+3%+5+2%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods25,000 CoinsUncommon+20+5+5%+10+4%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods50,000 CoinsRare+35+8+8%+20+7%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods100,000 CoinsEpic+55+12+12%+35+10%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods250,000 CoinsLegendary+75+16+16%+50+13%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods500,000 CoinsMythic+100+20+20%+75+16%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods1,000,000 CoinsSupreme+130+25+25%+100+20%Deal +5% Damage with fishing rods2,000,000 Coins

2. Terrys Trap

Its a Legendary reforge stone for Fishing Rods, It requires mining XXXIII to be applied. It will be obtained as a collection item, In iron collection X. This is the recipe 

64x Hunk Of Blue Ice64x Enchanted Iron Block64x Hunk Of Blue Ice64x Enchanted Iron Block64x Enchanted Packed Ice64x Enchanted Iron Block64x Hunk Of Blue Ice64x Enchanted Iron Block64x Hunk Of Blue Ice

It will sell for 3M at NPC even though its a lot more expensive to make.
It has the prefix Rigged

The goal of this reforge is to make fishing rods a more viable weapon.

This is the stat list

RarityDefense BuffStrength BuffCrit Chance BuffFerocity BuffSpecial AbilityCostCommon+3+7+1%+2Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage50,000 CoinsUncommon+6+15+2%+4Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage100,000 CoinsRare+10+25+3%+7Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage300,000 CoinsEpic+15+37+4%+10Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage750,000 CoinsLegendary+21+50+6%+13Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage2,000,000 CoinsMythic+28+70+8%+16Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage5,000,000 CoinsSupreme+35+100+10%+20Deal 10x Your Defense As Extra Damage10,000,000 Coins

3. Magmatic Emerald

Its a Epic reforge stone for Armor of Magma and Emerald Armor, It requires mining XXIII to be applied. It will be obtained from either 1/15000 chance from Large magma cubes in the Blazing Fortress, or a 1/15000 chance from Emeralds in the deep caverns, To avoid it becoming very cheap it will sell at NPC for 2.5M Coins.

It has the prefix Fused

The goal of this reforge is to bring back Emerald Armor/Armor of Magma to be usable.

This is the stat list.

RarityHealth BuffDefense BuffIntelligence BuffStrength BuffSpeed BuffAtack Speed BuffSpecial AbilityCost to ApplyEpic+50+40+40+15+3+5%Heal 25% Of all the damage you take over 60 seconds1,000,000 CoinsLegendary+75+65+70+25+5+11%Heal 25% Of all the damage you take over 60 seconds2,500,000 CoinsMythic+110+90+100+37+7+18%Heal 25% Of all the damage you take over 60 seconds5,000,000 CoinsSupreme+150+140+150+50+10+25%Heal 25% Of all the damage you take over 60 seconds10,000,000 Coins

4. Sturdy Leather

Its a Rare reforge stone for Boots, It requires mining XIV to be applied. It will be obtained from smithmonger for 75,000 Coins. This can only be applied to vanilla Leather Boots, It also increases its rarity by one tier.

It has the prefix Sturdy

The goal of this item is to potentially make vanilla leather boots decent Mid-Game.

This is the stat list 

RarityDefense BuffTrue Defense BuffStrength BuffCrit Damage BuffCrit Chance BuffCostUncommon+55+5+15+2%+10%10,000 Coins (Note that it was common before the reforge)Rare+150+25+35+10%+25%250,000 Coins (The Huge increase in cost/stats is because this item had to be recombobulated before)

That is all i got for now, please leave Suggestions in the comments below.

title: incorrect seed amount from farming wheat anyone?
body:
So I farm wheat with replenish on my island.

However, I noticed something.

I seem to be getting only 1 seed per block of wheat mined. In fact, sometimes I don't even get a seed.

This means that, after that one seed is planted back to replenish the crop, I end up getting no profit in seeds. After a full collect I sometimes actually end up with less seeds in my sack than when I started.

This is incredibly frustrating as seeds are required if I want to build more wheat layers, and I am not gaining any seeds from my collects.

I am not using the rookie hoe, but when I do the seed profit is better but still not that good.

I'm pretty sure that in vanilla, you usually get more than one seed from a fully grown wheat block.

title: idea from the fortnite game
body:
So I noticed that forntie is a wonderful game. So wonderfull in fact that I think that the creators of skyblock should take inspiration from some of the AMAZING ideas the creators of fortnite have had. This is one of my best suggestions and possibly could make it in the game with a good amount of tweaking. I noticed that fortnite added this amazing dog skin




I believe that something similar to this can be added in skyblock. Currently there is a dog armor set but there are not nearly enough furries in the game. This means that the furry community is not represented well. I also see that soviet aspects of the game are not flaunted enough and that there should be more soviet aspects. title: Skyblock Gems - Pay to Win?
body:
Hear me out on this one guys;

$4.99 for 675 Skyblock gems
1x booster cookie costs 350 gems
1x booster cookie is currently going for 1,150,000 coins on the bazaar

a little bit of math gives us:
1 gem = 1,150,000/350 = 3286 coins
$4.99 = 3286x675 = 2,217,875

for five bucks you can effectively buy 2.2 million coins in Skyblock.



Spoiler: my opinion



What do we know for sure?

Pay to win is strongly frowned upon by Mojang, and theres a case to say it violates the terms that are agreed to with the purchase of a minecraft account, there are several youtube videos of pay to win servers having their economies destroyed and ultimately losing players and business. I dont know the names of the channels or servers, its been a while.

Any user may use real money to buy skyblock gems on the hypixel store, currently $4.99 for 675 gems (which I purchased about 2 hours ago) as the lowest priced and least economical option.

Any item bought with skyblock gems can be traded for in game coins, excluding those that are direct buffs to the player rather than through the consumption of an item. I discovered this after opening the bazaar before writing this and seeing 2.2mil appearing in quick sell, and wondering how 5 stacks of enchanted birch could be sold for that much.

What do I make of this?

Honestly, I feel let down by hypixel. They've been amazingly vigilant about trading various in-game items and currency for real money, and I respect that. However now it seems that they're doing it themselves. For the price of 25 bucks, you can get yourself a pigman sword and a set of superior if you target the auction house right. And if you don't, well you can eat a month of booster cookies, collect all your bits, buy stonks, and resell them with compacting X enchants on them, again raking in a decent price and boosting your XP. Not to mention the several hundred enchanted items you could sell. Way less than straight selling the cookies, but you're still opened up to the potential of in-game currency as a result of spending real money.
I'd like to see something put in place to change this. I think that non-paying players should absolutely be able to access booster cookies in exchange for in-game effort, but maybe we should implement some way to get gems for free that doesn't involve near impossibility (if there is let me know).

title: Useful QOL Ideas
body:
We got a lot of QOL items added with the recent Farm Merchant's Dwelling project being added, but I think there are some more things that could be implemented to further add to the QOL.

If you like these ideas, please bump to help try to get them added.

1. An item that works similarly to the Prismapump or Basket of Seeds, except for normal blocks. Having to place things like slabs for a pumpkin farm or sea lanterns for a potato farm is fairly time consuming. This item, whatever it's named, will place a row of blocks until it hits an obstacle.


2. Region Delete tool. It may be quite easy to place blocks now, but removing them is something completely different. This tool will allow players to select a specific region, then delete the selected region. Things like chests and item frames can be exempt to make sure valuable items aren't deleted.


3. Personal Compactor. Just a plain Personal Compactor, no fancy numbers or anything. This item will work similarly to a personal compactor 4000/5000/6000, except instead of compacting items into their enchanted form, items will be compacted into their block form. This would make it so it is possible for wheat to automatically be compacted into enchanted hay bales, as well as being a good item for beginners to use to compact ores they mine early on in the game.


4. Make the last version of Euclid's wheat hoe cheaper. No one in their right mind would get the last version of Euclid's Wheat hoe. Every other crop-specific hoe has a last version that is significantly cheaper.


Spoiler: Reasoning



This doesn't necessarily mean just the amount of coins it takes to craft, but the amount of raw items it takes as well. Every other crop-specific hoe needs around 6.5 million raw items or less. The Pythagorean Potato hoe needs 6.5 million normal potatoes, the Turing Sugar Cane hoe needs 6.5 million sugarcane, the Newton Nether Wart hoe needs 6.5 million nether wart, and the Gauss Carrot hoe only needs around 5.2 million. The price of these hoes varies, but it's usually around 14.5 million for the cheapest (Sugar Cane), and around 21 million for the most expensive (Nether Wart). I would say that's a fair price considering hoe good they are. Now, I would say Euclid's Wheat hoe is certainly not fairly priced. It needs over 47 million wheat. On top of that, it requires tightly-tied hay bales, which require enchanted hay bales, which are very difficult to get as of right now since there is no way to automatically compact wheat into enchanted hay bales. To get all those materials, it costs at least 250 million coins if the enchanted hay bales are bought cheap.




Thanks for reading

title: [GUIDE] SkyBlock Achievements Guide [WIP]
body:
Greetings, mortals.

This guide will attempt to help you in your journey to maxing every Achievement in the game SkyBlock!


Spoiler: Why I am qualified to make this thread



I'm really not, I don't even play SkyBlock and I just got bored so take this with a grain of salt and correct me if I say anything incorrect.


This guide will be split into two sections - Challenge and Tiered Achievements. Challenge Achievements require you to do a specific action once, whereas Tiered Achievements require you to grind for a specific stat goal (such as, let's say, Combat Level 25).

In total, you can gain 1,700 Achievement Points (AP) from maxing SkyBlock. These Points are spread out over 195 different Achievements (some Challenge, some Tiered).

Challenge Achievements


Spoiler: 5 AP






Spoiler: Your Big Break



Survive an entire SkyBlock year without dying.
This one is the easiest SkyBlock achievement to get as you can just AFK the entire thing, or not even play SkyBlock for the year.





Spoiler: Higher Than A Rabbit



Wear the Spider Boots.
You can buy these off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (String Collection VIII).





Spoiler: Happy Holidays



Collect all 20 White Gifts on the Jerry Island.
This Achievement can easily be obtained during the Winter Event using Ender Pearls, a Grappling Hook and a Gift Compass.





Spoiler: It Never Ends



Kill a Zombie with the Zombie Sword.
You can buy a Zombie Sword off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Rotten Flesh Collection VII). Any Zombie will work for this Achievement, you can just go to the Graveyard and kill one there as they are the easiest to kill.





Spoiler: Existential Revelations (Secret Achievement)



Find the Mushroom Dream in the Catacombs.
To do this, click on a mushroom in the room with Winona (credit to @Benjaminthegoat https://hypixel.net/threads/wip-new-secret-achievements.3187728/)





Spoiler: Gottagofast



Wear the full Speedster Armor.
You can buy the Speedster Armor off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Sugar Cane Collection IX).





Spoiler: Happy New Year



Obtain a New Year's Cake from the Baker.
This Achievement can be completed by talking to the Baker during a New Year event.





Spoiler: Dullahan



Kill a Headless Horseman.
To do this, wear your best Armor Set, obtain a Spooky Candle from the Spooky Event and summon/kill the boss. Can best be done by glitching into the Dark Auction.





Spoiler: Businessman



Complete a trade with another player.
Rather self-explanatory, I won't explain anything to you for this one.





Spoiler: Oh Shiny



Mine a Glowing Block on the End Island.
Glowing Blocks are blocks of Endstone or Obsidian with glowing purple particles around them. Requires particles to be enabled. More common near the lower layers of the End.





Spoiler: King Of The Sea



Wear the Guardian Chestplate.
You can buy the Guardian Chestplate off of the Auction House, buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Prismarine Crystals Collection V).





Spoiler: No Enchants Needed



Drink a Burning Potion.
These can be found in Sand Collection VI.





Spoiler: Sacrifices Must Be Made



Salvage an item for Essence.
This can be done in the Dungeons Hub.





Spoiler: Deep Storage



[Coop or you] Unlock the level 3 Enderchest Upgrade.
The level 3 Enderchest Upgrade can be found in the Obsidian Collection (Obsidian IX).





Spoiler: Death From Above



Kill a mob using the damage from the Leaping Sword ability.
You can buy the Leaping Sword off of the Auction House, buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Spider Eye Collection IX).





Spoiler: Sea Monsters



Obtain (craft) the Sea Creature Artifact.
Can be found in the Sponge VIII collection. (This achievement could be wrong, maybe anyone who has the Achievement could tell me?)





Spoiler: Explorer



Discover all Areas on the main island.
Can be done in ~15 minutes of searching. Nothing to explain here.





Spoiler: Arcadia



[Coop or you] Place 5 unique Islands on your private world.
These can be found in various collections. Right click in a free area to place them.





Spoiler: Time To Go On Vacation



[Coop or you] Upgrade a minion with the Super Compactor 3000.
Super Compactor 3000s can be found in Cobblestone Collection X. Requires one Enchanted Block of Redstone along with all of the required Cobblestone.





Spoiler: Advanced Transportation



Sell an item using the Enchanted Hopper.
Enchanted Hoppers are Minion items which can be found in Iron Collection IX. Put this in the Minion, and you will get the Achievement after selling an item like any regular Hopper/auto seller.





This is a WIP, please don't dislike because it's unfinished. Will be finished in the next few days.

title: ✦ Dark Treasury ✦ - New Skyblock item hall!
body:
One day I thought to myself on where I was going to store some of my much rarer items. So began the construction of one of my most ambitious projects yet "The Dark Treasury" as already mentioned this was originally meant to be a place to showcase some of my more rare items, the build was too big and that was when it hit me. This wasn't just going to be a place where I displayed my rare items but a place where the community can showcase theirs too.







Currently the complex consists of two floors that being the lower floor located in the centre and then the upper floor wrapping around the lower one. Right now there are only display cases on the bottom floor as we simply do not have enough items to exceed the bottom floors capacity, the upper floor will be used if necessary. A lobby is also situated at the entrance of the building to direct players in and give them all the crucial information required about the Dark Treasury. The five pedestals at the end of the building are guild related and so are not relevant in this post. 






Simply just login to Hypixel, enter skyblock and type /visit Centranos. You will then spawn in at the lobby where you can read all about the build and it's purpose along with some rules.

- For the best visual experience ensure the following settings are correct.
- Have night vision disabled
(This can be done by either toggling the potion effect in the booster cookie menu or by removing the night vision charm/despawning your bat pet if active.)

- Have your brightness setting set to moody.
(Esc > Options > Video Settings > Brightness.)

- Full bright/ Gamma mods are disabled
(If you can see the entire treasury lit up then it wouldn't be the dark treasury XD)

If the island disallows visiting/the wooden doors are closed in the lobby this means that the Dark Treasury is currently closed for either maintenance or I personally don't want to be disturbed.






There are two ways to display your items, either you sell them to me or you donate them to me. If you sell them to me then they will just be placed in the hall. However if you donate items to me then your items shall be placed in the hall and your name/item donated shall be put on the wall of donations located in the main Dark Treasury lobby. We however must be in compliance with the Hypixel Skyblock abusive trading guidelines so each donation will be reviewed before proceeding.

Items that I am specifically looking to buy are as followed
- cluck the fish (idk if anyone has it)
- Gamebreaker (Ready to be broke XD)
- Placeable Heads

If you are interested in donating/selling items to me then either start a forum conversation with me or send a message in game. 

Have a great day/night and I hope that this is the start of something wonderful.​

title: Epic VS Legendary Silverfish for XP Leveling (Mining + Taming)
body:
Hey people! I'm currently grinding skill levels and I felt like mining and taming fit very well together leveling wise. I was wondering which pet would be more worth it: the Epic Silverfish, or the Legendary Silverfish. From my point of view, Epic costs less and gives the same mining XP gain and Haste III isn't really a good perk to have especially with god pot's existence. My argument for legendary however is you can squeeze more XP out of it. I really am curious as to what I should do. I've already leveled two legendaries to 100 (mine and my coop's) so I was wondering what I should buy to level and resell.
Also: if anyone wants a pet leveling service for their silverfish add me in game  (Rare+)

BUT LET ME INTRODUCE EUCLID'S WHEAT HOE!!!

479,492,000 + 8mil

title: [IDEA] RNG ultimate enchantment
body: RNG is an ultimate enchantment that can be applied to swords. It gives a +5% chance each level to deal +100% damage. An RNG I book can be obtained as a rare drop (1/100) from a Sea Giant. The Sea Giant is a legendary fishing mob that has 20,000,000 health, and throws the player up 30 blocks into the air, dealing lots of damage and then 50x the fall damage. The only weakness of the Sea Giant is that it is slightly slower than most fishing mobs. An RNG V book would be very expensive to make, but very good. You can obtain RNG VI as a rare drop (1/100) from the Sea Titan, a legendary fishing mob that is extremely rare to find. The Sea Titan has 50,000,000 health, and shoots lasers at the player when they are in line of sight, dealing high damage per second. It is faster than the Sea Giant, and throws the player 60 blocks into the sky, and then 100x fall damage. Even though the Sea Titan is classified as a mini-boss, it is the hardest mob to kill in the game.

title: Why 1.9 is the best for skyblock
body:
After several months of testing between 1.8 and 1.9 pvp and even joining the dark side of 1.8 for a bit, I finally want to talk about why I think that skyblock should switch to 1.9. 

1) It would make grinding zealots fun.
obviously if an attack cooldown were added, it would make it more enjoyable the same way it made pvp more enjoyable.

2) It would make skyblock more skill.
As everyone knows skyblock right now is not skilled as all dragon sets are **** at being skillfull and I could be better than everyone. 1.9 would make grinding more skilled based and not who clicks faster and has better stuff.

3) It would help ur hand
this is something that I don't see a lot of 1.8 degnereates mention but 1.9 is healthier. 1.8 hurts ur hand and most of my friends have switch to 1.9 because of wrist injuries from 1.8.

4) It is better for ur wallet.
This is a claim that I don't see a lot of 1.8 supporters mention, but 1.9 is cheaper to play than 1.8. 1.8 requires a good mouse that can double click and drag click and has 7 mill clicks and need a monitor with 480 hz and all that stuff. 1.9 only needs a brain, and that's free. just that most 1.8 players click spam and don't have brains

title: [IDEA]Pet Vitamins - New Upgrades for Pets(40+ POSITIVE REACTIONS)
body:
► Introduction
Pet Vitamin is basically an item that can increase the stat boosts of pets, similar to Hot Potato Books but for Pets
Its basically the Skyblock version of the Pokemon Boosters(e.g Protein, Vitamin, or Carbos)
Unlike HBPS and FBPS, there will be some strategy on Vitamins since they give different bonuses depending on what materials you use to make them
Also you can only give 5 Pet Vitamins per Pet

► How to Craft
To even be able to craft Pet Vitamins, you need to complete two criteria:
- You have Taming 25*
- You have unlocked Iron Collection X (100.000 Iron Collected)

*If you buy a Pet imbued with Pet Vitamins from ah and you are under Taming 25, the boost granted by Vitamins wont be applied
When you unlock Iron Collection X, you gain the recipe for the Empty Vitamin Capsule
Recipe:

1 Enchanted Iron Block1 Enchanted Iron Block1 Enchanted Iron Block1 Enchanted Iron Block
After you craft the Empty Vitamin Capsule, you can then craft it into 6 different variations
- Power Vitamin Capsule
- Defense Vitamin Capsule
- Speedy Vitamin Capsule
- Luck Vitamin Capsule
- Aquatic Vitamin Capsule
- Intelligence Vitamin Capsule

► Vitamin Variations
Here are the variations, their stat boosts, and recipe:
Power Vitamin Capsule
Power Vitamin is a Pet Vitamin that focuses on increasing your DPS
Stat Boost:
+5 Strength per Vitamin (Max 25 Strength)
+4 Crit Damage per Vitamin (Max 20 Crit Damage)
Recipe:


Spoiler: Recipe




64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold IngotEmpty Vitamin Capsule64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold Ingot64 Enchanted Gold Ingot



Defense Vitamin Capsule
Defense Vitamin is a Pet Vitamin that focuses on increasing your Survivability
Stat Boost:
+6 Defense per Vitamin (Max 30 Defense)
+10 Health per Vitamin (Max 50 Health)
Recipe:


Spoiler: Recipe




64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron IngotEmpty Vitamin Capsule64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron Ingot64 Enchanted Iron Ingot



Speedy Vitamin Capsule
Speedy Vitamin is a Pet Vitamin that focuses on increasing your Speed
Stat Boost:
+8 Speed per Vitamin (Max 40 Speed)
+8 Speed Cap per Vitamin (Max 40 Speed Cap)
Recipe:


Spoiler: Recipe




1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar CaneEmpty Vitamin Capsule1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar Cane1 Enchanted Sugar Cane



Luck Vitamin Capsule
Luck Vitamin is a Pet Vitamin that focuses on increasing your Luck
Stat Boost:
+1 Magic Find per Vitamin (Max 5 Magic Find)
+1 Pet Luck per Vitamin (Max 5 Pet Luck)
Recipe:

Aquatic Vitamin Capsule
Aquatic Vitamin is a Pet Vitamin that focuses on increasing your fishing yield

+0.6 Sea Creature Chance per Vitamin (Max 3 SCC)

+6 Intelligence per Vitamin (Max 30 Intelligence)

► New Pet Item: Vitamin Booster
The Vitamin Booster is a new Pet Item that is a 2.5% drop from Minos Inquisitors and is a 0.5% drop from Minos Champions
It is used to boost Pet Vitamins at the cost of a Pet Item Slot





► Vitamin Remover
Vitamin Remover is a new item that when used to right click one of your pets, Removes all the Vitamins that has been given to the pet
(when you right click a pet, it will show a confirmation screen so you cant accidently remove the vitamins)
It is unlocked in the Iron Collection X (same with the Empty Capsules recipe) and requires Taming 25 to use just like the Vitamins
When you remove a pets Vitamin, it will give you all the Empty Vitamin Capsules back and gives you 25% of the materials used to upgrade the vitamins
Recipe:

The charm starts at level 50 and can be raised to level 100, or lowered to level 0.
Levelling:
Being toxic in chat = decrease
Saying auctions in chat = decrease (not bad, when you see later)
Being nice in chat = increase
Swearing = decrease
Wearing a tuxedo = does not allow your charm to go below level 10, 20, and 40 (based on the type).

Less charm = More chat stopping/gray chat for VIP and above
More charm = More trades/highlighted chat

This is a way to make Skyblock positive.

Bye.

title: Mid-Late Game Content Suggestion.
body:
I have this problem, and I'm sure a lot of you do to.

Right now, I'm a mid-late game player, being combat 29, and having a net worth of about 150,000,000 coins. I don't have enough money to reasonably grind higher dungeon floors, and without the gear, I will be left in the dust. This post is a suggestion to make content suiting me, and everyone in the stage of game similar to me. 

IGoByLotsOfNames researched what percent of the player base is in which stage, and 48% of the playerbase is similar to me, so I know my problem is a plague infecting almost half of the community.





 time stamp 1:46


Alright, lets get in to the suggestion. My idea is similar to dungeons, as you start in a hub, and find a que with other players instead of randomly trying to enter a party with completely random players, having completely random gear and weapons, your inventory and stats would get scanned, and based off the level of gear using gear score, you would be placed in another party with similar stats. There would be 3 person parties instead of 5, as waiting for 5 other people with your stats could take long.

Based off your collective gear score and skill levels, you would be put in some sort of coliseum, with a wide range of difficulty of mobs. Everyone remembers how difficult and fun the end was at the beginning, and that would be the goal. There would be different drops from the mobs you fight in this arena, and those drops would be specifically used for that arena, so it wouldn't be overpowered in other parts of Skyblock. 

With this idea, Skyblock wouldn't become boring, and the players similar to me, who can't play dungeons, would get a challenge, never getting bored with the game.

title: Hall of Bosses
body:
Hi this is my first thread so go easy on me (or rather don't and tell me everything I did wrong lmao) If I missed anything or you want to add something just let me know!

HALL OF BOSSES

Overview: This would be a series of bosses that would range from extremely easy to incredibly difficult to even impossible (to prepare for future damage increases which are inevitable)
On release there would be only 1 boss (I'll explain why later), the first could be completed around the time you unlock the end and the 10th one would be EXTREMELY difficult in the games best gear. It would require groups of overpowered people to join together and try to take just one of these down. I think that this would work like the magma boss where it happens every 2 hours so it is accessible to everyone. I actually think the magma boss would be the first of the bosses as it can be easily defeated by a single person with aiming on their bow. The bosses stats such as health/damage would change depending on how high up the ladder this boss was. These bosses would grant combat xp as a way to get good amounts of combat xp based on how difficult the boss is to kill and how well you did in damage (there would also be loot drops but I don't know what to do for those) Defeating a boss for the first time in the top 3 would grant you 1 perk from that boss and would also allow you to continue to the next boss

Other Notes:
The Admins (assuming this would actually get added) would have to prepare a few bosses in advance because the only way for the community to unlock the next boss would be to kill the current highest boss in under a single minute (this could be tweaked depending on how long the dialogue/boss fight takes without the killing the boss part) and they would have to prepare enough bosses where the highest one SHOULD be impossible for like 20+ people in the best gear in the game (Im talking like 1 billion+ health and ridiculous DPS.
I don't want to go into the details of EVERY single boss because 1. I think part of the reasons most mega threads are never even considered by the Admins is because they don't give the Admins any creativity liberty for there work and 2. because I have like no ideas lmao. Although a few IDEAS and these are ideas only that I are shown here (their stats would be based on which boss it was):

Boss 1: (note this doesn't have to be the first boss it's just the first idea)
Room 1: This would be a massive room that was based like you were underwater and in a coral reef. There should be enough coral to allow the player to hide and heal but not enough to make it feel like you're constantly running into it / enough to make the boss get stuck constantly making it super easy to kill. Note: you wouldn't literally be underwater.

Boss Fight: Maybe you would be fighting like a siren or an underwater witch or something I don't know the actual entity that is the boss isn't really relevant but you can decide and let me know I guess. The bosses damage strategy would be based on DPS (so like 50% attack speed roughly and no true damage/ferocity) for the first phase of the boss fight the boss would try to shoot little beams of water (could be moving blocks of water or something created with particles) which would kind of freeze you in place in a way because of the damage ticks. Phase 2 would begin when the boss gets down to half health, The first thing the boss would do would to be go to the center of the room and rise off of the ground about 5-10 blocks. The boss would then release a massive shockwave that would 1 shot any player at the recommended level for this room. The players could survive by hiding behind coral or killing the boss while he is rising. Note: assuming the shockwave doesn't hit any coral/blocks, it would go to every corner of the room. If the boss was not defeated in the next minute or so, it would do this again (the groundpound type thing takes around 10 seconds for the whole process) and this would repeat until the boss was dead. During the time where he isn't in this process, he would act the same as in phase 1. 

Boss Perk: 1% more Sea Creature Chance

Boss Drops: Maybe something to do with fishing (please suggest something for this in the comments)

Other Notes: Aiming would not work on this boss to prevent bow spamming, the boss would drop things in the same way that the Magma boss, Dragons, and Endstone Protectors drops items.

SUGGEST MORE THINGS TO ME IN THE COMMENTS

title: Clarification on the Swarm Ultimate Enchant
body: So I was poking around the Hypixel Skyblock Wiki, and noticed an inconsistency. According to the Wiki, Swarm 1 would give +1.25% damage per LEVEL per enemy within ten blocks. title: Account Hacked...
body:
Hey guys, so yesterday my account was hacked and a ton of stuff was stolen, including:
- My full superior set(helm 5 starred)
- 3/4 Giant SA armor, 5 starred
- Fabled Livid Dagger, 4 starred
- Lvl77 baby yeti w/ 40% fishing xp boost
- 20 super compactors & enchanted lava buckets
- 12mil in cash
- Epic griffin pet
And I still don't know if that's all. Based on speaking to helpers regarding this situation, Hypixel is not willing to recoup my losses even with sufficient evidence of loss. So I honestly don't know what to do here. I'm beyond angry at this person who decided to hack my account and take all that stuff that I worked so hard for, and it's really frustrating that Hypixel, as big a server and company that they are, does not have a system to help their players when they are the victims of something like this.
So here is what I am asking from you guys. The bare minimum, if you could leave a comment/reaction on this post, maybe it will be noticed. Maybe they will reconsider my case. And if you wanted to go further, I would be thankful beyond words if any of you wanted to help me begin my journey back to where I was. I don't want to quit this server, but losing all that has forced me to consider it. Hopefully I won't have to.

My Discord if you want to contact me: Pose#2869

title: Do you like to progress or grind in Skyblock?
body:
Progression means to play once in a while or even every day, without spending a lot of time. Players that progress don't have many long-term goals and spend their time slowly building their wealth and upgrading their stats.

Grinding means to spend hours every day, to the point of competing repetitive tasks for hours on end to complete long-term goals. Think of players like Technoblade and TimeDeo - maybe not to that extreme of an extent but you get the idea. 

Which one applies to you? Vote in the poll above!

title: [IDEA] Some balancing on new farming update
body:
I've been experiencing the new update on farming like almost everyone else and I believe there should be some small balancing changes.
Here they are, ordered on what I think is more important first. Keep in mind, that's just my opinion.

1. Nether warts giving alchemy exp
I understand why it does and I know it's been like that since the start of skyblock, but I also think that, since it's part of a farming event that comes from a farming update, it should give farming xp.

Problem:
Right now, farming a nether wart gives 1xp whereas farming a sugar cane gives approx. 1.76xp if brewed from e. sugar cane (xp boosts excluded) so, except for the easier gold medal, there are absolutely no reason to farm it.

Another point is that the turing nether warts hoe give bonus farming xp, which is absolutely useless on a hoe meant for farming something that gives alch. exp.

Solution:
I see two possible solutions, there definitely are more, but this is my post so it's my opinion.

In a perfect world, I'd like to see nether warts give farming xp instead of alchemy. I also think that it could have a balancing in term of quantity of xp given, but I don't know about crops xp to propose anything.

If the farming xp way isn't possible (maybe because admins think that nether warts are meant to give alch exp, which I can understand) I'd like to suggest some small balancing with the current system.
First, the hoe really should give alch exp bonus instead of farming. I think it's reasonable.

Second, I think we should up the given xp to something like 12 or maybe even 15xp per wart. Let me explain how did I come up with that number.
As I said earlier, a single harvested cane gives 1.76 alch. xp (45000 / 25600) when converted to e. sugar cane.
Here's my setup for farming cane, which I think is at most average, if not under.
- Farming 22 -> 88%
- Sugar cane hoe -> 10%
- Turbo cane 2 -> 10%
- Harvesting 5 -> 62.5%
Which is 170.5% harvesting bonus so about 2.7 canes per broken cane, but, when farming cane, you harvest 2 blocks per broken block, so everytime you break a cane block, I'd get on average 5.4 canes, which is about 9.5 alch. exp per block broken.
On the other hand, warts only give a single exp per block broken.

Now, I proposed 12xp because I'd like warts to be a substiantially better way to farm alch exp than simply farming cane and cane could be the more expensive but faster way of farming alchemy because, right now, I can spend 50m+ to max out alchemy or I can farm canes all day long but sugar cane is still the only real way to max out alchemy.

So 12xp would be good but why did I say even 15xp? Because warts take so-damn-long to grow.
An hour (real time) after harvesting and my farm is still only about 80% regrown, with some patches everywhere.
Whereas my sugar cane is fully regrown only 30/40 min after harvest and my cocoa one only takes about 15/20min until I see that beautiful wall of brown bean.

So yeah, if we don't go to warts giving farming exp, I think that's the changes we could do and, even if we do change it to farming, I still think that 1xp is not enough to make it worth anyone's time.


2. Coco chopper almost not bringing anything new

Problem:
Every new farming item gives more collection in some way of another. Hoes give a straight up bonus to number of collected items whereas melon and pumpkin dicers gives a RNGesus drop.
It also doesn't give bonus farming exp, which every other tool does.
Like right now, the only reason I bought a coco chopper is because I destroyed my wall way too many times with my replenish treecapitator (please don't judge, I was too lazy to craft another gold axe)


Solution:
First, we could add either a flat 5% farming exp bonus on it or a scaling one like hoes do.
Second since replenish already exist, I think that we could change that passive ability to something that gives bonus collection. It could be as simple as copying the pumpkin/melon RNG drop and it would a huge improvement in my opinion.

Edit 1:
I just tested it and it's replenish ability doesn't work like the enchantment does. If you break a not fully grown cocoa block, it doesn't replenish, which forces the user to care about which block they break instead of just going ham and breaking everything, which makes it exactly the same as using a normal golden axe with replenish.

With the normal axe, you need to be careful about not breaking logs
With the coco- chopper, you need not to break unrippened cocoa beans.

To solve this, I think that making it so that the chopper can only break fully grown cocoa block would be nice.

3. Can't add harvesting to axes

Problem:
We have a brand new farming update with 3 new farming tools that are axes, yet we can't add the most basic farming enchantment to it (outside of telekinesis).

Solution:
Let us add harvesting 5 to axes, if someone decides to add it so their raider axe, it's their will to do so.

title: I married...
body:
Good evening everyone!

From this place, a hellscape known as Hypixel SkyBlock we take ourselves out of the usual routines of daily living to witness a unique moment in the lives of nemdoc and nemdoc. Today they join their lives in the union of marriage.

To all their guests, they are happy to share this moment with you. They have known most of you for many years. You watched them grow up, you went to school with them, or you worked with them. Because you are the ones who have supported them and known them so well, it is only fitting that you are the ones to share this once-in-a-lifetime moment with them.

Nemdoc and nemdoc are pleased to have their parents in the front row…close to them for the ceremony.

Nemdoc thanks her mother for providing her with every opportunity possible and being the best mother anyone could ask for.

Nemdoc appreciates all the love and support his parents gave him over the years.

A wedding day is often a day when couples miss family members no longer with them. For nemdoc and nemdoc, there are family members whose memories they hold dear.

My long lost brother "nemdoc" died 194 years ago. My long lost cousin of 1851 years of age could not come for he is dead.

And so it is that nemdoc and nemdoc present themselves to be married today…surrounded by the people they love the most.

Officiant:

As nemdoc and nemdoc prepared for the ceremony part of this wedding celebration, they reflected on what it is that they love about each other. And this was was the easiest part of planning this wedding!

To the Groom:

Nemdoc, nemdoc loves that you blend in so comfortably with her family. She sees in you a funny, kind, and sweet man. She loves that you think she is funny and that you always find a way to compliment her.

She loves that you always want to be close to her. You remember details of the stories she tells. You want to be part of her family and circle of friends. You help her around the house. Most importantly, you are so close that even when she is at her worst, you have never made her feel like you want anything but to be closer to her.

Nemdoc, nemdoc loves that you are nemdoc. He loves your brain, your smile, and your beauty. He appreciates that you are “low maintenance.” He likes that you can be really silly. He loves your emails and texts. He loves your cooking. He loves your kisses. He just really loves you!

You both look to a shared future that includes raising a happy & healthy family. That future also includes a richly lived life together…going out to restaurants, hanging out with family, relaxing at home in front of the TV, singing and dancing…Bride will do the singing, and Groom will do the dancing.

The years will come and go…you won’t take each other for granted, you will laugh a lot, you will be the best parents you can be, you will grow older and wiser together. It’s a good story,and the ending is not in sight!

(Optional Reading)

MARRIAGE VOWS:

Officiant:

We come now to the words nemdoc and nemdoc want to hear the most today…the words that take them across the threshold from being engaged to being married.

A marriage, as most of us understand it, is a voluntary and full commitment. It is made in the deepest sense to the exclusion of all others, and it is entered into with the desire and hope that it will last for life.

Before you declare your vows to one another, I want to hear you confirm that it is indeed your intention to be married today.

Nemdoc, do you come here freely and without reservation to give yourself to nemdoc in marriage? If so, answer “I do.”

Groom: hell no I don't


Officiant:

Nemdoc, do you come here freely and without reservation to give yourself to nemdoc in

marriage? If so, answer “I do.”

Bride: wtf no i don't


Officiant: welp

Nemdoc and nemdoc, having heard that it is your intention to be married to each other, I now ask you to declare your marriage vows.

Please face each other and stare into each other's souls

Officiant:

Groom, please repeat after me…

I, nemdoc take you, nemdoc to be my wife.

I will share my life with yours,

and build our dreams together,

Support you through times of trouble,

and rejoice with you in times of happiness.

I promise to give you

respect, love and loyalty.

This commitment is made in love,

kept in faith,

lived in hope,

and made new every day of our lives.

Officiant:

Bride, please repeat after me…

I, nemdoc, take you, nemdoc, to be my husband.

I will share my life with yours,

Build our dreams together,

Support you through times of trouble,

and rejoice with you in times of happiness.

I promise to give you

respect, love and loyalty.

This commitment is made in love,

kept in faith,

lived in hope,

and made new every day of our lives.

EXCHANGE WEDDING RINGS

Officiant:

Your wedding ring are the outward and visible sign of the inward and invisible bond which already unites you two hearts in love.

Groom, place the ring on Bride’s finger and repeat after me….

I give you this ring.

Wear it with love and joy.

As this ring has no end,

My love is also forever.

Bride, place the ring on Groom’s finger and repeat after me….

I give you this ring.

Wear it with love and joy.

As this ring has no end,

My love is also forever.

May the wedding rings you exchanged today remind you always that you are surrounded by enduring love.

Officiant:

Everyone has advice for newlyweds. Nemdoc and nemdoc, I offer these good wishes to you on this special day.

May your life together be blessed with prosperity and good health. May you always share open and honest communication between each other. May you respect each other’s individual talents and gifts and give full support to each other’s professional and personal pursuits.

May you cherish the home and family you will create together. May all the years to come be filled with moments to celebrate and renew your love. May your love be a life-long source of excitement, contentment, affection, respect, and devotion for one another.

DECLARATION OF MARRIAGE

Officiant:

And so now by the power vested in me by nemdoc, it is my honor and delight to declare

you husband and wife. You may seal this declaration with a kiss.

Officiant:

I am pleased to present the newlyweds, Mr. and Mrs. nemdoc!

title: My Ideas for SB
body:
first idea
Foraging update:
Pretty simple, expands foraging islands with new axes and enchants and potential new mobs
New enchants would include (name tbd, suggestions welcome) which would buff treecap and jungle axe to break more logs and “thicker” logs which would be a feature in the new islands (birch collection)
There would be special Trees in the new island which take longer to break and are more resistant to treecaps
These trees would be in special zones locked behind a foraging 20 or so barrier
Another new enchant, advanced efficiency, stacks with efficiency to break special logs faster, axe only
New pet, the tree frog pet, unlocked in highest acacia collection, (10 I think?)
Stats: gives 50 health, 75 speed and 25 intel at lvl 100 leg
Perk 1: frog powers(name subject to change)
Gives jump boost 1/2/3/4 in park or new islands
Perk 2: poisonous skin:
Reflects up to 25% damage(basically thorns) and applies slowness 1/2/3/4
Perk 3: bark shredder: break resistant logs 50% faster and buffs treecaps ability by 50%
That’s all for rn I’ll add more later

title: Skyblock New Slayer Idea
body:
I play skyblock casually, i dont really do slayers, but lots of people do, so i think something that could drag more people into slayers would be a new slayer boss, The Endermen Grasper, this new slayer would involve having to kill endermen (obviously) and some ideas for new recipes for the slayer could be, first of all, a new AOTE, this one would be like the og AOTE but in legendary rarity, it could have a larger teleport range and less mana cost, along with having a higher chance to get summon eyes from slaying zealots, another item could be, ender's helm, this new helmet could give a decent defense and hp along with a special perk, if you are low on hp, you will be teleported somewhere random away from danger, and my final idea for a new item could be a new pet, this pet could be a rare drop from the Endermen Grasper, this pet would give also a buff to getting summoning eyes along with a hidden buff at legendary, zealots will have a random percent chance not to attack you back, let me elaborate, with this pet, the higher the level, it increases the chance for when you hit a zealot, for the zealot to not be aggravated, so if you get a lvl. 100 Endermen Grasper pet, it would have a 100% chance to not have zealots fight you back. 

Thats basically all i can think of so far, so i really hope the admins consider this as i think this could get a bigger audience towards slayers

title: New totally not bloated idea
body:
I think that there should be an island after the end island called the plain of ultimate death, it will have wither mobs as the enemies. 
Right after you come here the first enemy you see is the baby wither skeleton with 1 million health and 1000 dps.
There are 6 areas with stronger and stronger mobs, each is the size of the end island and contains 5 unique mobs, aswell as an in depth boss battle between a strong wither ranging in health from 50 million, to 10 billion, and 5000, dps to 60000 dps aoe attack. 
Every single mob drops a unique pet aswell as a powerful wither themed armor set, the bosses each drop 3 swords, one mage, one powerful all around sword, and one sword which deals alot of damage against withers. 
There will be a new skill called withering which gives 10 ferocity per level, and is leveled by killing wither mobs and using wither items. 
Then there's a one in 10000 chance for each mob to drop a key, getting every key will unlock a specialised door at the end of the island permanently for you. 
Here you can fight the dual boss between wither king and mutant dragon every 4 hours, they will drop the most op gear in the game but only one drop from both if you dealt atleast 1b damage. 
This gear is not sellable on ah and requires withering 50 to obtain and use, one of the drops is a withered heart which when crafted with a legendary lvl 100 enderdragon non tierboosted, and a legendary lvl 100 wither skeleton non tierboosted will get you the withered dragon pet which gives 100 of every stat and has every pet ability

Anyway that was my short little idea, hope this get's added ty admins in advance love ya guys!

title: Another recent Dungeon tale with Zhirst
body:
So as tradition its time for my weekly dungeons progress thread, nothing weird happened tbh, until 5 minutes ago, I was on f2 doing my mage duties clearing rooms and spreading incoming doom. We make it to scarf after an ungodly amount of time since a single aa ko'ed a good chunk of us, (including me but my frames dropped I have an excuse). We make it to scarf and murder his toys, and then scarf spawns and my team is dead, just me. I was just a simple mage, not even a bulky mage I was running dark goggles for damage since I didn't die as much. So I pissed my pants and ran for my life. Using my frozen scythe I stalled out enough time for one of my teamates to spawn, it was the protector dragon armor dude and he died. So I ran even more sweating from my pits. Then finally another teamate spawns. Dead immediately, and then scarf delivers this line "yare yare daze" and then he lifted up. I slowly realize about what he was going to do,so I did what I do best, run again. I manage to chip down the pric- I mean priest and my opportunity spawns, a teammate spawns and scarf targets him which gives mr time to heal with my manaflux and he dies. Not like we were getting an S anyways. He chips scarf just enough for my frozen scythe to pick up the k.o, and I fall from exhaustion. And that was the story on how I "soloed" scarf in **** gear

Moral of the story: Don't do dungeons with protector users, and floor 2 is just as bad as floor 1

title: Guild Houses, Guild Center, & More! - Skyblock Idea (#05)
body:
Heyo,
I'm releasing another idea thread because, well why not?
The topic is Guild Houses and I made a visual representation and explanation of how this would work.
Hope you enjoy!

► Guild Center
Located behind the Auction House and Bazaar Alley, you may find the Guild Lord and his Mistress.
The guild center is the most notice-able change you can find.
Here you can:

Buy a Guild House
See Top *Skyblock* Guilds
View Guild Rewards & Perks




The Guild Lord Updates the leaderboards every minute! he is a very busy person.
The Guild Mistress will be able to sell your guild a house!

► Guild Leaderboards & The Perk Master




The Guild Leaderboard is a leaderboard of the guilds with the top Level!
Of course, guilds that have Skyblock as a game in their guild settings may show up on here!
If you click on the "Perk Master" a GUI will show up with perks and rewards for guilds on the leaderboard!
Guild perks are guild-wide, meaning if you purchase a perk with a stat boost, the entire guild will have that stat boost!


Spoiler: Guild Perks





















Guilds Must Be Level 20 to buy perks!

► Guild Mistress




The Guild Mistress will sell you Guild Houses, which come in different tiers and higher mortgage prices (whats a mortgage?)

► Guild Houses




Guild Houses offer advertising for guilds and will be open for guild masters to re-decorate!
Guild Masters will be able to edit the interior (build) for their guild members!
Theres also a guild info hologram for players that are interested in joining!




Guild houses are quite expensive and can go up to 5,000,000 coins per 2 skyblock years!
Why 2 Skyblock years you may ask?
Well, The Guild Mistress sells you these houses, however, you must be one of the top 8 guilds on the guild leaderboard to access her shop!


Spoiler: House Tiers And Prices

















There is a setting where you can set the mortgage to "Auto-Pay" which takes coins out of your bank when mortgage is due.
When a guild misses on their mortgage, they have 1 Skyblock Year to pay it back or the guild ranking under them will have a chance of applying for the mortgage!

THIS THREAD IS OPEN FOR SUGGESTIONS AND IS FREQUENTLY UPDATED!

Thanks for Reading!

title: Never, ever use Superb Carrot Candy on your pet.
body:
According to fandom, it costs 1.75M to make a Superb Carrot Candy from scratch with bazaar mats. Therefore, it costs $17.5M to get 10 of these candies to get 5M XP on your pet.

However, you can buy an Ultimate Carrot Candy upgrade from Elizabeth for 8,000 bits. Assuming one booster cookie is around 960k and provides 4,800 bits, the upgrade is worth 1.6M coins. Therefore, the cost to get 10 Ultimate Candy is 8 * 1.75M + 1.6M = $15.6M. You can use it to get 10M XP on your pet, which is 40% of the XP necessary to max out a Legendary Pet, for a cheaper price than Superb.

TL;DR Ultimate Candy is cheaper than Superb and gives twice the XP. Go for it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EDIT: For those of you who can't read, it's 8 Superb to craft 10 Ultimate. Therefore it is still cheaper.

title: The problem with Jacob's contests
body:
Everyone who's doing events right now and doing well is able to get the new hoes and stuff and do even better next time. Those who get gold now will be getting gold forever, with little to no hope for anyone else who wants to try. The top 20% or whatever will just distance themselves further and further from those below them as they get more efficient, making it literally impossible for newer players to have any hope of getting a single gold medal. Maybe a system could be added like the Spooky Festival, where for anything above Bronze you just need to farm a certain amount of the crops. For example, to get silver in Wheat you need to farm 20,000 wheat. For gold, maybe 75,000. Anything to make it at least possible for people to get gold medals without needing items unlocked only with gold medals.

edit: forgot you can trade medals so that’s better

title: MenacingBanana's apology.
body:
He posted a video not that long ago, with his pinned comment his apology, and that comment read:

"For all my fans and all my haters, I am sorry for what I did. I realize there was nothing I did right with the PVPWars situation. I exploited a server's willingness to give me money and it was wrong. I can't even begin to explain how sorry I am to the people disappointed in me. It was a ****ty thing to do and I don't know why I did it. To be honest, it wasn't even about money. I stopped playing the server because I have the attention span of a two-year-old and I just didn't enjoy it any more. I could have paid them back at any time, but I chose to only do it as of two nights ago when one of my IRL friends heard about the situation. That was selfish of me, and not meeting the terms of a mutual agreement is something one should never do in my position. I am sorry to PVPWars if I financially hurt you in that time and scammed you. I paid them back the entire amount of $1,000 owed as of this morning, but that doesn't fix what I did in the moment. I don't know where Akinsoft pulled this $5000 number from, but that's just not true. I really want to continue making content for you guys. I really want to have time to grow and improve as a person, a friend, and a creator. If you hate me now, I understand, but if all of you would be willing to give me a second chance I would love to prove myself to you. I still have a lot to learn about this platform and a lot to give to this community, so please just allow me to keep creating. As for an actual verbal apology, I feel like making the video on my channel would be sort of exploiting my situation, and for that reason I will be going on Hypixel Alert to try and make some more things known about my wrongdoings. There was nothing excusable about my actions here, and me making a video to profit or gain subs off of it feels inherently wrong. I hope you guys are capable of forgiving me. I love the community I have built more than anything, and I will try and make this right. I will get better, we will get through this. I love you guys. - Menacing Banana"

He says we should give him a second chance, which I can agree with. He owned up to his mistake, apologized, and returned the money he took. He will also be on Hypixel Alert to, "try and make more things known about my wrongdoings." 

Tell me what you think, does he deserve a second chance?

title: Basket of Seeds
body:
So, I was testing some of the new items, and the Basket of Seeds just straight up doesn't work for me. I did it with many different crops and none of them work. 

I saw a couple of other forum posts where someone said one crop didn't work and others responded saying other crops work. So I'm not sure if the basket doesn't work for me only or a few other people. It clearly works for some people though.

I've tried lots of different things to try and fix the basket. This included testing smaller areas, dropping it, making sure all the seeds were common, etc. but nothing worked.

When I use the basket I place it on the first block of the row I want the seeds on, facing the direction the seeds should go.

Am I using it wrong or is it just broken for me? Also, if it is broken is there a known fix or should I just send in a bug report?

title: Breaking News: Socialist Degenerate Zombies attacking opposing man
body:
https://hypixel.net/threads/wisconsin-michigan-pennsylvania-and-georgis.3510128/#post-25084718



Here you can see brainwashed kids from college who think socialism is good.

Why Socialism doesn’t work, written by an economist with a PhD, Mark Perry


If you are still convinced socialism is good, or are lazy to read, look up what happened to Venezuela they is what will happen to us.

March 22, 2016

Slightly more than 20 years, I wrote the article “Why Socialism Failed” and it appeared in 1995 in The Freeman, the flagship publication of the Foundation for Economic Education. I think it was the first essay or op-ed I wrote for a general audience following graduation in 1993 from George Mason University with a Ph.D. in economics. Note that the title of the article (“failed”) implied the past tense, as if I perhaps assumed the failures of socialism were so apparent and obvious (I called it the Big Lie of the 20th century) that it would be forever considered only as a discredited system of the past, and never as a viable option going forward into the future! Of course, at the time many parts of the world were moving away from collectivism and central planning and towards free market capitalism – the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991, the Berlin Wall came down in 1989, and China was opening up its economy and re-established the Shanghai Stock Exchange in 1990, etc.

Given the recent resurgence of socialism, especially as it is now being embraced by young Americans, I thought it might be a good time to re-visit my 1995 essay to review why socialism: a) failed in the 20th century, b) is failing in the 21st century (e.g. Venezuela, see photo above), and c) will always fail. And that’s because it’s a flawed system based on completely faulty principles that aren’t consistent with human behavior and can’t nurture the human spirit.
Here’s are some excerpts of my 1995 essay “Why Socialism Failed”:



1. Socialism is the Big Lie of the twentieth century. While it promised prosperity, equality, and security, it delivered poverty, misery, and tyranny. Equality was achieved only in the sense that everyone was equal in his or her misery.
In the same way that a Ponzi scheme or chain letter initially succeeds but eventually collapses, socialism may show early signs of success. But any accomplishments quickly fade as the fundamental deficiencies of central planning emerge. It is the initial illusion of success that gives government intervention its pernicious, seductive appeal. In the long run, socialism has always proven to be a formula for tyranny and misery.
A pyramid scheme is ultimately unsustainable because it is based on faulty principles. Likewise, collectivism is unsustainable in the long run because it is a flawed theory. Socialism does not work because it is not consistent with fundamental principles of human behavior. The failure of socialism in countries around the world can be traced to one critical defect: it is a system that ignores incentives.
In a capitalist economy, incentives are of the utmost importance. Market prices, the profit-and-loss system of accounting, and private property rights provide an efficient, interrelated system of incentives to guide and direct economic behavior. Capitalism is based on the theory that incentives matter!
Under socialism, incentives either play a minimal role or are ignored totally. A centrally planned economy without market prices or profits, where property is owned by the state, is a system without an effective incentive mechanism to direct economic activity. By failing to emphasize incentives, socialism is a theory inconsistent with human nature and is therefore doomed to fail. Socialism is based on the theory that incentives don’t matter!
2. The strength of capitalism can be attributed to an incentive structure based upon the three Ps: (1) prices determined by market forces, (2) a profit-and-loss system of accounting and (3) private property rights. The failure of socialism can be traced to its neglect of these three incentive-enhancing components.
3. By their failure to foster, promote, and nurture the potential of their people through incentive-enhancing institutions, centrally planned economies deprive the human spirit of full development. Socialism fails because it kills and destroys the human spirit–just ask the people leaving Cuba in homemade rafts and boats [and those waiting in long lines today in Venezuela struggling, and often failing, to buy food].
4. The temptress of socialism is constantly luring us with the offer: “give up a little of your freedom and I will give you a little more security.” As the experience of this century has demonstrated, the bargain is tempting but never pays off. We end up losing both our freedom and our security.
Socialism will remain a constant temptation. We must be vigilant in our fight against socialism not only around the globe but also here in the United States.
The failure of socialism inspired a worldwide renaissance of freedom and liberty. For the first time in the history of the world, the day is coming very soon when a majority of the people in the world will live in free societies or societies rapidly moving toward freedom.
Capitalism will play a major role in the global revival of liberty and prosperity because it nurtures the human spirit, inspires human creativity, and promotes the spirit of enterprise. By providing a powerful system of incentives that promote thrift, hard work, and efficiency, capitalism creates wealth.
The main difference between capitalism and socialism is this: Capitalism works.

Click to expand...

title: [POLL] I am back from getting banned for anti-sh*tposting, and my reflection towards this whole matter (Plz vote!)
body:
I'm officially back, and the staff should really tackle this sh*tposting issue.

Why is this Skyblock related?
The Skyblock forums is the forums that most players use, and it is almost the only forums that gets new posts every minute. When sh*tposters take over the first page, they do 2 things very bad to the Skyblock forums:
1. Annoy us normies
2. Bury actually good threads/posts

How I feel:
I was banned in forums for bumping an anti-sh*tposting thread. I also made some before, and got many likes and agrees from my fellow comrades. However, the staff decides to deleted or alter my anti-sh*tposting threads. This action is boosting the sh*tposters even more. A proof of my threads being agreed and altered was Dealing with forum nons v3, It got 7 positives and was thrown into off-topic sections of the forums. I am extremely infuriated from these events. Do the staff really care about the forums as they discourage voluntary exercises (that makes the forums batter) like anti-sh*tposting?

What I suggest the staff to do:
Either allow anti-sh*tposting movements just like how we repelled forum nons; or, make sh*tposting against the rules, so that us forumers can identify sh*tposters and report it to the online staff, so they could be banned for breaking server rules. Personally I would choose the latter.

Have you been banned for anti-sh*tposting before? And which method do you think is better? Make sure to leave replies and vote in the poll!

title: White Cat pet and Camera [Idea]
body:
We all know the Black Cat pet, right? Well, there's only two types of cats ingame. Ocelots and Black Cat pet. Where is the White Cat? Only one way to solve that:
White Cat Pet
Obtainable by: Buying the 'Camera' pet item from Dark Auction.
Common: Incompatible: When near either an Ocelot pet or a Black Cat pet, you gain +10 ferocity. (stacks up to 4 times.)
Rare: Explosive Camera (only activates when holding Camera):
The skeleton hat's ability now has a 100% chance to explode and scales depending on intelligence. (0.5 scaling.)
Legendary: Alpha Predator:
Deal 25% more damage to all mobs. Tiger and Lion pets nearby lose 20% effectiveness.
Stats (level 100):
Common: +40 Strength, +20 Ferocity, +10 Crit Chance, +50 Crit Damage
Uncommon:+45 Strength, +25 Ferocity, +15 Crit Chance, +60 Crit Damage
Rare: +55 Strength, +30 Ferocity, +20 Crit Chance, +70 Crit Damage
Epic: +60 Strength, + 30 Ferocity, +20 Crit Chance, +80 Crit Damage 
Legendary: +70 Strength, +40 Ferocity, +20 Crit Chance, +90 Crit Damage
Camera: Completely useless, just attracts the White Cat.

Everyone knows about the auction house and how you can place bids or buy items you want if you had the money to. The bazaar is also a think but it wouldn’t go with this.
This item would be a furniture that anyone could get from the oak collection, it would be crafted with 12 enchanted oak at the bottom of the crafting grid, an enchanted cobblestone in the middle and glass in all the infilled spaces.
You can place it by right clicking on a block and can open a menu where you can place an item you want to sell into it and put a price tag over the top of the pedestal. Then if someone comes to your island they can look at the items you are selling and can then right click it to open another menu and buy the item.
This block only works on your own island

title: New Diaz perk idea: Borrowing
body:
No one likes Diaz, and Borrowing seems like a cool mechanic.

Instead of one of her current abilities, Diaz should have a borrowing perk basically, you can borrow things from people, via borrowing booth (Maybe in the town hall, next to Diaz, or Diaz is running the booth?) And the reason why there is a set borrowing place is to prevent scammers from abusing the borrowing mechanic. 

Basically, how it can work is like a trade, that can only be done a very small area (Next to Diaz) and it allows you to send borrow-requests, that show up in purple Click here to borrow with [NAME] with red text: THIS IS NOT A TRADE. Then, it would open up into a trading section where you can toggle giving or borrowing. 

The 'Giving' panel allows you to put up items, and set a time, both of which are visible to another person, and then the 'Borrowing' Panel, allows you to but up payment of some kind, similar to how a trade would work.



If two people select 'Giving' That fine, basically, they will both give items, that will be returned later (Things like collateral or something)

If two people select borrowing, it becomes a normal trade, as both people give a payment of some kind, without a time limit.

BORROWED ITEMS CANNOT LEAVE YOUR INVENTORY. This is to make sure the item can be found later by hypixle's software, and prevent auctioning/selling

title: Make your OWN Custom Skyblock Items! | Skyblock Sandbox [ITEM CREATOR]
body:
This server is in no way shape or form in competition for hypixel
and is only used as a resource for players whom have great ideas for the hypixel skyblock
team to consider adding to the game. this is not an attempt to gain publicity for any other server.
this server is (once again) only a useful tool for the skyblock community to use to bring their ideas and creativity to life. That being said lets continue with the post.

if any staff have a problem with this, i am happy to take the server and post down forever.













Item Reloring
Item reloring allows the player to change the description of an item to make it the way the player wants it.
Item Renaming
quite simple. just renames an item to the player's choice
Item Editor
Can add enchantment glows without adding any enchantments.
Can add 'unbreakable' item tag so item does not gain durability





Spoiler: Rename/Relore Commands



/Rename <NAME>
/Lore <Line1|Line2|Line3 ETC.>
/Setloreline <LINE NUMBER> <TEXT>
Sub-Command /sll <LINE NUMBER> <TEXT>
/Removeloreline <LINE NUMBER>
Sub-Command /rll <LINE NUMBER>
/Glow
/RemoveGlow


Custom Ranks, Guilds, & Tags






Replicated Auction House
Auction your own items for money!











I am one to make plenty of ideas/suggestions for the game. so i eventually thought to myself;
i wish there was something that could help me make custom items.

boom.

i spent a little while setting things up. and now this server has
emerged from the depths of imagination. to serve one purpose..

create!



NEW UPDATE!
Revamped Main Lobby!
-More Compact Lobby
-New money making methods?

title: [Idea] Some idea for a Christmas update ( More precisely, Ice Fishing update )
body:
Hey everyone! I came out with a new idea so, hope you'll enjoy it!

The idea is all around a new sea creature, the Frost Archwizard, which can be fished in the Jerry Pond while being Fishing level 26 or more. It is quite similar to the Grim Reaper sea creature from the Spooky Fishing update, but he behaves like a Crypt Witherlord from Dungeons with the ability to float.






As you can see, it has two unique drops: the Frozen Tissue and the Frost Core. Also, he drops between 2-5 Frozen Tissues upon death.

Frozen Tissues are used to craft a brand new armor set, the Frost Wizard Armor, which is made for a mage setup. It could be used for Dungeons ( the set could be converted into a dungeon set using Ice Essence, dropped from Frozen Adventurers. )







Spoiler: Frost Wizard Armor + Recipes






















The second item, the Frost Core, is quite similar to the Spooky Fishing's Vampire Fang. The only difference is, the Vampire Fang can be applied to the Bat Pet whereas the Frost Core can be applied to the Snowman Pet.





It makes the Snowman Pet perfect for Ice Fishing by adding a new perk aswell as a bonus +1% ( per 20 level ) Sea Creature Chance.





Now I do know my idea was slightly based on the Spooky Fishing update, but I'll try to add a bunch of unique stuff in the future when I get more inspiration.

If you feel like anything could be changed or added, send a comment including it and I'll maybe include it ( if you're fine with it, of course. )

As for now, have a nice day, take care of yourself!

title: (Suggestion) New Sea Creature; Captain Midas
body:
Hey!

Yesterday when Me and my Friend (ign: Melegit) went spooky fishing we saw that there's still no Blessing 6 enchantment, so we thought of some ideas and came up with this one which in my opinion is a great idea!

Captain Midas: before I talk about the sea creature itself I want to say why this mob will make sense, king Midas is known for being very rich so therefore 
the blessing enchant is a good drop because its a chance to get a double drop chance which is basically double the money 

Now for the Idea itself: 
Captain Midas, King Midas' older brother that died in the sea long ago was an extremely rich pirate(its logical and a good reason for the source of King Midas' money and gold came from!)

abilities: so this is kinda awkward because we thought of no abilities. maybe in the future ill get some inspiration but for now, I have no idea.

some more lore: I don't know a lot about king Midas but I do have this info (Midas jewel desc)" a gift from his older brother, whose boundless generosity got the better of him. While he always admired his brother, Midas swore his kingdom would not end the same way." we can see that lore-wise he does have a brother and that something happened to his kingdom but that's about it.

some more ideas to the Mob: so, I really like Krakens I think they are extremely cool so why not make him ride a squid. if not a squid we can make it so he spawns up to 5 mobs in his life span which are the coral hunters(Btw yes I got this idea mainly from Davy jones)

lately, the fishing updates were great and they introduced Harder sea creatures for example The Great White Shark, the Grimm Reaper, and the phantom fisher

so I want an extremely challenging boss(it doesn't have to be ofc but it'll be kinda cool) and a high fishing skill level requirements

Hope the idea catches someone's interest.have a good day!

title: Why did they make mage weapons so op?
body: Mage was op af, since there were really good magic dmg spam weapons like fs and bonzo staff, and not spammable, but very powerful weapons like ink wand and pigmans. Bc of that, they "nerfed" mage by slightly nerfing how ability dmg works, and also made some weapon abilities worse. But with nerfing mage woweee they added the spirit sceptre, a spammable weapon with really good damage. This was actually a buff to mage due to how op the spirit sceptre was. Mage was still the best class in terms of dps due to splash damage, and magic dmg usually outclassing regular dmg. F5 came, berserk got a huge buff due to sa armor, a new dps set, the livid dagger and flower of truth, the new best weapons. Mage was still better bc of yeti sword, and then they released the midas staff. Idk how they thought adding a better weapon to the already seriously op magic damage/mage class, not in the way most items get buffed like 1.2x or something, it almost doubles the damage of the yeti sword. Now getting decent damage without magic damage is impossible on golems, and fs literally took over the end/any type of grinding. Voodoo doll is busted on drags, and using even the best swords will get you no where . Im just saying, stop buffing mage weapons, maybe give the voodoo doll/midas staff a little damage of a nerf, or add some new bows and swords that can compete with the midas staff, like buff the midas sword idk
