title: Idea: Allies (WIP)
body:
So quite a bit ago, about 1-2 months or something, I came up with a idea, called Companions. They would fight alongside you, and you would give them weapons. I worked with @ImEmber and @imapuffer on this, but Ember left and Puffer just was there, so the project went nowhere. Back to the present. I wanted to make a idea megathread because clout it's fun and also clout. Wait... Merriam Webster says clout means a hit with the hand. Okay I don't want clout anymore
Back to the idea and not on the thought of people hitting me. It would not be overpowered because the Companions, now renamed Allies, could only use specialized weapons from their own island. And you would have to Forge those weapons and also pay/help them to level the Allies up. Allies would be like Lost Adventurers, meaning they look like a player. They would be found in a new island, the Kingdom. (also imagine the absolute chaos if LAs added bhop to their cheat list)
Admins, please don't move this to Ideas and Feedback. That section kills threads
So!
Here we gooooooooooooooo

There would be 3 classes of Allies. Warrior, Archer, and Brewer. The Warrior would stab stuff with swords, the Archer would shoot primal sticks with feathers and flint on different sides, and the Brewer splashes debuff and buff water bottles with stuff in them. The Warrior would focus on all around good stats, the Archer focuses on extreme single target damage and speed, but is very fragile. The Brewer focuses on bulk and uses potions for attack, defense, and support. Each class has 5 tiers. You must help them or give them items to level up their tier.



Spoiler: Archer



The Archers are the children of Elves and humans. Archers, through training and connecting, can harness their elf abilities. I chose elves because they are normally associated to bows in fiction. Think Lord of the Rings elves, not christmas elves. They live in the forests of the Kingdom Island, honing their aim. These are their tiers:
Apprentice Archer, Tier 1. Items needed to level up: 32 enchanted bread, a Super Undead Bow, 5 stacks of arrows, 200k. (the bows are consumed)
Archer, Tier 2. Items needed to level up: 64 enchanted bread, 1 Runnan's Bow, 5 stacks of arrows, 750k.
Master Archer, Tier 3. Items needed to level up: 1 Runnan's Bow, 1 Scorpion Bow, 96 enchanted bread, 10 enchanted cooked steak, 5 stacks of arrows, Elf Artifact and 1m.
Elf, Tier 4. Items needed to level up: Elf Training Bow, Elf Longbow, Elf Crossbow, 5 stacks of Elf Arrows, 2 stacks of Elvian Bolts, 64 Elf Rations.
Elf Warrior, Tier 5. Items needed to level up: None, already max level.

Dialogue: Apprentice Archer: Hello. You look pretty experienced... can you help me with archery? Please? If you do, I can help you in your endeavors.
Archer: Thanks for helping me with my bow skills! Now I'm a full blast archer! But now... can you help me with honing my skill even more? I want to become a Master Archer, and if you do, I'll owe you one.
Master Archer: Thanks for training me with a bow! Although... I've heard people say we of the Archer Clan can become Elves. Could you help me with that?
Elf: I feel... different now. I'm more agile and my bow deals more damage. If you could get some Elf weapons, it would be highly appreciated. Thanks!
Elf Warrior: Thank you for helping me through my life. I will return the favor when you need it.

Stats: Apprentice Archer: 120 speed, 200 health, 50 melee attack damage. Helps you for 5 minutes, and you have to wait 2 hours before they will help you again.
Archer: 150 speed, 400 health, 75 crit damage. Helps you for 10 minutes, and has a cooldown of 1 hour.
Master Archer: 600 health, 170 speed, 100 crit damage. Helps you for 20 minutes and has a cooldown of 30 minutes.
Elf: 700 health, 200 speed, 120 crit damage. Helps you for 30 minutes and has a cooldown of 15 minutes.
Elf Warrior: 1k health, 300 speed, 140crit damage. Helps you for 40 minutes and has a cooldown of 10 minutes. Perk: His bow deals 20% more damage.
This path requires you have dealt 20k+ damage with a bow.
(note that all times are IRL)

Right click the NPCs to make them say their dialogue, and left click them to ask for their assistance in battle and give them items.






Spoiler: Warrior



The Warriors are the knights of the kingdom. They fight with swords, spears, and axes. They are just normal humans who fight. So, let's crack on with the tiers.

Farmer's Son, Tier 1. Items needed to level up: Training Sword, Training Armor, King's Consent, 250k, and 16 enchanted bread,
Squire, Tier 2. Items needed to level up: Steel Sword, Steel Armor, Spear, Warrior's Axe, 500k, and 32 enchanted bread.
Knight, Tier 3. Items needed to level up: Knight's Blade, Knight Armor, Knight's Spear/Axe, 4 enchanted gold blocks, Letter, and 64 enchanted bread.
High Knight, Tier 4. Items needed to level up: Champion's Armor, Champion's Blade, Fiery Axe/Whirlwind Spear, 16 enchanted gold blocks, 16 enchanted diamond blocks, 2m.
Lord, Tier 5: Max level, cannot level up.

Dialogue: Farmer's Son: Hello, I'm Paul's son. Paul's my dad, and he's a farmer, so I have to be a farmer. I want to become a knight, but that's impossible... or is it. You look like a person of respect, could you ask the King for permission to become a knight? I know this is sudden.
Squire: Thank you so much. You helped me reach my dreams, I'm a squire now. My master told me to find more people to teach me fighting, because he was busy with a lot of stuff. I'm wondering if you could help me with that, and also forge me some armor and weapons. Thanks!
Knight: I-I'm a knight now... I never thought I would be able to do this. The King said we are short on iron, so could you please get some armor and stuff for me? Also, see if my parents wrote. I'll repay you one day, I promise.
High Knight: Hello friend. The King said I could be a Lord, but I need a LOT more money and gear. So could you... umm, get me some jewels and gold? Also, he said something about a Fire Axe/Whirlwind Spear. I've never heard of those, could you buy me them? If you can, I'll fight for you like I do for my king.
Lord: I owe you much for your help. Do you have any monsters you have to fight? I can help you with those.

Stats: Farmer's Son: 75 speed, 150 health, 50 defense. Helps you for 5 minutes, and has a cooldown of 2 hours.
Squire: 100 speed, 250 health, 100 defense, 75 strength. Helps you for 10 minutes, and has a cooldown of 1 hour.
Knight: 120 speed, 400 health, 150 defense, 100 strength. Helps you for 20 minutes, and has a cooldown of 30 minutes.
High Knight: 130 speed, 500 health, 200 defense, 130 strength. Helps you for 30 minutes and has a cooldown of 20 minutes.
Lord: 150 speed, 600 health, 250 defense, 140 strength. Halps you for 40 minutes and has a cooldown of 10 minutes. Perk: Deal 15% more damage.
This path requires you to have Combat 20 to start.
Again, all times are IRL.





Spoiler: Brewer



Brewers are people who mess with odd stuff, making potions for buffing and debuffing. They throw splash potions for damage and use their dagger when in need. Brewers are a society, so they have ranks and stuff.
Well, here's their upgrade costs, dialogue, and stats.
Apprentice Brewer, Tier 1. Items needed to level up: 16 enchanted nether wart, 10 brewing stands, 5 enchanted fermented spider eyes, 5 enchanted blaze powder, 5 red mushrooms, 20 glass bottles, 16 enchanted bread, and 250k.
Brewer, Tier 2. Items needed to level up: 32 enchanted nether wart, 10 brewing stands, 10 enchanted fermented spider eyes, 2 enchanted blaze rods, 5 enchanted sugarcane, 50 glass bottles, Brewer's Knife, 32 enchanted bread, and 500k.
Master Brewer, Tier 3. Items needed to level up: 64 enchanted nether wart, 20 brewing stands, 5 enchanted fermented spider eyes, 5 enchanted sugar cane, 16 enchanted redstone, 32 enchanted glowstone, 10 enchanted rabbit's feet, 30 glass bottles, 64 enchanted bread, 1m.
Chief Brewer, Tier 4. Items needed to level up: 10 Brewer's Books, 10 Brewer Kit, 5 Hyper Brewing Stands, 2 stacks of glass bottles, and a Brewer's Dagger.
King's Brewer, Tier 5. Items needed to level up: 32 Brewer's Books, 32 Brewer Kit, 10 Hyper Brewing Stands, 5 stacks of glass bottles, and 2m.

Dialogue: Apprentice Brewer: Hello, my name's Peter. I'm apprenticed to my master Koil at the Brewing Soceity. He said to find a person who can teach me since he's busy managing stuff, so I'm wondering if you could teach me.
Brewer: Thank you for helping me become a Brewer. So... I see you are quite skilled in brewing. Could you by any chance help me be a Master at this? Thanks.
Master Brewer: Okay, I need your help... again. I can become a Chief Brewer, but they say I need brewer kits and books. I don't know what those are, could you get them for me?
Chief Brewer: Thanks for all your assistance. I need your help one last time. The king wants to get a personal brewer, and he said I could be his, but I need a bit more knowledge. If you can help me with this, I'll help you in fighting and healing.
King's Brewer: Thank you for helping me all the time. I will help you in war and peace.

Stats: Apprentice Brewer: 160 health, 75 defense, 75 speed, 25 melee attack damage.
Brewer: 200 health, 100 defense, 100 speed, 50 melee attack damage.
Master Brewer: 300 health, 150 defense, 120 speed, 75 melee attack damage.
Chief Brewer: 350 health, 200 defense, 130 speed, 100 melee attack damage.
King's Brewer: 400 health, 250 defense, 140 speed, 120 melee attack damage. Perk: His potions are 25% more effective.
This path requires Alchemy 20 to begin.





Spoiler: Items and whatnot



So, items. First of all, I would like to say that you must GIVE them items, they do not come equipped. Second, you must Forge most of these weapons.

Elf ArtifactA ancient artifact of the elves, this can bring out the best qualities in elves. Crafted when combining the 10 Elf Fragments found in the Forests.Elf Training BowBow used for training by the ancient elves. Crafted with 3 True Wood and 3 stacks of enchanted string. True wood is crafted with 1 stack of enchanted wood from all types of wood.Elf LongbowCrafted with 15 True Wood and 3 stacks of Enchanted String, it is the bow of hunters.Elf CrossbowCrafted with 15 True Wood, a enchanted iron block, and a stack of enchanted string.Elf Bolts, and Elf Rations.Elf Bolts and Elf Rations are purchased from the Old Elf in the forest,Steel Armor and SwordForged with steel originating from the Kingdom's Mines.Spears and AxesYou have a choice between the Spear and the Axe. The Axe ignores 25% of defense and the Spear has +2 blocks of reach.LetterGiven by Paul.Brewer's Kit and Brewer's BookThe Brewer's Kit is found when you put 5 enchanted glowstone and redstone blocks, 20 enchanted sugarcane, 64 enchanted nether wart, 32 enchanted rabbit's feet, 10 enchanted gold blocks, 10 enchanted cookies, and 64 enchanted glistening melonsHyper Brewing Stand and Brewer WeaponsHyper Brewing Stands just instabrew. Brewer Weapons are crafted with 64 and 128 enchanted nether wart respectively, and with... a stick what do you think the handle would be.

this is still so WIP, but eh ill do the rest later.


Spoiler: why did i do this...



why did i waste so much time on this lol








Spoiler: Lore



Ages ago, a king by the name of Leiol ruled this land. He was a good king, a kindly person. The Kingdom grew wealthy and powerful, but they kept to themselves. At this age, those who lived there were just humans. It was a happy time. But then, the war-hungry Olimbar came with his undead army from the south, leaving death and destruction in his wake. Olimbar desired the Kingdom for himself, and sieged the Dragon Gate, which was the gateway to the Kingdom, for eleven days and nights. Finally, Olimbar grew tired of waiting and bombed it with explosives, breaking open the gate for he and his army to go through. The defenders of the Dragon Gate retreated, but set a guard in the valley where the intruders were travelling into the Kingdom. The Watch of the Mountains, as they were called, caused much trouble for Olimbar, stealing their weapons and killing many undead. But the Watch was not enough. The undead still approached the Kingdom. The Kingdom was alerted and prepared for a stand at the Sun Ridge, gathering a force of 1,000 ground soldiers, and 250 archers. At dawn 3 days later, the army clashed. The undead won, but the Kingdom still killed many undead, and the Kingdom retreated for a last stand at the defensible castle. A couple days later, they battled once more. The Kingdom was soon driven out of the castle and were nearly defeated, but people from the North came, helping the Kingdom and decimating most of the undead, except for Olimbar, who escaped. The people were known as Elves, and they wielded bows and were thin and agile. They settled in to the Kingdom and made a life there. But Olimbar was still out there. Fast forward a couple centuries. A society of brewers, of potionmakers had formed, and they were quite prestigeous. They helped kings in battle with healing and harming potions, and they became quite well known.
Olimbar had died, but he had corrupted another power hungry man, who moved to the Kingdom. That man's name was Kithar. He slowly grew in power, amassing a group of other evil people. Then one day... he ursurped and beheaded the king at that time, becoming the dictator of the Kingdom. He ruled with a iron fist, enslaving many. He would kill those who spoke something bad about his rule. The elves watched at a distance, knowing they should help the oppressed people but not quite doing it. A elven boy saw what was happening and saw that the elves, knowing the plight of the people, still did not help. He trained, forging blade and bow for himself. When he came of age, he disappeared into the forest, with his gear. He snuck into the Kingdom through a aqueduct, and challenged Kithar to a duel. Kithar, thinking he would just kill the boy and get on with his day, agreed. He took the axe of Olimbar, which he had obtained through various means, and corrupted it to its very core. The day of the duel came, and they crossed blades.

.


Spoiler: The Duel



Flames wrapping round and round the glowing blade. It was blazing with cold heat, of fire as much as of ice. Taking a deep breath, he drew it from it's sheath. "Wh-Who are YOU to challenge me, peasant boy?! I am the rightful king of this land!" shouted the man in front of him.
"No." the boy said. "You are no rightful king. A true king wouldn't slaughter his subjects, wouldn't enslave them, wouldn't steal from them. You are a ursurper."
"HOW DARE YOU!" shouted the evil man as he drew his own weapon, a axe glowing with darkness.
They rushed at each other, their weapons a nexus of energy.

"I dare."
Their weapons met with a resounding clang of elven metal against corrupted stone. Back and forth they went, blades slashing. At times it seemed Kithar was winning, at times the boy might have the advantage. Kithar brought the axe down, smashing the pavement beneath it as the boy quickly dodged. Roaring, Kithar drew his axe from the ground and brought it swinging on the boy with stroke after stroke, driving the boy back into a wall. Kithar raised his axe above his head for the deathblow. The boy waited- and parried it with a slash, quickly kicking Kithar back and slashing. The boy kicked Kithar's legs, knocking him to the ground. In a flash, the boy had his blade held close to Kithar's neck. "You have lost, Kithar." said the boy. "Not yet..." said Kithar as a arrow from a crossbow nearby sunk into the boy's armor. The boy wasn't hurt, but he flinched. Kithar sprung up and grabbed his axe, swinging again and again. More bolts from crossbows came, but the boy deflected them perfectly into the handcuffs of the enslaved people watching. As a revolt happened from the oppressed people, Kithar swung his axe down with devastating strength, smashing the boy's sword in half. Staggering forward, Kithar slashed with his axe, missing narrowly. The boy took a neglected fishing rod nearby and wrapped the string around the axe, tearing it from Kithar's grasp and throwing it into the air, where the boy caught it and held it near Kithar's neck. "I-I have won. Give up the kingdom." said the boy. "Never." yelled Kithar. The axe, overcome by the pure amount of corruption inside it, exploded. When the smoke cleared, in place of Kithar were ashes, and the boy was stunned by the blast. The people had defeated Kithar's men.








Spoiler: Forging



So Forging would kinda be a minigame. You would have to pump the bellows, smelt and hammer the metal, feed the fire, and grab materials. For Forging, you would have to get all your materials for the item you want to forge, then come prepared with some water and a lot of coal. First, you would have to heat the fire by right clicking on it with coal. Then, get a Hammer, crafted with 15 enchanted iron and 2 sticks. You then put the metal in the fire and wait. You must also click the bellows to stoke the fire. After a while, get the metal and put it into the anvil, where you open a GUI and hammer the metal into the shape you want. After you have done that, throw the newly made weapons into a cauldron of water, and you are done.

You craft Steel Armor and Weapons like vanilla weapons, but with 10 in place of 1. You use 20 Steel and one stick to craft a Steel Sword and 10 steel and one stick to craft a Steel Spear, etc.

title: Bazaar Glitch:Lost money
body: Hi, i just used the bazaar to sell stuff my minions made, and i sold some stuff, but i didn't get my money. Then, i tried again, and it said Your inventory changed and you no longer have enough items for the sale. Someone please help me!

title: A Skyblock Irl website
body:
Hi Mods / staff ( not forgetting about helpers )
Me and my friend have found an irl coins website: my friend Oatmeal_log and me IAmJqt.
I dont want to advertise the website so can u message me if u r part of the official hypixel staff team.

Cyall

title: [LEADERBOARD] Skyblock Guilds ranked by Average Slayer Exp/Average Skill Exp (Updated 1st November 2020)
body:
This is a list of many Skyblock focused guilds ranked by their average total slayer experience and average skill experience. This is the average amount of slayer exp/skill exp a member in the guild has.

Overall Leaderboard
This leaderboard is a combination of the leaderboards below, with a penalty applied for guilds with low members, to prevent guilds kicking players to get ahead. If you want to know exactly how this was done it is in the FAQ.

Note that the overall leaderboard is somewhat arbitrary - if you want another way of ranking guilds this website is good.

Format is [PLACE] [GUILD] - [POINTS] (Guild Members)

Spoiler: FAQ



How did you find this data?/ How can I find the data for my own guild?/ How do you use the API?
If you just want to find the data for your own guild, or a small number of guilds, I recommend using the sbs guild command in the Skyblock Simplified discord server. This will give average data for your whole guild as well as individual player data. The link to the discord can be found [here]. If this isn't working the skyborn discord server has a bot that can do this too.

Personally, I have used the API to find this data. A great guide for getting started with the API can be found [here]. The data for skills is in the profile API, however for players with API disabled they can also be found under player API in the achievements section. The names of the skills are a little odd here. The data for slayer exp is found under the profile API, and can't be turned off with API settings.

How exactly is the overall leaderboard calculated?
Firstly, the total slayer exp across all guilds. This is done by multiplying the average slayer exp for a guild by the number of players in a guild, then adding that together for all guilds.
Then, for each guild, the guild's slayer exp is divided by the total.
The numbers are then multiplied by 20.
This gives a list where there is 20 points distributed around all the guilds, where guilds with more slayer exp get more points.

The same is then done for skill exp.
(Note that skill exp and not skill level is used, as while 200k slayer exp is twice 100k, 30 avg skill level is much much higher than 15)

The same is then done for catacombs exp, again using exp instead of skill level.

These three numbers are then added together, and a leaderboard is created off them.
There is one last subtlety, there are actually 20 points allocated to slayer, 65 points are allocated to skill, and 15 to catacombs. This is because some aspects of the game were determined to be more important than others. If you feel the leaderboard is inaccurate, the distribution of points is probably where it's at, and not the overall system.





Spoiler: Is there a guild missing?



Is your guild not on the list? Add the name of the guild below and when I update the list again I'll add it.
I will only add guilds with more than 15 average skill level across their members and more than 50 members. Guilds will be removed if they dip below 15 avg skill level or below 30 members.
I plan on updating this every few days or so to keep it current.

title: Why do you play this game?
body:
Something I've wondered for a while,
How do people manage to stay interested in this game?

No matter what you do, you'll never reach the end. You'll never be satisfied, no matter how much you gain.
Heck, just to stay on top, people spend upwards of 8 hours a day playing this game.

I can't even bring myself to go to my Clay Minions every week to harvest them, how do you folks manage to stay interested in Skyblock enough to spend most of your day playing it nonstop?

title: Why Mage weapons shouldn’t be nerfed
body:
Mage is a good class that is really good for clearing and others. And as someone who isn’t a mage, I see it shouldn’t be nerfed necessary. 
RCM shouldn’t be nerfed as it’s main point is to clear multiple mobs. And it isn’t as op as LCM or Bonemerang archers. 
What should be nerfed IMO is somewhat LCM as it is kinda op but still has its downfall as it is horrible for clearing. 
The main way to fix it is add other classes a weapon to compete with the other mage weapons like a better berserker sword, a good archer bow, or something that healers and tanks can get to at least make hem useful again. 

So, at the end, mage is seen good as there aren’t any major weapons that get close to the power of some mage weapons. Instead of nerfing the class, just add weapons that can compete with these. As, it won’t only affect mages, but you as you eventually play with them in ur party.

title: Here's how I think tank should be buffed
body:
Tank is a useless class mainly do to it not being needed. All the other classes can become tanky with the right set up which makes tank utterly useless and not needed at all.

What I think tank should get is not a passive that gives true defense, since again it wouldn't do much, but rather a passive that buffs nearby players.

This passive would be called Inspire and it boost player's strength & crit damage by a % if they are within 12 blocks of the tank. I think this would be helpful because now tank can actually support nearby allies instead of just being an annoyance since now having a tank helps you clear rooms and kill bosses faster which is something that many players would enjoy.

So that was a quick idea, if you have feedback feel free to reply as usual.

title: A suggestion on how to make the Skyblock Forums a better place
body:
Skyblock is a game that is largely seperated from the rest of Hypixel. Skyblock players don't really care about other games, and other games don't really care about skyblock. This idea would aim to contain all the skyblock forumers in the skyblock forums better, which would improve the experience of both skyblock forumers and forumers in other communities. How are we going to do this? By, 

The creating of a Skyblock Ideas Sub-Forum, and the removal of skyblock ideas from "Ideas And Feedback"

Take a trip to the Ideas and Feedback forum. Almost all threads there are skyblock ideas. Those threads get buried, with not much people noticing the work (or lack of work) put into these threads. The threads that have a lot of replies and views were originally posted in the main forum.
This is because the people that can give feedback on these items, or the skyblock players, prefer to stay just in the skyblock forum.

On the other hand, the creative corner, which was created so artists did not need a constant stream of bumps for their threads to be relevant, has a surge of idea threads, clogging the forum and defeating the original purpose of it.

So, what we can do is create a new sub-forum, called "Skyblock Ideas and Suggestions" in the sb forums. Alternatively, it could be a sub forum in the Ideas and Feedback section, and the link in the sub forums titled "Skyblock Suggestions" can link to that sub forum, and have the title changed to "Skyblock Ideas and Suggestions."

This would effectively solve both problems at once: people and devs who are looking for ideas for not skyblock can do so easily, and sb forumers and devs can view and give feedback on these ideas with easy access to them. (well, they already had, but now more people will know of it's existence). At the same time, the artists in the creative corner are free to show their work to the masses without the slew of idea threads burying their own threads.

title: [CONSPIRACY THEORY] Why Skyblock will NEVER go out of Prototype
body:
Skyblock is a game with thousands, even tens of thousands of hours of content. From skills to slayers, the deep caverns to dungeons, there really is so much to do, with new content constantly being pumped in with a large dedicated development team.

So why is it still in the prototype lobby?

Well, I have an answer for you. It's because they still want to make content for the game.

Let's take a look at every other game in PTL.
Survival Dash - this exists?
Zombies - followed the tried and true tactic of releasing it into the arcade and never updating it again.
The Bridge - released to the duels lobby with some new maps, and was never updated again.
KOTH - got cancelled
The Pit - got released, and then Minikloon just abandoned it forever.
Battle Royale - Oh boy, this. Got cancelled.
Capture the Wool - released into the arcade and will never be updated again.
Towerwars - either will get it's last update and be put in the arcade lobby, or will get cancelled.
Murder Mystery - an outlier. Released and got some more love due to it's popularity, but still hasn't received a content update (e.g new map) in a long time

I think we see a trend here. All games either never get updates again, or get cancelled. The games that did get released got some update with it to ensure that people wouldn't realize that hypixel basically killed all development of their game.
You see, skyblock is a PvE game. Once you do everything, that's it. It's crucial to make more updates, locking existing players into the endless grind and attracting new ones like flies to flypaper.
Therefore, releasing it would basically be the death of skyblock. And we all know hypixel would not want that.

Thank you for coming to my incoherent TED talk.

title: Double-Double math: Emerald armor and 500mil tater collection (6k already woo) (you can beat Technoblade's record in 2 months wow) (20+ positives)
body:
RandomFormer said:



how much would full emerald armor weigh?
how rich is maddox? (theoretically)
how long would it take to grind 500mil potatoes without optimization

Click to expand...

Today's math is sponsored by @RandomFormer 's ideas. I'm only doing two because I don't want to search 100 random people's shiiyu's for their slayers, calculate how much of that was Aatrox, and then do a whole bunch more math.

Teal is. . . actually not sick for once, so they'll be taking over the actual math parts.

First, how much does full emerald armor weigh?

A real-life emerald block is 4000 kg, making a regular emerald around 444 kilograms. Pretty heavy, but a lot of things are heavier.

Emerald armor is 24 enchanted emerald blocks, and each enchanted emerald block is 25600 emeralds. 

If each emerald is 444 kg...

444 * 25600 * 24 = 272,793,600 kg. 

Pretty simple!

Onto the 500 mil potatoes. I'm assuming that this question is referencing the Great Potato War between Technoblade and Im_a_squid_kid (splatoon ftw), and also Technoblade's final potato collection figure.

Normally, this would be pretty easy. You just have to divide the amount of potatoes that you get from one potato crop from 500mil, and then you multiply that by the time it takes for you to break one crop and then replant it.

However, this question asks for 500 mil potatoes without optimization. That's a lot trickier.

What is optimization?

According to google, optimization is the act of making the best or most effective use of a situation or resource. Basically, anything that would increase our speed from a normal skyblock player, we can't do (e.g. getting contraband like techno/squid did, using a co-op, buying cookies, etc.). Luckily, the question doesn't ask for manual grinding, so we can use potato minions to farm while we break potatoes on our own.

Setup:
Full width potato farm
Potato minions (t11, super compactor, flycatcher, hyper catalysts)
Harvesting 5 Replenish 1 TK 1 Rookie hoe
Level 100 legendary rabbit
Level 100 legendary elephant (has a 25% to double already doubled/tripled crops)
Farm crystal
Farming level 50
Potato talisman

The last one is unrealistic but I don't want to do exponential calculations with piecewise functions, okay?

For those of you with good eyes, you might be asking why we need both a legendary rabbit and an elephant. Short answer is,

We don't.

However, unless you want to die of thirst, hunger, and sleep deprivation (all at the same time I suppose), you have to also drink, eat, and sleep. In that time, we will switch to our rabbit pet so the tater minions work faster.

"But Dumplingsushi, couldn't you use an alt to do that?" No. Most players don't have alts, so having one would be an optimization.

"But Dumplingsushi, couldn't you ask people in the hub to do that?" No. That's illegal in this case, as it involves a random person listening to them, and as most players know when advertising an auction, that's impossible.

"But Dumplingsushi, couldn't you use a friend to do that?" No. I don't have friends. I collect souls.

Let's assume that you're an average person, but are really dedicated to getting your potato collection up so you can be #1. Let's say you play a very reasonable 16 hours a day, and take care of yourself for another 8. Additionally, you have a full length potato farm perfectly set up so that when you finish the entire farm, you can restart and farm potatoes at maximum efficiency.

Finally, your potato minions are set up in a way that they're all affected by the farm crystal (???), giving them an extra 10% speed buff.

Let's calculate.

A potato minion without buffs will normally make 540 potatoes an hour. In that time, a player can break around 120 rows of potatoes, each crop giving 3 potatoes without buffs. Each row is 160 crops long, so in an hour, you break 160 * 120 = 19200 crops. 

Each of those crops drops 3 potatoes on average, so with a harvesting 5 hoe, level 50 farming skill, and a level 100 legendary elephant, we respectively have a 62.5% chance to get double drops, 100% chance to get triple drops, and 25% chance to double drops.

3 * 1.625 * 3 * 1.25 = 18.28125 potatoes per crop. Since we can bread 19200 crops in an hour, that means we get 18.28125 * 19200 = 351,000 potatoes per hour. Nice! The only thing left is the minions.

A regular t11 potato minion will produce 540 potatoes an hour. Since we don't want the storages to fill up while we farm, we'll have to use a super compactor in the first slot, but a flycatcher in the second for that sweet extra 20% bonus speed. We'll be using hyper catalysts for fuel (infinite), as it grants a 4x speed boost. And finally, we have a 45% extra boost from the potato talisman, lvl 100 rabbit pet, and the farming crystal.

540 * 4 * 1.65 = 3564 potatoes per minion. Since we suddenly have 29 minion slots (does not require gems to upgrade), we make a whopping 3564 * 29 = 103356 potatoes per hour. Some of you are probably screaming at me from behind your computers, but remember that I can't hear your screams.

If I can hear them, I'll just silence you. I got these mute stickers recently and have been dying to try them out.

But you make a good point - we won't have the rabbit pet out all the time, as we need the elephant for manual farming. When we don't have it out, our potato minions will only produce 540 * 4 * 1.35 * 29 = 84564 potatoes per hour. That's still pretty good.

In total, we grind potatoes manually for 16 hours every day while our minions run in the background, producing (351000 + 84564) * 16 = 6969024 potatoes. (YES SERIOUSLY I'M LAUGHING AS HARD AS YOU) For the other 8 hours, only our minions run with a rabbit pet, producing 103356 * 8 = 826848 potatoes. 

In total, that's 826848 + 6969024 = 7795872 taters/day. (Remember kids, that's a suffix in the metric system, so you can also use kilotaters, hectotaters, decataters, decitaters, centitaters, millitaters, and the ability to annoy your physics teacher to no end)

So how long would it take to produce 500 million taters? 500,000,000 / 7795872 = 64.13 days.

... you're telling me that you can overtake Technoblade's record with the right setup in 64 days?

tl;dr Start farming potatoes now and you might have a nice present for your relatives on Christmas.

If you want me to do a lot more math like this, don't hesitate to post your (probably illegal) idea in the comments.
If you haven't already, check out my other posts - link in my signature.
Like, follow, comment, and give soul.​

title: [EFFORT POST] The Blazing Fortress Revamp Part I: Mobs 'n Netherrack (180+ Positive Reactions)
body:
Introduction​ Hello there. Some of you probably knew that I was making this post due to a teaser I released a while ago. I realized that I bit off a bit more than I could chew when designing this update so I've decided to split it into 3 parts. This part as you probably know is about new mobs & a netherrack collection expansion. The next part will be concerning a new island and the final part will be about a new, nether slayer. So without further ado, let us begin.

People who wanted to be notified I posted this: @Adaptiv @PigALicious



New Mobs
I'll be starting off with the new mobs as some of them have drops that will be important a bit later on.
After displaying all the mobs I will show off all the new, amazing, items.
(I would've put these all into spoilers but the spoiler tags just wouldn't work with me)

Cube Rider




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Cube Rider [Level 15]​800 HP (Cube)
700 HP (Rider)
5 Defense (Rider)​200 DMG (Cube)
300 DMG (Rider)​While the cube is alive, the
rider takes 95% reduced
damage from all sources​[100%] x3 - 4 Magma Cream
[100%] x2 - 3 Bones
[0.5%] Magma Apple​

The cube rider is in essence an archer that is mounted upon a magma cube. They can be found in the magma fields and is 
meant to add a bit of diversity from just magma cubes while having its own little gimmick.

After years of hard work, this lucky little wither skeleton managed to tame a magma cube 
and now they work together to take down their foes with ease.

Withered Archer




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Withered Archer
[Level 16]​200 HP
10 Defense​500 DMG​Shots from this
mob ignore 50%
of the target's armor​[100%] x2 - 3 Bones
[5%] x1 - 2 Enchanted Bone​

The withered archer is a ranged unit that can be found within the fortress. It is meant to throw a wrench into a casual player's plans as now they have to worry about a ranged enemy while the only enemy they had to worry about was the wither skeleton.

This expert marksman has been training all his life to become this amazing.
Most of his practice involves hitting weak points in the armor to improve arrow damage.

Withered Alchemist




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Withered Alchemist
[Level 13]​800 HP​N/A​Throws healing/absorption potions onto
nearby allies. If none, chucks harming/wither
potions at hostile players.​[100%] x3 - 5 Bones
[0.25%] x1 - 2 Enchanted Bottle​

The withered alchemist is a support unit meant to help allies.
Its main goal is not to kill the player but to improve the lifespan of its fellow comrades.

This guy, even with his father's disapproval, is a pacifist. He supports his teammates as a medic but only when things get extremely tough does he whip out his deadly concoctions.

Withered Warlord




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Withered Warlord
[Level 25]​2,500 HP
50 Defense​700 DMG​1) Summons up level 10
wither skeletons occasionally.
2) His attacks ignore 10% of your armor​[100%] x5 - 8 Bones
[5%] Enchanted Bone
[0.25%] Warlord sword​

The withered warlord is a heavy duty melee unit meant to stand as a roadblock for early players so they have the choice of fight of flight though those who choose the fight are in for some great rewards.

This guy takes his fights seriously. To achieve that level of swordsmanship, he trains 20 hours a day, 7 days a week!

Blaze Warrior




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Blaze Warrior [Level 10]​500​7 True Damage​Launches 8 fireballs
in quick succession​[100%] x3 Blaze Powder​

The Blaze Warrior is just a light challenge to add some more diversity and give more uses of true damage outside of dungeons.

A new recruit that makes the bulk of the blaze army. He hopes to one day be promoted into a knight.

Blaze Knight




Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Blaze Knight [Level 20]​1,000 HP
10 Defense​15 True Damage​Launches 3 fireballs
in quick succession
followed by a big fireball dealing
100 True Damage​[100%] x4 Blaze Powder
[1%] x1 Enchanted Blaze Powder​

The Blaze Knight exists to add a harder version of blazes in addition to being a higher EXP source when killing blazes.

This lad is a veteran of the blaze army. He's one of the elite soldiers and sometimes works in conjunction with the wither skeletons to achieve a common goal, eradicating every enderman, endermite, and zealot in existence.

Blaze Warlock (Mini-Boss)



​
Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Blaze Warlock [Level 35]​25,000 HP
100 Defense​18 True Damage​1) Launches 10 fireballs
in quick succession
2) Occasionally summons up Blaze Knights
3) Players that come too close take
damage equal to 1.5% of their
max HP every second​[100%] x3 - 4 Blaze Powder
[5%] x1 Enchanted Blaze Powder
[3%] Blaze Talisman
[1%] Warlock Staff​

The Blaze Warlock is a mini-boss that spawns every 30 minutes. However, killing a blaze warrior will reduce the respawn time by 1 second, and killing a blaze knight will reduce the respawn time by 3 seconds. Damage above 1,000 is reduce by 95%.
1 minute before it respawns players will receive a message saying "You feel the air around you get hotter..."

The Blaze Warlocks are some of the high ranks of the blaze army. They're in charge of managing the knights and the warriors and occasionally they give strategical advice to the king.



New Mob Drops


Spoiler: Magma Apple








The favorite fruit of a certain pet (that I bet you already guessed). If you try to give it to any pet other than this pet you will receive the following error message: "You try to give the Magma Apple to your pet. But it refused."

An apple that at first looks normal but at a touch feels incredibly hot. Handle with caution.





Spoiler: Enchanted Bottle








This bottle does exactly what it says it would however you still you need fill it with water (making it an enchanted water bottle) before you start brewing. Any potion brewed with it will have the prefix "Enchanted".
For example, if I were to brew a regeneration II potion with this, it would be called an Enchanted Regeneration II Potion

A bottle with mystical properties that allows potions to be more effective. How it's made? Only the alchemist knows...





Spoiler: Warlord's Sword








One of the three new summoning* weapons that allows for a more "necromantic" play style.
The summoned wither skeletons are tankier than their blaze counterparts.

A sword that is able to channel the ancient language of the wither skeletons allowing you the summon them to your battles.





Spoiler: Warlock Staff








The second of the new summoning* weapons which is the counterpart of the warlord's sword.
The summoned blazes are more fragile, but hit harder, than their wither skeleton counterparts.

A staff that was forged many years ago when the blaze nation first rose up. 
It is said that each Blaze Warlock passes their staff down to their successor.





Spoiler: Blaze Talisman








A simple talisman that decreases blaze damage. Nothing else to say.

This little talisman uses the blaze's tricks against them causing you to take less damage from them!





Spoiler: Fusion Blade







The final new summoning* weapon. As suggested, this weapon is crafted by "fusing" the Warlock Staff and the Warlord Sword
]


Spoiler: Fusion Blade Recipe







Requires:
x2 enchanted redstone block
x256 enchanted coal
x64 enchanted nether brick (see below)
x1 Warlock Staff
x1 Warlord Sword

Unlocked By Default






*I forgot to add text stating the max number of summoned mobs so I'll state it here.
At most you can have 3 blazes and 3 wither skeletons if you use the weapons separately.
When you use the fusion blade you can have a max of 5 of each.

If you think this will kill the reaper scythe don't worry, theres something later in this thread that buffs it.

Changes To The Magma Boss

The magma boss right now is just... not good. It works on a weight system much like dragons but it spawns on its own making it so only the players that do the most damage, aka the rich players, get all the good drops. I think an approach similar to the zealots from the end should fix this.

Changes:
- Magma cube spawn rate increased by 250%
- Killing a magma cube has a 1 in 400 chance of spawning a cube stack (more on that soon)
- There is now a pit of lava on the mountain that is a "shrine"


Cube Stack



​
Name​Health​Damage​Ability​Drops​Cube Stack
[Level 50]​7,000 HP (Bottom)
3,500 HP (Middle)
1,000 HP (Top)​600 DMG (Bottom)
900 DMG (Middle)
15 True DMG (Top)​1) Cubes that are stacked take no damage
2) The bottom cube melees
3) The Middle cube spits out big fireballs sometimes
4) The top cube shoots out small fireballs rapidly
5) For every cube dead, the others gain +50% attack speed​[100%] Nether Star​

Cube stacks have a 1 in 400 chance to spawn after killing a normal magma cube. Killing the top cube will drop a nether star.
Unlike zealots you cannot 1 shot these guys. They have a lot of health, but it's broken into 3 mobs to make it a bit more fair
(The nether star will have 5 seconds drop priority for the person who spawned the sub stack)



Spoiler: The Nether Star










There is now a lava pit shrine on top of the mountain. You can throw in your nether stars to summon the magma boss.
Unlike in the end, here you only need 6 stars.
(Don't worry, just like with summoning eyes, you can get your stars back through a given item. I didn't make an item for this because I was lazy, sorry lol)

With this system the weight system finally would be fixed and not totally in favor of late game players.

Oh, 1 last thing. The magma boss has new, rare drop that is used to craft a reforge stone.



Spoiler: New Item








This is used to craft pure lava, a new reforge stone (with other uses)





Spoiler: Pure Lava








It is used to apply the "Infernal" Reforge to the reaper scythe (I told you I was going to give a buff to the reaper scythe)



Spoiler: Infernal Reaper Scythe















Spoiler: Pure Lava Recipe












Netherrack Collection Expansion

Netherrack has been tossed aside and ignored for quite a while. So now it's time for it to get some more items in its collection.

Before people say that netherrack shouldn't have its own minion, I think it should. Some of the items I've created are incredibly grindy and may require minions to help you get there. Additionally, when maxed these minions will be faster than snow but it will be much more expensive than snow.

The following will be the netherrack collection but redone to fit new requirements.

Netherrack I - 500 Netherrack
Unlocks the netherrack minion.

Base recipe is the same as all other minions, x1 wooden pickaxe and 80 netherrack.
For this I have no image and instead will be using a chart​
Tier​Time Between Actions​Cost To Upgrade​1​16s​256 Netherrack​2​16s​512 Netherrack​3​14.5s​8 Enchanted Netherrack​4​14.5s​16 Enchanted Netherack​5​13.5s​32 Enchanted Netherrack​6​13.5s​64 Enchanted Netherrack​7​9.5s​128 Enchanted Netherrack​8​9.5s​256 Enchanted Netherrack​9​7s​512 Enchanted Netherrack​10​7s​8 Enchanted Brick​11​5s​N/A​

Netherrack II - 2,500 Netherrack
Unlocks enchanted netherrack
Enchanted Netherrack Requires More Non-Enchanted Items Than Other Enchanted Items Due To How Easy Netherrack Is To Obtain


Spoiler: Enchanted Netherrack Recipe







Requires:
- 160 Netherrack



Netherrack III - 5,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Nether Talisman
Unlocks Spark Sword



Spoiler: Nether Talisman Recipe







Requires:
- x32 Enchanted Netherrack
- x1 Enchanted Coal Block





Spoiler: Nether Talisman








A talisman forged from materials in the nether. It is said the materials are the reason why it makes you lucky.





Spoiler: Spark Sword Recipe







Requires:
x1 Flaming Sword
x6 Enchanted Blaze Powder
x64 Enchanted Netherrack





Spoiler: Spark Blade












Netherrack IV - 15,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Enchanted Nether Brick
Unlocks Corruption Enchantment



Spoiler: Enchanted Nether Brick Recipe












Spoiler: Corruption Enchantment












Spoiler: Corruption Enchantment Recipe










Netherrack V - 75,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Nether Ring
Unlocks Burning Blade



Spoiler: Nether Ring












Spoiler: Nether Ring Recipe







Requires:
- x1 Nether Talisman
- x32 Enchanted Nether Brick
- x256 Enchanted Coal





Spoiler: Burning Blade












Spoiler: Burning Blade Recipe







Requires:
- x1 Spark Blade
- x96 Enchanted Blaze Dust
- x48 Enchanted Nether Brick



Netherrack VI - 150,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Enchanted Nether Bricks
Unlocks Nether Artifact



Spoiler: Enchanted Nether Brick Recipe













Spoiler: Nether Artifact












Spoiler: Nether Artifact Recipe







Requires:
- x1 Nether Ring
- x4 Enchanted Blaze Rods
x8 Enchanted Nether Bricks



Netherrack VII - 350,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Nether Lord Armor (Probably The Most Overpriced Armor. Give Me Balancing Suggestions Please)



Spoiler: Nether Lord Armor




















For people complaining about 2 full set bonuses, look at diver's armor and farm armor






Spoiler: Nether Lord Armor Recipe



















Requires:
- x48 Enchanted Nether Bricks
- x160 Enchanted Blaze Dust
- x1 Pure Lava



Netherrack VIII: 750,000 Netherrack
Unlocks Demonic Blade




Spoiler: Demonic Blade












Spoiler: Demonic Blade Recipe







Requires:
- x1 Burning Blade
- x12 Enchanted Blaze Rods
- x12 Enchanted Nether Bricks
x1 Crystalized Blood

The way to obtain crystallized blood will be made known in the next post.





Conclusion
First of all I'd like to say thank you for just reading this post.
This has easily become one of the most time consuming posts I've made. The items took a week while the text took me 5 hours.
There are just some ideas I'm throwing out that I think would spice up the nether.
Feel free to disagree in the replies but if you do please give some reasoning.
Finally, if you could, suggest any balance changes you have become some stuff cough nether lord armor cough could use some balance and such.

Anyway, thank's once again, I hope you have a phenomenal day.


EDIT: Buffed the netherrack minion
EDIT 2: Made ench netherrack/ench netherrack bricks easier to craft​

title: Skyblock Sandbox | Official Open-Source Core
body:
Hello,
After some time, i've decided to release the core skript of SkyblockSandbox
This does not include:

Renaming
Reloring
Pets
Custom Items
This is simply for Ranks, Tablist, Gamertags, Chat, And Moderation



Spoiler: Source Code












Pastebin.com - Potentially offensive content ahead!


Pastebin.com is the number one paste tool since 2002. Pastebin is a website where you can store text online for a set period of time.




pastebin.com








DEPENDENCIES:
Skript 2.2
tuSke
NametagEdit
Skellett
skRayFall
skUtilities
skQuery
WildSkript
GroupManager/PermissionsEx
Gadgetsmenu (For Delivery Man)
JustSound *NOT REQUIRED*


Commands List (Skript):

User Commands:
- /ignore - Add/remove player's from your ignore list.
- /help - Prints a help page with customizable links.
- /search - Search for players.
- /reset - Reset your basic hub statistics.
- /watchdogreport - Report players for hacking.
- /chatreport - Report chat offenders.
- /hi or /hello - Why hello there.
- /opme - Troll command.
- /wtfmap or /map - Shows the current map you are on.
- /games - Opens the game menu. (Coming soon.)
- /lobbies - Opens the lobby menu. (Coming soon.)
- /profile - Opens your profile.
- /guild - Create/join/leave/disband Guilds.
- /guildshop - Guild shop.
- /friend - Add/remove friends or block/ignore them.
- /status - Check your current status.
- /rankcolor - Change the '+' in MVP+. (MVP+ only!)
- /pet (name/reset) - Name/reset your pet. (GadgetsMenu)
- /msg - Privately message players.
- /limbo - Switch to limbo.
- /chat - Switch chat.
- /fly - For VIP and higher

YT Commands:
- /nick - For YT and higher. Disguise yourself as another player.

JR HELPER/HELPER/MOD Commands:
- /watchdogreport-accept - Accept players WD reports.
- /chatreport-accept - Accept players chat reports.
- /mute - Mute players.
- /unmute - Unmute players.
- /announce - Announce something.
- /verify - Verify someone.
- /ban - Ban a player.
- /unban - Unban a player.
- /warn - Warn a player.
- /silence - Silence chat.
- /settings - Moderation Settings.
- /history - Not finished. Shows punishment history.

ADMIN+ Commands:
- All commands from JR HELPER+
- /adminrc - Admin settings for player's MVP+ color.
- /rank - Rank system.
- /addexp - Add Experience to a player. (SoonTM)
- /addkarma - Add Karma to a player.
- /level - Manage the level of players.
- /onlinereset - Reset online count. (If bugged)
- /boosteractivate - Just a little fun message.
- /setspawn - Set Hub spawn.
- /setlimbo - Set Limbo spawn.
- /setflyspawn - Set fly spawn (Has to be enabled)

title: I tested both Mage and Berserk Healer. Here's what I can say about them.
body:
Mage healer SUCKS.
It's absolute garbage.
It's like pure right-click mage—terrible.

Mages are only good if they use both left and right clicks.
Mage healer is just a worse mage that can't use left click.

Even with the best weapons—100m midas spoon—I do double my berserk setup damage, yet at half the ehp.
All that matters is that I did enough to 1-2 tap all normal dungeon mobs.

My berserk setup was cheaper than my mage setup, yet it was better.

Here's what I used (all hpb, g5p5):

Normal DungeonBoss Room5* necrotic shadow goggles5* reinforced mender fedora5* loving t10 chestplate5* loving t10 chestplate4* necrotic necro lord leggings4* necrotic necro lord leggings4* necrotic necro lord boots5* giant necro lord bootsnon-dungeon heroic midas staff (smite 6, 100m paid)non-dungeon heroic midas staff (smite 6, 100m paid)Voodoo dollVoodoo doll5* smite 6 fscythe5* smite 6 fscythe

Don't get me wrong, midas staff is an EXCELLENT weapon. It's definitely worth the price. But in the boss room, the magic resistance of mobs is INSANE and the strength is completely nullified.

With mage healer, you need to armor swap AND pet swap for ehp to even have a CHANCE to survive.

With berserk healer, all you need is baby yeti and you're set.

TLDR: mage healer sucks, from a player who used both.

title: Merry Christmas Everyone!
body:
Looking at the Hypixel network I can see that there Isn't enough Christmas Joy in here, for how hyped up the holidays are, the past few days at Hypixel have been very spooky and grim.

You could say its Halloween, but you are just lying to yourself. It is Chhristmas, I have already wished staff and others a merry christmas, and I will continue to do so until halloween come December 5th!

Problems I see on skyblock is that there isn't enough christmas vibes along the server and skyblock specifically, all other games can suck it, skyblock is the best, all other games are inferior, we got that down, good?

Suggetions I have are make everyones island the wreath skywars map, just in front of whatever they already have built, if it goes through chests, it goes through chests, not my problem. Not my fault you have not embraced and prepared for the sheer power of christmas.

My second suggestion is during the time of christmas, jerrys island falls out of the sky and links towards the main hub, this causes winter sea creatures to get invested in the hubs water, this will last until december 5th. When the mayor of skyblock finally decides to hire a exterminator, to catch and release all the winter sea creatures back to the main jerry island they belong. But a flaw with this is skyblock doesnt have much exterminators, which means this one did a peticulary bad job and now sea creatures are gone from the hub.

My third suggestion, is naming everyone ChristmasBoy or ChristmasGirl and then #, I propose to be christmasboy1 because I came up with this amazing idea, and I also propose my own special Jingle Rank. Just to let everyone know not to F*ck with the merry master.

My fourth suggestion, change the hub to the jerry hub, and keep it that way, forever, f*ck halloween f*ck spring f*ck easter f*ck thanksgiving f*ck halloween, there is only room for christmas.

This has concluded my top 4 suggestions to make Hypixel way more merry. Can not wait to get all of these added and get a new idea called the creative jingle mind.


Merry Christmas 

To all Hypixel players and staff!​

title: Werewolf Armor is really good
body:
The Werewolf Armor set ability is absolutely BROKEN with the right build and enough ferocity. By stacking ferocity procs, you can dish out MAD damage, incredible healing, and a metric ton of defence. Here's the setup we're gonna be using:


Spoiler: The setup



Dungeonized Werewolf Armor (any reforge, Renowned for extra procs and damge, Perfect for extra healing and defense)
Recombobulated Dirty Livid Dagger (enchanted with Ferocity 5)
Level 100 Tiger Pet (Any pet item will do, but Minos Relic is the best if you really care about that extra +6 ferocity)



Alright, so let's calculate the ferocity we get:


Spoiler: The ferocity



Dungeonized Werewolf Armor has 40 ferocity outside of dungeons, and when five starred gives 60 ferocity inside dungeons. Ferocity, attack speed, and crit chance aren't affected by catacomb levels, but they are affected by starring. (+60 ferocity)
Dirty Livid Dagger (+30 ferocity)
Tiger pet (+10 ferocity) (+100% ferocity)
In total we get (60+30+10)(2) ferocity, or 200 ferocity in total. If you use Renowned, you would have 208. If you used a Minos Relic, you would have 206. If you used both, you would have 214.24.



Let's look at Werewolf Armor's set bonus again:


Spoiler: The bonus



Upon activating Ferocity heal players within 25 blocks for 10% of your Defense and gain 50 Defense for 5s (stacking).



Now, let's do some math:


Spoiler: The math



Assuming no Minos Relic or Renowned, you would proc ferocity twice per hit. Because Livid Dagger maxes out your attack speed, you would be able to hit 4 times per second. This means you could proc ferocity 8 times per second. This would heal for 80% of your defense and give you 400 defense. Because the defense lasts for 5 seconds and stacks, you could get up to a max of 2000 defense from the ability alone.

Fully HPBed Werewolf Armor has 840 defense. If you have catacombs 25 (I'm not sure when dungeonized werewolf armor unlocks, so don't @ me) and your armor is 5 starred, you would get triple stats in catacombs, or 2520 defense. If you had mining 25 and all the fairy souls, you would get an additional 83 defense. A dungeon 4 potion would grant another 10 defense. Therefore, at the start of dungeons alone, you could get 2613 defense, and up to 4613 defense from the set ability. I'm still not sure how dungeon blessings work, but if you got enough blessings for +50% defense, you would have 3919 defense, and 5919 from the Werewolf Armor ability. This means you would heal 591.9 health per ferocity proc. Since you could proc it 8 times per second, you would heal 4735.2 health per second, and 9470.4 health with a mender fedora.

With the Perfect reforge, you would get 1140 defense from your armor and 3420 in dungeons, for a max of 7269.5 by the end of the run. You would be healing 726.95 hp per proc, 5815.6 per second, and 11631.2 with a fedora while still dishing out mad damage.



TL;DR;


Spoiler: TL;DR;



Read the whole thing, you lazy slob. I spend 45 minutes typing this up, in which I could have been doing any number of productive things, such as finishing my spanish classwork, grinding dungeons runs, or washing the pile of dirty dishes in the sink, so the least you could do to show your appreciation would be to read the whole damn thing. If you already read it and merely clicked this to see what the TL;DR was, I forgive you.

title: [guide] how to get good dungeons teammates
body:
I have noticed the dungeons community's frustration with bad party members, and I want to share my tips with you about how to get good dungeons teammates.

1. Make sure to have a good note.
Some people will set their note to something like "S run". This is not okay, as it doesn't convey that you want good teammates. Make sure to set your note to "join if ur good", as bad skyblock players might get confused and think that you want them in your party.

2. Make sure to always queue floor 6.
If you want to do a floor 2 per say, the kind of people who would join are the ones that are only good enough for floor 2. Make sure to get players that would do floor 6 so you know they are good enough for your floor 2.

3. Make sure to tell them to get secrets.
Some dungeons players don't understand that they should be getting secrets. Make sure to constantly spam the chat with "GET SECRETS YOU DUMB NONS", so they know what to do!

4. make sure to set a reasonable catacombs level requirement.
To assess the requirement you should look at about what is considered top 10 and set the requirement to that always. You don't want any non- cata 33 players in your party, right?

5. Kick bad players.
Make sure to always immediately kick players if they prove to be bad. Some red flags include:

saying SA or FA in chat. Do you really want someone in your party that can't solo any miniboss?

not readying up in 3 seconds of the dungeon starting. It will seriously hurt your profits to have a really bad member that will make you spend 15 extra seconds waiting.

Saying "7/8 on me"
This is really obvious lmao you really can't find all the secrets? yeah you're getting party kicked


I really hope this helped you all, and have good luck getting good dungeon parties!

title: We, as a community, should get Thirty to do secrets
body:
He's a cata 17 with only 79 secrets, half of which are probably either in the open secrets (like that 1x2 room with the chest in the middle) or ones he found on accident. We should teach thirty how to do secrets, so he actually benefits the team he's playing with. He also might get better at dungeons and not hate it as much.

Whether we like it or not, Thirty is one of the most influential, if not the most influential skyblock youtuber. This community could benefit, as more people would learn that secrets are actually a good thing to do and you shouldn't ignore them. Not only would he be showing the community how to be good, but he would also reveal some locations to the people who don't know.

If for some reason Thirty is reading this, heres a link to a resource most people use for their secrets. You can use it to find the secrets and begin to memorize them. Really helps alot. This is directed towards thirty but I also highly recommend it to anyone.

title: For all those who are wondering - What happened with MenacingBanana?
body:
First, go watch Akinsofts video about it: Akinsofts Video Adressing This

Now here is what happened, if you don't have time to watch a video or whatever.

MenacingBanana was paid by a minecraft server to make 5 Youtube videos on it. (What he was payed, 5000 or 1000, I do not know, both Akin and Banana say different.) Banana made 3 of the 5 videos, all of which got MUCH less views than his normal videos. After he had made 3, he said to a few of his Youtube friends that he did not know if he was going to make the other 2, and because the server had already payed him, he just planned to keep the money, and I assume not make the other videos. 

This was then made into a video by Akinsoft, which received TONS of views, effectively exposing MenacingBanana. Banana made a comment on that video, basically saying he was sorry, and that he would be featured on LegoMaestro's channel (The hypixel news channel) to make his apology more wide spread. 

Whether or not you wish to give him a second, third, or whatever chance is not something I will tell you, so go figure out how you will deal with this by yourself. 
But that is what happened, so yeah. Merry Christmas ig
Boop.

title: Skyblock Fishing Simulator - With progression, xp, leaderboards, and more!
body:
SKYBLOCK FISHING SIMULATOR
WITH PROGRESSION, ITEMS, LEADERBOARDS, AND MORE!





The newly revamped Discord SKY | Brokers


Spoiler: Discord Invite












Join the SKY | Brokers Discord Server!


We are a Minecraft based Discord with an emphasis on Hypixel Skyblock. Always expanding. | 13,238 members




discord.gg







 has just released a Fishing Simulator Discord bot based on some of the aspects inside Hypixel Skyblock.​





Is it fun?
Try it out for yourself! Basically it has all of the things that we love about fishing while ramping it up a bit with new items, sea creatures, and pets. Very easy to use as well as a website to track your statistics! (Thanks to Wykert)



Spoiler: Fishing Website






SSB Fishing Simulator





​

How does it work?
The commands are very self explanatory. With a simple [.fish] you are immediately placed withing the pond. Depending on your Fishing Speed, it can take up to 60 seconds to catch a fish, however it is based on chance so you could potentially catch it in under 3 seconds.





Spoiler: Fishing Pond









​

Catching fish:
Well, as a beginner you are most likely going to be catching what we all catch in Vanilla MC:
Raw Fish, Raw Salmon, Pufferfish, etc.




Spoiler: Fish Catch











Catching Sea Creatures:
Once you get better gear you have a better chance to catch Sea Creatures (factoring in Sea Creature Catch Chance)! Depending on your Gear Score you there are different scenarios that can occur when you catch a Sea Creature:
You successfully catch the Sea Creature, but it kills you and you lose a small amount of coins (upgrade your Health, Damage, and Strength).
You successfully catch the Sea Creature, but it gets away (upgrade your Health, Damage, and Strength).
You successfully catch the Sea Creature and defeat it, but it doesn't drop anything (upgrade your Loot Luck).
You successfully catch the Sea Creature, defeat it, and manage to get some Loot! (POG)





Spoiler: Sea Creature Catch #1














Spoiler: Sea Creature Catch #2









​

How do I upgrade my gear?
The first way is to buy new items at the shop:
You can sell your fish by typing [.fsell all].



Spoiler: Selling Fish










You can sell items you obtain from Sea Creature by typing [.sell (item)]



Spoiler: Selling Items










You can buy items from the shop by typing [.buy (item)].



Spoiler: Buying Items










Lastly you can equip items you obtain (buying or looting) by typing [.equip (item)].



Spoiler: Equipping Items










Shut up, you see, I see it, we all see it. Don't mention it







What's in the Shop?
I don't want to give away all the fun, but we have:
Helmets
Chest-plates
Leggings
Boots
Fishing Rods
Pets

All items were carefully priced in attempt to make the progression of the game fair for all (of course there is always room for improvement).
Here's one of my favorites



Spoiler: Jordan's Favorite Pet













"i CaN jUsT mACrO tHiS eZ"
Well, I would prefer it if you didn't because that's no fun at all
Additionally, we have a little something making it a bit more difficult for you sneaky macro'ers out there.



Spoiler: Get Macro-Checked











​

Want to Flex on your friends?
Check out our leaderboard!
Here's a shout-out to those already putting in SWEAT:



Spoiler: Leaderboard









​

body:
So rn tank is the least used class in dungeons. Also, it is the least useful class in endgame.
Why?
Because tank can be replaced with other classes. For example, berzerker could be a less tankier tank with much more damage, and additional lifesteal. Healer could also be a less tankier tank with healing abilities.
So I suggest adding more special attributes to tank. Maybe true res boost? A new tank weapon? idk
Or maybe make tank more useful in f7, idk.

title: #FreeMynetrix & Tiquann - My side of the story
body:
Hello, please Free Mynetrix and Tiquann

Tiquann and Mynetrix are just normal Skyblock players like the rest of us. They dont deserve to be banned and wiped

Please read all of this before reacting, or commenting. If you'd like to comment please don't take it all out on me as I'm just telling my thoughts, but I will take what you have to say into consideration. It's constructive criticism at the same time.

Also, did I say we shouldve went unpunished? No, but this punishment is WAYY too harsh.



Spoiler: PART - I (The Situation and Results)



Myself, 2 others, Tiquann and Mynetrix were in a call using a bug (that most people in the game knew about) where Fishing Spooky Mobs were still obtainable in Dungeons. Thus we used it however, basically all the big guilds were also doing it, and was being spread. My issue is if you don't want people fishing in Dungeons why make a Rod Dungeonable, and its not our fault you can just so happen to catch Spooky Mobs at the same time. What I mean is if you make a Dungeons Itemable ROD in Skyblock, people were gonna find out about this bug anyways. Why should Mynetrix and Tiquann get wiped for something other people have already reported? It's not like we were abusing the bug behind the scenes, and other players have done worse than that with previous bugs in the past, no ban, and if you're gonna Ban and Wipe Mynetrix and Tiquann then ban everyone in the entire game who have abused bugs. That includes: Fairy Armor Dyeing, Killing people in the Colosseum making people lose MILLIONs OF COINS, and people who collect glitched items.

Mynetrix was one of the hardest working Minemen on Skyblock getting Catacombs 30 in 2 Months of coming to dungeons. A skill average of 45 and only getting into Dungeons when Thorn was a few weeks old. Mynetrix has mutiple WRs in Dungeons, and has more secrets in Dungeons Found than people have killed Zealots.

It's not fair for a co-op to be wiped for something this petty and dumb. Losing stuff at the snap of a finger isnt cool nor no warning telling us never to abuse the bug again EVEN THOUGH YOU NEVER FIX BUGS AND DONT BAN ANYONE. BTW They didnt FIX the BUG at least an hour-- before me getting off (they couldve now)





Spoiler: PART - II (The Admins)



Now, I dont wanna point fingers, but Dctr I have a strange feeling it might be you considering people in the party said you came online 30 minutes previous to Mynetrix's wipe.. Dctr I also have a theory it might be you because you literally ghost Mynetrix WHEN HE TELLS YOU ABOUT THEM.. Mynetrix has changed; Tiquann doesnt deserve the backlash.

Admins, please just reconsider the Wipe.. It's very very saddening to see the progress they have made and for you just too take it away from something as petty as this.. Pretty low..

Dctr.. Mynetrix told you about the CMBT Ghasts with F11 immediately, and you literally said "I'm tired of fixing Combat XP Methods" and fixed it 7 months later. Wtf man? Is that justified?

Oh yeah hey look heres the proof for Dctr ghosting Mynetrix for helping patch bugs then here ya go!












Tiquann is the nicest dude in the world, and is also a very very hard skill grinder and an amazing builder.. Almost having his Average 50 saga done.

And too be honest, Admins I didn't even really see this as a gamebreaking/abusive glitch or bug, yes it's a bug, but have you done anything in the past about this stuff? Not really.





Spoiler: PART - III (Few Add-ons)



Last Message: We never ever advertised, encouraged or deliberately said how to replicate any of the actions we have done here. OFC were in the wrong, yes, but you have too see where this has gone too far.

Last Edit: Mynetrix has done wrong in the past, but he's changed.. None of us even took the moment to realize we're abusing a bug. Besides I see people in the comments accusing him of wrong things. Why was Tiquann wiped also? This is first offense. If Refraction gets a second chance why doesnt Tiquann at least??





Spoiler: Tiquann's Statement on the Situation



Introduction:
So just to clear up some confusion on the reasoning of the wipe and mynetrix's ban and some of the misinformation going around I'd like to say this. As his co-op member I know a lot of what he has done, and has not done in his past. Yes, he sold coins, and paid macroers to level pets, although he never macroed himself. Although he has gotten wiped for this, the admins have, and are continuing to show favoritism to YouTubers ( which is fair because they promote the server) as well as friends/co-op members of YouTubers. Some examples are of (removed for public shaming reasons). paying macroers to level pets, and (removed as well) irl trading and being on the Hypixel Player Council. With this out of the way i would like to talk about what happened.


The situation:
So there was a bug that I had found out about through my guild, Trouble Brewing, and i was dungeon fishing with many players from there, as well as from other guild which had known about it. All of the top 3 guilds had know about it at the time, and Mynetrix was not the main reason this bug spread, it was because of the top guilds. So when he logged on and saw I was streaming myself dungeon fishing, he logged on and joined me. Mynetrix, some friends and I all starting fishing. After about 5 hours after one of our server closed, Mynetrix and I started to do bridge duels. We did a couple games and then he all of a sudden left the game and started laughing. We had joked about him getting banned for dungeon fishing because we thought it wouldn't happen and knew it would be a stupid reason to get banned because it was difficult to do dungeon fishing even if you knew about it because you needed 5 people to clear a dungeon and start fishing without anyone try to actually complete the floor, anyway, thats besides the point. So he had said he had gotten banned and we all thought he was meming and his game just crashed or something. But it turned out to be true so i checked SkyBlock and our profile was gone. This was a big surprise to us because hundreds of ohter players had performed this bug already and there were no warning from admins or anything hinting that this was bannable. So after a few hours of streaming and being confused in general, we ended stream and privately talked about the situation with some close friends. They and most end game guilds all agreed that it was a stupid reasoning to get wiped and that a 30d ban would be understandable but still out of the ordinary for admins to manual ban for a bug like this. So far we have not been able to get in contact with admins or received any responses. Hopefully this can all be resolved shortly however.

Admins.. What is going on:

The last topic i would like to talk about is the communication, or lack thereof, with admins. Mynetrix had recently sent a list of about 15 bugs that are hurting the game in major way to dctr, none of which have been patched yet. We received no warning about this, instead were wiped out of no where. Hyixel has recently added a feature that warns a player of a profile boosting wipe if there is suspicious activity. This is a great feature, but seeing as that it was a manual ban by staff or most likely admins, we couldve easily gotten a warning, simply a message saying to not stream that or to stop using the bug. These are my main problems with the situation. I and many of my guild mates are trying to get in contact with admins/staff to try to resolve this issue







 <-- Tiquan's explaination of the situation.





#FreeMynetrix&Tiquann

title: Why Hypixel should add a Sponge Minion
body:
Hey, SpongeGod here, and today I’m going to tell you why Hypixel should add a new minion that generates sponges.

1. Sponge armour is by far the best set in the game, so there should be a minion used to obtain it. Sets like Frozen Blaze armour aren’t nearly as good as Sponge Armour but they have minions.

2. Sponges are REALLY cool. I mean, seriously. Where would we be without Sponges? I’m willing to bet that sponges actually inspired Notch to make Minecraft.

3. Sponges are useful for multiple areas of the game. Armour? You got Sponge Armour. Fishing? You got the Sponge Rod. Entertainment? Just grab some Stereo Pants.

4. Everyone needs more sponges. You really can never have too many sponges. A Sponge Minion would provide an efficient way in obtaining all the sponges you could ever desire.

5. Sponges already have an entire collection, enchanted and double enchanted versions, an armour set, a fishing rod, a cool pair of pants - why don’t they have a minion too? There are minions that produce materials with way less uses.

I sincerely hope that the admins listen to my idea and add a Sponge Minion to the game. It would benefit everyone in so many different ways and there really is no reason not to.

That’s it, I’ll see you guys later.

title: I interviewed iDobie in minecraft.
Ideas for Hypixel Skyblock
body:
1- Armoire: A wardrobe made to store weapons. I say this idea could be good, because when i store my weapons in my enderchest i sometimes get lost between backpacks, and i propose that there should be a weapon storing place like the wardrobe.

2- Potion affinity talisman tweaks: Potion affinity talisman from all teirs should be able to keep your potions after death and have the potion affinity talisman break or crack after death.

3-bank loan system: taking loans from the bank should be a must have in skyblock, and how it will work would be you will take a loan of money and you should repay that amount of money in 3days or less or else you will have negative currency, and to counter exploits you should lock that profile or make profile hopping from it in accessible till you pay back the money, and i suggest having a credit score system for the bank and make it work by milestones, as example you take a loan of 200k and you pay it back in the proposed time, you will gain 5 credits which would make you able to access the loan system again, and not to exploit that the milestone system comes in. where if you finished the first milestone of 200k you would need to finish the next milestone of 5mil to gain the next amount of credits. I say this update should be rolled in after the minecraft account migration to avoid most amount of exploiters as possible.

title: Special mayor concept
body:
So the one thing i hate about video game is limited time upgrades. Things that if you don't get them they are gone forever. A good example of this would be the community projects system which locks people out from the perks if they don't contribute during the time. To counter this i came up with a new special mayor idea. Lonely Philosopher runs for mayor every 10 in game years ( once every 50 days) Lonely Philosopher always has all his perks

Lonely Philosopher - The admins philanthropist
( the npc is the same one that can be found in the ruins selling the travel scrolls)

Perk one:
Retrograde - Can contribute to past projects for double the cost. Contributions are added onto the current project

Perk two:
Ritual of updates - Lonely Philosopher will start an event for the time he is mayor. If the community reaches the goal set in the event the developers will begin working on a new update ( like community projects but the goal is much bigger and more global - people can contribute without even realising it)
examples of possible goals:

- Run x dungeons

- Fish x amount of sea creatures

- Collect x amount of an item

- Gain x skill exp in a skill

The event awards unique and hard to get items depending on how much you contributed. The requirments scale on how hard it is to get one contribution in that category ( for example the goal would be lower for running dungeons then it would be for collecting skill exp)
possible rewards:

Extra jerry ( low amount of contributions):
Spawns an extra jerry on your island

Developers wand ( medium amount of contributions):
Click on a mob to view its stats ( the wand will display things like defence ,attack, health ,speed etc)

Recon essence( high amount of contributions):
Right click to award all players in you lobby a random amount of skill exp ( this is a pit admin item reference)

Book of disenchantment ( high amount of contributions):
Right click to open up an enchantment removal gui. Upon removing an enchant add 5 anvil uses to that item. ( The book can only be used once on any item)

Pumpkin springlazor( Top 10 placement):
Pumpkin springlazor is my favourite victory dance. It launches a spiral projectile in front of you and launches you back. I was disappointed it wasn't added as an item in the recent Halloween updates so here's my concept of it

Item ablity Pumpkin zap (10% of max mana):
Deal 1000 true damage to all enemies in radius. Consume an extra 10% mana per second cast is hold and deal an extra 1000 + 0.1% of intel true damage per 10% mana consumed
120 second cooldown
( this may need a buff / nerf. There's not many ways to deal true damage in the game rn but i think the long cooldown and high mana cost make this fairly balanced especially as its an aoe. This would be good in blood room) It also has a little recoil just like the victory dance.



Perk three:
Rushed development - Lonely Philosopher will double the community project daily limit (All contributions in this time will count for half so everyone can still get perks, its just that they can do it much faster. This also stops the admins from having to make 3 updates at once lol)

(Lonely Philosopher runs for mayor once every 50 days so admins can decide on what they want the ritual of updates update to be)
