title: Someone tried to scam me.
body: This took place at my island, when i was selling my midas’ sword. He offered me an elegant tuxedo recombulated with LEGION 5 on all pieces. At first, I knew this was a trick. Like my guy, You- Like NO one will trade a midas’ sword for full elegant tux maxed. Alright, so he put it in the backpack, telling me “I can’t trade it” and he wanted proof that It was the real midas’ sword. He kept asking for my discord ign, to take “precautions”. THAT’S WHEN I KNEW IT WAS A SCAM. Like bro, just keep hovering your mouse over the midas, you ****ing idiot, When I told him it was a scam, he said “LOL”. I didn’t feel like exposing him, so I just left.

title: [IDEA] to make enchanted snow actually have a use.
body:
So we all know the bottle of Jyrre, which is basically useless at this point unless it has a very high level of intellegence.
So here’s a rework: basically, 4 Jyrre cores (a new drop from presents to replace Jyrre bottle to make em a little more rare) and a awkward potion makes 1 jyrre potion. And instead of Jyrre potions increasing intellegence based on inventory time it’s now based on tier. when you make a Jyrre potion, it’s useless until you upgrade it to tier 1 for 8 enchanted snow block. Then it gives +5 intelligence for 30 seconds. It can be upgraded to tier 7, each tier costing 2x the enchanted snow blocks, has 2x the duration, and gives +5 more intelligence than the last tier.

New set idea: Festive set.

Gift Helmet: costs snow helmet and a gift catalyst. (Rare drop from presents)
Gives +5% chance for presents on the gift attack mini game.

Blizzard chestplate: costs 512 enchanted snow and snow chestplate.
Gives a +15% chance to get power ups from magma creatures.

Icy legs: costs 28 enchanted packed ice, and snow leggings. Gives -50% knockback 

Frozen chicken boots: after beating a new final level from the chicken guy, you can trade snow boots for these.
These also give a chicken double jump simulator to the double jump on mine plez, but only works on jerry island.

Snow Void Talisman:

This new item has a very, very rare chance to be fished up from Jerry island, and can be crafted with enchanted snow blocks to gain snow points, each block = 1 point. Can hold up to 50k points, and each 500 points gives +1 intelligence and speed on Jerry island.

title: My hypixel skyblock idea #1 (The Hunting Npc)
body:
I'm sorry if my english is bad and now we can start
The idea: hunting guy (Npc)
The hunting guy is an npc that will help you with your slayer or dungeon and
it will cost coins but it depends what floor/slayer lvl it is.
you can buy from him some upgrades for coins like this upgrades i'm going to showcase now
hunting guy upgrades:
hunter respect Lvl 1 - have a 3% chance to get back to money you gave to hunter to help you
hunter respect lvl 2 - have a 6% instead of 3%
hunter respect lvl 3 - have 9% instead of 6%
Next upgrade:
Hunt4fun lvl 1 - every hunt help you will buy from the hunting guy will now cost 5% less
Hunt4fun lvl 2 10% instead of 5%
hunt4fun lvl 3 15% instead of 10%
Next Upgrade:
Hunting Gift - the hunter likes so much to hunt with you and because of it you can get at the end of every hunt new rare items like:
Sneaky shoes:this super rare boots make monsters at below lvl 55 to not target you anymore
hunter armor:
armor rarity - epic
helmet stats -
10 strength 2 crit chance 10 crit damge 75 health and 75 defense
chestplate stats -
10 strength 2 crit chance 10 crit damge 125 health and 95 defense
pants stats -
10 strength 2 crit chance 10 crit damge 95 health and 40 defense
boots stats -
10 strength 2 crit chance 10 crit damge 50 health and 25 defense
full set bouns:
the hunting guy now deals 20% more when helping you and the hunter knife givs 30% more speed
and have more chance when the hunt is over the get rare hunting stuff.
Hunter stone - this stone can be added to the hunter knife and make it from an uncommon sword to a rare sword
plus gives the sword 40 strengh 60 damge 3 crit chance 12 attack speed and 30 crit damge.

and now why should it be in the game:
not only that it will add more stuff to the game it will also help alot for players with high level slayers and with dungeons
i think my favorite thing in this idea will be the hunting guy itself i would just like to see an npc helping me in my dungeon and sometimes maybe says in chat good work or something like it plus i think it would be a really cool thing in general and hope one of the stuff will see it

 an all-in-one skyblock utilities bot for discord

Hey,
We've just released our new SkyBlock Discord bot, SkyBlock Scribe. It has many easy to use API and information based commands, with plans for even more. For the main features of the bot see below:

New Features
Three Associates Puzzle




Item Viewer








Spoiler: Current Features



Current Features:
- Profile Viewer​- Active Pet Information​- Missing Talismans Viewer​- Bazaar Item Statistics​- Auction House Item statistics​- Player Location finder​- Player Networth Calculator (currently down for maintenance)​- Current Mayor, candidates, and perks viewer​- Event timers​- Sea Creature Guide​- Item description and recipe viewer​- Three Associates Puzzle​


​


Spoiler: In Progress Features



In Progress Features:
- Stat comparison​- Whole pet menu viewer​- event reminder​- minion and talisman optimizer​- Auction Finder​


​


Spoiler: Planned Features

- Verification Commands​- Pokecord-Styled Fun Commands​- Guild Finder​- Dungeon Parties Finder​- Custom Prefix​- Dungeons secrets and strategies guide​​

title: THE NEW LAUNCHER PROFILE SCAM
body:
Watch out for this new scam. On discord, on larger servers such as SBZ, these scammers will copy your discord tag and friend you on their discord alt. Then, they will pretend they have this launcher profile error (See Picture). They will ask to send you your launcher profile but DON'T. Your launcher profile, which can be found in your .minecraft directory under the name of "launcher_profiles.json" contains important information like your access token. These access tokens can be used to hack your account. The scammer will try to reassure you by telling you to leave out your email and IGN from that file.

THESE SCAMMERS CAN APPEAR TO BE VERY CONVINCING. DO NOT SEND ANY OF YOUR PERSONAL FILES TO ANYONE, EVEN IF THEY ARE TRUSTED.

title: Menacing gone
body:
He scammed a small server for 5k irl USD. For those of you wondering what that is in terms of skyblock coins:



Each gem is worth 3,384 coins 
The base purchasable gem amount of 675 is worth 2,284,362 coins
The USD cost per gem is ~$0.00739 each, meaning 1 USD is worth ~135.27 gems.
We can thus calculate the value of 1 USD as 457,787 coins
So 1 USD is worth 457,787 skyblock coins.
Multiply that by 5,000 and you get 2,288,935,000
Over 2 billion coins...

That's like 4 times my networth

title: about the Builder's Wand
body:
originally didn't want to make a thread on this because D R A M A, but I want to specify a few things.

1. I did not "steal" the idea for the builders wand (especially not from the forums), nor did I claim that it is my invention. As you can see here, I first made my plugin for the builders wand before skyblock even existed:

 https://twitter.com/i/web/status/977644461625835520(in my video I talked about how I reverse engineered the idea from modpacks that I played like 7-8 years ago)

2. I did not "beg" for the item. I actually was on vacation when the update dropped, and Dctr sent a DM when I was eating lol. I legit had not asked for or even mentioned the Creative Mind before this happened. I was the one reached out to first in this situation.

3. I believe that the staff chose to give me the Creative Mind because my interpretation was the most compatible with what SkyBlock aimed to do with the concept, from the functionality to the description. I wasn't the only one to present the idea, but my version is undoubtedly the closest to the version in the game. If you look closely, the phrase "extend all connected block faces" was from mine, to be honest that right there may be the reason I was chosen over other suggestions.

4. There have been concerns about unequal treatment by staff, and if you are one of those people I would suggest giving this thread a read. Teddy took care of it 





A Note About Me and the Creative Mind “Drama”


NOTE: This is not meant to start drama at all, so please keep the replies positive/respectful. There have been wayyyy to many threads and posts about me and the Creative Mind issue over the last ~2 hours. It’s weird, I never expected it to blow up this way, but whatever, here we are. With that...




hypixel.net





All of this drama would have been avoided if the people accusing me actually watched the video I made but tHirTyViRuS bAd REEEEEEEE

title: Max Euclid's Wheat Hoe
body:
Some people have already raised their eyebrows at the cost of this thing. The max potato hoe is 6.5m, while wheat, which harvests at a third of the rate, is sitting at a cool 47 million. Not coins, wheat itself. You can count the number of individuals who have farmed that much on this server on one hand. After playing the knife game ineptly three times. But the buffs mean we'll be able to make it eventually, right? Well, no.
Because they want to encourage us to use the sacks, personal compactors don't actually work with wheat. There is no option to compact them into hay bales, and as such making enchanted hay bales has to be done at least partially manually. This is inefficient, but when combined with the ridiculous cost of this hoe it reaches a whole new level of absurd.
Let's say you had all the wheat needed to craft this hoe, and all you needed to do now was turn it into tightly-tied hay bales. You would need to make 36,864 enchanted hay bales. I tested how long it would take to do this. Assuming you use a personal compactor to turn the hay bales into enchanted hay bales automatically, have low lag, and don't misinput at all, it takes you around 15 seconds to craft 4 enchanted hay bales, which makes a loop where you're effectively back to square one. This is very generous, my best time in 10 attempts was about 16.5 seconds with 100 ping, but trust me, it doesn't matter.
36,864 / 4 = 9,216 'loops' of crafting
9,216 * 60 = 138,240 seconds
That's 2,304 minutes, or 38.4 hours. Almost a full work week worth of crafting this thing. Assuming you have perfect efficiency. This is insanity.

title: The Infinite Cake Exploit Isn't Really... Infinite.
body:
So right now the new year cake event has an exploit where if you switch lobbies you can get another cake. And then sell that cake for 100 coins. People are saying you can get INFINITE money during these 3 days. Well let me show you that it really isnt infinite.

Hypixel skyblock hub lobbies. There are only around 50-60 lobbies open at a time. Now seeing as the cake sells for 100 coins, the maximum amount of money you can really get from this is about 5000-6000 coins, Which honestly, isnt really all that much. Even if your coop team of 5 people were doing it, you would have gotten a maximum of 30,000 coins. Which is like mining for an hour in the obsidian mines.

Anyways im ecxited to see what events get added to the calendar for the next skyblock year!


(edit) so you can go to your skyblock island and back to the hub and claim it again, so technically it could be infinite, but this event only lasts for like an hour so...

title: How I (Somewhat) Ruined SkyBlock
body:
I come to tell you this story about a man named LlamaBlade.

So, me and my friend ObamaTheApostle joked around how we could make so much money by utilizing people's strange craving for political content in minecraft. We held a contest to see who would win the 2020 USA election by advertising our auctions. I had dirt for Trump, he had dirt for Biden. All was well and good, until....

I won 1M.
Everyone who voted on mine and obama's ah saw how profitable this was.
It became a trend. People would go EVERYWHERE spewing political garbage in every hub for loose change.
I'm sure you've seen this:
" Bid on my ah Trump vs Biden, Red wool = Trump, Blue wool = Biden."

All because of me.
I'm almost honored.
And full of regret.
The funniest part is, it's evolved. People are starting to add Kanye West in, even TECHNOBLADE. This also led to Dream vs Technoblade ah votes to take advantage of those communities.
I have one thing left to say.
Forgive me.

title: [Joke Story] Music in the middle of the night
body:
After an eventful day, the team decided to rest up at a nearby Inn. Each of them had chosen their rooms, and went to rest. 

It was in the middle of the night, when Rogue heard something. 

'Where is that music coming from-' 

Rogue pressed the side of his head to the wall and tried to listen. Curious, he tried to examine the song more. 

'Healer? Is that you playing that music?' 

The Berserk came out of his room and peered at Rogue trying to tear the door down. He paused. 

'Not going to lie, this is kind of catchy--' 

The Tank came out of their room, half expecting Mage and Berserk to be squabbling again. 

They opened the Healer's door. 

It was not the Healer playing the music. 
But the Mage. The music slightly irritated Berserk, thus giving him YET ANOTHER reason to have a go at Mage. 

And in the morning, that is exactly what happened. 

'*Wheeze*' 

​

body:
In skyblock, you eat. What happens when you eat irl? You get fatter and heavier!
So I propose a new skill called eating. You get lvls by eating things. Some examples of things you can eat are:
God potion
Potatoes
Booster Cookie
Melons
etc.

If the item is enchanted (like enchanted pork), eating exp is multiplied by 200

title: IRL Trading is the Consquence of Other Problems
body:
Progression - People want a constant stream of progression and new things. When progression gets too boring, people look for ways to make that progression faster, and thus, may IRL Trade.
Scamming - When people feel like they get "cheated" in some way, they usually are inclined to hack or cheat. Could be the same thing with IRL trading.
Glitches - Same thing as scamming.
TLDR : IRL trading is the consequence of bad progression and scamming. Hypixel should try solving these issues, which could help solve IRL trading.

title: Coins are overpowered, and there aren't enough ways to get them
body:
I just started playing this Sunday, so I'm fairly inexperienced. Please take this post with a grain of salt.

Today I finally got fully enchanted Young Dragon armor and an AOTD. I was so excited to go farm zealots and increase my income by a huge margin. All the guides I was reading were telling me that one-shotting zealots were the early game goal, and once you hit that power level you would be catapulted into the mid-game. However, even in a not very full end lobby, I farmed zealots for 45 min without getting a single eye.
After a deeper dive into statistics of special zealot spawns, and other players' experiences, getting an eye after about an hour was par for the course. If you get lucky, snagging 2 or 3 eyes in that hour isn't impossible, but all the youtube guides use their highest rates rounded up as clickbait. Conversely, if you spend the same amount of time AH or Bazaar flipping, you make much more money faster and at more consistent rates than zealot farming can. Starting at 700k, making 500k Bazaar flipping took me about 30 min. And since it doesn't rely on luck, replicating that is extremely easy.
Making money is the most important thing to do in this game. Everything can be bought with coins. From gear and enchantments to XP boost and minions that help you complete collections, coins can be turned into any other resource. This means that the person who progresses the most the quickest is the one who makes the most money. As far as I can tell, the optimal way to play until you are very late game is to just talk to the 2 NPCs in the hub. This isn't fun anymore.
I really wanted to experience the progression and new content this game has to offer. There are a lot of cool items and bases I was hoping to play around with on my path to having everything, but I'm beginning to think that the only toys you should play with are the AH and Bazaar. There need to be multiple better, faster, and more dynamic ways of making coins. Either that or the overall grind of the game should be reduced, along with the power level of coins. Hypixel Skyblock is a lot of fun, but when there's only one way to play, it gets frustrating and boring very fast.

TL;DR
A new player is excited to progress but realizes that AH and Bazaar flipping are the only viable strategies to progress in a timely manner.

body:
Credits to Tvxas for posting this thread before for Badlion Client. 
Warning: This uses a mod, so it's not my problem if you're banned. It's your discretion and responsibility.

For Badlion Client
Follow this https://hypixel.net/threads/all-of-the-fairy-soul-locations-in-waypoints.3140801/ by Tvxas.
Steps:

Download this .json file from Tvxas https://www.mediafire.com/file/gb3qr0ihlhpmkaz/Fairy_Soul_Waypoints_1.0.json/file
Go to your BLClient-Mod Profiles folder (This PC > Windows (C: ) > Users > [Your Username] > AppData > Roaming > .minecraft > BLClient-Mod Profiles)
Drag the .json file into your BLClient-Mod Profiles folder.
Run minecraft (through BLC)
Turn on Waypoints
For Forge

Download Fyu's Waypoints
1.8.9 https://mega.nz/#!4KBwRIyJ!R7Bjk67VWIC43yr1y3lG16_uK3zHPYOY8pxYaR7Rpdc
1.7.10 https://mega.nz/#!8OQVxSSQ!Po8vobiYSW4r-rO3s7gOAwSeNxSwp_96UnhrGoKodCI

Place the mod into your mods folder. (This PC > Windows (C: )> Users > [Your Username] > AppData > Roaming > .minecraft > mods
If you don't see your AppData folder, you can see it once you press [View] at the top then checkmark [Hidden items] within the Show/hide section

Run minecraft.
Then, a new folder named Fyu's Waypoints should be in your .minecraft folder. Edit the waypoints file with anything really. Use Notepad if you want to lmao
Paste whatever fairy souls you want from this comment on wikia https://hypixel-skyblock.fandom.com/wiki/Fairy_Souls#comm-58018.
Here's the shortcut to the full list https://pastebin.com/i56np5kQ
Do not have any new/empty lines within your file. And, do not copy the "//" lines.

Save the file. (CTRL + S normally).
Reload minecraft.
The tilde (` or ~) and semicolon (; or : ) buttons are your controls.

title: Quick First Impressions on Jacob's Contests
body: From what I could gather, rewards seem to be sort of percentile-based, and the gap between silver and gold is huge. Not necessarily a bad thing, as long as there's adequate and reasonable means to improve. Now, bronze and silver rewards do help in building island-spanning farms to allow for continuous harvesting throughout the event. Bronze seems reasonable by hand and once you get one, the silver medal rewards can ease further construction. However, silver-to-gold seems like an unhealthy way to model progression. You have your island-spanning, you harvest without breaks, now the only change is farming level/pet/hoe. At 46 farming, 98 elephant, blessed rare, I ended about 45k below the gold threshold, and a rough guess to how to get there the quickest is 47/100/Turbo 2 (I'm assuming this is a thing). This will still take a fair amount of time, and plenty more players will have the insane boons that are the math hoes, likely pushing the threshold higher, and this can choke a lot of players out of the gold range and make it significantly harder for newer players to claim a math hoe (which I'm guessing is unauctionable). I don't have a good solution, admittedly. First, I was thinking of tiering hoes (and tweaking the stats) with medals: requiring crops+old hoe+tickets+new blueprint. At the very least, this lets the recipes make slightly more sense (requiring 40ok+ of a crop for a 500-crop recipe seems a little dumb). Maybe just introduce new hoes as stepping stones, as the previous suggestion would piss off a lot of current math hoe holders. I guess this doesn't help much if it's a percentile system like I'm guessing, but bridging the gap between tiers will at least help mentality and incentivize players to come back. Probably the better suggestion, though, would be to have an unchanging threshold at least for a gold medal/access to the math hoes. Similar to the spooky event, I guess. There is the issue of inflation, but after the hype dies down the math hoes alone will be doing that to a ridiculous degree, so I wouldn't sweat that too much. That being said, revamping and gamify-ing farming in my opinion is ultimately good for the game. I'd just like to have bases covered as far as early- and mid-game experience goes.

title: Idea: Charred Snake
body:
You know how mages don't really have an armor that perfectly fits them (besides wise dragon)? Well this mob would be an addition to the blazing fortress (because the loot there is bad + nobody goes there) that helps that. To spawn it, there would be a necromancer npc that is inside a cave that would ask for 25 skulls, which could be found within any hub and will reset daily, changing location. If you supply him with the skulls you will spawn the charred snake (rarely) or charred shards. 

The snake: It would have 4m hp and have an ability called charged char and an offbrand evoker's "fang attack" which can be devastating to someone without a high amount of ehp. 

The armor: The snake would drop a piece of charred armor that is built specifically for mages giving them a good amount of ehp ( a little less than necro lord armr so anything unlike a mage won't use it) and intelligence ( similar to a wise drag's intel), so mages won't need to rely on just tanky armor anymore. Just like dragon frags, charred shards could make charred armor. The special ability of this armor would be called sneaky snake and it will be a "camouflage" that makes you invisible and allows you to do a sneak attack for %50 more dmg (including abilities). This can only be done once all mobs in a 30 block radius are dead or gone. 

The charged fang: the snake could drop a weapon called the charred fang. The fang would do the same ability as the snake (charged char, but doing 10k dmg) and would cost 200 mana.

The snake staff: it could also drop a snake staff would be like an evoker's "fang" attack and would cost 75 mana and do 7k dmg, but good for clearing rooms. Just like all mage weapons, both of their base stats wouldn't be noteworthy.

title: New Prototype Game - Hypixel Skyblock
body:
Hello,

For years SkyBlock has been one of the most requested games on the Network, today we are releasing our own version of SkyBlock in the Prototype lobby!

 What is SkyBlock?
SkyBlock has been around the Minecraft community for more than 7 years, longer than the Hypixel Network! Even though the game has evolved a lot through the years, the idea remains the same:
Players start on a tiny island with almost nothing and quickly start unlocking and collecting resources, expand their island, combat monsters, then create farms and explore all their options.
There are many ways to play SkyBlock, and we have decided to create our own special way.

 How to play Hypixel SkyBlock?
You can go in the Prototype Lobby, or you can directly click on SkyBlock in the compass. There is also a SkyBlock NPC in the main lobby!
You can also easily join using the /play skyblock command.
SkyBlock can be played alone or with friends in Co-op! See more co-op information below.
You can play SkyBlock on any Minecraft version, but we recommend using 1.8.9 as it is still the most stable version!

 Why Prototype?
The game is still in development - there are "coming soon" features and a lot of balancing to do - but during the last few weeks of testing we have been having a lot of fun playing. If we are having fun, then the game is ready for prototype!

As such, please make sure you report any bugs or exploits as soon as possible so we can fix them fast. The best way to do so is to use our bug report form.

Click Continue Reading... to read more about SkyBlock!

Hypixel SkyBlock​Every single player and co-op will start on their own private world, with 2 tiny islands.
On the first island, you will unlock your first Collection: Oak!



Spoiler: Few of our staff testing islands!










Island of skyerzz and Aerh







Island of okexox







Island of Amylea_
(Note that every staff tester got 100% reset, those islands are now gone.)



 Collections
There are currently 55 different Collections in the game. Collections count how many of one resource you collected so far, and they reward you useful or powerful items on milestones!
So let's have a look at the Oak Collection (but no spoilers!).

The Oak Collection contains 9 rewards, like most Collections. Here are the rewards:

Oak Minion (What's a Minion?) - 50 Oak Logs Collected
Oak Leaves Trade - 100 Oak Logs Collected
Leaflet Armor - 250 Oak Logs Collected
Small Enchanted Chest - 500 Oak Logs Collected
Forest Biome Stick - 1000 Oak Logs Collected
Enchanted Oak Log - 2000 Oak Logs Collected
Medium Enchanted Chest - 5000 Oak Logs Collected
Wood Talisman - 10000 Oak Logs Collected
Large Enchanted Chest - 30000 Oak Logs Collected
Once you collect 50 Oak Logs, you will unlock the crafting recipe of the Oak Minion.
(All the recipes you unlock are listed in your recipe menu, we will talk about it later!)

 Minions
On your way to the second island, you will notice a portal, but also this little guy:







They don't protec, they don't attac, but most importantly they work a lot!
Meet your Cobblestone Minion! Take the Cobblestone from his storage to unlock your Cobblestone Collection.


Spoiler: Cobblestone Collection




Cobblestone Minion - 50 Cobblestone Collected
Stone Platform - 100 Cobblestone Collected
Auto Smelter - 250 Cobblestone Collected
Enchanted Cobblestone - 1000 Cobblestone Collected
Compactor - 2500 Cobblestone Collected
Silverfish Pet Egg - 5000 Cobblestone Collected
Miner's Outfit - 10000 Cobblestone Collected
Haste Ring - 40000 Cobblestone Collected
Super Compactor 3000 - 70000 Cobblestone Collected




They are not very smart yet, but they are motivated! Click on him to open his menu:





Our advice is that you should pay particular attention to those Minion menus, they contain their storage but also information on how to use them (can be different per Minion), how to level them up, and what kind of upgrades you can give them!

Minions tend to work a bit slower, but they work all the time! If you go offline they will continue to toil along in your private world. They will start with small storage, which means it won't take long for them to be full and unable to work. As you upgrade them, their storage and efficiency will increase.

There are a lot of different Minions in the game, but at the start you will only be able to place 5 of them on your island. You can unlock more slots the more Minions you level up!
(We recommend placing them close to each other, it won't make them work harder, but at least they will have someone to talk to.)

If you jump in the Portal behind your Cobblestone Minion, you will be teleported to the SkyBlock Hub Island.

The Public Islands







You can think of this as the SkyBlock Lobby, it's a very important place!

All those islands are public islands, you will meet other players there. This is where SkyBlock on Hypixel is very unique. Once in the Village, our advice is to explore and talk to the Villagers, they give important clues and advice!

SkyBlock is a Prototype game, meaning that most of the buildings are not finished, but the important ones are already functional (the Bank, Auction House, the Market, the Blacksmith...). Exploration is key!

Your adventure will begin outside the Village, you need resources to work on your private island and your Collections. Most resources can be found on public islands. For example, North of the Village is the Coal Mine, where you can unlock the Coal Collection!


Spoiler: Coal Collection




Coal Minion - 50 Coal Collected
Enchanted Book Recipe - Smelting Touch I - 100 Coal Collected
Brewing Recipe - Haste - 250 Coal Collected
Enchanted Coal - 1000 Coal Collected
Enchanted Charcoal - 2500 Coal Collected
Diamond Refinery - 5000 Coal Collected
Enchanted Coal Block - 10000 Coal Collected
Enchanted Lava Bucket - 25000 Coal Collected
Wither Skeleton Pet Egg - 50000 Coal Collected



Most resources can be found on the other islands, but to get there you need to use the jump pads on the edge of the hub.
Those require at least a few Skill Levels to use!
To get to The Barn (the island beyond the Farm) you need to be at least Farming Level 2!

Skills
In short, the more crops you collect, the more Farming Experience you will get! The more you mine, the more Mining Exp you will get, same goes for all Skills in the game.






Farming, Foraging, Mining, Combat, Fishing, Enchanting and Alchemy are the 7 SkyBlock Skills.

Leveling up your Skills unlocks Islands, but also perks and other rewards!

That's a lot of information but don't worry, the Nether Star in your hotbar contains everything, it's the SkyBlock Menu!

SkyBlock Menu
This is how your SkyBlock Menu will look at first, you will unlock useful options during your journey.
If you ever get lost, open this menu! It contains a lot of useful information.








Spoiler: Skyblock Menu




SkyBlock Profile - All information about your character stats!
Quest Log - Log of all of your completed and active Quests.
Recipe Book - This is where you can find the recipes of all the items you unlocked!
Trades - This is your personal shop, where you can unlock items to trade or buy with coins!
Collections - Every time you unlock a Collection you will be able to see the entire list of rewards there.
Skills - Keep track of your current Skill level and rewards.
Calendar - There are not many Events yet, but those will all be listed here!
Ender Chest - Your own personal Ender Chest, you can access it from anywhere and store items in it!
Hypixel Game Menu - The Hypixel Network Compass!
Private Island - You can go back to your island from there anytime!
Profile Management - Every player will have at least 2 profiles, you can create another one with friends if you want to!



Special mention to the Profile Management icon in your SkyBlock Menu;
At any time you can decide to create a new profile, solo or with friends!

Co-op!
To start a Co-op with friends, open your SkyBlock Menu, click on the Profile Management icon at the bottom and then you have 2 options:
Left-click to create a New Solo Profile (which will create a second profile)
Right-click to create a Co-op with friends, which will tell you to enter the command;
/coop <friend1> <friend2> etc
You can currently have up to 5 players in a Co-op, so you can invite 4 friends! But they all have to be online at the time of the creation, and all accept the invitation.

Once a profile is already created, you can add friends using the /coopadd command.

Once all players have accepted the invitation, you can start playing. Do note that once a Co-op profile is started, every player in the group are equals and can do anything in the game - there are no leaders, only friends.









If you read everything until now, you are more than ready to start playing the game!
We are very passionate about SkyBlock on Hypixel and we really hope you will like playing it!

Even if SkyBlock is a Prototype game, we will try very hard to never reset progress, even if players find major exploits. As such, you can enjoy SkyBlock right away without fear of having to start all over again.

If you ever find an important exploit (item duplication, issues related to coins, skill exp, enchanting exp, etc...), please contact us ASAP!
You can contact any staff member and they will alert us, or you can create a private conversation with me on the forums or you can use the usual forum bug report form.

That said, if we ever find out that you used an exploit without talking to us, you will be banned from SkyBlock forever! On a similar note, while we are allowing trading and giving items between profiles, if we find accounts created for the sole purpose of exploiting, we will reset and punish the accounts benefiting from it.

Last but not least!
Like previously mentioned, there are a lot of features we are still working on, but if you are curious, here are some spoilers on a few features coming in the next updates:

The Colosseum near the Village will host permanent PvP Tournaments!
You will be able to purchase furniture in the store located in the Village (currently the house where my NPC is standing!)
A lot of the houses in the Village and other villages in the games will be rentable by players, co-ops, and even Guilds!
Yes, every Guild on the Hypixel Network will have their own SkyBlock, and Guild masters will be able to set permissions for each rank!
In the SkyBlock Menu, you can already find the Calendar, depending on the day of the SkyBlock year, moon phase or time of the day, special Events might happen!
In your Collections you might unlock Pets, those will spawn as Level 1 monsters that will help you many different ways.
There is a big Mountain in the Hub, and Ruins of an old Castle, I wonder what those will be.. And what about this Wizard Tower?
You might find a large portal South of the Hub, maybe Guilds will have things to do there...
That's enough for now! Thanks a lot for reading, we are opening the >SkyBlock forums< if you want to give us feedback, positive or negative!
There is still a lot of work to do, but I'm sure we are going to make a great game. 
Enjoy!

title: [50+ mods, not even joking] SkyBlock specific mods you NEED to get right NOW!
body:
SkyBlockAddons: This mod is very helpful. It has so many small little neat SkyBlock features that aren't too game changing but are very helpful. Such as, dark auction timer, locking slots, fancy warp menu, better health bar, backpack display, and much more.

SkyBlockExtras: This mod costs $5, the problem with it is that people keep recreating SkyBlockExtra's features with other mods. However, SBE will be more optimized and still has a few tricks up its sleeve. It has a good API viewer ingame, and almost everything in other mods. If you have the money, it's a very helpful mod. I don't have the mod so I'm not 100% sure of what's in it

SkyBlockAddons Beta: Insane mod. It costs $3, however... it contains a dungeon room secret display (easier to see), better skill progress bar which looks a lot nicer and has more customizability, shows how much essence you have, fel sword kills, Personal Compactor backpack preview, rock and dolphin pet tracker, teammates get a glowing effect, expertise kills in lore, better orb, better chroma, show dungeon deaths, shows if items are recombobulated more clearly (helps prevent scamming), 3D mob slayer tracker, shows where items were obtained, class milestones, with the teammate overlay, it shows how low they are, stat boost for dungeon items, shows heads for minimap and has better turning, tells u when ur teammates are low, glowing dropped items, and more.

However, if you would like the mod for FREE! I made a guide, basically, the developer made the mod open source and it just tells you how to turn the code into a mod: https://hypixel.net/threads/simple-...the-sba-beta-in-less-than-10-minutes.3459763/

Cowlection: Pretty good API stalking, really good for stalking your dungeon party. Tracks dungeon deaths, dungeon performance, let's you see item quality (a life saver), overall a pretty sick mod

NotEnoughUpdates: Wow just wow, this mod blew me away. From a completely custom ah that's viewable from anywhere, to the recipe to every item in the game and extra info about it, to better GUIs, better AoTE warp, dungeon profit checker, a cool stats viewer, custom colors for high quality enchants, treecap overlay, custom trade menu, makes GUIs feel more responsive w/ custom GUI, allows you to client-side rename any item, etc.

SkyBlockCatia: Ingame API stalker, item rarity, a toast when a rare item drops, better ah, and so so much more

Apec: Gives your game a neat new GUI. Some people hate it, some people love it.

SkyPixel: Very useful mod for enchanting 50.

SkyBlockPlus: A few neat features but it has a couple bannable features and is made by a hacked client dev. Use at your own risk (they made the link an adfly, sorry)
Edit: Someone gave me the mediafire link for SBP

SkyBlockHUD: Neat little HUD for Apec haters. To get this mod, you have to become a moulberry patron: patreon.com/moulberry

SkyBlockImproved: A few small features, not much that other mods don't have but a fairly good stat viewer and a way to view giant's health which is cool (very hard just from looking)


Spoiler: ChatTriggers Mods



To add chattriggers modules, download chattriggers and do /ct import [NAME]
DungeonUtilties: Puzzle solver

SoopyAddons: Allows you to spot the real livid easily.

SBInvSee: Invsee for SkyBlock

SkyBlockCommands: Chat macros, wooo

FishingUtilities: better fishing... tracks fishing loot

ChatClear: Removes some stuff from chat

CoinsFromGriffin: Griffin loot tracker

SkyBlockStats: Better skill xp bar look

ExpertiseProgressTracker: Hm, what does this do. Idk why anyone would want this but whatever.

DungeonDeathTracker: Obvious

FishAlert: SBA plays the fish speed literally a second before the fish leaves. This mod plays it a little bit earlier to help you actually catch it

SharkAlert: Self-explanatory

HideOthersFishingHook: Self-explanatory

DungeonMilestones: Self-****ing-explanatory

CRANK: Want admin rank? Get it ez

WatcherAlert: tells you when someone opens blood/completes it

SkyblockiaNerds: a skyblock mod

FakeRNGDrop: trolling mod

BetterSBNPCs: better names

BroodMotherWarn: tells u when broodmother spawns

LockSlayer: prevents you from doing wrong boss

LockOrb: Doesn't let you double place orbs

CoinsFromGilded: tracks total gilded coins

LockPet: When enabled, it will only let you click on certain pets of your choice (don't click on wrong pet)

WatcherCountdown: Tells you how long until X event happens in watcher fight

DoubleHubWarp: double warps you when typing /hub

BazaarInfo: Gives info about bzr

SlayerUtilties: slayer drop tracking

DragonPercent: Dragon percentile health

RaiderAxeDisplay: Displays raider axe kills

SBConnect: 99.9999% bannable... It autoreconnects to SkyBlock when there's a game update/server restart. Useful for AFKing

SkyblockBar: Sick health/mana bar

CookTheBooks: Is your coop member not on? Do they want you to get 100m coins to pay off for that midas you bought? I've got the mod for you. This mod fakes purse balance.

I only included mods specifically for SkyBlock, no Hypixel mods, no PvP mods, just mods that are MADE FOR SkyBlock.

title: [Idea] Flying Pig Pet / Upgrade
body:
You know how they added the vampire fangs for the Bat pet right?
Lets add something else for the pig Pet.
Introducing: 





The Flying Pig pet 

To upgrade your old grounded pig into a Flying Pig
First you must acquire Wax Wings, a Crazy Rare drop from any Mob from the Mythological Ritual while your griffin is at least Epic Rarity.
Afterwards, simply equip your Legendary Pig with these wings to grant it new Abilities:
All stats are for the level 100 pet.
Speed: +50

Rider: Right-click your summoned pet to ride it! 

Flight: Soar through the skies with Style! Just don't get too close to the sun or tire out the pig. 

Dash: While holding an Enchanted Carrot on a Stick, Right click to quickly dash 6 blocks in the direction you are looking at 
(4 second cooldown)

Oinking Call: While flying, the pig will push back nearby foes.
(30 second cooldown)

Explanations: 
Flight: You will continuously move towards where you are looking at, holding s will cause the pig to hover and be unable to move. Going above build limit or staying on flight mode for more than 5 minutes will melt the wings/ exhaust the pig, forcing you to glide down. (wings won't be destroyed)
Oinking Call: The pig will oink at nearby foes, knocking them back 2 blocks and briefly stunning them. 

If anyone could give feedback or show me a website where you can make custom pets, that would be great.

title: Toadstar0 seems to have changed his ways
body:
He just uploaded, and it looks like he's changed his ways (at least a bit).

No more all caps titles which are completely clickbait:
Hypixel Skyblock - How to get SPECIAL PERKS from Community Projects!

It's still pushing for clicks and views, but every Youtuber does that, cmon.
It's real information that's pretty helpful, even if it is a bit late.
No more 60 second long intros about advertising his discord, asking for subs and likes, notification bells, etc.
Even his thumbnails are less, "OMG INSANE ARMOR SET - NEVER DIE!!!".

The video seems less rushed, better edited, more informative, and more scripted.

The one thing I still don't understand what he did was sub botting, which is really cheap. However, we don't have rock hard evidence and ever since he's blown up everywhere he seems to have stopped (I could be wrong). Onto his video:

The video seems less rushed, better edited, more informative, and more scripted. Hopefully he's changed his ways he seems set up to continue being a good youtuber.

Thanks @Toadstar0 , respect from me

title: I really like how they implemented the farming competitions
body: When the leak came out, I had a few issues on it. Gold medals were limited to 5 players, I expected it to be like a once per year kind of event, and I was skeptical about the raised farming cap because again only 5 people per event could get it. However, the actual implementation completely fixed my issues. Gold medals are now the top 5% of players, the competitions are very short and frequent meaning I won't need to build new farms for hour long events, and each event has different crops meaning that not only are you limited by the type of crop, but it splits up competition. I also like how the medal conversions work, especially since the events are so frequent. If someone doesn't have high farming and an elephant pet they can still stick with bronze and silver medals, then the biggest reward, the increased level cap, is limited to people with high farming levels who are closer to reaching farming 50 anyway. All in all, they did a good job with the balancing.

title: Mathematical Hoes Explained
body:
So I checked out the new hoes in SkyBlock, mathematical hoes. Each one is named after a legendary scientist. 

I want to go over each scientist because I'm betting there's a connection between the name and the ability.

HOES:

Newton
Pythagoras
Gauss
Turing
Euclid

Let's go over each scientist.

Newton:

You've probably heard of Isaac Newton before. He discovered gravity and did a bunch of experiments with that, including writing three laws that I probably should have memorized but I'm terrible at physics. His hoe is the Nether Wart hoe.


Pythagoras:

Pythagoras you may or may not have heard of. He was a great Greek mathematician and philosopher. He did a bunch of complicated math **** that I studied in seventh grade and now no longer remember. His hoe is the Potato hoe.


Gauss:

Carl Friedrich Gauss (whose name I always read as "cool fried rice gauze" lol) was a mathematician who solved a bunch of arithmetic series problems at superspeed when he was seven years old so he was, like, ****ing brilliant. His hoe is the Carrot hoe.


Turing:

Alan Turing was a British scientist who cracked the Nazis' Enigma Code in WW2, preventing the threat of German U-boats. He also made significant progress on inventing the computer. His hoe is the Sugar Cane hoe.


Euclid:

You've probably heard of Euclid, he did a bunch more math **** and he was also Greek, inventing Euclidean math and more stuff that I forget because I learned it four years ago. His hoe is the Wheat hoe.



Possible Connections I've Found: 

None right now, except that if I remember correctly, @Technoblade jokingly referenced Pythagorean math in The Great Potato War. 

Comment if you have any!

title: Yall are so petty.
body:
Honestly, there are much bigger things to be worrying about out there in the world, and even right here in the Hypixel community.

Tons of people are constantly committing wrongdoings and being extremely out of lines, from talking down others, to mocking others, to fights, arguments, flame wars, death threats, doxing, etc. I continue to be shocked at the complete unpredictability of the community regarding reacting to prominent members.

I wasn't gonna say anything, but after stumbling across an actual petition page to get this guy banned because he said an update would come out at a time and it didn't is extremely petty. I know you guys are better then that.

We've had YTers here who have hacked on the server, attacked their fans verbally, smack talk the server constantly and spread bad word of mouth, abuse their powers in build battle by choosing inappropriate themes, and we've even had predators, but the only thing anyone seems to care about is this one guy saying an update time is happening, and then it doesn't.


The dude's not 100% out of the water, cause he's definitely dug holes for himself in the past, but out of all the YTers who have shown themselves to be selfish and cruel, what this guy has done comes nowhere near as close to any of the guys I mentioned above. Yall need to control yourselves and be better.

title: [MEGA-IDEA] Coalitions
body:
Part 1

A coalition happens in Skyblock given the terms:
- All mayors have not been elected within the last election.
- All mayors have run at least 2 out of 3 times in the last 3 elections.

1) Their votes will be pooled together
2) The perk count changes (for a group of 2: it will take 1 perk from each and take a mixed perk) (a group of 3: it will take the mixed perk from the first 2, and 2 perks from the 3rd) (a group of 4: mixed perk from 1 and 2, and 1 perk each from 3 and 4)
3) The mayors will have a special name for their group has only 2 mayors in it.

Other things:
A coalition may occur in the middle of an election.
A coalition contains at least 2, at most 4 mayors.

That being said, it's very rare to get a coalition of 3 (probably 10.1% given the circumstances) or a coalition of 4 (5.2% given the circumstances).

Also, if two mayors have a perk that leads to an event, it is extremely unlikely that they will be paired.

Part 2

Name of all Mayor Double Coalitions + extra perk
Barry Diaz: EZ Money (Gain 2x coins from the spell kills)
Barry Aatrox: Magical Slayers (Slayers take 20% more magic damage)
Barry Paul: Mages Unite (20% more mage XP)
Barry Marina: Magical Fish (2x more magic damage to sea creatures)
Barry Diana: Magical Pets (Higher chance to get rarer pets, stacks with the pet luck)
Barry Foxy: Mana Fest (For 1 hour every 10 hours, gain 50% more mana regeneration)
Barry Cole: Magical Miners (Mana regenerates 3x as quick in the deep caverns)
Diaz Aatrox: Slayer Coins (Slayers are 75% cheaper)
Diaz Paul: Rich Dungeoneers (Dungeons chests are 30% cheaper, and the gold chest is free)
Diaz Marina: Fishing for Coins (Higher chance to fish up coins)
Diaz Diana: Mythological Treasure (Higher chance to find more coins in burrows)
Diaz Foxy: Event Tokens (Gain more candies and gifts from events)
Diaz Cole: Mining for Money (A certain ore will give more coins when mined)
Aatrox Paul: Slayers & Dungeons (Gain 20% more slayer XP and dungeoneering XP)
Aatrox Marina: Fish Slayer (Rare Chance to find the Kraken, a mob that drops so much ink sacs and lily pads (nearly 200))
Aatrox Diana: Slayer Petkeepers (Higher chance to find the Ghoul Pet, Tarantula Pet, and the Hound Pet)
Aatrox Foxy: Slayer Event (Slayers are 90% cheaper for 2 hours)
Aatrox Cole: Deep Explorers (Gain 20% more combat XP in the Deep Caverns)
Paul Marina: Fishing in Dungeons (Chance to catch a rare dungeons mob by fishing which drops really good loot (Sunken Midas after F4))
Paul Diana: Mythological Dungeons (Chance to find Griffin Upgrades in Dungeons)
Paul Foxy: Dungeon Fest (Makes dungeons way more playable by expanding the map by 4x during this event)
Paul Cole: Secrets in the Keeps (Cracked Walls can now be mined with a Stonk)
Marina Diana: Kraken Hunters (See Aatrox Marina)
Marina Foxy: Extended Fishers (Fishing Festival is now 24h)
Marina Cole: Deep Fishing (+30% fishing XP in the deep caverns (slimehill))
Diana Foxy: Mythological events (mythological event extends to 24 hours after the next election has been picked)
Diana Cole: Mining for myths (Chance to spawn mythological creatures by mining if you are over mining 15)
Foxy Cole: Miner's Festival (Mining Festival is 24h)

Part 3

Scorpius only collaborates with 3 mayors: Aatrox, Caleb (see below), and Paul
Scorpius-Aatrox (Dark Slayers): Chance for slayers to drop massive amounts of coins.
Scorpius-Paul (Shadow Explorers): Increased chance of finding a Midas Room in dungeons by 50%.

Mayor Caleb: Rarely appears in a two-person coalition, and gives a massive upgrade. (1/250)
Caleb-Barry (Intelligence United): Sells intelligence enrichment for 2.5k bits (1/2 price of Elizabeth!)
Caleb-Diaz (Money Mulchers): Increases contribution cooldown by 18 hours.
Caleb-Aatrox (Supreme Slayers): Slayers are free.
Caleb-Paul (Diamond Dungeoneers): Increases the chance of finding treasure talismans by 40%.
Caleb-Marina (Flexing Fish): Fishing has a chance to give you massive amounts of coins.
Caleb-Diana (Money Burrows): Always find 3k-15k coins at the end of a burrow. (doesn't replace the loot)
Caleb-Foxy (Appraisers of Jerry): Opens Jerry Island for 24 hours. (only 20 gifts to find, 3 magma fights)
Caleb-Cole (Miner's Massive Money): Mining a certain block will give you coins! (ex: quartz gives you 10 coins)
Caleb-Scorpius (Auctioneers): Gain 1% more cash if your auctions are more than 10 million!
Caleb has no base perks, all base perks of this coalition are from the other mayor!

Players can now become mayors.
The mayor's name will be a part of their username, their real name, or a similar sounding name as their real name.
Players will be a Youtuber, Admin, or rarely a player.
Youtuber -> Perks will relate to what they are known for. (Technoblade -> Potato, TommyInnit -> Money)
Admin -> Perks will relate to what they have added. (Dctr -> Pets)
Players -> Players can choose their specified perks using submission and they might be added. (Most likely Mini-Youtubers (Leocthl, Fezzy, etc.) or WKM (GamingDevil, Quaglet))

title: Some useful tips for building tree farms.
body:
Hi! So, if your going to make a tree farm on your island with the new builders wand, here are some tips.
TIP ONE: For the best optimized layout of your farm, I'd recommend going and looking at Jules channel on youtube and looking for his video on foraging. With his layout you can actually get 1.1m foraging exp per hour.
TIP 2: When you make your farm, build it above the main part of your island. It has to be atleast 30 blocks below height limit. The reason you do this is so that you don't have the problem with saplings not growing because they are under your island.
TIP 3: If you do not want to follow Jules guide, place down a night saver after all the trees have grown so you don't get annoying 1 wide trees growing.
TIP 4: Make sure you do the two extra layers of glass under each strip of glass that is inbetween the dirt rows. This prevents trees from having their leaves grow underneath your island, and also makes the tree go to a different spot which messes up the layout. This is what I messed up and I really regret it. 
TIP 5: Place down a night saver when you plant the saplings. Then place down a day saver when done planting to make the saplings grow. The reason you do this is because trees growing can mess you up a bit while placing saplings.
(Also pls use foraging exp pots.)
TIP 6: Use spruce saplings for your farm. These are the best because they grow very tall and wide trees. Spruce saplings can be bought at the new builder npc.


What armor, pet, and axe should I use?: I'd recommend using a young dragon armor set, for maximum speed. Or use whatever set gives you the most speed if you don't use god pots. The best pet would be a legendary monkey pet, but that pet is very very expensive. The next best pet is the legendary ocelot pet. But if your going for foraging 50 you should get a legendary monkey at some point. The best axe is obviously the tree capitator. A recommendation for the tree capitator is to get the toil reforge which can be obtained from the npc by the blacksmith. (The toil reforge stone costs 1 million coins, and requires 10k to apply to your axe. The effects of the toil reforge gives you 4% more foraging exp)

If you have any more tips I should include in here please inform me. If you provide a valid tip for foraging I will put it in and put your name by the tip.
Hopefully this helps you! 
Please bump if you want to, because I believe this could help a lot of players with their tree farms.

title: Slayer Additon
body:
I decided to post this in the Skyblock forums so the right people would see it, if anyone was wondering.

So, slayers are a bit lacking. There haven't been any updates for slayers for a while, so heres my ideas. I'll be introducing 2 new slayers, as well as a few new items for revenants and svens.


BONUS ITEMS


Old Reactor Core (Svens)
The Old Reactor Core is one of the core components for the Olderflux. It can be crafted or be obtained as a drop from fighting tier 4 svens. If obtained as a drop, the Old Reactor Core will have a 1 in 2000 drop chance, giving it a 0.05% chance to drop, but can only be dropped from t4 svens. This chance is significantly higher than the overflux capacitor drop, but you need Sven 8 to have a chance for it to drop. For those who don't want to see another sven in their life, there is another way. To craft the Old Reactor Core, you will need to surround 64 gold teeth with 512 True Essence (64 in each slot). The Old Reactor Core will be enchanted gray dye.



Spoiler: Old Reactor Core Recipe












Screenshot


Captured with Lightshot




prnt.sc








Olderflux (Svens)
The Olderflux is the Overflux, in the case that it has the same abilities, but just as costly and less dependent on RNG. The Olderflux will require Sven 8, acting as a last stand for anyone who doesn't want to grind Svens anymore. The Olderflux will require a manaflux power orb (row 2, column 2), 3 Weak Wolf Catalysts (row 1, column 2), 256 True Essence (64 in each corner), and 3 Old Reactor Cores in the rest of the slots. The Old Reactor Cores will be replaced with normal gray dye in the screenshots as I am not able to enchant them due to item IDs not working properly. One last thing, the olderflux will be a grayish old, signalling stress as people get older, and hair can turn gray due to stress. Proof? Look at Obama before he ran for president, and look at him when his term ended.

title: Proof that T10 Perfect is better than or at least equal to necromancer lord for tank related builds
body:
Use giant reforge on 5 star t10 u get 810 base hp in dungeons and 1k base def on average for the chestplate/leggings while in dungeons.
5 starred, giant necromancer lord armor gives you ~1.4k base hp and ~600 defense while in dungeons.
If you put these approximate numbers in an effective hp calculator, t10 gives you 8910 effective hp, and necromancer lord gives you only a slight bit more, at 9100 effective hp.
This concludes that yes, the leggings and the chestplate are better than t10, however, the chestplate is VERY expensive, so you are better off getting literally anything else that is tanky. 
The boots are a bit different. t10 5 star giant boots give you 860 hp and 800 defense. 5 starred Giant Necromancer Lord Boots give 1100 health and 450 defense.
Putting these numbers in the same calculator gives 7650 for tier10 boots, and Necromancer Lord boots only give you 6050 effective hp. 
T10 is better than necromancer lord in boots, however, the best setup would be chestplate and boots as t10, and leggings as necromancer lord. The helmet can be a mender fedora for easy healing or either of the two.
The choice is up to you, both sets are great in their own way, and can do the job great. I use 3/4 t10 and necromancer lord helmet, which can get me up to 600k effective hp by the end of a f6, and about 1m while using the tank passive, thanks for listening.

title: New dragon ideas, yes.
body:
alrighty folks, its time for dragons to be profitable again! I'm proposing 3 new types of dragons today, Furious, Magical, and Ultimate

As most of you have probably figured out by now, each dragon (except for superior) is dedicated to a specific statistic. (Ex: Young is meant for speed, Wise for intelligence, Strong for strength) Given that, you can probably see where this is going.

I'll start off with the Furious dragon:
This dragon would be very similar to the Strong dragon: Average health and defense, but raises damage by a tremendous amount. The dragon armor would give Attack Speed and Ferocity (I was thinking about +15% attack speed per piece, and +5% ferocity per piece, let me know if this is too OP or needs to be buffed) The armor would be a crimson color, somewhere between Unstable and Strong armor. Here's an example of the color scheme.





Next up will be the Magical dragon. This dragon would be extremely rare, and specialize in Magic Find.
This dragon would be one of the tankier dragons, with more health and defense than strong and wise dragons, but not by a lot. It would raise Magic Find by 5% a piece (again, let me know if this needs to be buffed or nerfed) The armor would be a darker blue color, again, here's an example, lol I can't draw





Last but certainly not least, we have the Ultimate dragon. This dragon would be the first dragon to beat out the almighty Superior dragon in terms of statistics. In terms of statistics, this set would grant a total of (without enchants) 500 HP, 700 defense, 50 Strength, 35 Speed, 15 crit chance, 60 crit damage, and 150 Intelligence. Obviously, the main selling point of Superior armor is the full set bonus, so i propose that you would double the effects of the Superior ability, raising it to 10% extra stats in every category. I think, considering how strong this armor set is, the chance of it coming out of the egg would be less than 5%, maybe even down to 1%, but I don't know. Anyway, here's an example for color.




hey if you're still reading this, you're pretty cool. Feel free to write any suggestions in the comments.

title: [1.6.3 Farming Update] ActuallyAssets - A vanilla-esque resource pack made for Skyblock
body:
ActuallyAssets is a Hypixel Skyblock texture pack that tries to fit the vanilla art style of Minecraft as much as possible. This pack has a texture for almost every weapon, armor piece, and several other smaller things (as you can see below). I am currently testing out new things for this pack including custom mob textures dependent on height.



Spoiler: Pack Images



Almost all swords as of v0.9.3 (image hasn't been updated for v0.9.4, but all Floor 6 swords are in the pack)




Almost all armor as of v0.9.3 (note that not all the armor models are textured yet)




Almost all ranged weapons w/ animation (alphabetical) as of v0.9.3




All tools and biome sticks as of v0.9.3












Current Version: v1.6.3

Additions/Changes:
- Added Armor of Magma Leggings model texture
- Added Bait Ring texture
- Added Bat Artifact texture
- Added Bat Talisman texture
- Added Beastmaster Crest texture
- Added Candy Artifact texture
- Added Candy Ring texture
- Added Candy Talisman texture
- Added Cat Talisman texture
- Added Claim Your Rewards UI texture
- Added Coco Chopper texture
- Added Euclid Wheat Hoe texture
- Added Extra Farming Drops UI texture
- Added Farming Level Cap UI texture
- Added Gauss Carrot Hoe texture
- Added Jacob’s Ticket texture
- Added Mathematical Hoe Blueprint texture
- Added Medal Trades UI texture
- Added Melon Dicer texture
- Added Mythological Bazaar Group UI texture
- Added Newton Nether Warts Hoe
- Added Pumpkin Dicer texture
- Added Pythagorean Potato Hoe
- Added Recipe Book UI texture (by Mojang from 1.12)
- Added Shark Scale Armor model texture
- Added Turing Sugar Cane Hoe
- Added Unique Gold Medals UI texture
- Added Upcoming Contests UI texture
- Added What Is This UI texture
- Added Werewolf Armor item texture
- Added Werewolf Armor model texture
- Improved Creeper Pants texture
- Improved Lapis Armor texture
- Improved Leaflet Tunic texture
- Improved Obsidian Chestplate texture
- Improved Steel Chestplate texture
- Improved Stereo Pants texture
- Improved Reaper Scythe texture
- Improved Spider Boots texture
- Improved Sponge Armor texture
- Changed Angler Armor model texture to remove the black
- Changed the Go Back UI texture so that it uses the gold palette
- Changed the Guardian Chestplate texture to remove the eye and redo the shading
- Probably some other things that I forgot!


Fixes:
-

Notes:
- I am aware several armor textures aren’t loading properly, I will look into it for the next update
- Next update will include all the textures from this past update that I missed







MediaFire Download: http://www.mediafire.com/file/0jrzga3oexka3lr/ActuallyAssetsv1.6.3.zip/file

title: [Suggestion] Alchemy Potion Scaling
body:
Alchemy is useless.

There. I said it. With God Potions, Alchemy is a useless skill except for the what, +10 intelligence you get from hitting level 50? Which costs what, 40mill?

It's almost as if there were some guy in the basement of a bar who makes you spend 30mil to get three numbers to flex! Oh wait-


The point is, God Potions. 500k for 24 hours of all max pots.

Kinda ****ing OP?


So here's my suggestion.

God Potion durations are equal to half of your Alchemy Level.

Alchemy 50? 25 hours.

Alchemy 25? 12 and a half hours.

Alchemy 30? 15 hours.







This would make Alchemy 50 something worth achieving and make God Potions a balanced item again.


Thank you for coming to my TED talk.

@Minikloon 
@Jayavarmen

title: >> The Skyblock Leaderboard << **NEW DUNGEON LB'S** NEARLY 200k TOTAL VIEWERS
body:
**NEW** -Anyone can apply for an S+ dungeon time, because there are no in game leaderboards

Leaderboards are recorded with [Amount] [IGN] [Date Recorded]. Blank positions are unknown players. Currently only adding top 5 players for everything, will need a screenshot or sky.lea.moe link as proof. It will be up to you to post new screenshots to update your rank. If others replace you in the same position, I will need a new screenshot from you showing your rank. This isn't an exact leaderboard, as positions aren't updated automatically and people move spots, but we can make it more accurate by adding more players and updating the post. If you are not top 5 for anything, feel free to still send screenshots of your leaderboard, it is always cool to compare to others. 

Looking for other leaderboards? Find them here: https://skyblock.matdoes.dev/leaderboards
(A ton of other leaderboards on this website)


Spoiler: FAQ



Q: When will this be updated?
A: I try to update weekly, just try to be patient I will get around to it.

Q: Can I apply for this thread if I have my collection API off?
A: Yes, you can, but keeping it on will help me with updating your progress. Ill give you a cookie if you do keep it on.

title: [IDEA] New enchant!
body:
I don't know what to call it, but it would just be an enchant that would make leveling farming easier. The perk would be:
For every 100 blocks broken, you gain extra farming xp.
25% chance to get 10 extra farming xp
25% chance to get 20 extra farming xp
25% chance to get 100 extra farming xp
10% chance to get 250 extra farming xp
7.5% chance to get 1000 extra farming xp
7% chance to get 2500 extra farming xp
.5% chance to get 5000 extra farming xp

It would just be a bonus on top of the xp you gained from getting the blocks
When you break 100 blocks it will show a message in chat:
"You have broken 100 blocks, and the skyblock gods are pleased. You are granted x farming xp for your efforts!"
Or something like that

(farming blocks such as pumpkins, melons, sugarcane, potato, carrot, mushroom, etc)

title: [IDEA] Wizard Portal Use, the Hall of Wonders, and new Ultimate Enchantments
body:
So I'm no good at formatting, so please bear with me xD.

The Wizard Tower

The Wizard Tower has no current use other than taking up space. I'm sure the admins have some idea for it, but this is my view.

He's a wizard. He should be able to teleport you to places, including an area called the Hall of Wonders (maybe like a temple out of quartz??) unlocked at Enchanting 25?

What will the Hall of Wonders have?

The Hall of Wonders will have different things including

Normal Enchantments and different items

Experience V (since experience IV costs 750K i think maybe Experience V will be 1,5M?)
Sugar Rush IV (price unknown)
Archaic Experience bottles (since titanic gives 250 lvls, maybe archaic exp will give 300-500?)
Big Brain VI, of course.

New Ultimate Enchantments

Traveler I

Currently average skill level is just a flex. What if we put it to use? Traveler I will give you a 0.1% - 0.5% (depending on level) stat increase for every 10 average skill level you have. It will be applied to armor (open for discussion, it might be OP) up to 2.5% at all skills maxed (runecrafting and carpentry shouldn't affect this please)

Revelation I

No ultimate enchantments on Treecapitator yet so here you go. Gain a 1%-5% (depending on level) chance to get the enchanted form of the log you're breaking. That's it.

Hidden I

This one's for all the mages out there - gain 0.1%-0.5% (depending on level) more ability damage for each 5% of your missing health. Sort of like Last Stand, but for mages. This goes on armor as well.




If anything needs nerfed or buffed do tell.
​​
​​

title: -Best- Money Making Methods - Nov. 2020
body:
Money Making Method 1.
Ever since the Bits shop update came out, Booster Cookie prices have gone up significantly. If you have some IRL cash and are too
lazy to work for money, head onto Hypixels store and get some skyblock gems. (Every 2.75$= 1 cookie AKA: 1mil)

Money Making Method 2.
Another method that uses Cookie Boosters is to buy them from the bazaar and use them. You can gain Bits from each cookie
just from doing nothing! Every 30 minutes you gain 250 bits. One you have accumulated all of the bits that you can get
head over to the bits shop. There, you can find really high selling items. I can't give any specific items to purchase,
because prices vary all the time, but either Minion-X Storage Expanders are the best or Kat Flowers. (Only get Kat flower
If it's selling for over 100k and Minion-X Storage Expander if their selling for above 280k!)

Money Making Method 3.
One of my personal favorite money making methods is to make and sell Hast IV potions. Haste potions are unlocked in early Coal Collection.
-To make Haste potion get 3 water bottles and put them in brewing stand, add nether wart and after that add 1 piece of Coal
to make the haste IV version add an Enchanted Glowstone block or preferably Enchanted redstone Lamp- (Cheaper to use redstone lamp
and not only upgrades the lv but adds time!) Once they're all made you can sell each individual potion for either 30-60k!

Money Making Method 4.
The Final money making method is through White Gifts. (A stack cost 396k) Buy 2-3 stacks and find a friend to open them with,not a random,
after opening them you have a chance to get a snow minion. Have your TRUSTWORTHY friend give you the one they got and upgrade
both to Lv 11 and sell em for 1mil each!


I'm going to start making a new ,Best Money Making Methods, forum every month so make sure to follow to stay updated!​

title: The Entire Script to Technoblade's First Skyblock Video
body:
I think Skyblock, at its core, is the ultimate challenge in resource management. You spawn on a tiny island in an empty universe. All you have is a tree, some supplies, and some dirt to stand on. You have to treasure every dirt block, because if one falls into the void, there's no way to replace it. And as you carefully navigate your absurd circumstance, you gain a new appreciation for the few things you have as you meticulously use them to their fullest effect. With nothing but some ice, lava, and saplings, you slowly transform this empty expanse into a world of your very own. Skyblock teaches us that, no matter how ridiculous the odds may seem, within us resides the power to overcome these challenges and achieve something beautiful---that one day, we'll look back at where we started and be amazed by how far we've come.



So Hypixel recently released their own unique take on the Skyblock genre. So basically you spawn on your own island, you cut down a tree, you bridge over to the other island, and then you log into Wynncraft.



In a nutshell, Hypixel Skyblock is exactly like regular Skyblock, the only minor difference being that, instead of carefully using your minimal items, you immediately get access to a separate multiplayer world with an infinite amount of every conceivable resource, and then you spend all your time in that world instead of the sky. But besides that, classic Skyblock.



Oh, cool! They transferred my stats from real life!



Wheat, wheat, wheat, wheat, wheat, wheat, wheat, wheat, wheeeeeeeeat, wheeeeeeeeeeeat, hey, hey! Stop taking my wheat!



Oh my God no, no the nons, they've taken all the wheat! We're gonna have a famine!



Wait, why're we all fighting over food, there's no hunger in this game. Food... food literally does not matter. What're we doing with our lives?



A little, uh, pro tip here on how to be an expert at Skyblock: if you put your coins in the bank you can get 2% interest on your coins at the end of every Minecraft season, which is a very useful unit of measurement because I know exactly how long a Minecraft season is in real life.



Oh good, there's some more info here: a Minecraft season is 93 Minecraft days. Thank you Hypixel, very cool.



We got my boy Jacob here, he mines cobblestone for me all day, I, uh, I don't pay him, and he also has no rights.



"Uh, but Technoblade, doesn't that kinda sound like--"



Shhhh... I need cobblestone.



Ok, look, ain't nobody care about farming, fishing, or cutting down trees, let's go get some diamonds.



Bum ba-dum bum, bum BUM ba-du bum, wait a minute. This is just a prison server.



The Blacksmith said he'd do me a favor and reforge one of my items for only ten coal, aaaand he put negative five intelligence on it. Thank you Hypixel, very cool.



It's alright, as someone that went to college, I know that you can't lose what you never had... but you can go into debt.



After an arduous five minutes of mining, I finally made it here: the Deep Caverns, the final challenge in mining.



There's six floors in the Deep Caverns, each floor containing more valuable ores than the last, but each floor is, in turn, guarded by even more powerful monsters. But I mean that's just some blue zombie, I've got like full iron armor, so I don't see how I could possibly--



They can shoot laser beams out of their faaaace!



Thank you Hypixel.



Finally, the Pigman's Den, at last I have found my people.



Pigmen don't attack you unless you attack them first, so we should be safe to mine restoH OH MY GOD WHY. WHY. WHAT IS-- WHAT IS THAT? WHY DOES HE HAVE FIRE MAGIC? WHY DO THE PIGMEN HAVE FIRE MAGIC??



...I don't like this game.



Look, if I'm gonna get immediately obliterated by magic monsters, I ain't gonna die mining redstone, I'm gonna die mining diamonds, let's go further.



Don't mind meee, I am a pig like you-- nononononono, urh, nonononono, nope, mrmmm... oh God, they cASTED THE MAGIC!



NononononononoNOnonono, no, oh okay, we're at- we're at the Slime Hill. We've gone past their territory, they can't-- okay well, that can attack us.



Bunch of idiot slimes think they can-- ok, I'm going the other way actually.



Where- where's the stairs down? Gonna, OW, just gonna, AHHHH--Nope, nope, we're gonna mind our own business and go in this direction.



C'mon, where, where're the, where're the stairs down at? Where're they at?



It was at this moment that Technoblade knew... he messed up.



AHHh.



Oup, here we go! So long losers!



I know what you're thinking: diamonds, we did it, wrong. We can go further.



There's even better stuff yet, where is it? Where're they-- nope, nope. No thanks. Mrmmmm. Mrrmmm.



Where're the stairs down?



That's the stairs back up, that is the opposite of what I want, nope. Noo!



When the game first came out, they'd make you do a walk of shame every time you died: back to the Hub Island, run past the Blacksmith, into the Coal Mines, warp to the Gold Mine, walk through the Gold Mine, get to the Deep Caverns, walk down to the Lift Operator...



Ugh, oh, we're finally here... son of a---



...Thank you Hypixel.



That's it, I'm tired of getting obliterated by every monster in one hit, it's time for an upgrade. You don't even wanna know how many zombies died to get this armor. Not even that many, I got three of the four pieces from other people, I was unnicked, ok? I, it wasn't even because I was a YouTuber, Skyblock players are just the nicest people on the planet.



And I got three repeat pieces anyway, so it didn't even matter, but I got to pay it forward at least.



Come back, I'm trying to give you free stuff. I'm-I'm tryin-I'm-y-you only need one more! No, take-take, here you go! Merry Christmas, young man.



Ah, look at him. He's a beautiful boy.



I, I was, uh, he- he dropped his sword!



i gotchu fam



I went to give him items and, and then I, and then I ended up robbing him by accident.



Oup, here he is. Trade. Aaaand I'm gonna die. I'm dying for my good deeds. This is what I deserve, this is what I get for being a nice person. Aaand... I live! Half a heart! The spirit of Christmas protects me.



By putting on this armor, my health and defense increase by 50%! But it's not enough. To the Blacksmith!



Prot IV, prot IV, prot IV, prot V... wait what?



With this much armor, I'd like to see a zombie even try to hurt me...



Thank you Hypixel.



Well, I guess dying in two hits is better than dying in one hit-- nope, no, no.



Is this it? Is this-- yes! Yes, we found it! The staircase to the bottom floor, we did it! Yes! And now the zombies are enchanted! But we can get diamond blocks, yes! OHH--



Almost went back to getting one-hit killed again, I don't like this at all.



Must... take as many diamond blocks as possible before I die...



I just, I just want the diamond blocks, they're everywhere! What is this?



Y'know, I'm tired of getting rekt by diamond zombies and skeletons, okay? But if we're gonna do it, we're gonna need the right tools for the job... do I hear level 50 enchant?



I know what you're thinking, level 50 enchant? But you can only go up to 30, wrong. Welcome to Skyblock.



Heh, heh, heh, heh, hehhh, that's not even that strong of a sword.



Alright, we threw that sword away and got one that wasn't garbage. Let's do this.



Y'know, some people say, "What is dead may never die..." but those guys are a bunch of idiots!



Ha, ha haa, die, die, DIE, ah ha ha ha! You clowns still think you can face me? You guys might kill me in two hits, but I can kill you in one!



Finally, after killing thousands of the diamond undead...



Oh my God, I actually got it!



...I finally gathered all the pieces, I finally assembled the Miner Set, when we're underground, the Miner Set gives almost 3 times as much defense as diamond armor, and when it's not worn underground, it's like completely worthless, but I mean, it's Skyblock! Wha- where else are we gonna by, the sky? Didn't think so.



Let's get this armor on. Hoh hoh hohh, yes, that's what I like to see. I'd like to see those diamond zombies do damage to me now-- aaand nothing has changed!



There's only one way to solve this: more level 50 enchants!



Growth, growth, growth...



Y'all messed up now, hoh hoh hoh, it's not enough. To the Blacksmith!



Yes, mhmm, gimmie dat, thaaank you...



Hey guys, it's me, I'm back! No hard feelings about the whole genocide earlier, right? Yeah, we're good.



Hey, I'm- I'm gonna go AFK here and get a glass of water, you gu- you guys don't bully me or anything though.



...



I'm back, got my water. Oh, all those guys left. Oh, well.



Y'know, this isn't satisfying enough. We have to automate it.



One skeleton minion... two skeleton minions... three skeleton minions... four skeleton minions...



Get the water all set up... and one last one here...



Deploy the skeleton minions... why is there ice there, there's not suppose to be ice. No, no my plans... outta here.



Aaaand now I escape before any of that happens. Mhm... hah, hah, hah, hah, ha...



As days go by, I continue killing skeletons. I kill them, I wait, and then I kill them again. I don't leave my island anymore, I don't go on any adventures. I just wait, and then I kill skeletons. Is this really what I wanted to do with my life? Stare at my monitor until meaningless numbers increase? Am I enjoying this? When I first made this grinder, I thought that I was trapping the skeletons, but now I realize, I was only trapping myself.



Oh hey, level 50!










Yes this is the Ulitmate ****post, respond to scam threads, or any other annoying thing on the forums with this.
