title: Early, Mid, Late, and End Game Requirements.
body:
A lot of people make posts asking if they are late-game yet when they are barely even midgame. It gets kinda annoying so I'm gonna make a thread giving the "requirements" of each stage of the game. Also note, early game and first five minutes of the game are crucially different. If you think anything here is wrong then lmk and if multiple ppl think so ill change it. Also I know myself, I am not that far into the game, I'm working on it.



Spoiler: Early game



To start, let's talk about the early game of skyblock. Early game is longer than most people think. It's not just the beginning where you have lapis armour, you could have strong dragon and still be early game. Also note, you need to be well rounded to progress, you cant be late game because you have a billion coins, you also need good skills, slayers, and pet score. To start, let's talk about skills. To be in early game, it's appropriate to have less than a 20 skill average. It's not that hard to achieve and you should definitely get it before considering yourself mid game. Next is slayers, if you have less than 555, then you can be considered early game. you only need 5000 slayers xp to get slayers level 5 respective of the mob, tara, rev, sven. Early game players look down upon slayers are an unneeded part of the game, while it is crucial. Next is pet score, in early game pets are not as big of a deal, but if you have less than 25 then your are an early game player. Second to last we have talismans. If you have less than 30 then you are an early game player. Last we have networth. I would say sub 25m networth is early game.





Spoiler: Mid game



Moving on to the mid game stage of skyblock. I've don't most the explaining so I am gonna keep these stages short and sweet. For sa, 20-30. Slayers would be 555-666 (777 on exceptions.) For talismans, you should have at least 30 by now, 30-40 to be more precise. Pet score should be between 25-75. Networth is probably gonna be between 25m-100m.





Spoiler: Late game



In late game, this is where the amount of players drop a lot. These players have a sa of 30-40, 777 slayers, a pet score of 75-150, and high networths ranging from 25m-500m. These player have around 50+ talismans, too.





Spoiler: End game



End game players have skill averages of above 40 and 777+ slayers. The players have pet scores exceeding 150 and commonly above 200. Their networths range from 500m to anything above. These players have all talismans, excluding some of the newest ones in some cases.

title: {REPOST}[Idea] Guild house (reposting because creative corner does not have ppl on it)
body:
This may not be to the admins standards and more player based and guild based but please try to understand that the guild house has been useless for all of skyblock and i'm just trying to get my thoughts about what they can do for the guild house.

I was thinking about the guild house being a place where guild can go to war to earn special perks by placing in a war leader board based on how many waves a guild has completed at the end of every skyblock year, thus giving them a buff but it wont be to long(this may seem a bit guild biased as some guilds are as good as others), for example placing 1st will give the whole guild 5 magic find 20 strength 15% more skill exp, etc. for the next skyblock year, and placing 2nd would give you 4 magic find 15 strength and 10% more skill exp up to 5th place, giving players a reason to play around with the guild house to help them progress faster? The first place could also have a discount on slayer prices up to 5% and only the players that participated in the wars will get said buff so people don't slack off in the guild and get a reward however if the admins feel like changing this they can. This can be an event sort of like the new years cake festival happening once every skyblock year. If everyone in one guild did waves, and the ways got really hard around wave 5, and would take like 10 minutes per run it would make since that it would be hard, or make it like spooky, and get rewards for placing.

Friend from my guild: Pres69 suggested that the perks for #1 spot would add +1 max level cap on said skill up to a max of 10.

If you have any suggestions please feel free to post your ideas, and if they seem good I will add them to the list with your tag

title: [IDEA] Spells - A new use for mana!
body:
SPELLS
Hello everyone! So, the mana is obviously an important part of the game as it determines can you/how much times you can execute a certain ability with a certain item. Even though that is pretty useful, I always thought that there should be more reasons to have high mana.

I think it would be nice if they added a new sort of NPC that could be some kind of witch/wizard that can introduce you to the spells (or they can just use the existing wizard in the tower, but maybe they already have ideas for him). The spells would require the certain amount of mana and you could use them by right/left clicking them. I imagined them being as some sort of stained glass differently colored. They would obviously have a cooldown so you can't spam them. I think this would make combat much more interesting and diverse.

I'm aware about the abilities, but I think this would be better for these reasons:

You could cycle through spells rather than having a ton of swords in your inventory.
There would be more spells and they would be easier to add because developers wouldn't need to make a whole new sword just for the ability.
It would represent mana as a better and more useful thing to new players.
It would make combat more ranged and interesting with different effects and new strategies.
You could level up the spells and make them better!
It would be more content for anyone to explore and have fun with.
It would open up more possibilities for the game's content, you can get a good example for that from my new boss/new armor/new pet section. 
Even if the spells would be a bad fit for the game, at least I made some new ideas that developers could use as inspiration for new abilities! 

I arranged all the spells according to their use by changing the text color, there is boost/effect spells, damage spells and healing spells!

Also, if a spell can give a critical hit, I'll put (C) near the name of the ability.

LIST OF THE CURRENT SPELL IDEAS:
Mana cost, duration, cooldown and damage of these spells in no way are final, please reply if you think some of these spells are unbalanced or obtained the wrong way. Thank you!

Spoiler: Spellcasting and Wands






Spellcasting would be a new skill introduced in this update. With every new level reached, you would get a new spell. Right-clicking the wand would open up the menu for choosing spells, a wand could have a maximum of 3 spells at a time you (you couldn't use more then one wand at a time). You would start with 1, at Spellcasting LVL 10 you would unlock the maximum of 2 spells and at LVL 20 the maximum of 3 spells.

You could cycle through spells by right-clicking, shoot out the spells by left-clicking and choose the spells you would cycle through by right-clicking a wand when you opened up your inventory or by entering that menu through the SkyBlock menu.

NOTE: The wands would change into stained glass and change their name into the name of spell when you load a spell into them. Also, you wouldn't be able to change spell until 5s after combat (no changing them while in combat).

You would level-up spellcasting by spending mana on spells, the intelligence you spend with the spells is divided by 2 and then converted to Spellcasting experience. You would get your first spell and wand when you talk with the wizard in the tower or with a different new NPC (he would give you enough Spellcasting experience to get to LVL 1).

Another thing that you would get from spellcasting is a damage boost to mobs when using spells, 4% per level (200% maximum). Also, this would change the combat skill level-up to dealing more damage to mobs with bows and swords rather than any source of damage.

Wands would be obtainable by crafting them like this:





Required Items:
Stick x2
Glowstone x1

Spoiler: Wand Reforges







"Every reforge will cost 5,000 coins!"

The rarity of wands would be legendary, so all the stat boosts in the "Old Reforges" are already known, but I wrote them anyways.

New Reforges
Caring - It would give +30% more healing from spells!
Brilliant - Increases your mana by +5%!
Chaotic - Spells deal 6% more damage!
Burning - Fire dealt by spells deal +10% more damage.
Raging - When you cast a spell, you get 25% damage boost for 5 seconds.
Mysterious - Gives 8% more duration to any boosts or effects you cast.
Repulsive - Spells deal +200% more knockback.
Ancient - Decreases the mana cost by -10% for every spell.
Impatient - Decreases the cooldown of spells by 8%.

Old Reforges
Odd - Gives -50 intelligence, +10% critical chance and +10% critical damage.
Rich - Gives +20 intelligence, +10% critical chance and +15% critical damage.
Deadly - Gives +10 intelligence, +10 critical chance, +10% critical damage and +10 strength.
Fine - Gives +10 strength, +5% critical chance and +5% critical damage.
Grand - Gives +25 strength.
Hasty - Gives +5 strength and +25% critical chance.
Neat - Gives +10% critical chance and +15% critical damage.
Rapid - Gives +10 strength and +50% critical damage.
Unreal - Gives +15 strength, +15 critical chance and +15 critical damage.





Spoiler: New Boss, Armors, Talisman and Pet



The Evil Witch




Summoning
The new boss would be spawned using the "Summon" spell you would get from the dark auction. Four people would need to use this at about the same time (1 minute span) to spawn the boss. The boss would be spawned in the north hub area known as "High Level". There you could find a some sort of pedestal where you could spawn this boss.

Statistics
The evil witch would be immune to any damage that isn't coming from spells to encourage players to use spells. She would give random negative effects to players while using these spells on them (they would be changed stat-wise):

Dark Beam (like the Light Beam but a dark version that only this boss can use, creates a little explosion so it can damage more people at once) - Takes 2500 health from everyone it hits.
Forcefield (at 100% HP) - She would create a forcefield that would keep all the players that come in to deal damage later out.
Life Leech - Takes 5000 health from anyone it hits. It heals her for 2000% of the damage given (100k HP).
Real Steel (at 50% HP) - Iron Golem has infinite duration and deals 2000 damage per hit.
Revenge (at 10% HP) - Represents the power of the revenge spell - bigger radius (creates a little explosion). It would deal 20000 damage.
The witch would make an attack every 5-13 seconds (not including giving effects, using Real Steel and Revenge). She would use Dark Beam 85% of the time and Life Leech 15% of the time.

The witch would give us these negative effects, the negative effect would change every 30 seconds (to all the players that hit her in the last 30 seconds and are still in the hub):

Slowness
Blindness
Wither
Nausea
She would have 2 million HP!

There could be new worlds/quests/bosses etc. I think this update would change SkyBlock for the better and make it way more interesting to play. Thank you for reading my thread!

Spoiler: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)



Q: Wouldn't this make it more like Wynncraft?
A: I never played Wynncraft, but from what I heard my system for spells is much different from theirs and also spells are a part of a lot of other RPG/MMORPG medieval games so I don't see a problem.

Q: Why would wands be so easy to craft?
A: The reason for wand being so easily crafted is because that I think leveling up spellcasting is a challenge already, I don't want to make it hard for players to use spells.

Q: Shouldn't they first focus on adding more ways to get higher mana?
A: There is no need for that with the low spell mana cost and the new armors I would introduce with the evil witch boss.

Q: Wouldn't this change the price for a lot of items like the Wise Armor?
A: Yes, it would.

Q: Would the Magic/Ability damage effect the damage of spells?
A: Surprisingly, I decided for it to not. I didn't include magic damage because it was broken recently (1st of June) and only way to obtain it currently is through the sheep pet and I don't want the sheep pet that is an alchemy pet to have much to do with the spells. Also, the real name of Magic Damage is Ability Damage and these are spells.

Q: Would the wise dragon's armor full set bonus effect the mana cost of the spells?
A: Yes, it would.

Q: Would the defence block a percentage of damage you get by spells?
A: Yes, it would.



Also, it would be a nice addition to my other, colosseum update idea, check it out if you want: https://hypixel.net/threads/idea-colosseum-update.3043624/

Please, tell me what you think and if you liked it, please leave a 


, I would really appreciate it! 
Before asking a question, please check the FAQ section to see if the answer is already listed there. Thank you!

title: A Creator's Guide to a Quality Idea Thread [GUIDE]
body:
Hello!
As some of you may know i am a decent idea threadmaker (in my opinion, you may have yours)
But I will be compiling a series of resources, formats, and tips on making your own Top-Quality idea thread!

► Formatting
While making an idea thread, make sure you insert a greeting, a simple "Hey, Hi, Hello, Heyoo" is good enough too.
Personally, I like to format my threads like update threads, adding the "►" symbol for each topic of the thread
Also make sure to add a "Thanks for reading" message or something similar at the end!
ex:


Spoiler: Example



Hi,
I'm releasing a new idea thread for the new "Ape" pet I made!
If you have any problems or criticizm you'd like to share, please PM me on the forums!

► Perks
The pet comes with a variety of perks and come in 5 rarities

Common
Uncommon
Rare
Epic
Legendary
Perks may vary depending on the rarity of the pet!

Thanks For Reading!


or
visit any of these pages for a more elaborated example:
https://hypixel.net/threads/skill-prestiges-sub-skills-more-skyblock-idea-02.3482246/#post-24842430
https://hypixel.net/threads/skyblock-qol-update-skyblock-idea-03-100-positive-reactions.3483789/
https://hypixel.net/threads/snow-collection-skyblock-idea-04.3488664/#post-24895446

► Creating Custom Items
If you wish to make your custom items for your threads, I suggest using https://lmnyx.github.io/hypixel-skyblock-item-generator/ for a more bland/simplified version
or
Join Skyblock Sandbox for a more realistic experience,
https://hypixel.net/threads/make-your-own-custom-skyblock-items-skyblock-sandbox-item-creator.3290252/
► Headers/Footers
If you wish to make headers/footers for your thread, I suggest Canva
It's simple and easy to use, it also has many other uses aswell!

► Credits
Make sure to credit the people that helped you make the thread by @'ing them!

title: Is this correct or am I missing something?
body:
So there is this item called the Euclid's Wheat Hoe, it increases wheat farming or wathever

So basically they introduced a new item called the Tighly-tied Hay Bale, which costs 144 enchanted hay bale, each costing 144 hay bales, each costing 9 wheat, now that item isnt much of a problem, but the problem is that to craft it you need 256 of these, which according to my math translates to about 47 million wheat, which in bazaar prices is over 100m.

I dont know how much wheat you get an hour with a wheat farm, basing off technoblade one it should be around 1mill wheat a hour, but prob more I dont know farming mechanics, so it translates to about 50 hours of farming wheat, with the tons of new double drop chances buffs, I expect it to be reduced to around 30-40 hours, which still some significant amount of time I would say, farming wheat and only wheat for a damn hoe.

I might have missed something, or calculated something wrong, cuz im not the best at math, you might be able to get 5mill wheat an hour, but if im right that is pretty insane.

title: (Repost x2) - Convienice items
body:
Items/new feature that would improve life on Hypixel Skyblock (I believe):
- Village Affinity (ring/artifact): Ring- removes the personal bank cooldown while in the Village, Auction House, or Bazaar. Increases Speed by +25%, while in the Village. Village Affinity Artifact: Allows you to spend $$$ directly from your bank on the ah, while in the auction house, gives buff from village affinity ring, gives +100% speed while in the Village.

- Reforge Bag: Allows you to reforge multiple items at once, costing the cumulative amount of all of the items. When using Accessories, gives the discount present in the Accessory Bag on all of the accessories in the bag. Can hold a double chest full of items, but only reforgable items can be held in it and no player may have more than 1 in his/her inventory. (Edit: maybe instead of an item this is accessible when speaking to the blacksmith, to make it simpler and easier to use)

- Piggy bank patch: (costs 8 enchanted pork): when right-clicked, repair the active piggy bank in your inv by 1.

- Wardrobe totem: Left-Click: switches the current set you are wearing one to the right, and does not work if you aren't wearing a set. Right-Click: opens the wardrobe menu.

Cleaning stone - costs $500 from the guy who sells all those reforge stones, and is free to apply. Removes all of the items enchantments and anvil uses, as well as refunds any fuming potato books used on the item (or it just deletes em but I feel like that is too expensive/mean)

(not an item but) Sac of sacs settings: allow you to disable items going into your sacs, withdraw/deposit all items from and into sacs, and has a setting where all items coming from minions do not go into sacs.

Removed BIN cap - this would help a lot for things who’s BIN cap is way to low, to make it so it doesn’t always have to go on auction, preventing steals (when someone bids incredibly low on an item and gets it cause no one else bidded)

Auction house fix - you can now look for supreme rarity items, and there’s a new all category, containing all of the categories, and custom categories, which only search for specific items ( such as fishing enchantments, or talismans.)

Multi-use wardrobe: one item( such as a hat) can be used for multiple wardrobe slots, meaning you don’t have to switch that item between them. 

Auto-match - automatically matches your bazaar order to the top +1 so you don’t have to cancel and shiz.

Please tell me what you think in the comments!

title: I used command blocks to replicate the Special Zealot spawning feature!
body:
I was horsing on my world where I do really random stuff and I thought of recreating the Special Zealot spawn feature. It was surprisingly easy and I can actually teach you guys the commands so you can prank your friends. Especially if they're addicted to skyblock!

Here's a video I made on how it works:
I made it so it spawns every kill because I have no idea how do do RNG stuff using command bloccs in 1.16.
If you're wondering, yes I do have the summoning eye drop feature. But just in a different way!




If you cannot view the video, go to this link. IT IS NOT RICKROLL!!!



If you want a tutorial, here it is (1.16+):
(I am assuming you have one other friend on. So this applies to everyone because you know it is going on. But your friend has no idea.)

NOTE: ALL THE REPEATING COMMAND BLOCKS SHOWN IN THIS TUTORIAL NEEDS TO BE SET TO ALWAYS ACTIVE!
ANOTHER NOTE: SEE THOSE CHAIN COMMAND BLOCKS WITH ARROW LIKE ICONS? SET THOSE TO CONDITIONAL. THE CHAIN COMMAND BLOCKS WITH FLAT BOTTOM ARROWS ARE UNCONDITIONAL. BE SURE TO FOLLOW THOSE!

BEFORE YOU DO THE COMMAND BLOCKS, MAKE SURE TO ACTIVATE THESE COMMANDS:
/scoreboard objectives add KilledEnderman minecraft.killed:minecraft.enderman
/scoreboard objectives add GotSummeye minecraft.picked_up:minecraft.end_portal_frame

1. Place command blocks like this. (Direction does not matter)





2. For these command blocks, copy these commands:
(From left to right)
1st command block:
/title @a times 2 20 2

2nd command block:
/title @a title {"text":"SPECIAL ZEALOT","color":"red"}

3rd command block:
execute as @a run playsound minecraft:entity.wither.spawn master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1

4th command block:
/tellraw @a ["",{"text":"A special ","color":"yellow"},{"text":"Zealot","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":" has spawned nearby!","color":"yellow"}]

5th command block:
execute at [Other player's name] run summon enderman ~ ~1 ~ {CustomNameVisible:1b,CustomName:'[{"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Lv55","color":"gray"},{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":" Zealot","color":"red"},{"text":" 2000","color":"yellow"},{"text":"/","color":"white"},{"text":"2000","color":"yellow"},{"text":"","color":"red"}]',carriedBlockState:{Name:"minecraft:end_portal_frame"}}

6th command block:
execute at [Other player's name] run spreadplayers ~ ~ 1 16 false @e[type=enderman]

7th command block:
setblock [the block before the first impulse command block coords] air





3. For these command blocks, use these commands:
(From down to up)
1st command block:
clear @a[scores={GotSummeye=1}] minecraft:end_portal_frame

2nd command block:
/give @a[scores={GotSummeye=1}] player_head{display:{Name:'{"text":"Summoning Eye","color":"dark_blue","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Use this at the Ender Altar in the","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"Dragon\'s Nest to summon","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"Ender Dragons!","color":"gray","italic":false}']},SkullOwner:"RMF_AndyPlayz"} 1
NOTE: IF THE HEAD DOES NOT SHOW A SUMMONING EYE, IT MEANS I HAVE CHANGED MY SKIN!

3rd command block:
/tellraw @a[scores={GotSummeye=1}] [{"text":"RARE DROP!","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":" Summoning Eye","color":"dark_blue","bold":false}]

4th command block:
scoreboard players reset @a GotSummeye

5th command block:
setblock [The coords before the impulse command block shown in the picture below] minecraft:redstone_block









4. For these command blocks, use these commands:
(From bottom to top)

1st command block:
execute if entity @a[scores={KilledEnderman=2}] run setblock [coords before the first impulse command block shown below] minecraft:redstone_block





2nd command block:
scoreboard players reset @a KilledEnderman





And lastly, these command blocks:
(From left to right)

1st command block:
execute at [other player's name] run summon enderman ~ ~1 ~ {CustomNameVisible:1b,CustomName:'[{"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Lv55","color":"gray"},{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":" Zealot","color":"red"},{"text":" 13000","color":"yellow"},{"text":"/","color":"white"},{"text":"13000","color":"yellow"},{"text":"","color":"red"}]'}

2nd command block:
execute at [other player's name] run spreadplayers ~ ~ 1 16 false @e[type=enderman]

3rd command block:
setblock [coords of before the first command block shown below] air





Thanks for tuning in! I hope you enjoyed it!

title: (High Effort) How much does pokimaine make per stream
body:
FYI I do not simp for pokimane *sweats* ok but for real i don't. Lets calculate how much money pokimane makes per stream, from her simps! 


BACKGROUND INFO
YouTubers get paid $2 – $7 per 1000 monetized views after YouTube takes its cut. Monetized views range from 40% – 80% of the total views. All these are influenced by several factors like device played on, the location of the viewer, ad inventory, how many ads there are on a video, how many people skip the ads, type of advertisement, ad engagement , type of content etc. The cost of an ad view is based on an auction between advertisers based on views. Advertisers have to bid a minimum of $0.01 per view. Officially, Twitch Partners and Affiliates receive 50% of the total subscription fee, so for the $4.99 tier, the streamer would get around $2.50. Twitch has been known to increase this amount for popular streamers to encourage them to remain on the Twitch platform, with some being upgraded to anywhere from 60% to 100% of the monthly fee. Streamers make money through the Cheering feature when a fan cheers with bits in the chat. A Cheer is an animated chat emote that uses bits. Typing “Cheer1” will generate a grey bouncing triangle, and cost you 1.4 cents. “Cheer100” brings up a dancing purple diamond, and costs you $1.4. You can Cheer any amount you please (including irregular figures, and the corresponding emotes get larger and larger, up to a “Cheer 10000,” a $140 tip represented by a fractured red star. streamers will get 1 cent for every Bit pledged while Twitch will keep the 0.4 cents. Pokimane is able to make even more revenue through brand deals which pay a large amount of money for every post on social media and mentions in her content. She has worked with brands like Hot Pocket, Epic Games, Geico, AzurLane, Lineage 2 etc The channel has over 5 million subscribers as of 2020 and has accumulated over 500 million views so far. It is able to get an average of 460,000 views per day from different sources. This should result in an estimated revenue of around $2,300 per day ($840,000 a year) from the ads that appear on the videos. YouTubers get paid $2 – $7 per 1000 monetized views after YouTube takes its cut. Monetized views range from 40% – 80% of the total views. All these are influenced by several factors like device played on, the location of the viewer, ad inventory, how many ads there are on a video, how many people skip the ads, type of advertisement, ad engagement , type of content etc. The cost of an ad view is based on an auction between advertisers based on views. Advertisers have to bid a minimum of $0.01 per view. There is also a program known as Google Preferred where deep-pocketed companies can target ads on the top 5% most popular content. The ad rates here are higher than normal. Apart from ads, YouTubers also generate extra from YouTube Red viewers who pay a monthly fee to view premium content on YouTube plus watch videos without ads. Here they get paid based on watch time on their videos. The longer the viewers watch their videos, the more money they earn.

The Math
Ok, so lets get to the stream info, as ^ was all background stuff. She is able to average around 10,000 viewers per stream and has had a peak of 73,000 viewers in a single stream. So, with this information at hand, and looking at how she has recently put in a 5 dollar donation cap, and around 40% of viewers watching at a single time donate, and also factoring in all the tiered subs, and knowing that she makes 20k per month, and we divide that with her stream schedule (3 days per week) so 12 streams per month, she makes around $1666 PER STREAM, which is a giant number! 

TLDR:
Pokimane makes around $1666 per stream

title: Best skills to level up (Guide)
body:
This is my list on the best skills to level up, if you have any feedback, put it in the comments.


9: Carpentry & Runecrafting
Carpentry and Runecrafting are only for decoration. Bad to level up unless you wanna decorate.


8: Alchemy
 Alchemy can make potions stay longer, it's pretty good if you use a lot of potions.


7: Enchanting
 Enchanting can be good for mana, it's pretty good if you have an AOTD.


6: Taming
 Taming can be good for pet luck, which can give you more rare pets.


5: Mining
Good for defense, which can make it so you don't get dealt so much damage.

4: Foraging
 Good for strength, which can make your weapons deal more damage.

3: Fishing
Best for health, but is slow. Farming is quicker and better than fishing.


2: Combat
Gives you more crit chance, and if you have a lot of crit damage, combat is op.


1: Farming
Gives health, which is just fishing, yeah, but it's quick and easy to do when you have young dragon armor and a farm full of pumpkins.




Thank you for looking at my guide, and I'm glad I could help you on this MMO server. If you have any questions, please ask in the comments.

title: Theory: Hypixel is adding hacks to skyblock so people don’t need to use a hack client.
body:
Think about it. There are so many hacks that are in skyblock in one way or another. I will list as many as I can think of here as well as what item gives them.
Fly - magical mushroom soup/booster cookie
Aimbot - aiming enchant
Anti KB - Legendary turtle/dwarf turtle shelmet
Kill aura - vampire witch mask/vampire mask/witch mask (also kind of shadow fury and silent death)
Teleport - /warp commands/AOTE
Whatever hacks give speed (Bhop, timer, and speed do this I think) - every item and potion that allows you to get speed 6 times faster than vanilla Minecraft
Edit:
Nuker - mineral armor
Tracers - echolocator/gift compass/dungeons teammate outline
If there are any other hacks I missed please tell me.

title: [NPC idea] The Crafter
body:
I have a new npc idea for Skyblock called the crafter. This npc is for people that need to craft something for one time but don't want to grind for the collection or afraid getting scammed from other people. The npc offers to craft the item for you for coins, and the higher the collection, the more expensive it gets, the staff team can also change it so that the crafter is searching for an item too and it requires the player to complete a certain task or quest in order to get him to craft the item you want. You also need a bit of that collection in order for him to craft that item
This is a very simple idea but I think it will offer a QOL change to Skyblock.
Or maybe to will just make people more lazy lol

title: Why public shaming should be removed
body:
While ik everyone and their bloodline knows this i wanna give some reasons for the admins.

1. It can lead to genuinely bad people from being reported (irl traders,scammers however don't put scam reports on forums pls,)
2. It can lead to no one making a comment about someone doing something wrong (example: Someone largely invested in the forums can be making death threats, scamming, irl trading but no one will talk about it bc of public shaming)
3. No one can be criticized (its obvious why this is bad)

This is all i can think of for now but add more in the replies.

title: The Minion Dupe Problem
body:
this is a joke dont freak out and start spam disliking

Alright so minions are asexual, because they produce themselves (upgrade) and do not sexually reproduce. Asexual beings "duplicate" themselves.
The definition of duplication is "exactly like something else, especially through having been copied." which is exactly how asexual organisms reproduce, they make an exact copy of themself.

If minions are asexual, then they are "duplicating" themselves everytime they upgrade (with the help of some items) as they make an exact copy of themselves (but slightly better - artificial selection). So, minions are duping themselves.

This is a huge problem as duping and dupe glitches are illegal, so from now on upgrading minions is illegal, and you and the minion will get permanently banned and wiped for duping.

TLDR: Minions are asexually reproducing, or duplicating themselves, so upgrading minions is illegal and will get you wiped and banned.

title: Hypixel SB dungeon party finder discord
body:
Why Did I Make The Server?



The reason for me making this discord server is because I have noticed a lot that all these popular dungeon discord servers are very active but it is hard for me to find a party with a group of people to the point where we all can help each other and we all are different classes and we can run many runs without having to leave once we are done with the first run. I am hoping that making this discord server that it can help new and old dungeon players find the perfect party and maybe even a permeant party!

What The Discord Server Has To Offer
The discord server has many different things to offer such as, information to all the new Hypixel Skyblock updates and leaks. Reaction roles to give yourself the opportunity to pick what you want to be notified on along with the ability to give yourself a dungeon class role to let everyone else know what class you are. Different discord categories with each one dedicated to a certain dungeon floor so you can find the perfect party. A leveling system in the discord (aint very unique) but also a work in progress bot with the final ability to see your catacombs level and give you a role showing you catacombs level!

This discord server is very new so please if you would allow me to help some people with the help I needed that would be great thanks!



Spoiler: Discord Link



[/https://discord.gg/yCBma6s5cs]

title: [IDEA] Ability Merging
body:
Hello! My idea that I would like Hypixel Skyblock is "Ability Merging". What this idea does is that in a special anvil you would put to items into the slots and merge them together. But it would cost 1-50m depending on them item's rarity. For example if you have a Hunters Knife and a Rogue sword and you were to put the Hunters knife before the rogue sword in the special anvil it would look something like this...









To make this balanced you would not be able to merge different mage abilitys such as bonzo/frozen scythe and the damage would be reduced by 10-50% depending on the rarity.This would cost 5million skyblock coins to merge. After merging there is is a nothing special anvil that you can use to set it back to normal and get the 2 items back. This would cost 1-50m depending on the item too! Please give me your feedback about if the community likes this idea. Please add this to the game. TY <3 I am posting this again because I am very confident that this will be added!

title: Dark wolves guild seeking new members :)
body:
Hello, I'm MoistyMoisty, and I am a moderator of a guild named Dark Wolves.

We are currently looking for more players because the guild is only half full right now, due to a lot of inactive player.

INFO:
We are a skyblock focused guild, with a lot of late game players (... active players currently.) The guild was founded on the 25th of September 2019 by iPep with an active, friendly, and helpful community.

We offer:
- Item lending
- Financial advice
- Dungeon groups (From approximately catacombs level 10-24)
- Our very good friend, Claus, who is always one of the first people to know about updates, and instantly updates the discord’s #game-updates channel
- Group members looking out for one another

We are for that reason a guild, wherein a lot of us take part in risky investments, with mostly great results… Take for an example our guild leader, Ipep, who as a dungeons zerk, warned us early that the Baby yeti pet would become a necessity for zerkers, which in 1 good investment, made the guild almost 200m coins. Good thing we sold before they tanked...

The applications are currently open.

Requirements
- Must be active, not necessarily on skyblock, but in /gc or in the discord
- A working discord account (you need to join our discord server)
- No age requirement, although, most of us are between 14-18 years old

Skyblock Requirements
- You must have a 26 skill average (This is mandatory)
- You must have EITHER 350k slayer EXP or Catacombs level 19. (This is a choice)
- We are however pretty forgiving, so if u almost meet reqs, or might have trouble keeping up with the next reqs, we do offer extra time for some people.

Application IGN:
- Age:
- Discord Username and tag:
- Network Level:
- Link to your Skyblock Profile: (https://sky.lea.moe/)
- Have you ever been muted/banned? (If yes, please explain why):

If you want to apply for the guild, put it in the comments.(I'll also be answering questions down there)


- iPep (Founder of Dark wolves), ISanity (Co-Owner, and current guild master of Dark Wolves) and MoistyMoisty (Less important moderator of Dark Wolves)

If applying to the guild, please quote the original post, so that i receive the notification

title: [Idea] Titles
body:
Hi! Just wanted to drop an idea that I had for Skyblock.

Let me start this off by saying that part of this idea came from a feature in another previously popular Minecraft server, (may it rest in peace) however, I also like to do this sort of a thing for discord servers that I'm a part of to make things more enjoyable. I feel people would really like this to be implemented into Skyblock.

Titles.

Titles are a cosmetic hologram of sorts that would sit just above the players head. These holograms would allow players to show off their favorite achievements in the game.

For example; Say a player were to reach a certain milestone in wheat collection (say, 1 million). There could be a title for reaching this point. A good title might be something as simple as: Wheat (I, II, III, IV, etc.) or maybe something even more creative!

Titles could be applied to many of the different accomplishments in Skyblock and I happen to have a fresh amount of examples and suggestions using titles that I had previously come up with.

Skill-Based Titles:
Fighter (I-V)- Reach combat 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Prospector (I-V)- Reach mining 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Laborer (I-V)- Reach Farming 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Lumberjack (I-V)- Reach Foraging 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Fisherman (I-V)- Reach Fishing 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Wizard (I-V)- Reach Enchanting 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Witch (I-V)- Reach Alchemy 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Beastmaster (I-V)- Reach Taming 5, 10, 25, 40, 50.
Jack of All Trades- Reach level 25 in all skills (Excluding Carpentry, Runecrafting, and Dungeons)
Master of One- Reach level 50 in any skill (Excluding C, R, D)
Master of All- Reach level 50 in every skill (Excluding C, R, D)
Overachiever- Reach level 60 in any skill
Settle Down Now- Reach level 60 in every skill (If the other skills aside from farming are increased to 60)

Collection: I won't go super far into detail because there are a ton of collections but obviously adding a tier for each collection would be cool if added.
Collector- Max out every collection (I understand collections are constantly being added to so this can be locked up whenever there is an addition untilthe player unlocks said addition)
Master Crafter- Unlock all recipes (Same standard as collections when it comes to additions)

Another thing that should be added to collection titles is a specific title that can be passed along to the #1 collector for each collection! A special title that would show off just how dedicated they are to their #1 spot.

A few ideas for this are as follows:
20/20 Vision- #1 Carrot collection
Picea Bane- #1 Spruce collection
Honest Worker- #1 Wheat collection
Krampus- #1 Coal Collection
Midas- #1 Gold Collection
etc...

Pets:
Ashborn- Obtain a Phoenix Pet by killing a mob.
Dovah- Obtain the Ender Dragon Pet by slaying the Ender Dragon.
Lost to the Void- Obtain a Legendary Enderman Pet.
Animal Friendly- Own a pet.
Veterinarian- Own 5 unique pets.
Zookeeper- Own 10 unique pets.
Irwin- Own 20 unique pets.
Exotic- Purchase a legendary pet from Oringo.
Pet Smuggler- Purchase a pet from the Dark Auction.
Trainer- Train a pet to level 100.
Elite Four- Train 4 legendary pets to level 100.
Noah- Obtain every legendary pet.

Specific Items:
My Fish- Collect 5 different special fish.
Daenerys- Obtain all Dragon armor sets.
Superior- Obtain a full set of Superior Dragon armor.
Golden Touch- Obtain a 50 million Midas Sword.
Cereal Killer- Obtain a 100 million Midas Staff.
Bling- Own a full set of Superior Dragon armor, a 50 million Midas Sword, AND a 100 million Midas Staff.

Dungeons:
(Will add in the future if this idea takes off)

I have a lot more in mind and would be more than willing to add more if this gets any interest. I think these titles would make an excellent addition to the game, and would allow players to really show off what they've got!

Feel free to give me any feedback or suggestions!

title: [0.9.11] Urban project: It is the home of farmers
body:
Jee !!

The community has completed a third urban project, farmers' housing.
In fact, it was called the "garden house".

Farmers' houses

farmhouse.png

A new home is underway.

The new garden offers new farm supplies.

Jacob is a new NPC farm.
Accept SkyBlock client. The Jacob National Championships are held at the Skyblock Center.
One day SkyBlock (20 minutes IRL).

You must have at least 10 parks to talk to James and attend events.
In addition, we must first talk to Jacob at least once.

_png
Jacob list (requires farmers looga x)

Once every three days, you can compete in three organizations.
When you look at the whole schedule, you already know the collection you want to grow.
You can enter the competition by collecting these 100 items during the competition.
Most players who gather at a party for 20 minutes will be rewarded.

Reward.png
For example, pumpkin

When you attend the event, you will receive medals and certificates from Jacob.
Paste characters in characters you can't change.
Tickets are sold in the Oddities series.

Anita is another NPC in the new farm house.
You can teach signs and tips at the Anita store.

anita.png
Anita store

Anita presents products that are useful for the rapid construction of gardens and other fast-growing plants.
Anita products. Not available You can buy it

1604682446965.png
An example of a new object

Reducing participation in urban projects will reduce ticket prices.
Prizes can also be purchased for transfers and tickets.

1604682655401.png
Several Anita awards

Two-point officer
Because we’ve added a lot of impact, we’re balancing the technical aspects.

All intestinal performance enhancement machines (Perk Farms, Peter's Elephant) are now connected.
Basically + 50% double probability, then add +50 secret "double drop" stat, which works like Ferocity.
More than twice the probability of a point triangle (e.g. field level).

To compensate for this change, profits doubled by 60% for elephants and 50% for monkeys.

Furniture Auction
Remember that AH has now blocked your search site.
The movement will be repeated for 20 minutes.
There is a new button for resetting settings when making changes.

1604683256988.png
Search AH

The auction can also be found in the product window.

General changes
(From Smithmonger) Wedding decorations are now available at Ax
Buy aloe vera
Go to the screen (moved to Assassin's Creed and Revenge)
that's it!
Enjoy planting

title: [Revised] The Most Amounts Of Items You Can Have
body:
Things I forgot last time: 

Enchanted Cooked Fish being in Bait Bag (th1s1sau)
The hypothetical ability for minions to store items (DumplingSushi)
Island Upgrades (ForumsLawyer)
Cake Bag (ForumsLawyer, IYeet_Gaming)
Griffin Pet (DumplingSushi)
Sack Of Sacks Upgrades (Me)
Island Dimensions (Kasstertroy30)

Given: Island Size: 241 x 256 x 241
Given: 10 extra sacks
Given: You're allowed to store resources in minions
Given: You're able to uncraft items
Given: Only pets that you are using counts (If you have a phoenix and a zombie, and you have the phoenix out, only the phoenix counts)
Given: Items stored in minions have to be able to be produced by the minions.

Base Item

Alright, so let's say we're going to house our stuff in a Jumbo Backpack. Good. We now have 54 slots, to put other stuff. A minion has 15 slots for items, plus an additional 5 for upgrades/fuels/skins/automated shipping. Good. Now, the current most "item-dense" thing that can be produced by a minion is enchanted golden blocks. Each enchanted golden block would contain 160 Enchanted Gold, 25600 Regular Gold, or 230400 golden nuggets. We now multiply this number by 64. Great. We now have 14745600 materials per stack. Now, we will multiply this by 15 (maximum slots in a minion). We now have a total of 221184000 materials stored, per minion. Now, we would multiply this by 54, as that is the number of slots in a Jumbo Backpack. We now have 11943936000 items stored in one slot.

Inventory

Now that we've figured out the number of items that we can store in one item, we would multiply 11943936000 by 35, and then add 1 for the skyblock menu. (11943936000*35)+1). Total? 418037760001.

Ender Chest

At max, we would have 8 pages, with a 54 item page, and 7 36 item pages. This is relatively simple. We would do 54 + (7*36), or 306. We would then multiply 306 by 11943936000 or (306*11943936000). This would equal 3.6548444e+12 (dw I'm simplifying at the end), or a total of 4.0728822e+12.

Accessory Bag

I've done the math here, and I realized that the Personal Compactor 6000 is the most material dense, with a total of 1351680 items per, as opposed to the cake bags 54. I have run the numbers and 1351680 is in fact greater than 54. So we multiply 1351680 by 57 and we get 77045760. Add that to our total and we have a new total of 4.0729592e+12.

Fishing Bag

For the fishing bag, we have 45 slots, of which can store 64 enchanted cooked fish each, and (45*(64*(160*(160)))), or 73728000 items. 73728000 + 4.0729592e+12 = 4.0730329e+12 

Quiver

Our quiver has 45 slots, and an arrow is comprised of 3 materials (flint, stick, feather), and we can fit 64 arrows a stack. 64*45*3 = 8640, and thus equals 4.0730329e+12.

Sack Of Sacks

The most material rich sack is the mining stack, with 15 different materials per sack. It can store 20160 of each material, and we can fit 22 of these sacks in a sack of sacks. 15*20160*22 = 6652800, or a new total of 4.0730396e+12.

Pet

The most item dense item is the legendary griffin, with around 3800000 items. Add this to our previous total and we have 4.0730434e+12.

Wardrobe

Okay, so the first thing we would do is obviously is wear the backpacks on our heads. For the other pieces, it gets interesting. The most material dense armour is 3/4 perfect with the previously mentioned jumbo backpack on your head. It would be about 11947936000 per wardrobe slot, and with 18 wardrobe slots, we would have 215062848000, which we would add to our total, getting a new total of 4.2881062e+12. Good. 

The Island

Alright. For this, we'll be figuring out the number of items we can store on our island. Anything we've already done will pale in comparison to this. The dimensions of an island at max upgrade is 241 x 256 x 241, or 14868736. That's good. We know that you can fit 27 items in a chest, and each chest takes up 1 block, meaning we would have 401455872 available slots on our island for backpacks. We would then multiply 401455872*11943936000, for a total of 4.7949632e+18 items in our island. We would then add our previous total and end up with 4.7949675e+18 as our new total. Great. We're almost done. Next up...

Profiles

This one is pretty simple to calculate. Assuming we're a youtube rank, we would have 5 profiles. 5*4.7949675e+18 = 2.3974838e+19. 2.3974838e+19 is our total. 

Conclusion

23974838000000000000 items. This is the maximum amount of items a skyblock player can store at once. That's a lot of items. Thank you for reading, please like if you found this helpful as it took me 2 hours and a lot of pain.



Spoiler: TLDR



23974838000000000000 items.

title: [0.9.11] City Project: Farm Merchant's Dwelling
body:
Hello!!

The community completed the third city project: Farm Merchant's Dwelling.
Actually, it's renamed to "Farmhouse"!

Farm Merchant's Dwelling Farmhouse







New Farmhouse build!

The Farmhouse offers a new event and many new farming tools.

Jacob is a new NPC in the Farmhouse.
He hosts the SkyBlock event: Jacob's Farming Contests every 3 Skyblock days.
The event lasts 1 SkyBlock day (20 irl minutes).

You need to be at least Farming level 10 to talk to Jacob AND participate in the events.
Also, you need to talk to Jacob at least once to activate the event.






Jacob's menu (Requires Farming X)

Every 3 days, you can compete in one of 3 collections.
You can know ahead which collection to farm by looking in the full Calendar menu.
To participate in a contest, simply collect 100 of that item while the contest is running.
Players who collect the most in one collection during the 20 minutes of the event earn rewards.






Example of a Pumpkin contest

You will earn medals and Jacob's Tickets from participating in the event!
Medals are profile-bound, you cannot trade them.
Tickets are tradeable in the Bazaar under Oddities.

Anita is the other new NPC in the farmhouse.
You can spend your medals and tickets in Anita's shop.






Anita's shop

Anita offers items which are useful for building farms fast, and others for harvesting them fast.
The items from Anita cannot be traded or placed in the Auction House.






Example of a new item

The discount from contributing to the City Projects reduces the Tickets cost of items.
Also, medals can be converted and sold for Tickets.






Anita's medal conversions

Double-drops Stacking
Because we added many items which impact it, we rebalanced the double-drops mechanic.

All mechanics which increase double-drops (Farming Perk, Elephant Pet, etc..) now stack additively.
Essentially, when it says +50% chance for double-drops, it will add +50 to your hidden "double-drops" stat, which behaves like Ferocity.
Double-drops above 100 turn into a chance for triple-drops (Just like the Farming level perk).

To compensate for this change, we doubled Elephant pet perk to +60% and Monkey to +50%.

Auction House improvements
The AH will now remember your search settings when closed.
Settings also reset after 20 minutes.
There's a new button to reset the settings when you edited them.






Search settings in the AH

Auctions search will now also display in the inventory window's title.

General Changes

Blessed reforge (from Smithmonger) is now available on Axes
Added Cactus to the Farm Merchant
Reshuffled the Bazaar (moved Slayer and Mythos to Combat)
That's it!
Enjoy farming!

title: Reviving FurfSky+ - Progress Update + Help Still Wanted

Hi everyone! On Tuesday I made a forum post about reviving the FurfSky+ texture pack, and after gathering 8 artists who I believed had the capabilities to make super high quality textures, I'm excited to announce that we've made progress. Currently we have finished (most of) the Floor 4, Floor 5 and Floor 6 boss drop items as well as a few added extras and we want to share it with you guys to get some feedback on what you do/don't like. Here's some images/gifs:




 


 





 












In order from left -> right:

Last Breath
Warped AoTE
Gilded Midas
Spirit Scepter (ignore the colours in the top left, those are colour palette)
Sharktooth Accessories
Treasure Accessories
Treasure Artefact but animated
Necromancer Armour Set
There are more items we've made but these are the ones I've put in a poorly formatted forum post. If you want to try out the pack so far, here's a link to the forum post where you can download the pack and give feedback on how the textures fit with existing furfsky textures:





Texture Pack - Sky++ (FurfSky+ Overlay)


since @FurfNSFW ended the production of his pack (pack here), @FurryEBoy and I have had the idea to continue it, and now since we have gathered the necessary artists, that idea is finally becoming a reality. yes it's still incomplete we're working on it and yes you have to use it on top of...




hypixel.net





I'm also interested in a name for the pack. Please vote for a name on the poll here. And last note,
I am still looking for talented artists who wish to continue the FurfSky+ pack. If you believe you can make good-looking textures in Furf's style, send me a forum message with some of the work you can do and if I like what I see I'll invite you to the project.
So yeah, please download the work-in-progress pack and give us some feedback on what you do or don't like!

Thank's for reading and happy halloween!

title: Honest Question for F6-Rushers
body:
Many of the best dungeons players right now are using what we can call the F6-rush strategy: queue for entrance, wait till your party fills up with noobs, then enter Floor 6 instead. All the noobs will get kicked (because they don't have F5 completion), and you'll have the floor to yourself.*

The point of this strategy, as far as I can tell, is that you won't have to share any of the loot (flowers, livid frags, etc.), and you will get a ton of combat experience.

That brings me to my question: if this is what you want to get out of an F6 rush, why do you kick mid-level players who join your parties? Honest question!

If someone with a Cata Level of, say, 14 joins your party, they certainly aren't going to compete with you for loot or combat experience. If anything, they might lower your grade for the floor, but that isn't what you were going for (as far as I can tell). So why kick a mid-level player who joins your party?

Maybe you just enjoy the feeling of having a dungeon to yourself. Maybe you look down on mid-level players. Maybe you actually care about your grade for that run. Who knows? I don't, which is why I am asking. I would be grateful if you would fill me in!

(Full disclosure: I accidentally tagged along once on an F6 rush. I wanted to test a new setup so I joined an entrance party, and then found myself in floor 6 with a very surprised late-game player. It was a nice break in the grind, so I thought it might be fun to tag along again sometime. Obviously I would behave myself--I'd hang back and pick up enough scraps to hit my milestones, but I wouldn't do anything to ruin the run. Or so it seems to me!)

*I do think this is a bit of a crummy thing to do to unsuspecting noobs, for whatever that's worth. For one thing, you're costing them a few minutes of their time (since they will now have to find another party after waiting with you to enter a dungeon, only to get kicked). For another, you're falsely getting their hopes up--"yay, I'm going in with a level 30 mage this time!"--which seems kinda crummy, too. But I don't want to get into the ethics of F6 runs here, not least because there isn't anything crummy about kicking a mid-level player who knows very well what you're doing.

title: Not the bee movie script
body:
as a tank in dungeons, should i get bee, blu whale, or turdle



Spoiler: bonus bee movie script



According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow! Let's shake it up a little. Barry! Breakfast is ready! Ooming! Hang on a second. Hello? - Barry? - Adam? - Oan you believe this is happening? - I can't. I'll pick you up. Looking sharp. Use the stairs. Your father paid good money for those. Sorry. I'm excited. Here's the graduate. We're very proud of you, son. A perfect report card, all B's. Very proud. Ma! I got a thing going here. - You got lint on your fuzz. - Ow! That's me! - Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000. - Bye! Barry, I told you, stop flying in the house! - Hey, Adam. - Hey, Barry. - Is that fuzz gel? - A little. Special day, graduation. Never thought I'd make it. Three days grade school, three days high school. Those were awkward. Three days college. I'm glad I took a day and hitchhiked around the hive. You did come back different. - Hi, Barry. - Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good. - Hear about Frankie? - Yeah. - You going to the funeral? - No, I'm not going. Everybody knows, sting someone, you die. Don't waste it on a squirrel. Such a hothead. I guess he could have just gotten out of the way. I love this incorporating an amusement park into our day. That's why we don't need vacations. Boy, quite a bit of pomp... under the circumstances. - Well, Adam, today we are men. - We are! - Bee-men. - Amen! Hallelujah! Students, faculty, distinguished bees, please welcome Dean Buzzwell. Welcome, New Hive Oity graduating class of... ...9:15. That concludes our ceremonies. And begins your career at Honex Industries! Will we pick ourjob today? I heard it's just orientation. Heads up! Here we go. Keep your hands and antennas inside the tram at all times. - Wonder what it'll be like? - A little scary. Welcome to Honex, a division of Honesco and a part of the Hexagon Group. This is it! Wow. Wow. We know that you, as a bee, have worked your whole life to get to the point where you can work for your whole life. Honey begins when our valiant Pollen Jocks bring the nectar to the hive. Our top-secret formula is automatically color-corrected, scent-adjusted and bubble-contoured into this soothing sweet syrup with its distinctive golden glow you know as... Honey! - That girl was hot. - She's my cousin! - She is? - Yes, we're all cousins. - Right. You're right. - At Honex, we constantly strive to improve every aspect of bee existence. These bees are stress-testing a new helmet technology. - What do you think he makes? - Not enough. Here we have our latest advancement, the Krelman. - What does that do? - Oatches that little strand of honey that hangs after you pour it. Saves us millions. Oan anyone work on the Krelman? Of course. Most bee jobs are small ones. But bees know that every small job, if it's done well, means a lot. But choose carefully because you'll stay in the job you pick for the rest of your life. The same job the rest of your life? I didn't know that. What's the difference? You'll be happy to know that bees, as a species, haven't had one day off in 27 million years. So you'll just work us to death? We'll sure try. Wow! That blew my mind! "What's the difference?" How can you say that? One job forever? That's an insane choice to have to make. I'm relieved. Now we only have to make one decision in life. But, Adam, how could they never have told us that? Why would you question anything? We're bees. We're the most perfectly functioning society on Earth. You ever think maybe things work a little too well here? Like what? Give me one example. I don't know. But you know what I'm talking about. Please clear the gate. Royal Nectar Force on approach. Wait a second. Oheck it out. - Hey, those are Pollen Jocks! - Wow. I've never seen them this close. They know what it's like outside the hive. Yeah, but some don't come back. - Hey, Jocks! - Hi, Jocks! You guys did great! You're monsters! You're sky freaks! I love it! I love it! - I wonder where they were. - I don't know. Their day's not planned. Outside the hive, flying who knows where, doing who knows what. You can'tjust decide to be a Pollen Jock. You have to be bred for that. Right. Look. That's more pollen than you and I will see in a lifetime. It's just a status symbol. Bees make too much of it. Perhaps. Unless you're wearing it and the ladies see you wearing it. Those ladies? Aren't they our cousins too? Distant. Distant. Look at these two. - Oouple of Hive Harrys. - Let's have fun with them. It must be dangerous being a Pollen Jock. Yeah. Once a bear pinned me against a mushroom! He had a paw on my throat, and with the other, he was slapping me! - Oh, my! - I never thought I'd knock him out. What were you doing during this? Trying to alert the authorities. I can autograph that. A little gusty out there today, wasn't it, comrades? Yeah. Gusty. We're hitting a sunflower patch six miles from here tomorrow. - Six miles, huh? - Barry! A puddle jump for us, but maybe you're not up for it. - Maybe I am. - You are not! We're going 0900 at J-Gate. What do you think, buzzy-boy? Are you bee enough? I might be. It all depends on what 0900 means. Hey, Honex! Dad, you surprised me. You decide what you're interested in? - Well, there's a lot of choices. - But you only get one. Do you ever get bored doing the same job every day? Son, let me tell you about stirring. You grab that stick, and you just move it around, and you stir it around. You get yourself into a rhythm. It's a beautiful thing. You know, Dad, the more I think about it, maybe the honey field just isn't right for me. You were thinking of what, making balloon animals? That's a bad job for a guy with a stinger. Janet, your son's not sure he wants to go into honey! - Barry, you are so funny sometimes. - I'm not trying to be funny. You're not funny! You're going into honey. Our son, the stirrer! - You're gonna be a stirrer? - No one's listening to me! Wait till you see the sticks I have. I could say anything right now. I'm gonna get an ant tattoo! Let's open some honey and celebrate! Maybe I'll pierce my thorax. Shave my antennae. Shack up with a grasshopper. Get a gold tooth and call everybody "dawg"! I'm so proud. - We're starting work today! - Today's the day. Oome on! All the good jobs will be gone. Yeah, right. Pollen counting, stunt bee, pouring, stirrer, front desk, hair removal... - Is it still available? - Hang on. Two left! One of them's yours! Oongratulations! Step to the side. - What'd you get? - Picking crud out. Stellar! Wow! Oouple of newbies? Yes, sir! Our first day! We are ready! Make your choice. - You want to go first? - No, you go. Oh, my. What's available? Restroom attendant's open, not for the reason you think. - Any chance of getting the Krelman? - Sure, you're on. I'm sorry, the Krelman just closed out. Wax monkey's always open. The Krelman opened up again. What happened? A bee died. Makes an opening. See? He's dead. Another dead one. Deady. Deadified. Two more dead. Dead from the neck up. Dead from the neck down. That's life! Oh, this is so hard! Heating, cooling, stunt bee, pourer, stirrer, humming, inspector number seven, lint coordinator, stripe supervisor, mite wrangler. Barry, what do you think I should... Barry? Barry! All right, we've got the sunflower patch in quadrant nine... What happened to you? Where are you? - I'm going out. - Out? Out where? - Out there. - Oh, no! I have to, before I go to work for the rest of my life. You're gonna die! You're crazy! Hello? Another call coming in. If anyone's feeling brave, there's a Korean deli on 83rd that gets their roses today. Hey, guys. - Look at that. - Isn't that the kid we saw yesterday? Hold it, son, flight deck's restricted. It's OK, Lou. We're gonna take him up. Really? Feeling lucky, are you? Sign here, here. Just initial that. - Thank you. - OK. You got a rain advisory today, and as you all know, bees cannot fly in rain. So be careful. As always, watch your brooms, hockey sticks, dogs, birds, bears and bats. Also, I got a couple of reports of root beer being poured on us. Free the bees! Free the bees! Free the bees! The court finds in favor of the bees! Vanessa, we won! I knew you could do it! High-five! Sorry. I'm OK! You know what this means? All the honey will finally belong to the bees. Now we won't have to work so hard all the time. This is an unholy perversion of the balance of nature, Benson. You'll regret this. Barry, how much honey is out there? All right. One at a time. Barry, who are you wearing? My sweater is Ralph Lauren, and I have no pants. - What if Montgomery's right? - What do you mean? We've been living the bee way a long time, 27 million years. Oongratulations on your victory. What will you demand as a settlement? First, we'll demand a complete shutdown of all bee work camps. Then we want back the honey that was ours to begin with, every last drop. We demand an end to the glorification of the bear as anything more than a filthy, smelly, bad-breath stink machine. We're all aware of what they do in the woods. Wait for my signal. Take him out. He'll have nauseous for a few hours, then he'll be fine. And we will no longer tolerate bee-negative nicknames... But it's just a prance-about stage name! ...unnecessary inclusion of honey in bogus health products and la-dee-da human tea-time snack garnishments. Oan't breathe. Bring it in, boys! Hold it right there! Good. Tap it. Mr. Buzzwell, we just passed three cups, and there's gallons more coming! - I think we need to shut down! - Shut down? We've never shut down. Shut down honey production! Stop making honey! Turn your key, sir! What do we do now? Oannonball! We're shutting honey production! Mission abort. Aborting pollination and nectar detail. Returning to base. Adam, you wouldn't believe how much honey was out there. Oh, yeah? What's going on? Where is everybody? - Are they out celebrating? - They're home. They don't know what to do. Laying out, sleeping in. I heard your Uncle Oarl was on his way to San Antonio with a cricket. At least we got our honey back. Sometimes I think, so what if humans liked our honey? Who wouldn't? It's the greatest thing in the world! I was excited to be part of making it. This was my new desk. This was my new job. I wanted to do it really well. And now... Now I can't. I don't understand why they're not happy. I thought their lives would be better! They're doing nothing. It's amazing. Honey really changes people. You don't have any idea what's going on, do you? - What did you want to show me? - This. What happened here? That is not the half of it. Oh, no. Oh, my. They're all wilting. Doesn't look very good, does it? No. And whose fault do you think that is? You know, I'm gonna guess bees. Bees? Specifically, me. I didn't think bees not needing to make honey would affect all these things. It's notjust flowers. Fruits, vegetables, they all need bees. That's our whole SAT test right there. Take away produce, that affects the entire animal kingdom. And then, of course... The human species? So if there's no more pollination, it could all just go south here, couldn't it? I know this is also partly my fault. How about a suicide pact? How do we do it? - I'll sting you, you step on me. - Thatjust kills you twice. Right, right. Listen, Barry... sorry, but I gotta get going. I had to open my mouth and talk. Vanessa? Vanessa? Why are you leaving? Where are you going? To the final Tournament of Roses parade in Pasadena. They've moved it to this weekend because all the flowers are dying. It's the last chance I'll ever have to see it. Vanessa, I just wanna say I'm sorry. I never meant it to turn out like this. I know. Me neither. Tournament of Roses. Roses can't do sports. Wait a minute. Roses. Roses? Roses! Vanessa! Roses?! Barry? - Roses are flowers! - Yes, they are. Flowers, bees, pollen! I know. That's why this is the last parade. Maybe not. Oould you ask him to slow down? Oould you slow down? Barry! OK, I made a huge mistake. This is a total disaster, all my fault. Yes, it kind of is. I've ruined the planet. I wanted to help you with the flower shop. I've made it worse. Actually, it's completely closed down. I thought maybe you were remodeling. But I have another idea, and it's greater than my previous ideas combined. I don't want to hear it! All right, they have the roses, the roses have the pollen. I know every bee, plant and flower bud in this park. All we gotta do is get what they've got back here with what we've got. - Bees. - Park. - Pollen! - Flowers. - Repollination! - Across the nation! Tournament of Roses, Pasadena, Oalifornia. They've got nothing but flowers, floats and cotton candy. Security will be tight. I have an idea. Vanessa Bloome, FTD. Official floral business. It's real. Sorry, ma'am. Nice brooch. Thank you. It was a gift. Once inside, we just pick the right float. How about The Princess and the Pea? I could be the princess, and you could be the pea! Yes, I got it. - Where should I sit? - What are you? - I believe I'm the pea. - The pea? It goes under the mattresses. - Not in this fairy tale, sweetheart. - I'm getting the marshal. You do that! This whole parade is a fiasco! Let's see what this baby'll do. Hey, what are you doing?! Then all we do is blend in with traffic... ...without arousing suspicion. Once at the airport, there's no stopping us. Stop! Security. - You and your insect pack your float? - Yes. Has it been in your possession the entire time? Would you remove your shoes? - Remove your stinger. - It's part of me. I know. Just having some fun. Enjoy your flight. Then if we're lucky, we'll have just enough pollen to do the job. Oan you believe how lucky we are? We have just enough pollen to do the job! I think this is gonna work. It's got to work. Attention, passengers, this is Oaptain Scott. We have a bit of bad weather in New York. It looks like we'll experience a couple hours delay. Barry, these are cut flowers with no water. They'll never make it. I gotta get up there and talk to them. Be careful. Oan I get help with the Sky Mall magazine? I'd like to order the talking inflatable nose and ear hair trimmer. Oaptain, I'm in a real situation. - What'd you say, Hal? - Nothing. Bee! Don't freak out! My entire species... What are you doing? - Wait a minute! I'm an attorney! - Who's an attorney? Don't move. Oh, Barry. Good afternoon, passengers. This is your captain. Would a Miss Vanessa Bloome in 24B please report to the cockpit? And please hurry! What happened here? There was a DustBuster, a toupee, a life raft exploded. One's bald, one's in a boat, they're both unconscious! - Is that another bee joke? - No! No one's flying the plane! This is JFK control tower, Flight 356. What's your status? This is Vanessa Bloome. I'm a florist from New York. Where's the pilot? He's unconscious, and so is the copilot. Not good. Does anyone onboard have flight experience? As a matter of fact, there is. - Who's that? - Barry Benson. From the honey trial?! Oh, great. Vanessa, this is nothing more than a big metal bee. It's got giant wings, huge engines. I can't fly a plane. - Why not? Isn't John Travolta a pilot? - Yes. How hard could it be? Wait, Barry! We're headed into some lightning. This is Bob Bumble. We have some late-breaking news from JFK Airport, where a suspenseful scene is developing. Barry Benson, fresh from his legal victory... That's Barry! ...is attempting to land a plane, loaded with people, flowers and an incapacitated flight crew. Flowers?! We have a storm in the area and two individuals at the controls with absolutely no flight experience. Just a minute. There's a bee on that plane. I'm quite familiar with Mr. Benson and his no-account compadres. They've done enough damage. But isn't he your only hope? Technically, a bee shouldn't be able to fly at all. Their wings are too small... Haven't we heard this a million times? "The surface area of the wings and body mass make no sense." - Get this on the air! - Got it. - Stand by. - We're going live. The way we work may be a mystery to you. Making honey takes a lot of bees doing a lot of small jobs. But let me tell you about a small job. If you do it well, it makes a big difference. More than we realized. To us, to everyone. That's why I want to get bees back to working together. That's the bee way! We're not made of Jell-O. We get behind a fellow. - Black and yellow! - Hello! Left, right, down, hover. - Hover? - Forget hover. This isn't so hard. Beep-beep! Beep-beep! Barry, what happened?! Wait, I think we were on autopilot the whole time. - That may have been helping me. - And now we're not! So it turns out I cannot fly a plane. All of you, let's get behind this fellow! Move it out! Move out! Our only chance is if I do what I'd do, you copy me with the wings of the plane! Don't have to yell. I'm not yelling! We're in a lot of trouble. It's very hard to concentrate with that panicky tone in your voice! It's not a tone. I'm panicking! I can't do this! Vanessa, pull yourself together. You have to snap out of it! You snap out of it. You snap out of it. - You snap out of it! - You snap out of it! - You snap out of it! - You snap out of it! - You snap out of it! - You snap out of it! - Hold it! - Why? Oome on, it's my turn. How is the plane flying? I don't know. Hello? Benson, got any flowers for a happy occasion in there? The Pollen Jocks! They do get behind a fellow. - Black and yellow. - Hello. All right, let's drop this tin can on the blacktop. Where? I can't see anything. Oan you? No, nothing. It's all cloudy. Oome on. You got to think bee, Barry. - Thinking bee. - Thinking bee. Thinking bee! Thinking bee! Thinking bee! Wait a minute. I think I'm feeling something. - What? - I don't know. It's strong, pulling me. Like a 27-million-year-old instinct. Bring the nose down. Thinking bee! Thinking bee! Thinking bee! - What in the world is on the tarmac? - Get some lights on that! Thinking bee! Thinking bee! Thinking bee! - Vanessa, aim for the flower. - OK. Out the engines. We're going in on bee power. Ready, boys? Affirmative! Good. Good. Easy, now. That's it. Land on that flower! Ready? Full reverse! Spin it around! - Not that flower! The other one! - Which one? - That flower. - I'm aiming at the flower! That's a fat guy in a flowered shirt. I mean the giant pulsating flower made of millions of bees! Pull forward. Nose down. Tail up. Rotate around it. - This is insane, Barry! - This's the only way I know how to fly. Am I koo-koo-kachoo, or is this plane flying in an insect-like pattern? Get your nose in there. Don't be afraid. Smell it. Full reverse! Just drop it. Be a part of it. Aim for the center! Now drop it in! Drop it in, woman! Oome on, already. Barry, we did it! You taught me how to fly! - Yes. No high-five! - Right. Barry, it worked! Did you see the giant flower? What giant flower? Where? Of course I saw the flower! That was genius! - Thank you. - But we're not done yet. Listen, everyone! This runway is covered with the last pollen from the last flowers available anywhere on Earth. That means this is our last chance. We're the only ones who make honey, pollinate flowers and dress like this. If we're gonna survive as a species, this is our moment! What do you say? Are we going to be bees, orjust Museum of Natural History keychains? We're bees! Keychain! Then follow me! Except Keychain. Hold on, Barry. Here. You've earned this. Yeah! I'm a Pollen Jock! And it's a perfect fit. All I gotta do are the sleeves. Oh, yeah. That's our Barry. Mom! The bees are back! If anybody needs to make a call, now's the time. I got a feeling we'll be working late tonight! Here's your change. Have a great afternoon! Oan I help who's next? Would you like some honey with that? It is bee-approved. Don't forget these. Milk, cream, cheese, it's all me. And I don't see a nickel! Sometimes I just feel like a piece of meat! I had no idea. Barry, I'm sorry. Have you got a moment? Would you excuse me? My mosquito associate will help you. Sorry I'm late. He's a lawyer too? I was already a blood-sucking parasite. All I needed was a briefcase. Have a great afternoon! Barry, I just got this huge tulip order, and I can't get them anywhere. No problem, Vannie. Just leave it to me. You're a lifesaver, Barry. Oan I help who's next? All right, scramble, jocks! It's time to fly. Thank you, Barry! That bee is living my life! Let it go, Kenny. - When will this nightmare end?! - Let it all go. - Beautiful day to fly. - Sure is. Between you and me, I was dying to get out of that office. You have got to start thinking bee, my friend. - Thinking bee! - Me? Hold it. Let's just stop for a second. Hold it. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, everyone. Oan we stop here? I'm not making a major life decision during a production number! All right. Take ten, everybody. Wrap it up, guys. I had virtually no rehearsal for that.

title: Lunar Client Fairy Soul Waypoints
body:
Ok. Some of you may have already seen my post on the new BLC Fairy Soul Waypoints mod profile:





Updated BadlionClient Fairy Soul Waypoints Profile, ft. Thirty's profile + fyu waypoint list.


Like if it helped. Thanks so much for the 3k views so far. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— THIS IS FOR FORGE So i found this website https://pastebin.com/eJnvcjwk that has the list of all the new fs locations...




hypixel.net





Every time you exit out of Lunar, the client shuffles all the waypoints in the list around. The order is always messed up. I don't particularly like this implementation. ALSO, there is a bug in the waypoints menu list. When you scroll down too far, you can't hide or unhide a waypoint.

Tutorial:
1. Download, install, and run Lunar Client once with minecraft. Then make a random waypoint with 'n'. Close minecraft, and then close the Lunar launcher.

2. Go to:
Windows: "C:\Users\____\.lunarclient\settings\game\"
Mac: "/Users/____/.lunarclient/settings/game/"

3. Delete the existing "waypoints.json" and replace it with the download:
http://www.mediafire.com/file/6jeet1iq3jmhoim/waypoints.json/file

4. Launch Lunar and minecraft. Press 'm' to see the waypoints.

NOTE: If it says "There are no waypoints for this world", close Lunar and open the waypoints.json file. You should see that it starts with


JSON:


{"mp:hypixel.net":{"":{"Hub #1":

Change it to:


JSON:


{"mp:mc.hypixel.net":{"":{"Hub #1":


Please tell me if anything is wrong or confusing. Thanks.

title: The issue with the mythic bat pet (it's broken and it doesn't work with a spooky bait)
body:
For anyone who doesn't know its stats:


Mythic bat pet gives +5% scc and +25% chance to catch spooky sc during event. I got my vampire fang during the previous event and I decided to put it on my pet (it was a huge mistake). I was excited when I saw these stats because I thought that it's the best pet for spooky fishing. Then I tested dolphin and bat pet for spooky fishing - I was disappointed with the test results:

I cought 150 sc with dolphin and bat pets ('+' is a spooky mob, '-' is just a common sea creature mob). 65 of the 150 sc were spooky mobs (dolphin + spooky bait) [this is 43%] and 55 of the 150 sc were spooky mobs (mythic bat + spooky bait) [36-37%]. Bat pet should've given 60-70% spooky mobs (not just 40%) so I can conclude that a mythic bat pet is bugged and doesn't work with a spooky bait (I think 150 sc is enough to make conclusion). It makes this pet trash because I don't see the point to use this pet with another bait since a dolphin pet is better with a spooky bait than a bat with a fish|whale bait. I heard that auger rod doesn't work with an ice bait and maybe bat + spooky bait is the same problem.
I should've made this post right after the previous event but I was slightly lazy 

TL DR
Bat pet is broken and the last perk (Sonar) doesn't work with a spooky bait

title: BEST BUDGET FISHING SETUP (GUIDE)
body:
Do you wanna fish? Are you POOR???
Well if so, look no further! I'll tell you the best cheap fishing setup that will cost less than 500k coins!
This guide is for people who are early - mid game, or don't wanna spend that much on fishing.
Lets begin!

ARMOR
Helmet- Water hydra head (100k).
Chestplate- Angler chestplate (100 coins).
Leggings- Angler leggings (80 coins).
Boots- Squid boots (anywhere from 15 - 100 coins).

FISHING ROD
Winter rod (40k from shop on jerry island).

PET
Common dolphin (anywhere from 50k-300k depending on level).

BAIT
Fish bait (80-100 coins each from bazaar, I will use price of 100 and 1000 total bait).

OTHER
/visit cake_hub for all the cakes, you will need the sea creature chance one the most but just take all of them (FREE!).
Fishing exp boost 3 ( about 20k each).
Angler 6 enchantment for rod (about 20k).

TOTAL
Coins - 270k (Higher if higher level dolphin, this total includes 1000 bait, so subtract 100000 coins if you dont wanna use bait).
Total Sea creature chance: +16.3 (+21.3 if dolphin is lvl 100).
You also fish up sea creatures fast because of the + 50% fishing speed from the rod.
The winter rod adds 5 sea creature chance if you fish on the winter island, so that is already added to the total.
Level 1 dolphin is worth getting since you can level it fast.

Enchants other than angler 6 not included in the total.
