title: Anyone got sammed by this guy?
body:
Hello! I'm kinda hunting scammers down and recently I found one guy who makes people leave from playing SkyBlock. That guy works pretty clever way. He tries to make friends with you and waits a couple of months and be like a cool guy. But then later he asks to borrow items to test them out or test something else. I was getting sus of him after he asked for more items.  Then just start collecting more and more stuff from you and then he says that add him to your coop to get items back. That's where you are doomed and you lost all your items. If you add him he just grief you and collects the rest of the items for himself somehow. So when he asked to add him to COOP, that's where I got sus of him even more and started investigating. And yea, I lost my armor cause of that, but I hope it's a good sacrifice. 
I found a couple of nicknames of people what he scammed and he is still in coop with the last successful victim. If you have any info about that guy or you saw him trying to scam someone or you been scammed by him. You can report it to the staff. 

That guy IGN: ImSirius_ 

I'm asking about this, cause it's more than scamming, that guy makes people leave the game and SkyBlock or even the whole Hypixel server. That is harming the server and the server is losing potential customers. There are more people like that, so if we report this kinda people with good evidence, we make servers better for everyone and we can actually get more people in this wonderful game mode. 

PS. Don´t call this "public shaming", this can be a pretty serious problem in the future.

title: [IDEA] Midas Pet and the Darkest Auction
body:
Btw, i'm posting this in normal forums because I actually want people to see it

The Darkest Auction is a special version of the Dark Auction happens only twice a day, one at 12pm est and one at 12am est. The requirements for the Darkest Auction is to have either a 50m midas sword, 100m midas staff, livid dagger, shadow fury, or really any other expensive endgame item. You also have to have at least 10mil in your purse. The Darkest Auction sells unique items and also items that are unobtainable any other way, like mythic pets or supreme swords. In it is a mythic Midas pet. The other rarities can be crafted with enchanted eggs and gold (8 stacks of enchanted gold and 1 enchanted egg for common-rare, 8 enchanted gold blocks and super enchanted egg for epic-legendary). The mythic Midas pet is the same as the legendary Midas pet, but with one more ability. On base, it gives +50 defense, +50 strength, and +30% crit damage. It's abilities are:
common to uncommon - legacy: Gain +1% crit damage per hour of active gameplay (max 50 crit damage, has to be on public island).
rare to epic - golden touch: Inflict slowness 3 for 5 seconds on enemies when a item ability is used on them (i.e. Dragon Rage, Shadow Fury, etc.)
legendary - royalty: Gain +5 strength per 50 defense (max 50 strength).
mythic - Ancient Blade: Gain +1 damage and strength on the Midas' Sword per level.

title: ::THE MOST UNDERRATED ITEM::50dmg less than "shadow fury" but 25M cheaper . (if ur lower than Catacomb 37 ) that sword is even better~
body:
INTRODUCTION: necromancer sword , a f6 drop , which is about 4~5M in ah. it has 250 base dmg , 125 strength and 125 defence , according to "hypixel fandom" , can store soul from undead tag mobs (except bosses) .

WHY IT IS UNDERATED??
from its price in auction house , at 06/11 7:00pm , its just 5M in lowest bin , which is quite shocking because compared to "shadow fury " , regarded as "the best weapon" , the necromancer sword is just have (50 dmg less) . WHILE WE JUST DONT TALK ABOUT THE SHADOW FURY ABILITY FIRST , regard on the " RAISE SOUL" ability , if you have absorbed a "mimic soul " or "spirit bear soul" they deal 40k per second (due to high attack speed) and if you are in full necromancer armour , the dmg per second (WITHOUT THE SWORD ) is 40k*6 = 240k

NECROMANCER SWORD DEALS 240k DMG more in its ability ,

the dmg of two sword if not include necromancy mobs , shadow fury better => better than necromancer sword JUST FOR 50 dmg

however , when the ability of the necromancer sword is counted , which is 240k more at its best mob whihc can absorb in 6/11 2020

SHADOW FURY is NOT as GOOD as the NECROMANCER SWORD (unless your above catacomb 37)(calculated)

due to the shadow fury just have 50 more damage but necromancer mob deals 240k per sec

WHAT adds insult to injury is that ----- Shadow Fury , a 50 more damage weapon , is 25M higher than the necromancer sword

HOWEVER , inspite of the shadow fury ability , it is believed to be useful to shadow fury users can rapid teleport and hit 5 mob in a 10 block radius
which is the catchy point of the shadow fury , worth 25M more coins.

but when it comes down to use , the rapid teleport is not efficient , which can welly replaced by the spirit scupture , whihc worth 28M recently , recorded in 6/11 2020 .

IN THE NUT SHELL ,
1)shadow fury better than necromancer sword JUST FOR 50 dmg
2)SHADOW FURY is NOT as GOOD as the NECROMANCER SWORD (unless your above catacomb 37)(calculated)
3)Shadow Fury , a 50 more damage weapon , is 25M higher than the necromancer sword
which those coins can be used to buy spirit scupture , whihc worth 28M recently , recorded in 6/11 2020 .

NECROMANCER SWORD IS UNDERATED SOOOOOOOOO MUCH , with its low price , high dmg stat

SHADOW FURY IS TOOOOOOOO OVER PAID , WHICH DIDNT DESERVE THE PRICE
THE 25M extra can be used to buy spirit scupture , or other items .

title: Ideas for Ironman
body:
Just wanted to share some thoughts on what they should add to ironman profiles.
1) A way to give gifts.


Spoiler: How could they add this



The devs could code it so that you can only give and not receive gifts. It shouldn't be too hard, it would be similar to disabling item pickups. Snow minions are a great source of money when you have limited methods as well as a great source of diamonds. Perfect Tier 12 takes very long to grind even with snow minions, but at least they are much more effective. As for exp boosts, they are necessary for anybody who wants 50 skill avg. It already takes months per skill, this would greatly speed up the process for iron man profiles.


2) Remove npc buy limit.


Spoiler: How could they add this



It's simple, just make the code for an iron man profile the same as it used to be. There really is no point of the buy limit when you can't resell to bazaar but I can also understand why it's in the game.


3) Make there a way to get booster cookies.


Spoiler: How could they add this



They could make a new npc that sells them very overpriced. Maybe make him sell at 2mil so people don't flip them and only buy one every day or 4 days. Furthermore, they could make it so only iron man players can interact with him.


4) If there are no booster cookies, at least make bits easier to obtain.


Spoiler: How could they add this



I think you can get bits in dungeons, but I may be wrong. My idea for adding bits would be on each skill level you get some, scaling just like coins scale. This would mean they are limited so bits items are more valuable automatically. You could also get rewarded bits on each npc purchase, and contribution to community projects. If you do though, the npc buy limit might have to stay.


5) Make mage a more viable class.


Spoiler: How could they add this



The yeti sword is almost necessary and is ridiculously expensive. If you had one ice minion tier 11 working, it would take upwards of 5-6 years to fully make this. Even with 29, which is unrealistic because people need other minions for other things, it takes upwards of 2 months to just get all the ice. The iron blocks take about a week also. It's ridiculously expensive for an iron man player and unlike the midas staff, isn't buyable for a mage. This makes the game unbalanced because a smart player would just save up and buy the midas staff next time Scorpius is mayor again. It's better at almost every price point, but still insanely expensive. For a game mode with limited money making methods, it's almost impossible to play mage.


5) Buff npc sell prices.


Spoiler: How could they add this



This one is a must. Money is so hard to make on an iron man. It can screw you out of dungeon drops easily and overall is a pain. The only way to make money is through raider's, which isn't much, or farming and selling to the npc, which is barely more. To buff npc sell prices is a good fix in my opinion.



Anyways, these are just suggestions. The only necessities are the gifts and bits or booster cookies and the others are just wishes mainly. If anyone else has ideas please respond, I'd love to hear them!

title: Void chicken- a fun pastime
body:
A fun activity I found while messing around. Requirements are an aote and lots of mana

The rules are simple. Jump off the island next to the launch pad to the park. Now, using your aote, fly into the space under the hub island. Race to the other side of the hub and come up behind the colleseum. If you fall into the void, you lose. If you survive, you win. Bonus points if you had a god potion on or millions in your purse.

This enchantment would basically work on Gold Pickaxes to make them behave like a Diamond Pickaxe, mine diamond things you know, but it would be just like the regular speed of a golden pickaxe. This would be so useful for people who just need one pickaxe, and want to stick to the Stonk, which sadly is golden and not diamond. So the recipe would be 4 stacks of enchanted diamonds, one in each corner, and 32 enchanted gold filling each of the other corners being like 32, 32, 32, and 32, and a regular book in the middle

title: A simple, but necessary change.
body:
Currently in the whole of Skyblock, there is no way to naturally obtain sand. 
Having to make and destroy a cactus island seems almost silly.
There are two main places in which sand appears. The mushroom desert, and the end.
It doesn't particularly matter in which place it's mineable, but it definitely should be obtainable somewhere.

Thank you for coming to my TED Talk.

title: [IDEA]New Pet Upgraders
body:
1. Introduction
As you know, the Spooky Update last week added new items, and one of those new items are the Vampire Fangs, that can be used to upgrade the Bat Pet into a Mythic rarity, increasing the amount of abilities it has for the cost of a Pet Item Slot. Here are some ideas for other Pet Upgraders
2. Pets that will be Upgraded
There will be several new Pet Items that can be used to increase rarity of pets. 
Here are the ones that i will upgrade in this thread
- Enderman Pet
- Dolphin Pet
- Monkey Pet
- Rabbit Pet(WIP)
- Silverfish Pet
- Parrot Pet
- Sheep Pet
- Ghoul Pet
- Hound Pet
- Tarantula Pet
- Snowman Pet
- Ender Dragon Pet
- Skeleton Pet
- Bee Pet
- Wither Skeleton Pet
- Griffin Pet
Pet Upgrades increases the Stats that the pokemon increases, adds a new ability and improves old ablities
3. The New Pet Upgrades
Dragon Charm


Spoiler: Dragon Charm



Dragon Charm is a new Pet Item that can upgrade a Leg Enderman Pet into a Mythic Enderman Pet if used as a pet item
How to Obtain:
it is rarely dropped from Endstone Protector(2%). chances increase if you are 3rd, 2nd, or 1st
Pet Boosts:
[Lvl 100]Enderman
+90 Crit Damage

Enderian - take 40% less damage from end monsters

Teleport Savyy - Buffs the Aspect of the End ability granting 60 Damage and 30 Strength for 5s on use.

Zealot Madness - Increases your odds to find a Special Zealot by 35%

Draconic Luck - Increases the chance for rare dragon drops by 10% and gives you an extra +20 Dragon Weight per eye placed

Spoiler: Dolphin's Bone

It is obtained after you get 20.000 Sea Creature Kills

title: Things to do when bored of SkyBlock
body:
Never done a formal thread before, let’s see how it goes
Hello, people of this game. As you know, playing one specific video game for long periods can cause you to lose interest in that game. I thought that if this were the case, you would want to do something else to fill the time that SkyBlock would normally fill. So, I have come up with a list of some things you should do if you were ever to get bored of SkyBlock. This is just my opinion, or something.
5. Roguelikes 
So, roguelikes are games that are pretty fun. There are many of them out there that don’t cost a lot. Some examples being Noita, The Binding of Isaac, Soul Knight (suggested by SnowMinionT11), and Enter the Gungeon. They have a lot of strategy and many different play-styles for you to possible enjoy
4. Going outside
In these circumstances, it might not bethe most accessible, but you should all give it a try sometime
3. Hollow Knight
in my opinion, this is one of the better games out there. It has good mechanics, great tmusic, and looks very nice. You should definitely give this game a try. 
2. A new hobby
You ever wanted to draw, or play a sport, or write a book. But you haven’t had the time until now? Well, now you might have the time.
1. Sleep
Trust me, sleep is amazing. You need this more than anything else. 

Well that was it. Please leave feedback or something for my first formal thread.

title: Midas armour
body:
As ridiculous as this sounds hear me out first

I have came up with a full concept for this set that will be basically the end game

Midas Armour piece base stats (rarity legendary)
Helmet Chestplate Leggings Boots
Base health 50 Base health 75 Base health 60 Base health 40
Base defence 20 Base defence 40 Base defence 30 Base defence 15
Base crit chance 0 Base crit chance 0 Base crit chance 0 Base crit chance 0
Base crit damage 0 Base crit damage 0 Base crit damage 0 Base crit damage 0
Base strength 0 Base strength 0 Base strength 0 Base strength 0
Base intelligence 25 Base intelligence 25 Base intelligence 25 Base intelligence 25

Ok those are the base stats now it's time for the scaling
Each piece will follow the same scaling

Per Million coins the stats will increase as following (take note each piece caps at 50m)
Health 7.5 hp per million (375 health if maxed) (this can be scaled down probably)
Defence 4 defence per million (200 def total if maxed)
Crit chance 0.25 per million (12.5 cc If maxed)
Crit damage 0.8 per million (40 cd if maxed)
Strength 0.8 per million (40 S if maxed)
Intelligence 2.5 per million (125 intel if maxed)

Now I understand that this armour set may seem super overpowered but please keep in mind that this set will cost you 200m coins which by no means is cheap at all compared to its lower tier counterpart shadow assassin which is 25S 25 cd per piece if you like the concept of it share it with your friends because it took a while to come up with these numbers for base stats and scaling stats

title: The Iced Sickle (Idea) Somewhat effort post
body:
The Iced sickle is unlocked at ice collection 11 it costs 128 enchanted packed ice and the sticks are replaced with enchanted blaze rods, its ability Shoots 4 ice projectiles dealing 5000 damage each(this has a 0.1 scaling with intelligence). It has 120+ Damage but when holding it you lose 20 speed(0.1 scaling with intelligence) after 10 uses it takes 5 seconds to recharge. This will be the idea that it drops from a new mob "The Frozen God." He is wearing full frozen blaze with the Iced Sickle He has 3million health and has a 1/300 chance to drop it, this mini boss has a 1/20 chance to spawn in dungeons.

title: Phantom Rod and Livid dagger comparison in a nutshell.
body:
Phantom rod when hooked , deals true damage ( 0 miss chance ). Good against mobs that go zoom all the time. Can be even better with attack speed.

Livid dagger has max attack speed , crit chance and better stats. But it doesn't have true hit like phantom rod.

Phantom rod > Livid if mobs don't stay at 1 place
Livid dagger > Phantom rod if you can solo mob at 1 place.

title: Toxicity in dungeons
body:
Dungeons is a fun update, but one major issue that I have had with it is toxic players either leaving in the middle or actively trolling the run. When a player leaves the entire run can be very difficult, but still salvageable. If a player is actively trolling then it is a horrendous 1 hour experience. It is understandable that sometimes there are connection issues or other real world factors;m players who actively troll a dungeon ruin the entire experience

Recently I've had dungeon runs where someone holds the entire team hostage. In my most recent, a member left the game and another decided to afk in a safe zone forcing us to 3 man F4. We could not collect our xp because we could not wipe, and we were already 70% cleared. Since I don't have a recording software, here are screenshots of ltzKlenO_0 sitting at fairy for almost 10 minutes while we cleared. It should be noted that this player actively trolled puzzles such as the ice room, and was afk in the fairy room before I realized and started taking screenshots. The run in question only ended when we cleared the entire dungeon and had the boss kill ltzKlenO_0 for us.

I figure that there is nothing to be done against this player, but I do wish this kind of situation can be addressed. A vote kick option for a dungeon run would be one potential solution where the majority of the players votes to kick a player who is trolling or excessively afk.

title: The Story of The Watcher (10+ positive reactions) [Effort post]
body:
This is my alternate timeline in which I envision The Watcher like this I hope you enjoy reading! (Its an alternate timeline because the journals say otherwise)

The Watcher came from a time when the catacombs were not in control of Necron. The wither king made The Watcher to keep an eye on Necron. Necron knew that he could not kill The Watcher without getting serious consequences potentially ruining his chances of inheriting the catacombs from his father. 

Necron made The Watcher test adventurers dumb enough to come into the catacombs. The Watcher enjoyed making adventurers flee for their lives as to not waste Necron's time with the ones not strong enough to fight. The ones who got through The Watcher, always died to one of Necron's generals. The Watcher liked stalking the humans and messing with their brains. It was fascinated by how the humans dealt with the undead. It also thought the humans were weak. Most humans died to the undead. The Watcher stalked each group with great interest. The ones that did not die to the undead died to Bonzo. 

Necrons number one rule was to leave no survivors. The Watcher made sure of that by trapping and killing the ones that turned back. Eventually one human made their escape from the catacombs alive. But nobody believed them because the catacombs had been quiet for millennia, possibly even eons. Necron heard about this and told The Watcher they are lucky that it is under the wither kings protection otherwise it would have been smitten. The humans could have found out they were planning to take over the overworld too. Now they have to speed up the process. 

Lore about the generals coming soon hopefully! I hope all you forumers enjoyed reading this considering I put some effort into this. I should probably make it more about the watcher instead of making a whole story behind it that will help with the transfer to Bonzo's storyline, but eventually I hope to put all of the generals stories as well as Necron's and the wither kings into one big story that seamlessly passes into each other. Anyway I hope you enjoyed the introduction! Keep an eye out for Bonzo's story if you liked this one! Also, please like the post if you enjoyed it, and give it a bump!

Edited to add a bit of clarification
Edit 2: Bonzo's Story is out make sure to check it out if you like this! Right here ---> https://hypixel.net/threads/the-story-of-bonzo-effort-post.3494435/
Edit 3: Formatting a bit better

title: storm boss fight, new miniboss and new puzzle room! [idea]
body:
Target Practice [puzzle]


Spoiler: target practice



A room with a 10x10 wall. A "target" pops up for a second, and goes away. Then this happens 1 second later, and the goal is to hit 3 of them in a row. You can go anywhere in the room, but if you miss a shot, the counter resets. If you dont shoot, it doesnt reset. Basically, shoot 3 times, hit 3 times and you win, not every target that pops up has to be shot. A counter can be seen above the wall, with green stained clay meaning a hit, and red stained clay meaning the ones you still need in a row


Fear Mongerer miniboss thats totally not stolen from twilight forest's lich stage 1 [miniboss]


Spoiler: fear mongerer miniboss thats totally not stolen from twilight forest's lich stage 1



miniboss name: Fear Mongerer(the spooky fest trader person), only spawns in yellow rooms
hp: 1 hp, dies in one hit, but has shields that circle around him. you cant attack him until all shields are down.
how fight work: 3 shields, makes him immune to damage until all 3 are down. He shoots candy lasers(just a visual) that can be hit back using an item you get by finishing the parkour in the room(quite easy, 5 jumps 4 blocks each(extra speed in dungeons makes them easy), cant use movement abilities(aote, grappler, spider boots, etc)). Lasers do 20% of hp, and give you slowness 3 for 5 seconds. Each time you get it, you can hit the lasers back at him, to destroy a shield every time you hit him with the lasers. I didnt steal this from twilight forest, 100% NOT stage 1 of the lich, so dont spam comments abt that.
drops candy core, used to upgrade candy artifact for an extra +10% + boosted rarity, as rng drop and 5 of each type of candy as 100% drop instead of essence.


Storm fight


Spoiler: Storm fight



Storm (if someone wants to make storm phrases you can)
Stages: 5
Stage 1: air related: big platform above the arena, air related. Random "winds" blowing you off the edge, platform made of packed ice btw. You try surviving for EITHER 60 seconds without falling off, or until you kill the core in the middle, which is what is shooting winds at you. storm also occasionally strikes lightning, which destroys the ground there and also damages you for 100k damage if you get hit. you cant teleport once you fall off(death barrier is the same as the platform height).

stage 2: fire related: speech "hah you fools. While you were trying to survive in my mighty winds, they've been powering my fire, a fire that will rage, and tear through you!"
what you do: big fire that prevents you from seeing clearly, and you get randomly teleported inside it. Also does 2k ehp of damage per second. Random fire spirits pop up, which you have to kill, kinda like bonzo's mobs but you cant see them very clearly. in this fire, you have to try and find the middle, where the lever will be located to turn it off, you have to kill all the fire spirits before you can hit the lever. f5 doesnt help seeing.

stage 3: earth related: speech "AGGHHHH. Why did i leave that lever there? No matter. The lever you pulled may have stopped the fire, but it wont save you from this challenge!
basically, the ground stops you from healing every little stage you're in. deathrun but with fighting instead of parkour, so you're in an autoscroller that advances every time you finish the mobs in the stage. you fight until you get to the end to press yet ANOTHER lever. if you finish the stages and hit the lever without the wall hits you, you continue to the next stage without any debuffs. if the wall hits you, you'll go on to the next stage with the following deuffs: set speed to 100%, remove half of all blessings, rounded up when odd number, and finally a -20 second penalty on your breath bar/time when you get onto the water stage.
stage 4: water related: speech when beat the parkour "WHY DO I KEEP LEAVING LEVERS EVERYWHERE!?!?!?!? Doesnt matter, ILL JUST DROWN YOU INSTEAD!"
speech when you didnt do the stages fast enough: "Hah I knew you couldn't beat my marvelous arena! I'll send you a little GIFT just for failing. Prove your worth to me again by continuing this challenge with even LESS power than you had before." message in chat saying: you've lost half your blessings, and your speed has been set to 100%.
you then get teleported into a cage for 20 seconds if you failed the parkour
what you do: basically, you have to try and survive by getting to the other side without drowning or dying. No abilities. You have to try to get to the other side, where there will be a hut to lead to a hole where storm is. Traps will try stopping you, so will some mobs.

stage 5: fighting storm: speech "fine burger this is. Wait how did you get in here???? I guess I'll have to finish you myself then! Get ready!
storm has 700m hp and shoots gusts of air that blow you around. Also shoots fireballs that do 90k dmg a hit, which are fairly easy to dodge. Sses the yeti sword ability too, and also makes the floor water occasionally. Nothing special. Once he gets down to 1m hp, he will start self destructing, doing 500k dmg when he blows up. Gets down to 1 hp, continues to attack, but you can hit him and kill him instantly. Not hitting him for 20 seconds results in him healing until he gets hit again



please give feedback thx

title: Stealing Special Zealots SOLUTION
body:
I know that they added pick up priority on the summoning eyes after you killed a special zealot but that's only one part of the problem. The problem now is people killing the special zealots and standing on the eye until the pickup priority ends and they can take it. I know that a number of people have faced this issue and have gotten cheated out of eyes. I think there's an easy solution to this and it's to make it so that if you spawn a special zealot that you are the only person that can hit it for say 10 seconds or so. This would give you time to look around for the zealot and find it before someone could kill it and stand on the eye.

This would also make a good solution to people hitting another person's slayer boss. Maybe they could even make it a setting that you can toggle so that way if you have a friend who you want to help you with a slayer boss they can hit it.

These are both problems that lots of people deal with and I think this solution or something similar to it would save frustration, in-game money, and time (more for slayer bosses) for lots of people.

title: Hypixel forums app? (Poll)
body:
Idk where to put this thread so ima just put it in the most active forums page, skyblock.

often I find myself on the hypixel skyblock forums page via my phone. I love posting threads and replying to others while in school so I like to be here. In fact, This place may have pretty stupid people but they just make the forums family whole.

However much I like tuning into the forums mobile, it could be better. Sometimes I wish I could get notification pings without having to use my email, and auto-correct should definitely be adapted to the forums where unnatural terms are used all the time.

these issues could definitely be fixed as long as provide actual support to mobile users. I propose that hypixel devote some of their funds to creating a hypixel app. This app would have connections to the forums, hypixel store, game info, announcements, and all the other pages o hypixel.net. I also think it should have systems that tie to useful fandom wikis and API viewers, especially for skyblock. These implementations could even be adapted to things like google play and desktop applications.

what do you think? I’m no app developer but this does seem like a useful idea. I could see myself using this all the time. Please vote on the poll for your opinion on the matters and comment any other ideas!

title: The Mayors and their likely used money making methods.
body:
So we know for sure Marina isn't an actual citizen of the Hub or its (current) surrounding islands, and comes from what is implied to be the Abyss (promising to let us visit some day) and it's even possible her and the Melancholic Viking both come from the same place. Her income is probably legit, fishing and selling her catches.

Diana sells Griffins and Ancestral Spades, but due to her abilities and knowledge on the topic of both pets and mythos she's likely a scholar. Her income probably comes from the stuff she sells as mayor (shovels produced by her, Griffins bred by her) along with her research papers and grants to further her studies.

Cole is a miner. He outright tells players he spends his time mining. Safe to assume his income is just from mining and selling his drops.

Diaz seems to be associated with the normal auction, bank, and shop NPCs and they have a lot of money-based perks. I assume Diaz likely makes money off of Bazaar and AH flipping since they seem like the rich "invest in stocks" kinda person.

Paul just grinds dungeons 24/7 when he's not mayor. Probably has a freakin' Diamond Necron head or something. The fact he is so skilled he can find TEN different secrets a floor, no matter the layout that NOBODY else can find implies a lot. Not to mention he's so rich he outright offers to pay 1/5 of dungeon chest's costs as mayor.

Foxy seems to be the type of girl that schedules her life around the game and its events. She probably makes profit off of placing high in Spooky Festival, taking advantage of other mayor's events when she's not mayor, selling Oringo pets when others can't get on and miss them. And I imagine she has a full museum of every year cake in the game.

Aatrox seems to grind slayers A L O T though his intelligence is lacking. He probably just grinds Sven a ton and sells overfluxes bin at their lowest price for instant money. Still money, but not as much. I imagine Maddox lets Aatrox do slayers for free because they're related.

Barry conjures money from hell.

Scorpius def makes his money off DA. They're paid off by Sirius so he can sell more stuff through his puppet mayor. Likely the richest of all of them due to the sheer fact Sirius is likely willing to do anything to get more business and he can give up to 1m to all players that vote for him.

To sum it up, the best money-making method is being an NPC. Have a wonderful day folks!

title: [Dungeon-Journal] The Wither Age
body:
We entered the Catacombs, the Entrance. We knew that it was easy, as we struggled there before. 
Zombies were a little stronger than before, but that didn't match our increase of violence. We went on the death pathway, right onto the hall of death, the Blood Room. Right when we open the room, inside was full of blood, but black. No enemies in sight, but a distance of fear beneath.
The Portal ignited there without even a second, and we got out to avoid trouble...
The First Floor will be the solution to our army's mission. We got there immediately, slaughtered the crypts like animals and headed to the Blood Room again - This time, it was the same, but when we went in, things changed quite differently.
"Welcome back, adventurers. I know that you want to slaughter me again, but I won't make this happen anymore..." Bonzo said. His sudden change of quotes shocked us with a flash of betrayal. The insane fight began. Bonzo seems different, he summoned balloons like usual, but they were a face of death, just black, and dynamites inside that killed us all...
"I won't tell you the pathway to our secrets..."
We were kicked out of the dungeon as a punishment for our loss. We knew that this was not right, and we headed back to the lab again. No Scientists can explain the myth behind those changes to the dungeons. Maybe there were in fact, changing? Is it because of the humans that used to torture the dungeons? If not, then why would still, this would be happening? This is the future.

The next day as we entered the Second Floor, it was a sudden change and silence. That eye was not seen in the Blood room. This time around when we entered the boss room, we were in a spiral of moves. 
The room was tainted with spider webs. There was a bed, and the blanket there had some stains. That student was still vomiting blood, that was black in colour. We were not mercy and immediately attacked him. However, that barely did any damage to him. It is just wasting our mana and giving him a chance to strike.
Same again, that boy rose into the air, but this time he was higher. Dozens of dark spells overwhelmed us with fear. Lasers... we were wiped out in less than a second.

"Wait, this isn't Wither Skulls..." Scarf said with a creepy voice. A smile appeared on his face. 

Something must be wrong...

title: [MUST READ for newer forumers] What is necroposting?
body:
Sb related because there are many necros on the Sb forums. 

Necroposting. Maybe you’re new to the forums and wonder what it is? Well, I can tell you.

Necroing
Necroing is the short version of necroposting. Necroing basically is, you reply to a thread that already is 14 or more days old. But that’s not everything. A post is only a necropost if the thread it was posted in is irrelevant. If the information is still relevant, it is not a necro. But if the thread was maybe a question and already answered, and it also was like 2 months old, it’s a necro post too.

Why you shouldn’t necropost
Everyone on the forums will be angry. There even is a group of people on the forums who call themselves the Necro Police. Everyone will be annoyed if they see a 12 months old thread that’s called „How to get an AOTE“.

Someone necroed my thread! What do I do? (By @Lightnin00)
Yes, this sounds pretty weird, but all you have to do is to report your own thread and put „Please lock thread“ or „necroed“ in the report reason. 

TLDR
Don’t reply on old threads everyone will hate you kthxbai

title: [0.9.9] The Cooking Update *Suggestion*
body:
New Skill: Cooking
Cooking is a new skill that can be viewed from your skills menu. Cooking is increased
by cooking with various ingredients with the gain will be dependent on the ingredients used
in the cooking process.





Foods are a secondary temporary buffed that can be applied to the player. The player
can only have one food buff at a time and the buffs vary depending on ingredient. Some
ingredients can give temporary stat increases, while other ingredients can give special
abilities and effects.






When starting out on cooking, you are only limited to FOUR cooking slots. Players gain access
to a new cooking slot every 10 levels, with level 50 unlocking the final slot.






There is also a new house in the hub with a brand new NPC called "Chef"
(I used a skin of myself as I couldn't find any players who had a chef skin). This NPC will
introduce you into the ways of cooking and offer you the crafting table.





(Ignore barrier block)

New Item Type: Ingredient
Ingredients are a new type of item that can be obtained in several ways. Some ingredients
are craftable, some ingredients are rare drops from mobs, some can be from special events, and much more. Each ingredient
holds special properties that range from stat boosts to unique abilities. Each ingredient
also adds/reduces the duration of a food and players can only put three of the same ingredient in a meal.

Here are some examples:




(Dropped from mining Shiny blocks in the End)





(Dropped from squids)





(Extremely rare drop from Hydra)





(Carrot Collection)

Obviously there are going to be a lot more ingredients, but these were just a few examples
of ingredients that could be added to the game.

Food buffs will stay even inside of dungeons and upon death. However, if you want to consume new food or
get rid of your current buffs, there is the Digestion Pill. (Purchase for 100k in the alchemist npc)





To differentiate it from another minecraft server with a similar cooking system,
there are recipes that you can collect throughout Skyblock. Most of these recipes
are able to be purchased from the Chef himself, while other recipes are hidden in collections,
other NPC's, quests, and more!






These recipes will allow you to create food that you desire in a shorter period of time. However, 
if you try creating something that you don't have the recipe for or the recipe doesn't exist entirely,
you are forced to go through longer periods of time to cook your meal.


When cooking, you're tasked upon doing random minigames, getting good
minigame scores will result in increased stats for your food, while failing
these minigames (or "cooking process") will result in a deduction in stats.

Some examples are:




Click a furnace that constantly teleports from one location to another,
the furnace disappears quickly and not clicking it will result in a lower food score.





This is more of a timing minigame. The more closely you click the glass pane
when your food is done cooking, the more additional stat bonuses your meal gives.

That's about it for now, if there's anything you want to add please comment below,
Thank you for reading​Change Log:
(27/10/2020) Fixed an error where it would display as level 16 instead of level 26 in the image where I hover over the cooking skills (Credit: @Caving_Lantern)

(27/10/2020) Added Chef NPC

(27/10/2020) Added something unique about cooking compared to a certain server. (Credit: You know who you guys are)

title: My Take on Scams
body:
Counterpiece to @AwesomeJDrock
His Piece Here :


AwesomeJDrock said:



Everyone is always complaining about being scammed, scammers say it’s allowed. There isn’t really a straight answer to what scamming is in the skyblock community. Here is my opinion on what is scamming and what is not.

SCAMS ARE YOUR OWN FAULT

On ah if someone puts a lvl 4 book instead of 6 for a high price it’s not a scam just look at what he is “actually” selling.
if someone is starring your dungeon item that is trust to get someone to upgrade it, then be given a free item in return Coins).
all trade ”scams” are not scams whatever someone puts in the trade menu is what you get what you put is is what you give, use of backpacks mean you get a backpack, assume Nothing is in it. Trades are not scams as You get what you see and give what you see, the only way to get scammed is giving free items (for nothing in a trade) then asking for a third party request such as starring a dungeon item or crafting a pet etc. if You do third party trading aside from the trade menu then that isn’t hypixels fault. And 100% of the time you just need to ask for a coallateral item or coins. I’m not saying it is ok to “scam” or that “scammers“ are doing nothing wrong I’m just saying if you trade how your meant to trade there would be no issues with “scams”.

this is just my opinion, I’m not saying I’m a ”scammer” Just tired of hear “I gOt ScAmMeD pLeAsE hElP”

please tell me your opinions and let me know if you agree with me

Click to expand...

I agree with somewhat, but not all. I'll explain.

To start off, I'll bring up an example. Let's say you are approaching a red light. Your friend is right next to you. You don't want to run the red light, but your friend keeps telling you that it's fine. "You'll make it! It's fine." You run the red light and crash into a limousine. Whose fault is it?

This is my general sentiment. Both you and your friend are at fault, now, AwesomeJDRock did not explicitly say that the scammer is not at fault, but the tone here was very much that most of the blame was on the victim, which I do not agree with.
For his first example, he says, "On ah if someone puts a lvl 4 book instead of 6 for a high price it’s not a scam just look at what he is “actually” selling." The thing is, most of these times, he is telling you he is selling a lvl 6 book. This fits perfectly into my above example. You did it, but he was influencing you.

For his second example he says, "if someone is starring your dungeon item that is trust to get someone to upgrade it, then be given a free item in return Coins)." The scammer is most of these times saying he will give it back, or says he will give like a livid dagger, but gives instead a iron sword. Again, you did it, but he influenced you.

For his third example(which confused me a bit?), he says, "all trade ”scams” are not scams whatever someone puts in the trade menu is what you get what you put is is what you give, use of backpacks mean you get a backpack, assume Nothing is in it. Trades are not scams as You get what you see and give what you see, the only way to get scammed is giving free items (for nothing in a trade) then asking for a third party request such as starring a dungeon item or crafting a pet etc. if You do third party trading aside from the trade menu then that isn’t hypixels fault. And 100% of the time you just need to ask for a coallateral item or coins. I’m not saying it is ok to “scam” or that “scammers“ are doing nothing wrong I’m just saying if you trade how your meant to trade there would be no issues with “scams”. if someone is starring your dungeon item that is trust to get someone to upgrade it, then be given a free item in return Coins)." So first, he says that trade "scams" are not scams. This is true only if the scammer says nothing false or misleading. If he says he will give it back and doesn't, that's a scam. If he says he will give enchanted porkchops but gives rev viscera, that is false and a scam. Other than that, I generally agree for this point.

Side Note : Hypixel Skyblock's playerbase is on the younger side, so their brains are more susceptible to manipulation, which is another reason they shouldn't be bashed on too much.

title: Ideas for Skyblock
body:
Greetings all,
Here are some ideas I propose:

Ideas:

New Ultimate Enchantment: Superior Force
Increases your stats by .2% per level (stacks, so if you had Superior Force V, you would get 1% stat buff, and 4% if all 4 armor pieces have it. Also, this enchant works with Renowned)
Superior Force I books have a 1% chance to drop from Superior Dragons and Pray RNGesus odds for all the other dragons

New Weapon Enchant: Might
Grants 5 additional Strength to the weapon per level
Obtainable from killing Minotaurs, and level 6 can be obtained from DA

New Accessory: Wealth Shrine (Legendary Accessory)
Upgrade of Seal of the Family, costs 50 million coins and 20 items from DA, but reduces prices of most NPC stores, including DA, by 20% percent. (So if you bought a Midas Staff for 100 mil, you would only pay 80 mil, while getting the 100 mil bonus). 

New Accessory: Skills Artifact (Epic Accessory)
This accessory increases Skill XP you get by 30% (Catacombs included), but the buff only applies to the Skill which you have the most XP in. For example, if you had the most Mining XP, you would get 30% more Mining XP. Automatically awarded when you get a level 30 Skill. (Excluding Carpentry)

Tell me what you think of these ideas!

title: Theory of damage progression.
body:
The Problem:
A non wants to progress in the game. They have a budget of 2 Million coins. Their current weapon is a Raider Axe, and they have Unstable Dragon Armor. How do we spend the 2mil?

The Solution:

First, we take the budget and see what we can improve.
Then, take the standard damage output of the non.

Lets say DMG=7000
Budget=2 Million.

Our goal for damage is 20k+

So we can either do
Budget-Armor
Budget-Weapon
Budget-Talismans.

but we can also do
Budget-(Armor+Talismans).

Let’s say Strong Dragon Armor costs 1.1Mil.
The cheapest set of talismans cost 780k
The best weapon costs 1.5 mil.

What is the best solution, you may ask?

The anwser is a better weapon.

”But Weapons are just the best!”-You may say.

Here are the reasons why a Weapon fits us better.

1.Lets say that reforging those new talismans takes 300k from the bank (due to being unlucky).

That is 1.08Million coins.

Lets say that after reforging them to Hurtful you gain 55% CD (This is unlikely, but this is a theory, not a concrete status)

The Sword costed 50k to reforge (unlucky) and 600k to enchant.

Lets compare our final scores.
Weapon:2150000 coins (OVER BUDGET)
Talismans:1080000 coins (LOTS OF SPARE MONEY)
Armor:1100000 coins (SPARE MONEY)

As you can see, the weapons does go out of budget, while the Talismans don’t.

”What about armor, huh, smartass?”

Well, armor is way to easily outclassed.

Lets compare old Strong Dragon prices to new ones.

Old prices:5Million
New prices:1.1Million.

1.1<5

Why did this happen? 
Armor gets outclassed easily. Easier than weapons.

Lets compare that to 3/4 SA and strong chestplate.

Strong:1.1 (Million)
SA+Strong Chestplate 6.6 (Million)

1.1<6.6

Now as you can see, a set with simmilar, hell, even better stats exists. Now I am not saying Strong isn’t necesarry, it absolutely is, but for people that need damage, talismans should be a priority.

So, for damage progression

Weapons<Armor<Talismans<FAIRY SOULS

Now, many people do know this, but many people don’t. Also, this was made to waste my and your time.

WARNING:THIS IS JUST A THEORY, AND IS MOST LIKELY INCORRECT.

title: [FIXED] Internal Exception Java io.IOException forcibly closed by remote host problem
body:
for those who have Internal Exception Java io.IOException forcibly closed by remote host problem, i have found 9 ways to fix it.
Ways to Fix IT
1. Turn Off Your Windows Firewall



Spoiler



Go to setting > Update and Security > Windows Security > Firewall and Network > Your Active Network > Turn Off Microsoft Defender Firewall



















2. Update Your Java


3. Reinstall Your Minecraft


4. Restart Your Computer


5. Restart Your Router


6. Flush Your DNS



Spoiler: Tutorial



To open this, press Windows Logo Key + R on your keyboard








then press enter and it should look like this








7. Enable Your Native Sandbox in Java



Spoiler: Tutorial







Click Java and then go to Advanced.
Scroll down then check the the native sandbox









8. Change Your Allow An App Through Windows Firewall Setting



Spoiler: Tutorial



Open Control Panel and go to System and Security




then click Allow an App Through Windows Firewall




Click change setting and do like this










9. Turn Off Your Windows Security



Spoiler: Tutorial



Click the "^" icon and click the Shield Icon




click virus and threat protection




click virus and threat protection setting (manage setting)




then disable all
(i disable Real Time Protection Permanently)











​That's it. Hope this methods work for you

title: Hey Skyblock Texture Pack Makers, let's revive FurfSky+
body:
Remember furfsky+? It's my favourite skyblock texture pack because the textures just look so clean and accurate to what I would imagine swords would look like, and some of the textures have really nice animations. However, the pack hasn't been updated since February, and the creator hasn't been posted anything since June which pains me because I know the pack probably will never be updated and at some point I will probably have to stop using it.

However, I know there's some really talented people out there, and I don't really want to stop using this pack, so I propose a solution; an unofficial extension of FurfSky+ made by fans of the pack. I tried to reach out to Furf a month ago to get permission to do something like this, but I didn't get a reply so I'm going to proceed with caution and do it anyway, and @FurfNSFW if you see this and don't want people to extend your work, then let me know and I'll stop it.

So the plan is, anyone who is interested please let me know in forum messages. Furf is the only skyblock pack I truly like, and with a collaborative effort of a lot of artists, between you, you can make an unofficial extension of the pack. I unfortunately have the artisitic talent of a doorknob so I won't be able to help a lot here, but if you feel you have what it takes to make a super clean. super vibrant 16x skyblock texture pack then please get in touch with me, and let's extend the best skyblock texture pack the world has ever seen.

EDIT: Start a forums convo with me if you're interested

(P.S. 32x packs all look awful)

title: The Cookie Problem
body:
As everyone know, booster cookie is one of the most useful item, and most of the mid late game can afford it every 4 days.
It give you the ability to not losing money and coin when die and open ah whereever u want , which is convienience.
But one of the op item exist in this game, it will causes some problem....

The only way to obtain booster cookie is from bazaar and the gem store. Meanwhile, if supply < demand is going on the price of it will increase, but the only sources to legit produce booster cookie is to buy it gem store which cost u irl money. And the price of a cookie is so damn high with about ~2.99 USD just for 1mil coin. Therefore no one is buying cookie and the supply of cookie become less.

The demand of cookie is insanely high and only a few (not many) peoples is paying gem for cookie and sell to bazaar. So then, the price of it will keep rising until a stable supply of cookie appeared.


Idea:
1. Add a recipe of booster cookie
2. increase booster cookie duration

title: FRIENDLY WARNING: ITEM WIPE GLITCH! (160M coins lost to this alone)
body:
Short intro:
I'm making this thread to spread awareness and gather support, since it's the only thing I'm able to do anymore. I'm unsure if staff will assist me. I'm not a YouTuber or close friend, so I certainly don't matter to them as much. 

Storytime: I don't know what sort of luck this is but a friend of mine has officially and suspiciously lost two expensive swords due to this same glitch. First time was a 80 mil Midas, this time was a 60 mil Shadow Fury, plus a couple 20 mil worth of other junk like frags. Total of 160 mil coins lost. Gross.

Details (how to avoid the glitch):
Whenever you drag an item (manual move) through an inventory menu instead of shift-click (quick move) it, the item has a chance of disappearing or dropping when you put it down (despite you setting it so that the item cannot be dropped). Happens regardless of whether you're using backpacks, ender chests, chests, or your own player inventory.
As a general rule of thumb, try not to ever pick up and drag an item while in inventories that don't require it, especially if your ping is unstable. Skyblock servers are very iffy as they already are. If you end up losing an item, drag another item to the spot where the missing item should be, and hopefully the server corrects itself. What you shouldn't do is move lobbies while the item is missing, since it risks losing the item for good.

TL;DR - always shift-click items instead of dragging them.

Possible explanation is that you lag out and the item does too, since it doesn't even go to your island's Jerry. Other explanation is the item accidentally dupes, and the server's counter-measures against duping decide "yeah this innocent player deserves his hard work to be deleted."

To conclude:
This obviously isn't the only item wipe glitch we know about, but it's the most memorable that we've experienced. This also isn't even the most BS thing that's happened to my friend, so just imagine what's going through their mind every time they log back on Hypixel and remember they bought a rank and paid an investment into this dirty treatment.
He's a noble, loyal player, and it sucks to see this happen. Now whether or not Hypixel does anything at all to help or even fix this glitch is beyond me. I'm not even sure if they can fix it, so for now everyone just stay careful, and rip your F's or similar stories in the replies.

title: [GUIDE] New Year Cake Market

​


By Cillian96470
New Year Cake Market Analyst
June 9th, 2020

Skyblock New Year Cakes have been given out every skyblock year to reward players for being online every five days. These cake rewards have helped create a new emerging market focused on selling and buying cakes. This article will explain seven critical factors to the New Year Cake Market that explains cake prices and rarity of cakes.

Average Prices on Cake Auction (Shown in Table)
Average Prices from a Cake Collector (Shown in Table)
Rarity of every New Years Cake (Shown in Table)
Graphs of the New Years Cakes
Debate on whether to buy from auction or cake collector
Main competitors
The Present New Year Cake Market
Questions


Below are the definitions for each factor shown in the Table


Average Prices on Cake Auction:
This means how much on average it would cost to buy certain New Year Cake on auction

Average Prices from a Cake Collector:
A cake collector is someone that collects cakes every day in order to resell them either on auction or to individual players. These would be the prices that a cake collector would sell to an individual or on auction.

Rarity of every New Years Cake:
I have categorized every cake into 4 different sections shown below.


Legendary
Epic
Rare
Common

Legendary:
This is the hardest cake to find on auction, which would be between 2-4 weeks to find. These cakes include 2, 15, 19, 22, 45, 46. The reason they are hard to find is because they were 1. released at midnight in the US (15, 19), 2. the server was down for maintenance (22, 45, 46) 3. Players without ranks could not join, 4. They are popular because they are the most difficult cake to get (2). These are the four reasons why they are hard to get. The prices ranges from 1.4 million-4.2 million

Epic:
These cakes are the second hardest to find on auction, which would be 1-2 weeks to find. These cakes include 9, 16, 33, 34. The reason they are hard to get is because 1. they were released at midnight, 2. Not having enough players online to grab the cakes 3. Hard to find on auction and on average more expensive. These are the three reasons why they are hard to get. The prices range from 750k-2.2 million.

Rare:
These cakes are easier to find on auction with medium difficulty, which would only take 1-2 days. These cakes are normally below New Year Cake 30 and making it rare increases their price. The price ranges from 250k-3.6 million.

Common:
These cakes are normally above New Year cake 30 and in less than an hour looking through the auction house. The average cost of these cakes range from 50k-250k and many people have these cakes.

Debate on whether to buy from auction or cake collector:


This will give a comprehensive report on whether to buy from the auction or cake collector

Pros for buying from cake collector

Gets specific cakes faster
Saves you time instead of auction

Find hard cakes that are very rarely on the market
Saves you time for other important areas.

Cons for buying from cake collector

Expensive cakes
Full collection is 61 Million
Different prices from every collector

Pros for buying from Auction

Cheaper cakes
Full collection is 29 Million
Get better deals on certain cakes for low prices
Meet an entire community of people

Cons from buying from Auction

Time consuming
Estimated time for each cake for be 3-5 weeks of searching on auction
A lot of fluctuation in prices on the market

Summary:

The overall best way to get the cakes you need and get cheaper prices is by using both strategies. For example, people can buy the cheap cakes from auction and go to cake collectors for certain cakes. This would save money and time by going through both options

Below is a comprehensive list of the most competitive competitors in the Market from my own experience and from statistics from different websites. There are a total of 6 main competitors in the market including myself.

Market Analysis in June of 2020:


New Year Cakes have created a new and growing market since their release. This emerging market has attracted many players to buy and sell different New Year Cakes. Interestingly, there has been a trend in increasing prices since the first ten cakes were released. For example, the beginning prices were around 10k and then increased from 10k to 50k due to the new cake bag release. These cakes at 50k created a stable market with little fluctuation unless it was below New Year 20. Furthermore, this trend has increased dramatically starting from years 68-70 with the cakes going to 550k or with cake 70 at 200k. If this trend continues, the producers in the market will benefit tremendously as their cakes increase, but consumers will lose out because they will have to pay more. In other words, hypixel players will have to buy more expensive cakes and the people that sell them earn a lot more money. I estimate that New Year Cake 71 will be worth 150k-300k and the New Year Cake Market will increase in price for the next 10 skyblock years to year 80.



Questions:

Why do Cake Collectors charge so much?

Cake collectors charge a lot because we normally wait 1-2 weeks just to find specific cakes. However, people do have a valid point that we charge more than normal. There are only around 6 main competitors in the cake market, which allows cake collectors to charge more compared to the lower amount. For example, the average cake on auction can go for a minimum of 250k in bin auction. This means that cake collectors should not sell under 250k to an individual as that is how much you can get on auction.

Should I get into the New Year Cake Market?

The New Year Cake Market is very profitable by buying and reselling cakes. However, there is a large time commitment to the auction every day, the cake average can jump from 50k to 90k at any time, and as they always say “You have to have money to make money.” Many cake collectors spend an average of around 15 million every skyblock year on cakes and resell them later on for triple or quadruple the price. If you have the passion and the time, it is the right decision. If you don't like waiting at auction all the time and would rather be doing other money methods, than it is not the right decision





“Pass on what you have learned.” - Yoda

title: [Shop] New Year Cake Shop Closing Soon
body:
My name is Cillian96470 and I have been collecting New Year Cakes since year 60. I am one of the last major collectors with over 9,000 cakes collected. I have worked hard every new year to get New Year Cakes in order to help players like yourself to gain cakes either on auction or bins. I am leaving the market soon and will not be selling any more cakes. This would be your last chance to buy cakes for your cake bag or just for your collection. As time goes on in hypixel, the New Year Cakes become more expensive and this would be your last chance to get them for the current price in Hypixel Skyblock.

The reason why this is important is because I am offering discounts of around 20k and give discounts on large quantities of cakes. For example, in my shop you can get around a 1 million discount if you buy many cakes at one time. This shop that I offer will help you gain exactly what you need for cake years at a lower price compared to on the bins of auction.

History of New Year Cakes:

I remember a long time ago, when the legendary Cake collector himself “Slada” with over 24,100 cakes collected left the market forever and would not be selling anymore cakes. But before Slada left, he had a major sell of cakes that helped many players get full cake bags. Back then, the cake prices weren't as high as they are now. That is why I am doing this major sell before I leave the market.

There is now a large community of small, medium and major cake collectors that help each other determine prices and rarities of cakes. This community has been involved in every year since year 70 and have worked together to provide ideas and suggestions to improve cake collecting. This community has now developed overtime strategies, alliances, competitors, trading cakes, articles and more.


Credibility:

Administrator of the Cake discord

Facilitated events for the cake discord on buying certain cakes from the auction
Encouraged community involvement in strategies, articles, and ideas
Managing interviews with new players joining the cake community
Plan and executed cake strategies with the cake community
Manager of Cake Shop

Sold 800 New Year Cakes on auction or bins
Provided Cake Customers with the lowest prices on Bins
Organized New Year Cakes in a professional manner on my island
I have had around 250-300 customers visit my island to buy cakes

Important Points on Prices:

I sell below the bin price on any year cake, but higher than auction price
Generally rule among cake collectors, any cake below year 55 is 550k or higher
The bin price is typically 2 times as much as the auction price. For example, if a cake goes on auction for 100k, on bin it's 200k
Rarity cakes such as Rares, Epics, and Legendaries will be a lot more money than normal prices

October 10th, 2020 prices

My prices are normally the Bin prices. I generally do a 20k discount depending on the year that you want. For example, if the cake year 60 is 530k on bin, I will charge 510k.

title: The Highest Possible SCC currently (if you want to waste time and money)
body:
I decided I wanted to calculate the highest possible scc you can get right now (with and without Marina). TL;DR: 140.4% outside of dungeons, and 239.4% inside dungeons. Please, let me know if I made any mistakes here, I'm trying to prefect it and there's a lot of nitty gritty things.

Outside of Dungeons:
Gear Needed:
-Lvl 100 Epic/ Legendary Dolphin Pet w/ Washed Up Souvenir
-Recombed Rod of the Sea w/ Treacherous / Salty reforge, Angler 6, Expertise 10
-Recombed Shark Armor w/ Submerged Reforge and Ultimate Legion 5 on all pieces
-Sea Emperor Century Cake Boost
-Spiked Bait (Opt., doesn't add to multiplicative boosts)

Factors that affect SCC:
20 - Base SCC
29 - Shredder or Phantom Rod:
7 - Treacherous or Salty (Recomb)
6 - Angler 6
6 - Expertise 10
10 - Chimera 5 (Doesn't copy Dolphin's ability so only 10)
Other Factors:
15 - Lvl 100 Dolphin Pet (Epic or Legendary)
5 - Washed Up Souvenir
10 - Full Shark Armor
4 - Submerged reforge on all Shark Armor Pieces
15 - Marina's Luck of the Sea 2.0
1 - Sea Emperor Century Cake
6 - Spiked Bait
1.28x - Legion 5 on all armor and 20 players within 30 blocks. Yeah, I know, but it works.

When you calculate these up you get:
90 - Base: w/o LOTS2.0 (Marina) or Legion
105 - w/ LOTS2.0 (Marina), w/o Legion
115.2 - w/o LOTS2.0 (Marina), w/ legion (and 20 players)
And Finally:
134.4 SCC w/ LOTS2.0 (Marina) AND legion (and 20 players).
If you add spiked bait (assuming Legion doesn't affect it which I doubt it does), that's 140.4% SCC.

Seriously though, Legion just isn't worth it unless you really hate money bc there's never going to be 20 players around you. I dare somebody absolutely nothing to go for it though, if somebody hasn't already. I'm also not even bothered to calculate the cost of this.

In case you were wondering, Renowned only overtakes Submerged for armor reforge once you get 98.51 SCC without legion or armor reforges.

Inside of Dungeons:
I didn't original calculate this but it was mentioned so I'll try my best even though I never play dungeons. (If I get something wrong, please correct me).
Gear needed:
-Lvl 100 Epic/ Legendary Dolphin Pet w/ Washed Up Souvenir
-5 Star Recombed Phantom Rod w/ Chimera 5, Treacherous / Salty Reforge, Angler 6, Expertise 10
-5 Star Recombed Superior Dragon Armor w/ Submerged Reforge and Ultimate Legion 5 on all 4 pieces
-Sea Emperor Century Cake Boost
-Spiked bait (Opt., doesn't add to multiplicative boosts)

Factors that affect SCC:
20 - Base SCC
Phantom Rod - 26 (not in dungeon):
10 - Chimera 5 (Doesn't copy Dolphin's ability so only 10)
7 - Treacherous or Salty (Recomb)
6 - Angler 6
6 - Expertise 10
Other Factors:
15 - Lvl 100 Dolphin Pet (Epic or Legendary)
5 - Washed Up Souvenir
1 - Sea Emperor Century Cake
4 - Superior Dragon Armor w/ Submerged Reforge (not in dungeon)
1.05x - Superior Dragon Boost
1.056x - Legion 5 on all armor pieces (Assuming you can only have 5 people in a dungeon)

Now, calculations.
If you have Catacombs level 50 (look this is a hypothetical), your dungeon items gain +465% stats. Combine this with 5 stars on the Superior Dragon Armor and Phatom Rod, you get a 5.15x stat multiplier on them. Stats unaffected by Dungeons are as follows: Base Chance (+20), Dolphin Pet w/ Souvenir (+20), Sea Emperor Century Cake (+1), so 41%.
56% with Marina added,
189.9% with Phantom Rod added,
210.5% with Superior's Submerged Boost of 20.6 added,
~221.02% with Superior's 5% stat boost added,
and finally with Legion's boost (w/ 4 players) is a final SCC total of ~233.4%, which, when you add spiked bait, goes to...
239.4% SCC!
I am in pain.

title: Bug Involving the Silence Block
body: I've already made a bug report about this, but I figured I'll also make a public post about it to let people know. If you place a Silence Block (Endstone Collection Tier V) on your island, the sounds of the Warp Pads will be muted. Also, although I haven't tried this with other hostile mobs, the attack sounds of Ghasts are not muted. Personally, I think a menu should be added to the Silence Block, like in the Day Saver, to alter settings such as which mobs can make sounds, and what kinds of sounds they can make. I'll put a poll below to see what other people think.

title: farming update shouldn't have extra levels (just my opinion) [A lot of controversy so far]
body:
Hi. I know everyone's hyped about the new farming update, but I, as someone who doesn't have a farm, am not really interested in it.

Until I saw the farming level cap increase.

Now this will probably get me flamed, but personally, I think this is somewhat unconventional. My friends and I have been discussing this, and obviously a LVL 50 skill would be more easy on the eyes rather than a LVL 55 skill. The level cap would probably be higher with some coming updates, but this is guesswork.

Also, they're going to have to increase other skills by 5 otherwise people's ASL would be so messed up. I personally don't want to grind to foraging or fishing 55. I don't think anyone else does either.

TL;DR: basically this update is targeted at endgame players. I don't really know about the above, this is just a prediction, but I for one will not participate in the event because I'm not bothered to build a farm.

title: Should Skyblock switch to 1.16+ or Hytale?
body:
This post is not biased and is made from a completely neutral standpoint.

First of all, yes it is possible to make skyblock for 1.16.
How? Because this server runs on 1.7, while simulating items, behaviour and etc from 1.8.
So yes, it IS possible to keep the server at this version while SB would require 1.16.

However, this would take a lot of time to make it work. So this transition should NOT happen any time soon, at least not until Skyblock gets a full release. 

Now let's talk about the pros and cons:

Pros: More items, crops, blocks, mobs, more Collections, more items that can use stuff like netherite tools to have a different texture from now used ones (useless if using texture pack).

Cons: 1.16 is very buggy for servers, Shields (though they can just be blacklisted and unable to be crafted), having to constantly switch versions so play other games, difficultly to make this change.

Though there is another way of getting more content for Skyblock. That's right, Hytale.

Although Hytale is a long way from us, I believe moving Skyblock to Hytale would be the best option for content and game mechanics, since devs will be able to model mobs like they want, model items the way they want, they can code behaviour for specific mobs however they want.

This option has a lot of benefits: Reduces Server load for other games, easier to add content, freedom for the devs, better online experience.

IN CONCLUSION (TL;DR)
Should SB switch to 1.16 or to Hytale?
Hytale 100%. They shouldn't waste resources on trying to switch to 1.16 because of the limitations of Minecraft, Hytale will have a lot of freedom for the devs.

title: New blessed reforge is a SCAM, Don't bother with it, its useless.
body:
So I go buy this blessed reforge stone, this is what is said on the patch notes




Blessed, 1m hoe reforge, req Mining lvl 25, grants up to 20 speed, 6% farming exp & +20% chance for double crops


Click to expand...

So I go and apply it to my rookie hoe, which is currently the best hoe in the game bc it gives a 50% bonus to get more seeds, but also has a common rarity. Because of this I only get 1% more farming xp and 5% more chance for 2x drops. I did some investigation, and the highest rarity hoe you can get it a recombed diamond hoe, which is only gonna be rare, unless you count reaper scythe recombed, but you can't use that as a farming hoe. This means that legit the reforge stats the admins talked about in the patch notes you can't even obtain in the game due to hoes only being rare at best rarity.  I believe this also applies to the other reforges, but to a lesser degree cuz treecap and stonks are Epic already.

TL;DR Blessed reforge is a SCAM, Don't buy it, its a waste of 1m

title: [STORY] Diary of a Fisherman, Pt. 4
body:
Disclaimer: This is a fan story and is not an official part of any in game lore, not all things will make sense
Also Forum Mods, please don't move this to creative corner as barely anyone actually goes there.
Diary of a Fisherman
A 1,200 word story by SpyderMC


Spoiler: Day 30



Dear Diary,

I did some research, you can unlock Diver’s Armor by crafting it with Emperor Skulls which is a rare drop from Sea Emperors. I need fishing 20 to catch sea emperors though so I’m pretty far from getting it. I’m currently fishing level 18.

I decided to go to the hub and go fish at this big pool next to a village in a cave. Along the way, I met a peculiar looking fellow. He was covered in black rags and showed no sign of skin. He kind of scared me. In his hand was a sword that he clutched very tightly..

“What are you looking at?” he asked. His voice was almost inaudible and every word he said shook my ears.

“Uhhhh,” I blurted out scrambling to find words to say, “What’s that sword?”

“This is an Aspect of the End, it allows me to teleport.”

“Tele whaaaa?” I asked.

“Teleport, it means I can transport myself anywhere I would like to without having to manually walk or move there. Sadly, this Aspect of the End only allows me to teleport 8 blocks.”

“Wow,” I said, completely stunned. Teleporting. Huh, I mouthed it a few more times. It felt weird to say that.
“Anyway, what’s your name?” I asked him.

“They call me JC,” he said, careful not to show his mouth or any emotion.

“Cool, how do you-” I was midway through my sentence when he teleported away with his Aspect of the End.

That guy sure was full of secrets, I thought to myself. I wondered if I could get my hands on an Aspect of the End.





Spoiler: Day 31



Dear Diary,

My encounter with JC still felt like a minute ago. He was so, what was the word, mysterious and secretive. What was he hiding under his rags? Creepy.

I met up with JC again today. This time, instead of holding an Aspect of the End or as he called it, an AOTE, he was holding a fishing rod. It didn’t look like he was going fishing so I was confused.

“Why are you holding a fishing rod?” I asked.

“It’s not just any fishing rod, it’s a grappling hook,” he said, shaking his head.

“Oh, what does it do?”

Instead of talking to me, he flung the “Grappling Hook” out and when it went the max distance, he pulled it back and flung himself into the air flying away leaving me behind with my mouth hanging and eyes as big as plates.





Spoiler: Day 32



Dear Diary,

Today I hung out in the hub for a while when I encountered for the 5th time, someone wearing dragon armor. The player was wearing red and orange armor and was wearing a black leather helmet also.

“Hi there! Can I ask you a few questions?” I said.

“What do you want, I have other things to get to,” said the player impatiently.

I saw him grip his sword tighter. I shivered, nervous to not make a wrong move.

“What items should I get next, Diver’s Armor or a Rod of Champions?”

“Well from what I’ve heard, the Sea Emperor drops both enchanted lily pads and Emperor Skulls, which you need to craft both of them, I suggest you try to catch a Sea Emperor and see where it gets you,” responded the player.

“By the way, what’s your name? I might catch you some time later,”

“I’m Justalie12 but you can just call me Justalie,” he said, “Anyway, I gotta go follow, err, lead someone home.”

And with that, he was gone.





Spoiler: Day 33



Dear Diary,

I’m now fishing 19, only a few more days till I’m fishing 20!! I can’t wait to catch an Emperor. I might go fishing and see if there are any new creatures I can catch.

OMG GUESS WHAT! I caught this creature called a Water Hydra and it dropped it’s head! Isn’t that cool? The head gives 100 health and 100 defense. I’m so excited! Fishing makes so much money it’s insane. I’m not sure what to put today, nothing really exciting has happened…





Spoiler: Day 34



Dear Diary,

Today I got fishing 20! While I was fishing, some guy started slow clapping. I asked him what it was and he said this.

“Seriously man? You’re fishing but you're not using any bait at all. Here, take some of my spiked bait. You’ll catch a ton more creatures.”

He then reached into his inventory and handed me a purple looking spiked thing. I put the purple thing and put it in my inventory. I then flung out my fishing rod and saw the purple thing drop out of my inventory. I pulled back my fishing rod and went to go grab my “bait”. However when I dove out to it, I didn’t pick it up.

The player started to chuckle. I felt my cheeks glow bright red.

“What are you laughing at?” I demanded, my cheeks were burning now.

“You’re not supposed to pick them up, the bait disappears when you fish with it. The bait dropping is just cosmetic and it doesn't actually drop.”

Ok, now I wasn’t just embarrassed. I was mad, mad at myself. I felt the rest of my face glow red and I felt my head steaming.

“Whoa there man, you need to chill, I know how I can help, I know a yoga class that will help you,” said the player.





Spoiler: Day 35



Dear Diary,

Today I went fishing again. I caught up a few sea creatures and got a few rare drops. After a while, I finally caught an Emperor. When the emperor came up, I grabbed my blade and started stabbing the guardian.

The Emperor shot me with an arrow and it flung me backwards. As I staggered back to kill the Emperor, another player in Diver’s Armor sped over to the mob wielding an emerald. He jumped up and killed the Emperor in one hit. I hobbled over and yelled at the player.

“HEY! Gimme the drops, that was my Emperor!”

The player ignored me and picked up the drops. He then used his AOTE and teleported away into the hub. I tried to run after him but he was too fast.

I fell down onto my knees and started crying. Why did everything good that happened to me turn bad? That was my one chance at getting an Emperor.

Who was the person that stole my sea creature? I needed to find him.





Spoiler: Day 36



Dear Diary,

My life has so many mysteries. First there’s a bunch of random writing in my diary, then a mysterious being punches me in the face, then I meet JC, then Justalie12, then someone steals my Emperor. It’s like before I got my diary, everything was boring and then when I got my diary, everything started to get interesting.

I also got fishing 21 today. From my research, there aren't any new mobs that I can fish up. I’m gonna go fish some more and see what I can get. 

Well, I caught a Deep Sea Protector today. I was doing well in the first half. I circled around it hitting it up and down. Then, the golem swung it’s fists at me and knocked me off my feet. Then the player who stole my Emperor came back and killed the golem within a matter of seconds and ran off again with it’s drops.

Grrr, this was like the mysterious writing in my diary again! Somebody does something to me and it keeps on repeating.



To be continued...



tl;dr: no

Hi guys! Spyder here, really really really sorry for releasing part 4 so late. It was kind of hard coming up with ideas to put in part 4. If you couldn't tell, JC was @JavaChipYT and Justalie was @Juse73X . If you want to be in part 5, start a convo with me following the same format as last time.

Make sure to check out parts 1-3!​

title: Game Checklist for 1.0 release
body:
Here's a checklist with everything the admins need to do before 1.0 releases:

1. General balance changes for lots of the game.
2. Floors 7-10
3. All the coming soon items released.
4. All empty collection spots filled up.
5. Bugs ironed out.
6. No dupes.
7. Wizard Portal
8. Blacksmith Expansion
9. Slayers V2

I'll update this list if i missed anything/if the admins finish one of these items

Please vote on my poll btw (signature link). It's for a good cause and we already have 170 signatures and counting

title: Maddox Cell-Phone!!!
body:
I have never made an idea post before, but while I was thinking of the new slayer update I thought of a item.

Maddox Cell-Phone

Upgraded version of Maddox Batphone.
Instant response time from Maddox no more of that 3 line wait.
You can call back to back very quickly instead of having to wait.
Cost

You would need I was thinking 6-6-6 slayers or 7-7-7 slayers to upgrade at maddox.
The recourses would be maybe 20 Rev. Viscera, Tarantula Silk, 20 Golden Teeth.
Maybe a set amount of money added like 1m
Additional Optional Perks

Discount at Maddox
Idea from King_Lazarus: A setting in the Phone where you can select a specific slayer and every time you defeat its boss it starts that slayer again.
Idea from EelCiity: For a specific slayer you can choose a specific amount of times you would like to do it. Ex. you chose 5 t4 revs. when you kill a t4 rev, it will auto start a new one until you have completed your 5th one.
(Any thoughts please comment them)


Please Bump and Like (Price of item can fluctuate; If I can find more perks to add I will keep the price, If not I will decrease it.)

Any tips on what the pricing of item should be I was thinking a couple Million Coins. I was thinking of a 3m-5m price point which is reasonable if you have 7-7-7 slayers.

title: Idea: Very Perfect Hopper
body:
This hopper will have the minions sell the items, but it puts the money directly inside your bank/purse.
It could come in 2 tiers: t1 and t2. t1 will only put it in your purse and t2 will be configurable with bank or purse.
But this is kind of overpowered, so I think that it should take up the automated shipping slot and an upgrade slot.
You could also be able to configure it to have it start selling at a certain limit.
