title: [Idea] New event (Bird Festival) {Constant Updates}
body:
Ill share with yall a idea for a new event cuz we seem to lack more events.

So first this event will be in Spring days 1-6 (2 hours) Being the second longest event in skyblock.

The event will be accesible by the same way as Jerry Island and the size of the island will be slightly larger than Jerry Island.

The main part of the event is that there will be constant minigames every 10 minutes (12 minigames per event) These minigames last 5-8 minutes, Holding up to 30 players per minigame. 

In this event there will also be a reputation system earned by completing minigames. Minigames will be scored With a 300 point system. The scores are: C 110 points or less. B 140 points or less B+ 160 points or less A 200 points or less A+ 230 points or less S 260 points or less S+ 289 points or less S++ 290 points or above. Every minigame has its own scoring values. Reputation is awarded by scores. 

ScoreReputation RewardC15 (+1 Reputation for every C rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )B25 (+1 Reputation for every B rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )B+35 (+2 Reputation for every B+ rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )A60 (+3 Reputation for every A rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )A+90 (+5 Reputation for every A+ rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )S125 (+10 Reputation for every S rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )S+200 (+15 Reputation for every S+ rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )S++600 (+400 Reputation for every S++ rank you have gotten [Resets per event] )
There is also extra Reputation rewards for certain accomplishments: Playing 10 minigames grants 50 extra reputation. Getting S rank or higher in 5 minigames grants 200 extra reputation. Finishing in the top 5% players in 30 minigames grants permanent +5% reputation gain. Getting A+ rank or higher in 50 minigames grants 1000 extra reputation. Getting 2 S++ ranks in one event grants 2500 extra reputation. Getting S+ in 75 or more minigames grants 5000 reputation. And finally getting 10 S++ ranks grants permanent +15% reputation gain. (These are all one time rewards Not affected by extra reputation gain)

If You Somehow get 12 S++ Ranks in a event you gain a extra 15000 reputation (Repeatable per event Affected by extra reputation gain)

Additionally minigames can give loot!



Spoiler: Minigame Loot Drops

If youve been reading to this point you might be asking, What are the minigames? Here ill show the concept of all 8 minigames (Probably Going to be expanded till 12 minigames)

It is very important to know that minigames will not include anything that isnt provided in the minigame during the minigames (Everyone has the same things like in a bedwars game for example)

1. Egg Battle 

Your placed in a 5 layered platform with up to 29 other players. Your speed is set at regular speed and your goal is to use eggs to throw people to the void. The platforms first layer will be 16x16 the 2nd layer will be 18x18 the 3rd layer will be 20x20 the 4th layer 22x22 and the 5th layer 24x24 (All of these will be shaped circularly) These layers have a 4 block vertical distance between each other,Your given a infinite egg supply. The eggs will also have knockback I to help you melee nearby enemies. You cannot die other than by falling off the void. There will be powerups which spawn every 20s (One powerup per layer. The powerup spawns in a random place of the layer) There is 3 powerups which are: 

Powerup NamePowerup UsageDurationTriple EggsThe powerup as its name says makes you shoot 3 eggs at once in a 20 degree spread8 SecondsDiggerYou are given a anvil which when placed will fall destroying any block in its way making a hole for players to fallIf the anvil isnt placed within 15s it will despawnRabbit LeapsYou gain Jump boost VII Which can be usefull to get to a higher layer if you have fallen down4 Seconds

After the 2:00 mark TNT will start falling from the top destroying blocks where it falls (All of the platforms should be destroyed at around the 7:15-8:00 mark if no block had been destroyed other than by TNT) The tnt will also knockback any nearby player. Once the 3:00 time mark is reached All players take +25% knockback from ranged egg hits and the egg becomes enchanted with knockback II for melee. Once the 5:00 time mark is reached All players get Slowness I and eggs are thrown at +50% speed. Once the 6:30 time mark is reached All players take +175% Knockback from ranged egg hits and the egg becomes enechanted with knockback IV. If the 7:15 Time mark is reached Rabbit Leaps powerup is disabled and wont spawn. (Only Digger and Quintiple Eggs) Triple Eggs turn to quintiple eggs because Triple eggs will be shot by default now. [This game focuses on using knockback to defeat enemies]

Scoring Of the game: Every 10s Lasted Gain +1 Score. Every player who dies before you grants +6 Score. Winning Grants +30 Score, Winning before the 5th minute grants a extra +40 Score.

2. Builder Birds

You are placed in a series of small islands competing with 29 other players to build the shown structure as fast as possible. There is 40 rounds in total, And you have a 8:00 Time limit. You win by either completing all the rounds or being the one completed most buil when the time runs out. The first 5 rounds will be in a 8x8 building area and itll be around 20-35 blocks. Rounds 6-10 will be in a 10x10 building area and the build will be around 30-40 blocks Including trickier blocks like slabs/stairs. Rounds 11-20 will be in a 14x14 building area with a around 50-80 blocks count including very tricky objects as buttons tripwire hooks levers pressure plates cobwebs and even string. Rounds 21-30 will be in a 16x16 building area with a very high 75-100 block count and very complex builds including any item you can think of. Rounds 31-35 will be in a 18x18 building area at 95-115 blocks each featuring builds which require great skill to build fast. And the final rounds 36-40 will be in a 20x20 building area at 120-150 blocks possibly including a full inventory of blocks needed. Between Each island there will be a gap which you will have to bridge trough (Your given infinite redstone blocks to pass) The gap is adding 2 blocks per round starting at 10 at round 1. But you must be carefull when bridging Not to let your redstone bridge touch the TNT that will be spread around in the air (Around 20-200 TNT per gap) or else your bridge will be destroyed and youd have to start remaking it. In these gaps you may also see gold blocks in the air (1-5 per gap 10 at last round) These are gotten by the same was as youd blow up TNT, These gold blocks dont do anything normally but incase theres a tie in rounds by the amount of gold blocks gotten the winner will be decided. [This game focuses on rapid building/speedbridging]

Scoring Of the game: Every build completed grants +6 score. Winning grants +60 Score.

3. Pearl Race

Your placed in a massive map where you race 29 other players to get as far as you can in the pearl race. You Cant move at all other than by ender pearls Your supplied infinite pearls (4s Cooldown) You have 8 minutes for the race. The race begins with easy hits like 4x4 platforms with a 3 block wall to avoid dying. After that you might start mainly seeing 2x2 or 3x1 platforms. There may even be places where you have to go trough a hole in the wall to get to your location. Later on paintings and 1x1 platforms will be the main thing. Once your getting closer to the end of the race your gonna see lots of random walls of iron bars 1x1 from floor-roof that your gonna have to avoid and probably your gonna have to land on single fences/cobblestone walls at the very ending parts its gonna be a really tight place featuring extremely hard to get locations. The whole path is about 1000 Blocks Taking 4 turns to the right all 4 of em or to the left all 4 of em (You know where im going dont you) Once you pass the ending part youll find yourself back at the beginning in a "new lap". There will be Checkpoints every 80 blocks or so that will be marked by a particle wall, youll spawn in the checkpoints if you have failed a epearl jump. Theres no ender-pearl damage in the minigame. The Winner is decided by who got furthest into the race. By either the furthest checkpoint in the lap that they got to. (Tiebreaker would be at what time did they reach the checkpoint which they ended on) or by the exact furthest block counting laps that they ever got to. (Tiebreaker (Very rarely) would be what time did they reach that block peak). [This game focuses on precision epearl throws and its a fun og minigame from 2013 too!]

Scoring Of the game: For every player you beat get +8 Score. Winning grants +68 Score.

4. Battle Birds

Your placed in a map of nearly the same style as TNT Tag with 29 other players. The goal is to be the last one alive. Your set at 110 speed. The map will give you 3os to get as high as you can (About 40 blocks from ground level should be the highest possible) Before a border starts slowly rising (Lava or whatever u want as long as it kills u) Which will completely cover the map in around the time mark of 7:00. Your given a Knockback I stick but you have a 2s cooldown per hit, You get a punch I bow with 4 arrow shots, Use it wisely as you wont get more shots ever. After the 4:00 mark Stick cooldown is entirely taken off and it gets Knockback III instead. Player speed is naturally 125 now but if your hit by a stick its at 25 for 1s. After the 6:00 mark staying in the same spot for 3s starts damaging you. 1 Heart a second (Only way to take dmg other than falling down) But you will never regenerate hp, You will also be forced to hit a player every 10s at least to avoid taking 1 heart a second dmg Once your at the 6:45 mark you get knockback VII on your sticks (basically to kill everyone) And if you dont hit within 2s you take 6 Hearts a second. Incase 2 players die at the same time they will be tiebreaked by the amount of hp they had before dying. [This game focuses to be some pvp/parkour mix type of minigame]

Scoring Of the game: For every player that dies before you, Gain +8 Score. Winning grants +68 Score.

5. Bird Spleef

Your placed in a map of 3 layers with 29 other players. The goal is to be the last one alive. Your set at 165 speed but You can only Jump every 7 seconds. Everyone has the same setup which is the following one:

Item:Use of the ItemMini Pearl x1.Its a enderpearl, But can only be thrown at a 4 block range Attempting to throw it at a longer range will give the pearl back to you saying that the range is too long. This can help go trough a gap if you dont have a jump and need to get away fast.Iron ShovelYou probably guessed it. Its to break the snow blocks your standing on.Speed II Potion (7 seconds) x2A useful speed boost to chase someone or get away from someone, Be aware that your slower while drinking the potion.Splash Potion Of Mining Fatigue IV (13 seconds) x1Gives you a bit of time where the person who is chasing you cant break blocks allowing you to escape/go aggresive on them. Beware of splashing yourself though.Fishing Rod Knockback I (5s Cooldown)You can throw it on someone to hit them and pulling the rod back will drag them 1.25 blocks towards you potentially pushing them to a hole but you need to pull within 2s of hitting em or the hook despawns and you have to wait again. You could also use this as a melee hit with knockback I. Both of these need a 5s cooldown after each use.

The layers are each 32x32 size and a 11 block vertical gap between each other. In the middle of each layer theres a 6x6 Netherrack platform in the center. (You can break it but it takes a while since its not a shoveled thing) The point of the one in the middle is that its unreachable with a pearl since its a 5 block distance between each layer. The layers have a circled shape. After the 2:00 time mark Speed is set to 135 and all shovels gain efficiency V. After the 4:30 time mark fishing rod cooldown is deleted and you get 1 snowball every 3 seconds (up to 5) to shoot at enemies. After the 6:50 time mark the first layer vanishes entirely and Speed is reduced to 100 + Jumpings entirely disabled. After 7:15 time mark the second layer vanishes entirely and speed is reduced to 70. And the final layer will slowly degrade by the edges. At around 7:30 it should be at a 6x6 size the final layer. Here your fishing rod gets knockback V. and infinite snowballs which deal 1 block kb on hit are given. at 7:45 everyones given a diamond sword sharp X and pvp damage is enabled (basically a one hit kill). [This minigame focuses on spleef and to stay away from players using surroundings for your advantage]

Scoring Of the game: For every player that dies before you, Gain +8 Score. Winning Grants +68 Score.

6. Flying Snek

Your placed in a map of 64x64x64 Blocks with 29 other players. The goal is to be the last one alive. You are a snek (Snake) of 4 block size. Movement is pretty simple. -> to go right <- to go left ^ to go up v to go down. Your snek expands 1 block every 0.5 seconds. (There is no way to get rid of the blocks, Your snake moves at the same speed it expands) Additionally the ground is made of Beacons (4096 beacons in total because of the ground size) Every 25 seconds 512 beacons (1/8 of the beacons) get a White light that marks that the beacons light will become Red in 4 seconds. (Red beacon light lasts for 3 seconds) If your sneks head touches a Red beacon light. Your snek dies. Hitting another sneks body with your sneks head= your snek dies. If a head of a snek hits another head of a snek If only the snek that hit was pointing at the other sneks head. Then the one that hit dies. If both sneks were pointing at each others head. Both sneks die. If your snek hits a map edge (They are marked by Solid blocks) The snek dies. After the time mark of 1:30 Snek expansion becomes 1 block every 0.35 seconds. After the time mark of 2:30 Snek expansion becomes 1 block every 0.25 seconds. After the time mark of 4:00 The Map begins to shrink from the top and the bottom each of them shrinking 16 blocks (At 4:30 the 16 blocks should be shrinked on each side turning the map 64x64x32) After the time mark of 5:30 The map will shrink again from the top and bottom each of them shrinking 15 blocks (At 6:00 the 15 blocks should be shrinked on each side making the map 64x64x2) At 7:00 The map will shrink from all sides (North South East West) 32 Blocks. (At 8:00 the map should be 0x0x2 basically = game end) [This minigame focuses on planning ahead how are you going to manage your sneks posicion and being careful of the beacons that might ruin your perfect spiral plan]

Scoring Of the game: For every player that dies before you, Gain +8 Score. Winning Grants +60 Score.

7. Egg Shooter

Your placed in a map of 50x50 Blocks with 29 other players. The goal is to get as many kills as possible, Your speed is set to normal (100). You have the following items 

ItemUseWood SwordKill enemies with it. works like a regular wooden swordEggKills on hit you only get one of these. (Kills grant +1 Egg) If you miss you have to use the sword to get a kill or die to get another egg.
Pregame you get 15 seconds to select a Perk. The list of Perks is the following

Perk NameWhat Does it doSwift SwordsGain Speed II (3s) On sword kill. This cannot be applied if you already have the effect.Restoring KillsGain Regeneration V (5s) On kill.Enchanted EggsYour Eggs will bounce to nearby targets on hit (3 block range) It can bounce twice.Magic EggsOn getting a kill with a egg gain +2 Levels of Sharpness on your sword for 3s.
The map will contain some mountains/houses without doors that could serve as protection from eggs, Also there would be some parkour spots with maybe 2-3 paths leading to the same spot where at the top you have around 2.4 walls
You have a 6:00 Timer to get as many kills as possible. If the top player has 3x more kills than you or more., Any kill you get counts as 2 This lasts until the top player no longer has 3x more kills than you or more. After the 4:00 time mark eggs gain +50% Range/Speed. If 2 people have the same score at the end of the game its decided by amount of deaths they had. If they have the same score and deaths there will be a 30 second period that will decide the winner by the first of the 2 To get a kill will win. Or the first which dies of the 2 will not win. [This minigame focuses on good aim and to be carefull not to get shot by enemies]

Scoring Of the game: For every player that you beat get +8 Score. Winning grants +68 Score.

8. Hoarding Birds

Your placed in a map of 100x100 Blocks with 29 other players. The goal is to get as many points as possible when the time ends, Your speed is set to 130. Points are determined by how many valuable blocks you have in your inventory, which are the following ones. [You have a Efficiency V Diamond Pickaxe to mine the blocks]

Valuable Block PointsSpawn Chance In a Valuable Block LocationCoal Block135%Iron Block230%Emerald Block420%Diamond Block510%Gold Block75%
The map has many ups/downs in the terrain + many places that could be potentially hidden or simply blocked by a small hill, There is 150 Valuable Block spawn locations, Yet only 35 Can have a valuable block at once, When a valuable block is mined, they spawn in another random non-filled valuable block spawn location.
There is also Items To help you in many ways, these items are split into 2 Tiers, T1 and T2, T1 Items are avadible since the game starts, while T2 Items are avadible after 4:00 from game start, The item list is the following: [Color = Tier] (The items need Exactly those items, cannot be a replacement of equal points]

ItemWhat it doesCostSpeed I Potion (20s) Its a vanilla speed I potion, mainly to help you go faster1x Coal BlockFull Leather Armor Set (Unbreakable)It helps you defend against mobs (listed below)1x Emerald BlockIron CompassPoints towards the nearest iron block1x Diamond Block, 3x Coal BlockFull Gold Armor Set (Protection III) (Unbreakable)It provides large defense against mobs (listed below)1x Gold BlockSaving ApplePrevents losing items on death permanently.1x Gold Block, 3x Emerald BlockWealth PearlTeleports to the nearest valuable block from your location, anyone within 6 blocks gets mining fatigue IV for 2 seconds.2x Iron Block
As you might have seen above, i said something about Mobs. Mobs will spawn from 50 Spawners scattered around the world, spawning a mob every 5 seconds. These mobs have tiers too, Which are: T1, T2 and finally T3. T3 Will only spawn once in the game at 5:15, they spawn in every corner of the map one each. When T2 Begins, T1 mobs stop spawning. The following is the mob list: [Color = tier]

MobStats (2HP = 1 Heart)Spawn ChanceDrops if anyBlinding Creeper12 HP, Does 10 Damage on explosion, Moves at 85 Speed.
Any player caught in its exploison gets Blindness I (10s)20% spawn chance [7 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]25% Chance to drop a splash potion of Blindness I (1s) [Use it on other players to ruin their concentration]Burnt Skeleton20 HP, Does 5 Damage on arrow hit, The arrow hit sets targets on fire for 4s, Moves at 60 Speed
Has Fire Resistance30% spawn chance [5 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]5% Chance to drop a Burnt Bone (Bone with Fire aspect I)Iron Zombie28 HP, Does 14 Damage on hit, Moves at 125 Speed.
Has Resistance V (3s) on spawn.
When Under 10 HP Gains 75 Speed.50% spawn chance [14 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]On death, Grants a iron block to the player who did most damage to the mob within the last 20 seconds.Carrier Endermite10 HP, Does 7 Damage on hit, Moves at 155 Speed.
Whenever Hit, Throws a Splash potion of Harming I infront of it, and teleports in a random direction 2 Blocks
On Death, Spawn 2 Silverfish, Silver stats are the following:
20 HP, Does 10 Damage on hit, Moves at 140 Speed.
Whenever Hit gains resistance I (1s)30% spawn chance [9 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]NoneHunting Witch30 HP, Moves at 100 Speed.
Throws 3 Splash potions of harming II every 2s infront of it at 20 degree spread.
Throws 8 Splash potions of Poison I (5s) every 5s in a 360 degree spread
On death throws 5 Splash potions of harming III directly upwards its death location over the next 3 seconds.30% spawn chance [11 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]On death drops a random piece of chainmail (protection III) on its death location.Emerald Zombie36 HP, Does 20 Damage on hit, Moves at 200 Speed
Has Resistance V (5s) on spawn.
When Hit Apply Poison I (3s) [Cant apply if target already poisoned] to the player that hit it.
When under 12 HP gain +5 Damage.40% spawn chance [11 Guaranteed to spawn at least every wave]On death, Grants a emerald block to the player who did most damage to the mob within the last 20 seconds.Golden Gladiator80 HP, Does 17 Damage on melee hit, Does 10 Damage on projectile hit, Moves at 135 Speed.
Fires a arrow at up to 7 targets every 4 seconds.
Throws 8 Splash Potions of Weakness II (3s) every 3 seconds in a 360 degree spread.
When under 40 HP, Increases Melee Damage by 7, Increases projectile damage by 5, Increases speed by 50, Splash Potions of Weakness II turn to Splash Potions of Weakness IIIOnly Spawns Once in every corner of the map.Every 20 HP lost, Grants a golden block to the player who did most damage to the mob within the last 20 seconds (Dosent count all damage that player did to it if that player died after that damage, still counts all the damage after player death)

On death, Applies Blindness III to all players within a 8x8 radius for 8 seconds, and drops a Golden sword with sharpness IV (Unbreakable) in its death location)
The game ends once the time limit reaches 7:30. Then the player who got most points wins, Incase of a point tie first tiebreak is deaths, second tiebreak is mobs killed, Third tiebreak is if the player bought any items (If Yes then the player who bought items wins), Fourth Tiebreak is a 30 second aftertime on those players for who mines the first valuable block (Eff X diamond pickaxe Speed IV and Jump Boost V given + Resistance X)

Scoring Of the game: For every player that you beat get +9 Score. Winning Grants +39 Score.

This is all i got for now tell me what you think about it cuz this took me 4 hours to make + about 4 hours in updating dis :/

title: How Tow Get Obsidian Minion Early Game
body:
HI
I just came across this method of getting an obsidian minion before you have even unlocked Deep Caverns.

no before is share it I want to say that I don't know if this has already been discovered or not, I just came across it and hadn't heard anything about it before so I thought it was worth sharing.

1. so what you do is you make a 3x1 hole in the ground (btw you can do this on your private island, I tested it and it works)
2. you then place water at one end of the hole
3. you go to the builder in the hub, select the original builder shop menu(to do so just click on the armor stand at the bottom of the shop page)
4. buy as many lava buckets as you can(you will have to come back a few times)
5. place lava buckets on the other side of the hole, so it turns into obsidian, and then mine it. and yes it does count towards your obsidian collection, I have tested it myself.

you will need a diamond pickaxe for this though so you might have to unlock deep caverns anyway to get a diamond pickaxe if you can't get a diamond pickaxe before then. but you won't have to go into the obsidian reserve and constantly die due to you having bad armor which is very nice.

so there it is. again I don't know if this has already been discovered, just thought it was worth sharing.

And yes I do know that this is a normal way of getting obsidian in Minecraft vanilla(normal Minecraft), its just, before i didnt know that this counted towards you obsidian collection

title: Bazaar buyer bots
body:
In the past couple of days, I've seen a small issue with bazaar buy orders:
When I place buy orders on certain items, 2 orders pop instantly on top of mine. It wouldn't be that much of a problem, you know, a lot of people want to buy this and that so they go for a higher price, but it's sooooo fishy that exactly 2 buy orders go for the same amount each (64 items) at any time of the day you know it's not ok.

These accounts go for as much as you surpass them, whichever it is pennies or even full thousands at any time. I really don't mind some bots bazaar flipping, but if they don't get punished on some way, might as well try it on some hacked accs before the account migration thing occurs to see how much I can make

title: Pickup priority
body: Pickup priority is bad from my experience. I was yeti fishing and I got a legendary baby yeti, but pickup priority kinda broke and I lost 50mil. I know it works for other players, but I'm a salty non who just lost a legendary baby yeti to a bug. I think that instead of the current system, we use the dang item stash instead. Right now the item is on the ground for 5 seconds and then other players can pick up the item. Instead of that, I think the item should automatically go into your stash to stop people from taking your overflux, baby yeti, and other rare drops because you were pinned in a corner by wolves or a very annoying snowman. No I do not want a creative mind, I want to not lose a 50mil drop to a stupid snowman.

title: [IDEA] Annual Harvest. New Event Farming Related
body:
HEY GUYS,
THIS IS A QUICKI BUT A GOODIE.

Every year in skyblock Farmer Daniel comes around. He brings his annual harvest and sells it to the community. With his harvest comes new Pet Items, Pet Food & Harvesting Tools. Daniel will also sell enchanted Beef, Pork & Chicken.

Pet Food:
Beef Jerky.
Gives 750k Pet xp to a Tiger, Lion, Pigman, Wolf, Hound, Zombie & Ghoul. This pet food will also grant the tiger with a Friend Ship Buff (new buff) granting 5% additional pet xp. 

Frozen Fish.
Gives 500k Pet xp to a Yeti, Blue Whale, Flying Fish, Squid & Ocelot. This pet food will increase the stats on the pet by 10%.

Golden Seeds.
Gives 750k pet xp to a Chicken, Pig, Rabbit & Parrot. This pet food gives the pet an extra 1 skill xp per 100 gained.

title: What are the chances of this??
body:
Hello, last night I got a Tara talisman and tarantula pet (separately, not from the same mob). I have done some math and checked it but I'm not sure if it is correct. If you could do you mind checking some of it and answering some of my questions? Thanks!  

Also, if you're not sure how I got some of the numbers check down at the bottom under the heading 'How I got the figures'.

If you have any questions reply to the thread and I will respond soon.

Chance for me to get Tara Talisman and Tara Pet


Drop chance for me to get the Tarantula Talisman

1/{(Approximate drop chance) / Magic find - amount of bosses I killed}

1/{(1999/3.23) / 2.17 - 9} =

1/276.200667703 (no1)


Drop chance for me to get the Tarantula Pet

1/{Approximate drop chance / MF - amount of spiders I have killed}

1/{12000 / 2.17 - 3211} =

2318.953917050691 (no2)


Total chance to get both drops (They were not acquired from the same mob)

=1/{(no1) x (no2)}

=1/640496.620262

= 0.00000156128%


I have probably calculated this wrong idk


How I got the figures


I calculated the approximate drop chance from refraction’s skycrypt it said he has killed 2053 tara brood fathers killed. Then from 2053 you need to take away 54 because that is the amount that he would have had to kill to get to tara 6 meaning he has had 1999 tara broodfather 4’s that he had a chance to get the talisman from. 1999/3.23 gives approximate drop chance as it says on skycrypt he would’ve according to theoretical probability acquired 3.23 tara talismans with 0 MF.

Then divide this by 2.17 because I have 117% Magic Find and minus 9 because I have killed 9 tara bosses since I hat tara 6.

Tara pet drop chance is estimated to be 1/12000 from spiders at the spiders den (unconfirmed). Divide this by the amount of MF I have and minus the amount of spiders I have killed and you get yourself the next figure.

Multiply the chances because that is the chance of me getting both of these.

P.S.


Btw I killed the T4 tara boss then freaked out at the talisman and was being hit by spiders I killed three and on the third kill got the pet. Would this have any effect on the chance because I got them so close together? I don’t think so but please let me know





According to I go by lots of names’ video: Cookie no rookie got an epic and a leg e drag back to back which supposedly has a 0.00008% chance of happening but I think this was calculated incorrectly because then I would be the luckiest man in skyblock and also E-drag pets are definitely rarer than what I got.

title: [Relatively High Effort] The Theoretical Most Amount of Items That Can Be Held at Once
body:
Hello yes okay so today i will be calculating the maximum possible amount of items the player can have
okay so rule 1 is that we are counting island, inventory, head, armors, accessory bag, sacks, sack of sacks, etc
rule 2 is that you are able to disenchant materials to make this more interesting

okay so lets start with figuring out the highest density of items per slot
jumbo backpack (54)
with enchanted golden blocks (160 (enchanted gold) x 160 (regular gold) x 9 (gold nuggets)
stack amount (64)
so we do 54 x 160 x 160 x 9 x 64
this equals 796262400 (big number)
now keep in mind this is 1 slot
we can now add the jumbo backpack, giving us a total of 796262401

okay so in our inventory we can have 35 slots (default 36, -1 bc skyblock menu)
796262401 x 35 = 27869184035
okay good
now max enderchest upgrade is 54 slots and then 7 36 slots
okay so that equals 243656294706, which added with our inventory is 271525478741 
okay that's good now lets look at armour slots
wardrobe has 18 things 
so 18 backpacks
and 54 other things
so we do
285858201959 
and then we add 54
285858202013 

okay so that's good
now we need to do the accessory bag
57 slots
285858202013 + 57
285858202070 

okay so for quiver
45 x 64 = 2880
285858204950 

sack of sacks
most storage sack mining sack
15 different things
with 20160 of each thing being able to be stored
and 12 slots for sack of sacks
3628800 
current total 
285861833750 

bait bag is like 45 stacks of 64
new total
285861836630 

okay so I think thats everything
wait pet menu 

I think its a cap of 50
285861836680 

okay I think that's everything

now for the island
lets say we're using chests, each block stores 27 backpacks containing 796262401 items each
27 x 796262401
21499084827 

okay so now we do 160 x 160 x 160
4096000 

we multiply 4096000 x 21499084827 
8.8060251e+16 or 88060250000000000000000
now we add the previous total to that
880602510000021499084827
wait profiles
if we have youtube rank we have 5 profiles
now we just multiply this number by 5
880602510000021499084827 x 5 
8.8060251×10^23
so 88060251000002149908482700000000000000000000000

this is our answer maybe I'm not very good at math
the maximum amount of items you can have in one skyblock account is 88060251000002149908482700000000000000000000000

title: To Everyone Who Thinks Healer has "So Many Items"
body:
The items that we have currently are the three zombie swords, which, although they are good at healing yourself, are not amazing for healing others. 

The Fel sword would be great, except for the fact that the healing buff is broken and doesn't work, which also applies to the Lesser Orb of Healing. 

Werewolf is an AMAZING set for healing others, however, it does not have a lot of ehp, which means it will not do great in the boss room, where it is really necessary. Since werewolf requires the full set to be the best, the mender's fedora is not useful here.

The supposed "healer pets" are garbage, and tank pets, such as blue whale, or dps pets, such as tiger, are much better. The bubblegum item is also worthless, since you will never need an orb for more than 60 seconds in 1 area, and in boss rooms, you will get more than enough mana to spawn another one. 

If you disagree, give a valid reason why.

Thanks for reading! 
#carrotgang

title: [IDEA] Wizard Portal
body:
Wizard portal takes you to what looks like the end, but the pearl dealer is replaced with the wizard, and all the shop items are gone. You try to talk to the wizard.


Spoiler: Wizard Dialogue



Wizard: Hello. This is the wizard realm.
Wizard: People like barry sometimes come here.
Wizard: Although there are some... oddities happ-
*suddenly an enderman takes the place of the wizard*
Enderman: STAAAAY HEEEEERE INNNNN THEEEEEE WIIIIIIZZAAAAAARD REEALM
*turns back into wizard*
Wizard: -ening. I wonder what they are.
Wizard: What enderman?
Wizard: No, I didnt morph into an enderman. What did he say?
Wizard: Oh. Oh my. This is terr-
*turns into enderman*
Enderman: IIIIIIIF YOOOOOOOU PLAAAAAAN TOOOOOO LEEEEEEAVE
Enderman: IIIIIII WILLLL KNOOOOOOW, AND IIIIII WILLLLL ACCTTTTT
*turns back into wizard*
Wizard: -ible. What? Oh this is bad. That’s golthazar. He’s the unofficial dictator of the realm.
Wizard: Go to the big ships over there. There’s barriers, so you won’t fall into the bottomless void!


After you run most of the way to the ship, the barriers disappear, and the enderman voice appears inside your head.


Spoiler: “Phase 1”



Enderman: IIIIIIIII WIIILLLLL KNOOOOOOW AND IIIIIII WILLLLLLL ACCCCT
Then you will get warped into a boss room that’s like the livid boss fight in that there’s clones and you have to find the real one. Except each enderman has 1.5 mil hp, 1000 defence, and 50% magic resistance.


If you die:
Enderman: IIIIIII HAAAAAVE AAAAACTED
Enderman: IIIIIII WILLLLLLL MAAAAAAKE THIIIIIIS REAAAAALM BEEEEEND TOOOOOOO MYYYYYY WILLLLLL
If you kill the correct one:
Golthazar: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! THISSSSSSS ISSSSSSSSS NOOOOOOOOOOT POSSIBLEEEEEEEEEEEE!


Spoiler: “Phase 2”



Golthazar: GOLEEEEEEEEEMS!! GEEEEEEEET THIIIIIIIIIS PUUUUUUUUNY FOOOOOOOOOOOOL!!
Then he summons 8 endstone protectors which you have to kill. They revive 25 seconds after you kill them.


If you fail:
Golthazar: YOOOOOU MAAAAAY HAAAAAVE BEEEEESTED MEEEEE, BUT YOOOU WILL NEEEEVER BEST MYYYYY GOOOOOOLEMS
Golthazar: IIIIIII WILLLLLLL MAAAAAAKE THIIIIIIS REAAAAALM BEEEEEND TOOOOOOO MYYYYYY WILLLLLL
If you win:


Spoiler: “Phase 3”



*gets teleported to the ship*
Wizard: You did it! You saved us all!
Voice: Oh no, you didnt.
Wizard: No... he was dead... HIDE!
Voice: Yes, it is I, DALTHUZAR!!!
*giant wither comes out of the end and onto the ship*
Dalthuzar: You may have bested my brother, but you will never best ME!
Then you fight Dalthuzar. He has 20 mil hp and 5000 defence. He circles around you shooting wither skulls every 1/5th of a second. Sometimes he will body slam you for massive damage.
If you win: Dalthuzar: *SWEARS PROFUSELY* DAMN YOOOOOUUUUU-
*disappears*
If you lose: Dalthuzar: HAH! Fools! You’ll never defeat me!
Wizard: Im out, bye.
*wizard jumps off the ship*


I’ll add rewards later

title: Armor Tier List
body:
A

Perfect Armor Tier X (1200 def) - Arguably the best armor in Skyblock. I mean with 1200 defense, you become nearly invincible. It is 3 times better than the Hardened Diamond Armor and provides 2 times the defense of Dragon Armor. Although this Armor has no abilities, it's insane amount of defense makes up for it.

Wise Dragon Armor ( 500 def, 350 hp ) - For me this is the best Dragon set. All abilities cost 50% less mana. You can basically become unkillable if you have a Zombie Sword with you. Rogue Sword and AOTE is also very fun and useful while wearing this armor.

Superior Dragon Armor ( 600 def, 450 hp ) - This armor boosts all your stats by five percent. AOTD ability also deals 50 percent more damage which means that it's ability will now do more than a thousand damage. For me this is the 2nd best Dragon set.


Strong Dragon Armor ( 500 def, 350 hp) - With this full set on you gain 100 more strength, which increases your base damage by a lot. This set also buffs AOTE by a little. If you want to deal lots of damage, then use this set.

Unstable Dragon Armor ( 500 def, 350 hp) - Increase your crit chance and damage by a ton, which is very good because you have a better chance to one or two shot Zealots and other End mobs. The lighting ability is also pretty decent too.

Protector Dragon Armor ( 500 def, 350 hp) - This set is focused on defense. It also increases your defense when you are low which is really good. The lower you are the more defense you get.

Old Dragon Armor ( 520 def, 650 hp ) - This set has no cool abilities, but it gives a lot of health and defense which is really awesome. It is not that great compared to other Dragon sets but I still think this set is an A tier.

Emerald Armor ( 570 def, 300 hp ) - This used to be the best armor in the game, but now it is outclassed by Perfect Armor and Dragon Armor. It is still a pretty decent End game Armor though.

Diver Armor( 500 def, 290 hp) - Super rare to get because you need to fish a LOT, which takes a crap ton of patience but it has really good stats. When you swim underwater you become aquaman. However, it is still outclassed by other end game armours.

Blaze Armour( 410 def ) - An amazing armour. The recent update removes fire prot from the Armour which means that you can now put prot on it. With the full set on you gain 40 strength, 8 percent speed and immunity to fire and lava. Mobs will also take damage when you are near them. This armour is about as expensive as Speedster Armour but I think it's worth it.


B

Ender Armour( 170 def, 90 hp ) - This armour is only good in the end as it doubles all stats, including reforges. It is a pain to get this armour though, as Enderman rarely drop these. Outside of the end it is pretty useless.

Young Dragon Armor( 500 def, 350 hp) - Worst Dragon set. It is basically like speedster armor but with more health and defense. You gain 70% WALK speed when only you are at FULL health. You can just use rogue sword and it will still be faster. This is a good set but it is the worst Dragon set.

Speedster Armour (350 def) - It is like hardened diamond armor but with 20 more defense and a lot more speed. It is a very good mid game Armor and not that hard to get. Just build a huge sugar cane farm and you will be surprised how easy it is to get that armour.

Monster Hunter( 235 def, 220 hp) - It has pretty decent defense and hp, but what makes this armour so good is the fact that there are four abilities in this armour. You also deal 25% more damage to mobs and take less damage from mobs. Pretty good mid game Armor.

Hardened Diamond( 330 def) - This is one of the best early to mid game armours. It provides good defense which is good as you will now not get one or two shotted by the obsidian sanctuary mobs. It is also very easy to get and craft.

Golem Armour (250 def, 105 hp ) - This is a good early game armour, but I still think it's not worth the time to get this armor as it so expensive. It's stats is equally matched to Hardened Diamond so I recommend going for Hardened Diamond as it is much easier.

Sponge Armour( 285 def) - Relatively easy to craft, it has high defense and when in water, the defense is that of an Emerald Armour! Although on land it is outclassed by many mid game armours.

Zombie Armour( 60 def, 530 hp) - Similar to the Magma Armour, it has low def and high hp. But what makes this armour B tier is that you regenerate health two times faster and also regenerate health when hit by a projectile. However this armour is SUPER expensive to craft.

C

Ember Armour( 180 def, 200 hp ) - Honestly this armour is not that good. It provides less defense than golem and Hardened Diamond. The full set ability is also not that good. You could just use fire or lava talisman instead. 

Magma Armour( 85 def, 470 hp ) - This might be an unpopular opinion, but I think Magma Armour is not that good. Sure it has super high health and intelligence but look at its defense..... ITS ABYSMAL. If you go to the end with this armour you would probably get one or two shotted. Heck, you would probably have a hard time against the Obsidian Sanctuary mobs.

Miner Armour( 375 def in mines ) - In mines it is very good and it's regen ability is super broken, but outside of the mines it is probably one of the worst Armour in Skyblock.

Armour of Growth( 145 def, 380 hp) - Pretty decent def and hp. This armour also has good healing abilities as well. But you need to get like 5000000000 dark oak wood....... so it's not worth it for me.

Lapis Armour( 120 def, 60 hp) - Great set for early game. It gives 200% more experience when mining ores which is very useful. However it's stats are low so you would probably get two shotted by the Obsidian Sanctuary mobs.

Miner's Outfit ( 100 def ) - Absolutely must have when you are trying to grind cobblestone as it gives haste two which will insta break it. Not useful in combat.


D

Crystal Armour (100 def ) - The base defense is trash, even worse than Lapis Armor. You also need to rely on the freaking light level in order to make it slightly better. This armour is a complete joke.

Angler Armour( 80 def, 165 hp ) - This is mainly used for fishing but....... with that defense you would get bodied by sea monsters. It did not even show statistics it just says it increases the spawn rate of sea creatures and reduces damage, but how much? If you want to increase sea creatures spawn rate then there are billions of ways you can do it in skyblock. 

Diamond Armour( 100 def ) - With that Armour set on you would absolutely get destroyed by even lapis zombies. It is a good starter Armour though because you can wear it and grind lapis zombies until you get lapis Armour.

Fairy Armour( 4 def, 4 hp ) - Sure you get speed but...... the defense is in the same level as leather Armour. Also you get -4 intelligence. Brilliant.

title: [Idea] Stereo Talisman (New GUI concepts added + duplicate disc management)
body:
Disclaimer - I have also posted this thread in the ideas and feedback forum to reach more people. 
This can be viewed at https://hypixel.net/threads/idea-stereo-talisman.3032711/

I don't usually make threads but a very random idea popped into my head and I want to receive people's feedback on it. 

What I impose is a stereo talisman which could be crafted from the prismarine shard collection.
Similar to the cake bag it would grant you a stat boost depending on how many unique music discs you have stored away in it. (Potentially Intelligence)

You can also have the option to play these discs, of course they will have to only play for you otherwise the lobbies would have 50 different music tracks going off at once.

With the use of prismarine shards it will give life to the primarine shard collection and cause more people to want to fish. It will also give people the incentive to collect all the discs for a small intelligence reward.

The talisman could have craftable upgrades which will enable more discs to be stored in it at once.

The Stereo Talisman can store up to 7 music discs.











The talisman would crafted using 2 stacks of enchanted redstone dust, 1 stack of enchanted prismarine shards and one jukebox.






The Stereo Ring is upgraded from the Stereo Talisman and can store 14 unique discs.











The ring would be crafted using 4 stacks of enchanted redstone dust, 2 stacks of enchanted prismarine shards and 1 Stereo Talisman.






Finally the Stereo Artifact is upgraded from the stereo ring and is able to hold 21 unique music discs.











As the final version of this item it will be crafted using 4 enchanted redstone blocks, 4 stacks of enchanted prismarine shards and 1 Stereo Ring






Duplicate Discs
One key thing to note is that players will most likely fish multiple of the same disc during their hunt for all the unique ones.
So I impose at the bottom of the interface for the stereo there is an option to cast away duplicate music discs which are already registered in the stereo.






There will be a stat boost reward for every certain amount of duplicate music discs deposited into the hopper. There could be a feature for you to enable the discs to automatically go into the talisman as well, acting like a sack.






Let me know what you all think.

body:
Well, we all know about the portal in the wizards tower.
But once you try to go inside it... it doesnt send you somewhere.
Time to work on the wizard portal!!!!!!!!!! save me.
So first, lets talk about where it will send you. You will be at y200. Every block is random. It isnt clean. You find a NPC. Their name? Their name is ???
Try talking with them and this will happen.


Spoiler: NPC: ???



???: Who are you? 
???: Why are you?
???: Who are you?
???: Why are you.
???: Who. Are. You.
Now this island is meant for early late game players. Not 1983b network **** but like 50 mil midas sup armor, the stereotype.
Now this person goes after you, they arent slow but they sure aint fast. They are using running speed. Their AI uses the same AI a hacked client would use for the hack ¨hunt¨. It just goes after all targets, but hypixel would make it so it just targets you.
His hits are no joke, doing half of your health bar. But, there is a catch. He stops going after you if you are 50 blocks away. Bow shots dont work vs ??? and you can only heal. Once you kill him he drops a book and quill. You cant read it.


(These mobs will have no HP value. You just need to hit them a current amount.)
You move on. 1000 blocks foward. You see a second NPC. Their name is !!! Try talking with them and this will happen.


Spoiler: NPC: !!!



!!!: Why did you do this!
!!!: Why did you do this!
!!!: Why did you do this.
!!!: Why. Did. You.
This person deals 1/3 of your HP with one hit, and cant be damaged by a sword. You need to bow them. This persons speed is not a joke either. Well it is speed? Every 2.5 seconds it teleports to you and trys to hit you. But somehow, you kill them. They drop a ink sack. You cant craft it into anything.


You move on. But you hear the sound of a mad endermen.
You look behind you yet nothing. Move on. 
You hear it again. Are you going mad? No, this cant be the case.
???: Why hello.
!!!: How are you.
Within the blink of an eye they show up as a red eyed endermen. You keep walking. You see the wizard but in a ruined state. Try to talk to him and...


Spoiler: NPC: Wizard 



Wizard: Help me, they are after us. Please take me with you. Please. Please
Wizard: You will! Thank you.
Wizard: (the glitch minecraft text)
You are now in a remade version of the end. He just tells you,
Wizard: Run.
The NPCS: ??? and !!! Go after you, in slow speed. But sometimes teleport to you.
Once you are within 100 blocks of the weirdos you get a 3rd npc. Once this NPC talks the wizard is gone.
Wiz??!: Help. 
Wiz??!: Help.
Wi?!?!: HelppP!P
W?!?!: HE!W
?!?!?!: Hello.
This npc now fights you. Only dealing 1/5 of your HP bar. But still hard to kill. This NPC has the same factors of ???.
Once defeating this npc you are granted with a new item.
A piece of paper. It reads: Combine the relems, combine the items.


If you put all of these items you granted into a crafting table, you will get a readable book.
For what is inside it, it is up to you. New lore for yall to figure out.


Spoiler: The drops of the bosses



??? Would drop 30 enchanted sugar cane.
!!! Would drop 100 enchanted eyes of ender
?!?!?! Would drop 53 enchanted paper.


And that is it!

title: The Ultimate Skyblock Guide - Noob To Pro - Work In Progress.
body:
Hey Guys,
I am making this guide to help players become good in Skyblock. I will be using NPC sell price for materials although it is recommended that players sell Materials to the Bazaar for extra coins.

Step 1: Starting A New Profile.
The First Step to Beating SkyBlock is Starting a New Profile. The Profile Must be Apple. Apples are associated with Good Luck & Money. Everything we want in this profile.

Step 2: The First Hour.
Start your new profile by breaking the tree and bridging to the hub portal. (If one of the leaves drops an apple keep it, and place it in a chest, You need the luck) You will start by talking to each of the villagers. By doing this you will receive your first 170 coins. With your free money Find the farm merchant who will sell you a rookie hoe for extremely cheap. Purchase the hoe and start punching away at the wheat until you unlock the recipe for Harvesting 5. Run back to the farm merchant and purchase some sugar cane to craft into paper then harvesting 5. You will then move to the blacksmith to put the enchant on. Once you have harvesting, walk to the witch's hut and mine all the nether wart. You will need to mine this until you get the potion affinity talisman recipe. Craft this as-well as a farming talisman. *WARNING* do not sell the excess wheat/seeds to the merchant. You will then make your way to the forest. Speak to the Lumber Merchant and complete his quest. He will reward you with an axe, which you will use to forage up to level 7. Make your way to the Mine Merchant and purchase 3 gold. Create a Golden Pickaxe and mine up to level 1. One hitting level 1 go to the gold mine and complete the lazy miners quest. Continue to mine all 3 ores (Coal, Iron & Gold). These ores will be used to make minions later on. You Have now Unlocked the Bazaar. Selling all the materials to NPC will net you approximately 15k. You will need to deposit this into the bank IMMEDIATLY.

Step 3: Gearing Up.
Weapons & Armor are one of the most important things in SkyBlock. Your first armor set will be Pumpkin Armor. This set it commonly forgotten about, and its ability will help a lot in the early game. You will need to mine 100 pumpkins to unlock the recipe for this armor set and only require 24 to craft. You will need to save the extra pumpkins in order to create a starter pumpkin farm on your island, which you will use to increase your farming level (NOTE: This will not be your full sized farm). Once back at your island, use any blocks you have spare to make a 16x16 room with ceilings 3 blocks high, This will be used to store Minions/Mobs. Create holes in the wall so that you can hit the mobs without getting hit yourself. This will allow you to have a mob farm without wasting minion slots. For the weapon you will use a Undead Sword. You will need to create enchanted golden apples, using the apples from foraging 7 and the gold from mining 7 to make a life steal 2 book. This book will go on your sword and will help you last that little bit longer in the Deep Caverns.

Step 4: Deep Caverns.
Finally, Progression is being made. In the deep caverns you only have 1 goal, To get Ores. You will need to mine enough Coal/Iron/Gold to upgrade each minion to t5. After doing this make a hast 3 pot and mine cobblestone until you get enough to make 5-6 Compactors, these will be used in the minions. Continue exploring the deep caverns until you reach the Pigman Den. You will need to stay here for around 10mins mining Redstone until you unlock the Enchanted Redstone Collection. You will then make 5-6 Enchanted Redstone and combine that with the enchanted cobblestone to make a compactor. Place the Minions and the Compactor on your island. You can then log off knowing that your minions will be working overnight.

Step 5: Minion Slots + Foraging
Pumpkin Armor with and undead sword can only last so long. Its time for an upgrade. Using ender pearls (obtained from mob box) go to the Spiders Den and slay some spiders until you unlock the spider minion recipe. Craft as many spider minions as you can (Keep in mind your Minion Slots) and place them into your mob box. Make a water system so that all the mobs get pushed to the gap where you can slay them. Kill these spiders until you can craft 3 enchanted string. This will be used to make a Savana Bow. After completed Craft a golden axe with efficiency 5 and brew some haste 3 pots. You will need to mine logs until you can upgrade each foraging minion to level 7. When doing this you will unlock all foraging collections which is needed for the next weapon, Raider Axe.

Step 6: New Gear.
After grinding your foraging you are in need of a new weapon. This will be the Raider Axe. To obtain the raider axe you must first complete the Melancholic Vikings Quests or buying 1 from ah. To complete the Vikings quest you are going to need a magical water bucket, fish and a fish hat. All of these items are easily obtainable. To get the coins for the raiders axe you can do 1 or 2 things, Foraging & Fishing. When foraging it is recommended that you mine the highest selling wood that's currently on bazaar. To start fishing you will need a normal fishing rod which you can buy from the fish merchant. To start fishing purchase a lure 6 book from the ah and combine it onto your rod. Then swap between Park lobbies until you find one where it is raining, this is where you will be fishing. Once you reach squid collection 1 craft a squid hat and continue fishing. You will need to fish until you collect approximately 300-400 ink sacks. Sell these to Bazaar and you should have enough money to afford the raiders axe. Worrying about anvil uses now is a bad thing. To enchant the raiders axe you will need to make a complete enchanting table and pull up a list of the enchantments, which can be found HERE. You will need to mine emeralds at the deep caverns with full lapis armor on and once reaching 60 levels grab a book and enchant it with one of the needed enchants, You will then repeat this process adding the books onto the raiders axe. NOTE: this will take a while. 

Step 7: Dungeons Gear.
With your new raider axe its time to grind some coins. Head to the diamond reserve in the deep caverns and grind some mobs. After getting around 20k and some mobs drops head back to the hub, selling all the loot received. With the coins received its time to purchase some dungeon gear. Head over to the auction house and find some floor 0-3 dungeon gear going for cheap on the ah, (NOT BIN). Bid on each of these pieces. As of now Skeleton Soldier or Zombie Knight will be the best armor set for you.
If needed head back to the Deep Caverns to grind out some more money. With your New Raiders Axe and Dungeons Armor Its time for the END.

Step 8: The End.
This step is simple. Test your damage. With your raiders axe and Skeleton Soldier/Zombie Knight you should be able to 1 tap the 4.5k Eman. If not don't panic!!! You may need to get some talismans to do this and I recommend watching @ThirtyVirus Video that can be found HERE. After watching this craft as many talismans as you can until you can 1tap the enderman. Once you can 1 tap the enderman grind them until you get a COMMON enderman pet. This pet will be your carry pet up until you can get a uncommon Tiger from the traveling zoo (always have enough mats for it spare, you never know when it will pop up). After getting a common enderman pet leveling it up is essential. I recommend getting it to level 50 before moving ahead.

Step 9: Dungeons!!!
The most controversial step. Grind entrance floors for lost adventurers and catacombs level. Once you feel prepared enough floor 1 is always there. Dungeons is one of the easiest ways to make money in the early game. Getting secrets can award you with around 50k per run. Your runs though will not be for profit, they will be for gear only. You will need to get your catacombs level as high as possible. Once a high enough catacombs level purchase a Zombie Soldier Cutlass. This sword is extremely good and will help you a lot.

More Coming Soon!!!

title: [IDEA] F8 Items, Baby Yeti Change
body:
Hello!

Today I created some ideas for F8, which is kinda being slept on tbh. I also changed the Baby Yeti pet, which is a change from a previous post I made.

First, lets talk about the Baby Yeti.

In my opinion, the Baby Yeti pet is not a mage pet, so I made a few changes to its stats and its Shocking Slam perk.





Changes
- Removed Intelligence buff
- Added +30% Crit Damage
-Changed Yeti Fury ability, adding +100 Strength to the Yeti Sword and increased Intelligence by 300
- Changed Ability 2 (used to be Ice Shields) to Ability 3 (used to be Shocking Slam)
- Changed Shocking Slam damage from Intelligence to Strength

Idea for compensation for players who used Epic Baby Yeti pet and liked the Ice Shields perk, decreased price from 20m to upgrade from Kat to 5m, and changed the time required to 4 days (from 12).

NEW F8 ITEM IDEAS!
(please note these are ideas, as said in the TITLE!)

Greater Orb Of Healing






Crafted with 4 Lesser Orb of Healing, this item is a significant upgrade to the previous tier.
Note that the Strength buff does not increase by 5% each second, it just increases your Strength by 5% once. (ex, 1000 str. to 1050 str.)

Detonate Bow






Think of it as an Explosive Bow, but better! You can spam a few detonators, then detonate them, dealing massive amounts of damage, like tens of millions of damage! I might increase the detonator duration, because 5s seems a little short.

Wither Knight Armor
I did not make the full set, that would take too long. Imagine that there are 4 pieces, and the chestplate gives the most hp and def and boots give the least.






An incredibly strong set, giving large sums of defense, strength and crit damage. It's ability deflects projectiles (arrows, wither skulls, skeleton master bolts, etc) and shoots it back at them! All pieces can be found in Emerald or higher except for chestplate, which is only found in Bedrock, costing 12m to buy.

Goldor's Staff, Golden Skull + Reforge!
3 new ideas in 1!













The Goldor's Staff has a unique ability. You right-click to throw the staff and it will circle around you, (like the bone helmet bones, but faster and wider radius!) and the Goldor's Staff will turn into a Golden Nugget (placeholder, like the Bonemerang). Press Right Click again to bring back the Goldor's Staff!
This sword is exclusively found in Bedrock Chests and costs 15m to buy.

That's all! Leave a positive reaction and a nice comment and have a nice day!  ​

title: This is really frustrating..
body:
So I think its really strange how coops work in terms of leaving. I could be wrong about this but I think its bad how when you leave a coop you can NEVER rejoin it. I'm sure me and lots have other people have had this problem. So I left my coop. This was before I knew I could not rejoin btw, but that's besides the point. Anyway, I wanted to rejoin and my friends told me that there was a 48 hour period before I could rejoin. So I looked it up and started seeing I couldnt rejoin my coop. This is annoying for many reasons.

1. All the progress made in the last months that people will have and maybe even the past YEAR is gone.
2. Maybe you want a break from your coop and decide leaving, but you then want to rejoin. BUT YOU CANT
3. You might have accidentally deleted your profile and now can't get it back.

I suggest this feature is removed and replaced with a recovery period.

Within 30 days of deleting a profile your deleted profile goes into a limbo. It doesn't show up in the profile manager as to not take up space but will show up next to the profile manager in an icon called "Profile recovery"
This would work like within 30 days of your profile being deleted, all your data exists, and nothing gets deleted. You have that 30 day time frame to rejoin or start back up the profile with everything restored.

I'm not sure why you cant rejoin a coop but if anyone sees something like this (specifically a staff) please say why that this isnt a feature or if you can add it or not. Because this is something that a lot of things do, so I don't see why sky block cant do it.
I have seen a lot of people commenting "Its your fault for not reading the big bold text" I chose to delete my profile, even though i regret it, I have accepted that I cant get it back. None of my posts are active attempts to change my specific circumstances, but generally change the circumstances of everyone else. Other people have made mistakes like accidentally deleting the wrong profile, they also can't get anything back. So actually read the post, its not me asking for my profile back.

Also, obviously there are exceptions. If a coop was actively participating in a duplication glitch or macroing, then their profile gets completely wiped, no getting it back. But as for completely legitimate profiles, a profile recovery system needs to exist.

also i get that there is like a 1 in 1000 chance anyone who can get this into the game will see this but if people see it then thats all i want.

title: [IDEA] Abandoned Mines v1.1 (effort post? | more than zero positive reactions)
body:
Before the actual thread starts, i just wanna say one thing: I was going to delete this first, as i didn't really like how at the end it became less fun and more of a task just to do the thing because i'm already too far in. This isn't really good, but i just couldn't delete so much progress. Even though i did it like, 4 times already...

So at some point, i finally accepted that all both of my idea threads are absolutely dead and bumping them would make no sense. Luckily, i had a creative explosion at 2 AM and hello again.

Part 0: How to access
Abandoned Mines are located in Deep Caverns and require Combat 11 to enter. The portal is on the back of the island, behind the cliff with a fairy soul.

Part 1: Design and purpose
Abandoned Mines are mostly caves with a lot of open space made in mostly gray and dark gray colors. It's a mining-combat area, in which you can find Diamonds and Quartz as well as strong monsters and a boss.

Part 2: Enemies
This part is well, what the title says. I'm just gonna list the mobs, what they drop and how much Combat XP they give.
Undead Miner - A zombie with 1,500 Health and 360 Damage. They drop 2-4 Rotten Flesh, Ench. Rotten Flesh with a 5% chance and 24 Combat XP.
Crazy Geologist - A zombie with 2,000 Health and 375 Damage. They drop 3-4 Rotten Flesh, Ench. Rotten Flesh with a 5% chance and 27 Combat XP.
Mindless Guard - A skeleton with 2,250 Health and 390 Damage. They drop 3-5 Bones, Ench. Bones with a 5% chance and 20 Combat XP.

Part 3: Memory Pieces and the bossfight
"Mindless Guard" is a strange name for a creature living in mines, isn't it? Obviously enough, they're guarding a place. To be exact, the Expedition Base. They start appearing as you go further in the area rather simply wandering around. The Expedition Base itself is a place for a bossfight. It's an area with tons of open space and some ruins, which appear to be something humans used down there to survive. Here's how a classic room in the base looks like:





(pls dont send hate i suck at building) Notice that ender frame over there? Honestly, i kinda felt like it's weird down in the mines, but it's the only way to tell people "you gotta put things in the frame for the boss to appear" that i thought of. But what to put in there? Memory Pieces. These are gray and white heads dropped from the Mindless Guards with a 1/350 chance. If you wanna see how one would look ingame, launch Minecraft 1.8.9 and do
/give @p skull 1 3 {SkullOwner:"random_gamergirl"}
Once a Memory Piece is put into the frame, it disappears and you get a Forgotten Memory. It's basically a Memory Piece made in darker colors. Using your Place/Use with a Forgotten Memory key will remove the piece from the frame and replace it with a Memory Piece again.
Alright, that's about it for Memory Pieces. Now the boss.
Expedition Leader is summoned after 9 Memory Pieces are put in the altar. Himself, he is a normal person with a player skin. With a pretty large amount of 8M Health, he's hard to kill. Well actually no, this guy would die in 5 seconds. To prevent that, he also has a "Shield" ability: All damage above 150k is reduced back to 150,000 making the Expedition Leader battles way longer than they would be. Now, the boss has multiple phases.
Phase 1: Starts when summoned. The boss summons Mindless Guards with 40k health and 450 Damage each for 5 seconds, 2 of them in one second (for a total of 10).
Phase 2: Starts once the buffed guards are defeated. The leader himself goes into battle, having 1350 Damage therefore being extremely dangerous. Along with his melee Iron Sword attack, he also has a ranged bow attack - He uses it every 3 seconds, the arrows start home towards a random player always dealing 35% of their current health.
Phase 3: Starts at 5M health. Similar to phase 2, but the leader teleports near a random player every 5 seconds, making it impossible to camp in one spot to avoid all damage and leaving the boss to others.
Phase 4: Starts at 3M health. (This one is inspired by Zethes-Rainbow's post) The boss instantly summons 20 Mindless Guards with 90,000 health and starts a charge attack for 90 seconds. If the players fail to defeat the Mindless Guards, a lightning strikes every player. This "drains" the damage dealt to the boss, recovering him back to 5M health and starting Phase 3 again. The lightnings themself do a damage equal to 30% current health of a player.

Part 4: Expedition Leader rewards
Expedition Leader is a pretty hard boss, so the rewards are good too.
At first, let's take a look at how the chances for certain drops are calculated. The system uses the Weight system already used by Dragons. Placing a Memory Piece grants 85 Weight, Scoring first grants 270, Scoring third grants 215 and scoring third grants 170. Now to the drops. The main thing you wanna get from the Leader is "Expedition Suit" - A set of armor. A helmet requires 300 Weight, chestplate requires 365, leggings 325, boots 270. Although the stats are the same, the pieces will still cost a different amount because of how hard it is to get a chestplate compared to boots. Speaking of stats...
Stat: Piece stats | Total stats
HP: 110 | 440
Defense: 130 | 520
Strength: 20 | 80
Speed: 2 | 8
Intelligence: 10 | 40
There's no set bonus from the Expedition Suit.
Another drop from the boss is the Miner's Daggerknife. It's an iron sword and has a drop chance of 8% when 440 Weight is reached. With 175 Damage and 90 Strength, it's basically a worse version of the AOTD. It also has an ability: Activated with RMB. Throw the knife, dealing 0-25% more damage on hit depending on distance traveled. When thrown, the knife only comes back after 3 seconds and can't be used. Missing the shot does not cancel this. With no Mana cost and 20s Cooldown, this is a pretty useful melee-ranged weapon for early-mid game.

Part 5: Other minor things
These are extremely small notes that don't deserve their own part, but still do exist.
-There are 12 Fairy Souls in this area.
-There are no drop chances to the Expedition Suit. You will always get the best piece you can get with your weight.
-More coming in future updates if people like this one!

Part 6: Afterwords
Yeah, i'm really not sure about this one... It's so far my least favorite out of the ones i made, but i guess i'll just post this here. Won't bump too much, but i still appreciate it if you do! I think i'll focus more on making minor ideas like talismans, swords and just making a single item per thread. I don't hope you liked this one, it honestly turned out straight up bad. Why am i even posting it? I don't know, i just felt like deleting an almost finished thread is too much even for a near perfectionist like me.



Spoiler: Updates



v1.0 - Thread posted
v1.1 - Boss greatly nerfed (Suggested by Ma1ngo)

body:
Okay, so I was foraging recently, and I was looking around, and I noticed something. There is no dedicated armor for foraging. Most people were either using Young armor or something random. So I though of something.

Introducing: The Monkey Suit!


Spoiler: Armor Stats



(Epic Rarity)
Each Piece (All pieces have the same stats):
10 Health
15 Speed
5 Pet Luck
1 Ferocity
(It gives Pet Luck and Ferocity because, well, it's wild!) (Also, it's the first armor with Pet Luck)
Abilities:

Full Set Bonus:
Skilled Forager:
For every 2 foraging levels, this armor gets +8% stats (+200% maximum) and a 0.5% foraging xp boost (12.5% maximum).

(Boots Only) Vine Swing:
Allows you to double jump! Upon double jumping, gain +20 speed for 10 seconds (does not stack). Mana cost: 50





Spoiler: Crafting Recipe



This armor's recipe is unlocked in Jungle Wood VIII (8) instead of the 1,000 foraging xp it is now.
It is crafted with 23 stacks of enchanted jungle wood and one wood singularity in the "normal armor pattern", with the wood singularity in the middle of the chestplate.

This armor just looks like leather armor with the monkey pet texture (or something similar) as the helmet.





Spoiler: Monkey Suit's Impact on the Game



This suit would obviously be used mostly for foraging, with the speed boost, vine swing ability, and foraging xp boost being used to improve the foraging experience. This suit could also be used for zealot grinding if you have a high foraging level, because it has a maximum speed boost of 180 (with foraging 50), which is slightly more than young armor, although it would be balanced because it has low EHP (after all, why would you need EHP for foraging?).

This armor is also unique because it gives pet luck, so it could be used if you want to be the pet-luckiest person in SkyBlock. At foraging 50, the full armor set would give 60 pet luck, which is quite a bit, and could be used as a money-making method to craft legendary pets far more commonly.

This armor also gives ferocity, because why not? 



Let me know what you think of this idea, it is my first, so I appreciate any feedback.
Thanks for Reading!

title: Why ghost damage doesn't grant a competitive advantage
body:
Various dragons that are killed across the end are usually accompanied by at least one person who complains about ghost damage. Everyone seems to hate mages present outside of dungeons because of their ability to do stupid amounts of damage to dragons, also known as 'ghost damage.' Ghost damage is the portion of damage dealt to a dragon, in which it registers as accumulated damage on your end, but not on the dragon's. This supposedly allows you to do unusually large amounts of damage to dragons in certain lobbies. At first glance, this is an exploitable bug. However, the damage you deal to the dragon doesn't affect the damage other's deal. If you deal 100k damage as ghost damage to the dragon, it doesn't register on the dragon's health, meaning that you have left 100k damage for other people to deal as well. This means that the amount of damage you do is proportional to how much damage others do, which is why people who do 20m+ on dragons usually are done in terrible lobbies. Therefore, this relationship is mutual, and ghost damage doesn't grant any competitive advantages.

Note that this is coming from an Elegant Tuxedo sweat who isn't a mage and does dragons on a consistent basis.

Edit: I'm not saying that the admins shouldn't remove this. I'm just stating that ghost damage isn't an advantage.

title: Will the Aspect Of the Dragons sword prices ever come out of their Depression?
body:
Will the Aspect Of the Dragons sword prices ever come out of their Depression?
_______________________________________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________________________________
Hopefully Yes, But There are many better swords e.g The Livid Dagger. The Aspect of the Dragons, about a month ago was worth 2 Million coins for a clean one.
_______________________________________________________________________________________
They have dropped down to 1.2M in a little over a month. The Dragon armors are dropping as well. The Superior dragon armor used to be 60-55 Million coins, and now its 40-50M coins! Why? To be honest, I am not completely sure, Whether it be the
Shadow Assassin armor, or summoning eyes dropping.
_______________________________________________________________________________________
But back to the question. Will the AOTD Ever rise again? This is not Certain at the time. It could drop, or rise. One thing to note is It used to be an amazing sword, but there are just so many better swords nowadays. If you have the money, go for a Livid Dagger.
_______________________________________________________________________________________
If you're just looking for a sword to grind Zealots, Get an AOTD, you'll only need to deal 13k damage without a crit.
Now Obviously it's a personal preference, and I well... I prefer the AOTD. The AOTD Will most likely Rise when either the Eyes rise, or it gets a buff (if it gets a buff). Another thing to note is how many AOTD's are in the market right now. With more swords, there's not enough buyers, so people will drop their prices in order to sell them
_______________________________________________________________________________________
My Conclusion is The sword will most likely either stay the same price, or drop more.
_______________________________________________________________________________________
If I am wrong about anything, Please correct me in the replies  Have a good day!
_______________________________________________________________________________________ _______________________________________________________________________________________

title: Need a decent healer guide or just general advice
body:
Summary at the bottom

I have basically been a mage since dungeons came out because i was told it was good, but now that im cata 15 and i have 25mil of gear, im just not enjoying it anymore, and im finding it hard to progress without spending incomprehensible amounts of money on single weapons or items. I just feel stuck. Ive been considering switching to healer for a while, and ive finally decided to go for it. For some reason i just feel like as a healer i can go a lot further as a healer without having to grind so much and spend so much money. I dont know if this is a good choice, and to be honest, i dont really care. Its a change of scenery, and something to actually work towards for once. If im wrong, please let me know, but im still probably going to go through with it. 

Summary (TL;DR)

I am currently catacombs 15 (nearly 16), i have a budget of 49mil, and i want to go for a mainly melee style setup. I want to be able to not die, but also do decent damage. I dont know if this is possible, but i hope it is.
I need advice on:
Armor
Weapons
Pets
Reforges
Other items that might be useful

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

body:
Block: beacon
you can only place 1 at the same time.
can be used with taming lvl: 25
the pet floats above the block so you can see the incubator is working.

idea 1: you have to fill the incubator with candy it will give a percentage bonus to pet the xp but it takes some time for the pet to get all the xp from a candy. higher taming lvl -> higher bonus

idea 2: Pet essence: it will rarely drop from any animals you killed. each essence have a base amount xp and can be filled into the incubator

idea 3: slayer boss drop: monster souls drop rarely after killing the boss. stronger Tier boss -> stronger souls you can use the souls to get xp or put it into the incubator to increase your pets level over time

title: Spider Slayer Rework and Improvements (Suggestion)
body:
Spider slayer.
Quite possibly the worst slayer, in the most unloved map.

The spider's den is constantly crowded, making it take 10x longer than it should just to spawn the boss, with people constantly killing your minibosses, and then killing the Tarantula Broodfather you summon. It's clear it needs a rework.



Spoiler: My ideas



- Firstly, I believe the spider's den should be fully reworked. The map itself is a pain to navigate, as it is full of cobwebs and random holes, and the spiders themselves give very little combat exp. when combined with the difficulty of actually killing a spider, it takes far longer to spawn a Tarantula Broodfather than any other slayer boss.
- Secondly, a random lobby feature, similar to that in the hub, could be added. This would allow you to get private lobbies for the spider's den, like for all of the other slayer areas (castle, crypt), without having to spend your entire day trying to find one.
- Thirdly, a new area could be created in the hub, like the Castle and Crypt. This would allow players to more easily do spider slayer while still being in a private server, without the need to add new servers to Skyblock.

These are all my ideas. I am in no way saying these will be added, this is just what I believe could be added to make spider slayer less mentally painful.





Spoiler: Other ideas



- Make the Tarantula Broodfather AI better, and not just constantly jumping in holes - L6st62deepforge
- Remove cobwebs from the Spider's Den - L6st62deepforge



If you have any ideas which haven't been mentioned, feel free to post them in the replies. I will add them to the "Other ideas" section with credit to you; spider slayer does need to be improved, and getting more ideas from the community will give the Admins more suggestions on how to do this.

title: Century Cakes (Info Post)
body:
Century Cakes are a new exclusive limited edition item in skyblock for the 100th year anniversary.
If you talk to Simon in the hub, you can claim a free mystery cake, one of the following:




Once you obtain one, you can auction it.
You can also go to your private island and place it down. It then acts like furniture (so you can pick it back up).
Upon doing so, you can right click on the cake to obtain the buffs for 48 hours. You can do this infinite times, and you can go to other people's islands and get buffs from the cakes there.

There is a rare chance that you obtain a Cake Soul upon eating a cake, but no one knows what they're for yet.

This NPC will last for (most likely) 1 skyblock year.

Hope this helps!
