title: iDobie's Side of The Story.
body:
Please read with an unbiased perspective. (copied from IDobie's dm with me).

The Story:
It all started off like this, I met this guy in game, and he wanted to damage test my Aspect Of The End, so, or a bit more safety, I ask for his discord, and eventually find out he is a ThirtyVirus YouTube Member, (as of recently his rank on the discord server was removed, and he was warned. He has not been banned or kicked.)
For any of his supporters, keep on supporting him if you want, but this video might change your mind, for anyone supporting me, again it's your decision. No matter what side you are on, both of us were in the wrong as you’ll find out, and as to why we were wrong. I am not gonna paint a picture, where I am perfect and and he is the absolute villain because that wouldn't be the truth. Somebody already did that. I had made a forum post on hypixel, and it got removed for public shaming, as of what I know the guy got no punishment whatsoever.

Wednesday (Eastern Time):
Back to the story. Around about noon, I meet this guy in-game, and he wants to damage test my Aspect Of The End, so I ask for his discord, and eventually find out he is a Thirty Virus YouTube Member. So I thought he was credible. His In-Game Name was 1Point17. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/768419022604992532/769218588815917066/unknown.png His discord username is Sleeting. I won’t include his tag because that would be a violation of his privacy, and I don’t want to cause that problem. Because he was a Thirty Virus YouTube member, I thought that he was credible and trustworthy. (later he lost his role, possibly because maybe he ran out of youtube member sub, disconnected, hid/changed his YouTube account) So I let him damage test it. Then he scams me. He forgot to block, or ignore add me, and about 30 minutes later I scammed him out of his old Aspect Of The End, using the Old Damage Test Method. I shouldn’t have scammed this guy, especially over an aspect of the end, but I was mad at him, mainly because that week I got scammed out of a Level 100 Legendary Enderman, A somewhat high level epic griffin and more, it was my fault that I got scammed, but that didn’t stop me from being mad about it. I shouldn’t have done it, and if I will take full responsibility for my actions and accept any punishment I get. So anyways, after I scammed him, I got banned from the Thirty Virus discord because he starts talking about it in one of the channels on the server. I was also muted and therefore couldn’t defend myself. He was bragging about it saying that he scammed me and was justifying it because I scammed him back. A couple people I never met started defending me. I have no idea why, but if you are watching this, thank you. At least one of them was a very credible person. https://media.discordapp.net/attach...3640649441300/image0.png?width=267&height=475
Later one of his friends Private messages me in discord repeating the same thing over and over, SCAMMING ***** *****.
This was the one of the first attacks, and surprisingly also not the worst of it, everything else is oh so much worse. https://media.discordapp.net/attach...573013565440/unknown.png?width=891&height=475
I reported it to a Thirty Admin as soon as I could, but I mainly had to do it through Vjay(The credible person who defended me) and they reported the guy who said it. The person was banned for a week. Later that evening ProNinjaGamin0, who had banned me, and had banned the other guy, joined my discord server, (which you should totally join, link in the description). I am not upset at him, as he was doing his job, and, with the information that he was given, it looked like I had been the one scamming. I assume he joined to investigate, but I was not afraid of that as I have nothing to hide.I asked around to see if there was anything I was forgetting but I think I covered all the important stuff from wednesday.

Thursday (Eastern Time)
I wake up to a death threat. I couldn’t even take a screenshot, as it got deleted. I don’t even remember who it was, and I have no way of checking, so you’ll just have to take my word for it. I immediately thought about what happened on Wednesday. And thought about sleeting, and I knew he was behind this somehow. Fast forward a little (Context to this next little bit, he has a youtube channel and he has been posting in quotations “proof”) He made a video, about this death threat thing, and said that it's ****ed up and he would never do it. And my response to it was “I literally have proof of those death threats, which I am not releasing yet. I don't know if you sent someone after me or not, but it still exists. And you are right it's ****ed up, even though I have no evidence that it's you, there is one thing in common between most of them, they know you, through a discord server, they are friends with you, or are subscribed to you.”
I currently can’t tie them to him, but again most of these people are close friends of his.
Let’s go back to the timeline. I log onto a hypixel skyblock, collect minions, grind a little, and get on to my classes. Everything is fine until sleeting tries to contact me. I had blocked him, and just focused on my school work. Fast forward to school is done and I do some homework and I get onto hypixel, and I get partied and warped to an island. The owner of the island is muted so he puts down a couple signs. https://images-ext-1.discordapp.net...mcBrNLuzKzYo6JxSF3QB.png?width=920&height=475
He tells me to go committ suicide, and later a sign saying (Which I don’t have a screenshot of), if you don’t commit suicide, I will come after you my self. Like what the hell? It had some kind of creepy, stalker vibe. I shared it with a close friend ShadeSoul, and he suggested I make a forum post, meanwhile my video editor suggested I don’t, but I had already made the post. I was expecting people to be really negative about it, but I was surprised at the support I was getting. There were people that were like oh that's a **** post.However, a lot of people were also like, “Why are you making a post about getting scammed out of an Aspect Of The End”. And my video editor responded and gave a very good point. He said that the problem isn’t the fact that I got scammed, the problem is that I am getting death threats, being bullied, and being told to go commit suicide. My video editor, Sooubway was threatened by the guy himself, because of his response. https://media.discordapp.net/attach...4089129295882/image0.png?width=267&height=475
He said that because I deleted my forum post, it proved that I lied, and my response was, “no an admin deleted it, because of the public shaming rule, I even reposted it just without names.”
Here are some more dms.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachme...9208/Screen_Shot_2020-10-23_at_9.00.04_AM.png
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachme...5488/Screen_Shot_2020-10-23_at_9.01.04_AM.png

I found out later that a piece of his evidence is the fact that I use badlion.
He and a friend by the name of Quaglet, both in discord and in game, partied me on Hypixel and proceeded to bully me. I said before they did anything, “I will give you 1 minute to say anything that you feel like saying, as I am about to go to bed.” Long story short I stayed for about 5 minutes extra as they bullied me. I immediately left, and went to bed. Later on Friday around noon Sleeting partied me and said that I was avoiding him, and using going to bed as an excuse, while it was 10pm for me and it usually takes me an hour to fall asleep. Plus on top of the fact that I was stressed because of recent events, and I was falling behind on school work. So it might’ve taken me 1-2 hours to fall asleep. I fell asleep around 11-11:30pm.

Friday (Eastern Time):
I got up early. I saw that my forum post was deleted by an admin, and I reposted just without the “public shaming”Nothing yet, except for the fact as I was afk on my skyblock island. Nothing unusual, but I scrolled up in chat a little bit and he tried to party me. Later on Friday he joins my island, and says he has all this evidence(Which includes his “evidence” that I play on badlion”). He acted really mad, and I got partied by him, where he said that I am having a breakdown.
He had also said that he never threatened me in all caps, which only made me believe that he was even more mad.
https://media.discordapp.net/attach...591197724692/unknown.png?width=891&height=475

He said that I deleted Direct messages between him and me, and to be honest I did delete some. Basically I deleted the direct messages related to the video he uploaded, which included me scamming him out of the Aspect of the end, after I got scammed. I deleted them because he was making in quotations “proof” videos, including anything he could, on top of encouraging people to bully me.

Tuesday EST:

I wake up and decide to check forums. All of a sudden people are hating on me and are calling me a scammer. I am very confused and ask questions as to what's happening. Someone gives me a link (They want to stay anonymous.) and i read it. I think to myself this is ludicrous. The situation that they brought up was me talking to this guy and asking to borrow a legendary wolf, and some superior armor. Afterwards there was an image of me selling superior armor and a legendary wolf. I admit that is very suspicious, and there is a reason for it looking that way. But what I did in order to be able to afford things such as the midas staff I sold a lot of my items, and I flipped superior multiple times, not to mention a lot of grinding. In the end how is that scamming? Than some other people wanted me to give him the sup armor and leg wolf. I was so confused as to what was happening. I got messages from people like “you deserved those death threats.” Someone even created an alt called “iDobieHater.” https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/712246198177628181/770679187878969354/unknown.png
Some other people said that I now am hated even more than ThirtyVirus. First that's an insult to ThirtyVirus. And second, I don’t think ThirtyVirus was hated. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/712246198177628181/770705737940598864/unknown.png
People think that it is funny, and anyone who comes up with a story gets a mass amount of praise. Any negative comment towards me is met with praise. Any one who supports me has gotten death threats, bullying and more.


More Information on Sleeting:

Sleeting has a track record himself, and actually has some other things that might be good to take into account. He has been ban evading, his main account Sleeting got banned on Hypixel (reason unknown) and he started the account 1Point17 as an alt. He has made threats that aren't as violent as some of the ones I have gotten, but are still pretty bad. Even if he didn’t make a death threat himself, his friends did, and when I mentioned that it was his friends that made the death threats, he said “sure, as if.” and said that it wasn’t true. I think he might be defending his friends, because if he admitted it, he would immediately be in the wrong and lose this “argument”.
https://media.discordapp.net/attach...925734641695/unknown.png?width=891&height=475
He could have faked evidence.



In Summary:
So, to put it into wraps, over these last few days I have received both a lot of support and a lot of backlash about this situation. In the end, both sides have their points and opinions. Neither side has admitted to being wrong, so I can’t tell you for sure who is at fault. What I can tell you though is that through all of this evidence that you’re seeing here, why would these people get so upset over something so trivial? To me, the only reason this really became a problem is because of the large stack of lies and inconsistencies that came with it.

I don’t have a problem with the money. Losing that Aspect of the End and the 150k is not fun, but it isn’t the end of the world. In the end the problem is the way that I was treated as a result of these people going too far.

Conclusion:
But yeah, that’s about it. Thank you for watching and taking the time to listen to my side. You are free to have your own opinion, just try to take into account the things that have transpired, and make decisions off of that, not mine nor Sleetings word.

Don’t go and put hate towards this guy, I know some of you might want to, but please don’t. It won’t help me, or anyone in the long run. What I suggest doing is ignoring this guy, or just not getting involved in general. He just wants attention. And we don’t give him what he wants, especially not in this situation.If anything else happens, I will put it in the description. If it is anything big, then I most likely will just make a whole other video about it.


It was gonna be for a video

title: The Story of Bonzo [Effort post]
body:
This was the 2nd part of my upcoming megathread about an alternate timeline that the dungeon bosses could have come from check out the first part about The Watcher here ---> https://hypixel.net/threads/the-story-of-the-watcher-10-positive-reactions-effort-post.3487549/ Make sure to check that out if you haven't as it provides a little bit of context to this thread/story!

A bit of Bonzo's backstory: Learned to be a clown by the age of 13. Forced into the dark arts of necromancy by his parents at 14. He found it fascinating that he could resurrect the dead corpses and make them do what he wants. He came under Necron's command around the age of 15 and made into one of his weaker generals by the age of 17. Bonzo got an order from Necron on his 18th birthday.

Bonzo just got orders that he needs to return to Necron because a human escaped from the catacombs. It took a while to get to the lowest floor but he got there in due time. Apparently Scarf was having a bit of fun with the adventurers now, because Bonzo was not there to clown on the poor adventurers. Scarf danced with them and killed them easily. 

But the adventurers also managed to get loot from the first floor and then sold it to their friends after they escaped using the new gear. Bonzo's training at the Necromancer Academy was cut short because the adventurers were making it to Scarf constantly now, so Bonzo must return. Unfortunately for Bonzo the loot from his floor and Scarf's floor made it nearly impossible to beat the adventurers, so he kept getting beaten by nearly everyone. 

Eventually, Bonzo figured out how to revive himself nearly instantly, and so he could compete with the weaker humans. Necron was happy that Bonzo found out how to revive himself like the adventurers could, and then decided that they could learn just a little from the humans. Necron then told Scarf that he must use his next set of adventurers as minions because they could be stronger than regular undeads. Bonzo was happy that he did something that got Necron's approval, and then was used to make his commander, Scarf, also do something with the humans.

Thank you for reading this, I hope you enjoyed it! Make sure to leave a like if you liked it as it motivates me to make more! Part 3 of Scarf should be out in a few days and within the end of the year the megathread (Hopefully). I will link it when it is done right here --->

Edit 1: Formatting

title: How to get Golden Coloured Enchants
body:
have you ever wanted your enchants to look like this:




follow this guide. even if you have NEU, you might not know you can change the ugly purple colour

SkyblockExtras does this but it is paid. If you are looking for a free version you will need to download the NEU mod.


Spoiler: NEU Discord












Discord - A New Way to Chat with Friends & Communities


Discord is the easiest way to communicate over voice, video, and text. Chat, hang out, and stay close with your friends and communities.




discord.gg








Once you have the mod downloaded you'll notice most of the enchants that are highlighted to be purple. A lot of people dont know how to change it so here:
First you want to open your inventory and go to the NEU settings:





Next you wanna edit enchant colours





Then you should see a kinda hard to understand menu. All you need to do is copy my config exactly like it is into yours. Make sure to click on the add Enchant Colour button to keep adding.




This highlights pretty much every high tier enchant in the game. If you want to add more enchants and dont know howto just ask and I'll try my best. The colour is golden (the same as seen on skylea) but you can change it to any other one that you prefer by changing the 'Col' value to the corresponding colour value. You can see the different values here.

hope this helped, ty to moulberry for making the mod, hf

title: Why Snow minions are good and everyone should use them
body:
So basically a lot of people have been talking about the bazaar and how to calculate the best minions, and people are saying that gold and lapis are the best minions atm, but really, snow should be the meta. 

If you do the math (Math warning):

It costs 318k to upgrade a snow minion from tier 1 to tier 11 if you buy enchanted snow blocks which go for 608 atm on bazaar and are comprised of 600 snow, or if you use snow produced by snow minions which sell for 1 coin each.

Ill say that it costs the rest of the coins to 400k to get a snow minion tier 1 since they drop at ok rates from common, green, and red gifts (I've heard that green gifts are the best)

An enchanted lava bucket costs about 400k to buy from the bazaar. (if you buy ench coal blocks and ench iron and either craft the lava bucket or get someone on skyblockZ to craft it you can save around 40k per enchanted lava bucket)

And a super compactor 3000 costs about 400k from the bazaar.

If we combine all of these values together then that means that a T11 snow minion costs approximately 1.2 million dollars (not including diamond spreading and medium storage because those are very cheap)

A T11 snow minion with an enchanted lava bucket makes, (I used TBlazeWarriorT's minion spreadsheet (very useful by the way (also I'm nesting parentheses epic))) around 59k coins per day selling to the NPC's at spawn. I'm going to round that up to 60k because the bazaar prices are slightly higher than the NPC prices for diamonds and snow (especially if you create a buy order instead of insta-selling)

This means that after buying a snow minion for 1.2 million coins, you will make 60k per day FROM 1 MINION. This should pay off in about 20 days, and then your making pure profit. This is extremely good because most other tier 11 minions pay off in months.

Now on to why snow minions are better than other minions that make more money on the bazaar.

1. As shown above, snow minions are easy to get to T11 and pay off very quickly.
2. If you go with the volatile market of the bazaar, you will spend half of your time playing skyblock constantly changing your minions and buying materials to level up the minion that makes the most money currently, but when everyone catches on then you will have to change minions and start the process over and over again, ultimately reducing your minion profits or maybe even losing money leveling up so many minions.
3. With a snow minion, it will take about 20 days to fill up with a super compactor, diamond spreading, and enchanted lava bucket so you don't have to worry about storage filling up. Don't worry if your snow minion seems to not be compacting snow into enchanted snow blocks, it takes almost 10 stacks of snow to make 1 enchanted snow blocks.

thank for listen to ted talk yes

title: Shredder is now more meta than AOTD
body:
Shredder costs only 500k as compared to AOTD that can cost maybe twice, thrice, or even 4 times that amount (at previous costs).
Both deal the same amount of damage and strength (once the Special Effect on Shredder is maxed); furthermore, Shredder can have sword enchants (both can have the same enchant damage). HPBs can also be applied to Shredder to note.




Therefore, Shredder will replace AOTD as the new Late-Early Game weapon.

title: [Tool] Find a Coop!
body:
Skyblock Players! 
Are you wishing to find a co-op?
Well here is a place where you can find some!

I thought of ideas for a thread, and I noticed in the UHC thread that there was a pinned thread to look for a team for UHC, and I figured many people might want to find a co-op for SkyBlock, so why not make a thread for people to find a co-op!

(Credits to @jucry , since this whole idea is based off of their thread. Also @StevenR8 thanks for pointing out the thread in the first place)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Format for a co-op request (you don't have to make it exactly the same, you can add or remove things):



Spoiler: Co-Op Format



Username:

Timezone:

Skills(As in for skyblock skills like Combat X or Fishing VI, sorry for the confusion):

Any type of communication (Teamspeak, Discord, Skype, etc):

How Active:

How long you've been playing Skyblock:



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are new to the game, don't be scared to make a request! You are not alone, and there will always be a person to help you out! And being in a co-op will be a big boost for your island!


Thats all! If you think there's something important that needs to be added to this thread, I will take your suggestion into account.

I wish you all have fun in Skyblock!

(again jucry thanks for the idea even if you havent been in the forums for a month kbye)​

title: Youtubers really got to investigate before making vids(toadstar0)
body:
Most youtubers, take time to test out the sets, read and get info from others, and before testing proof read to see if all info is credible and accurate. However, certain youtuber(s), haven’t been giving good or accurate data.

Not gonna start a war like earlier but @Toadstar0 stated in his latest video of werewolf armor that the set is amazing for tanking and can help you survive as it heals you every time you deal damage. And he said this set is 100 recommended for F7.

First off, that is wrong. The set ability doesn’t ever say it heals you. It only heals other around you. Also, from people testing and telling me, it never healed them. (Had to make sure they weren’t berserkers as they do get bloodlust which heals them). When toad was doing testing, he was doing it as a tank. And we all no, tanks don’t die. (Unless really bad).

So, just to make this short without bringing old topics of when he didn’t state accurate info, youtubers really gotta investigate and proof read stuff. Cause, ngl, there are a bunch of sweaty 9 year olds who now think that they made a mistake and then go quickly to buy werewolf set only to see it isn’t as great, this set only good for healers, that’s all IMO.(after this big incident, I wanted to watch his videos to see if @rm_rf_slash was right. And, they were). So, in conclusion, If youtubers gonna give advice or good guides, they better make sure it’s accurate at least

title: who is worse toadstar or thirtyvirus
[IDEA] Chainsaw, the berzerker weapon of your dreams
body: The Chainsaw is a legendary item that can be crafted from a saw motor, a sawblade, 16 enchanted iron blocks, and 8 Enchanted Redstone Blocks. The saw motor can be obtained as a crazy rare drop (7/13000) from dungeon mobs in floor 4 or up. The sawblade can be crafted from 4 chains and a scythe blade. A chain can be obtained by putting fire in a crafting table. Fire can be obtained by mining fire with a silk touch pickaxe. The chainsaw does 200 damage, making it pretty useless, but it's ability is what is powerful. It's ability can be used when you right click while very close to a monster. The chainsaw will rev up, and lock the enemy and you in place. You then have 3 seconds to saw through the enemy, and you can spam click for insane damage. With a consistent cps of 10, you could deal up to 6,000 base damage, not including crit damage or crit chance. The problem is, you can get damaged by other mobs when doing this. It has a 20 second cooldown and can be used on any enemy. This can also be used to cut down trees, and using it's ability on a tree activates a 1 second animation where you cut through the tree, and the whole tree gets cut down.

title: [IDEA] True Armor and True Ultimate Enchantment, more expensive than Chimera
body: True Armor is an armor set crafted from 24 stacks of Enchanted Iron Blocks. It grants no stats at all, but it's full set bonus makes it worth it. It's full set bonus is: True - Convert 1% base damage into true damage, and convert 1% defense into true defense. It has a leveling system similar to perfect armor, with a maximum of 9 upgrades. Each upgrade costs 16 stacks of Enchanted Iron Blocks, and gives 1% conversion. Additionally, with the True Enchantment, which is an ultimate enchantment dropped by Awakened Golems (mythological creature with 100,000,000 health, but half dps of default inquisitor), you can make it 30% stats. The problem is, Awakened Golems are one of the rarest creature to dig up, requiring a legendary griffin and being almost as rare as inquisitors, and only having a 25% chance to drop the book. The book converts 1% damage and defense to true damage and true defense per level, and if you apply True V to every piece of armor you have, you will have 30% converted. This can be crazy for campfires, dragons, svens, or anything that deals with true damage or defense. The only problem is, a full True V set would cost over 2 billion coins.

title: Why the Century Cakes won't increase in value, and you shouldn't invest in them
body:
alright, so based on what I've seen, these little cakes everyone is getting, unlike most are saying, they wont go up in value. People have been conditioned to special items, such as the crab hat, and assume that they will inevitably go up in value. This leads to everyone and their mother looking to buy century cakes. Now one day, these investors will realize "oh crap, the cakes aren't going up, I better cut my losses and sell" This leads the price to drop little by little, and oh, everyone is doing, and you have the price plummet. Now this might not happen if there is a buff that could give some consistent value to some of the cakes, which would then balance the inevitable crash and keep a consistent price. already today these prices have fallen SIGNIFICANTLY so its only going downhill from here. So if you think your being 5Head and investing in these new kewl items, sell now and make it so your not poor. NOW THERE IS A POSSIBILITY I AM WRONG, THIS IS ONLY A SUGGESTION. But this is my genuine belief, so whether or not you act on what I just told you is your call, and i wont pressure you further. Now I kinda know how these work a lil bit, because I was one of if the THE pioneer of the "BuYiNg CrYsTaL fRaGs fOr 2Ok a PeIcE" and i made millions off that until over usage, so I know over usage when I see it, so I suggest believing me, but again, your call

title: City Project: Dungeon Headquarters - Idea
body:
Currently as the city projects are close to completion and starting the build process, soon we will need new city projects. One part of Skyblock I think is somewhat lacking is the catacombs hub. No not the dungeons hub, the small area in the crypts. I feel like its fallen out of use and honestly doesn't seem as great anymore, so what if we revamped this area?




Spoiler: Part 1 - Structure/New Building:



The revamped Catacombs headquarters would not only now have a new entrance more directly from the hub, most likely around the coal mine area. But now the main area would have huge changes, firstly now Ophelia has been moved to a separate small shop room. A new small blacksmithing area as well which would both be in a hall on the left side of the main dungeon door. The dungeon door with Mort still stands. Then it would also feature a hallway containing some new rooms as well, mainly a planning room with a map of a dungeon. Then room 2 would be chest and loot storage behind a huge iron reinforced wood door containing the loots of many runs. Room 3 would be a small library with special books and enchantments scattered throughout. Room 4 containing essences and powerful weapons to be studied. Finally Room 5 would be a small living area with some beds, storage attached and all the necessaries. These would contain new NPCS as well. Most NPCS do not serve a purpose, though there are a couple which have special perks that only are found here and not the Dungeon Hub.

First one is a new magic NPC which will disenchant Ultimate Enchants, you get nothing back, but the slot for a Ultimate is back on, this NPC is found in the library room.

The second NPC is found in the first room, also known as the planning room. He will sell hints for certain rooms in the dungeon time to time, telling you where secrets may be lying to help out certain players. He has a small cooldown between hints of a day or two.

The third NPC is found in the loot storage, he doesn't serve much of a purpose other than a bazaar/auction/trading area for essence. Idea provided by: @70Ox

Those are all the main NPCS, but some other NPCS will exist, they don't give secret locations or anything to buy, but they may tell you some tips and useful dialogue.

One NPC is located in the living area.
Voice Lines: (Note: These are not in order, they will be randomized each time)
1. Years of dungeons have tought me to instead rushing headfirst, cautious approaches can lead to more success.
2. I remember when I first blew up a crypt, that zombie- It still scares me to this day.
3. Why did I take this job?
4. I wish I was out exploring those catacombs.
5. A dungeon a day keeps the /g kick command away!
6. Don't waste your time too much here, go explore the depths of the catacombs!
7. Over time you will become better in these catacombs, its learning from your mistakes to become better.







Spoiler: Part 2 - Perks/Bonuses:



Onto the most important part that any Skyblock player needs, PERKS. The perks in order as well as how many contributions are require plus a new special part, in order to get certain perks you need to contribute a certain amount of times minimum on a very certain possible contribution. For example you may need to instead of using the cheapest perks available, now you must contribute to contribution #4 2 times in order to get the highest tier of perk. Now onto the perks.



Spoiler: Perks:



Perk #1 - Contributions required: 4 | Gain 5% off on all dungeon related NPCS except for Malik.

Perk #2 - Contributions required: 8 | Gain 10% off on all dungeon related NPCS except for Malik.

Perk #3 - Contributions required: 16 - Special Contributions Required: At least 4 times on Contribution #3 or above | Gain 15% off on all dungeon related NPCS as well as 7.5% off on Malik and all reforge anvils.

Perk #4 - Contributions required: 28 - Special Contributions Required: At least 4 times on Contribution #4 Plus 8 #3 Contributions | Dungeon Chests are 10% cheaper










Spoiler: Part 3 - Contributions:



Finally onto what you will need to contribute in order to get these perks and the city project done in the first place, now since perk #4 and #3 are exceedingly powerful now in order to to adapt we make the contributions themselves more expensive. Now onto the contributions.

Contribution #1 - Excavation and Terraforming:
Description: In order to create space for the new headquarters we must terraform and excavate the environment, this will fund the team with the resources needed to get this job done.

Resources needed:
1. 2 Enchanted Iron
2. 1 Enchanted Oak wood
3. 1 Enchanted Gunpowder


Contribution #2 - Materials and Structure
Description: Construction of the main structure and its new rooms will require resources which will be funded via this.

Resources needed:
1. 64 Enchanted Dark Oak
2. 32 Enchanted Cobblestone
3. 8 Enchanted Sand


Contribution #3 - Catacombs Magic:
Description: Experiment with the catacomb's special properties to allow for new processes and breakthroughs in Skyblock.

Resources needed:
1. 1 Enchanted Blaze Rod
2. 8 Enchanted Eyes of Ender
3. 16 Enchanted Glowstone



Contribution #4 - Dungeon Expertise:
Description: In order to fund those who have expertise in the art of adventuring in the catacombs to help us build and establish this new headquarters we will need some resources which will be funded from this contribution.

Resources needed:
1. 1 Scarf Studies
2. 64 Enchanted Melons
3. 2 Enchanted Cookies

title: Finally, I can stop killing dogs in cold blood.
Furniture cap increase
body: With the release of the century cakes, its fair to say that the furniture cap is going to be pushed on a lot of islands. I personally have an area in my base where exactly 14 armor stands would fit perfectly, leaving a mere one slot left for a carpentry table. And that would work out perfectly. But, seeing as I have all but two of the cakes (weak flex), I need to choose what I want to have on display. That's why I think that we should be able to increase the furniture cap, and I think this would fit perfectly as a profile/account upgrade in the community center. Only the first couple tiers would be available for free (thereby reducing possible lag), but each would give 10-15 more slots, giving more than enough of a cap to fit all that stat-buffing cake goodness.

title: NEW Skyblock item idea: Magic Eraser
body:
Have you ever tried to destroy a nether wart island, only to find that the obsidian takes too long to mine out? Well, look no further, as the Magic Eraser can instantly destroy (almost) every vanilla block on your private island. All blocks that are destroyed do not go into your inventory and are just removed from the game.

Now, of course, an item with an ability like this would cause way too many bugs if not playtested, so it would need a lot more work than many other items. The crafting recipe would have to be slightly expensive in order to make this item more than just a slight diversion for early players. so maybe making the recipe require a stack of enchanted sponge surrounded by 8 magenta dyes would work. Any suggestions are welcome in the comments.

title: An Empty Coop
body:
Hello Hypixel forums.

Today I had a comrade of mine help create a sugarcane farm with me. Doing so, I had to create a temporary coop with him.

This all went fine and expected, until he left. I expected everything to go back how it used to be. I was wrong. The first thing I noticed was a blue (coop) right next to my profile. 




While irritating, I could deal with it.

Then, I tried to deposit my coins into my bank, then I saw the coop options.




This was starting to get aggravating and inconvenient.

I also got messages like these.





This is frustrating that my ancient Island has become a coop, which seems to be for forever. This and many other inconveniences are annoying. So I would like a quality of life improvement to at least remove these messages and personal/coop bank when NO ONE ELSE IS IN THE COOP. It is a minor thing, but I haven't seen anyone else discuss this. I hope there is a way to delete a coop without deleting a profile in the future.

title: [?] Spider pet gives dungeon mini-bosses bhop/speed hacks
body:
Since the spider pet came out, I've switched to Tarantula minions, as the spider pet at level 100 gives a 30% speed increase to spider and tarantula minions.

To level up the pet, I started doing F6's with it, especially when killing golems (as an archer I farm the golems, which gives over 5k combat xp each).

However, when clearing the dungeons, I've noticed something weird.

Whenever I had the spider pet equipped while killing Lost Adventurers, Frozen Adventurers, Shadow Assassins and Angry Archeologists, they would suddenly get speed hacks.

I'm not joking. It was equally confusing and frustrating. They literally start zooming around with like 1000 speed, and I had no idea why. They became practically impossible to hit without splash weapons, and as an archer... yeah.

Then I realized this only happens after I have the spider equipped, and hitting the mini-boss once. If I switch back to my blue whale, skeleton, or even wither, it would go back to normal. No weird speed hacked mini-bosses.

But what exactly makes the spider pet give mini-bosses speed hacks?

Ironically, I think it's the legendary spider pet's second ability:

Web-Weaver - Upon hitting a monster it becomes slowed by 40%
I know it doesn't make sense, but listen.

This "speed hack" bug only happens when using the spider pet.
All of the other pet perks don't affect mobs at all.

It's not a coincidence that this ability affects mob speed. If any of the abilities were bugged, this would be the one.

I don't know, but maybe the developers forgot to code the perk to affect dungeon mini-bosses the same as every other mob? Maybe the way mini-bosses are coded are so inherently different that Web-Weaver has a completely opposite effect?

To conclude, I don't think I'm the first guy to discover this, or even make a discussion post about it. But this has just been very confusing to me, and is practically forcing me to do Rev IVs to lvl it up, which is expensive and more time consuming.

Thoughts?

title: How to be skilled in dungeons.
body:
What do you think the grind of dungeons, you probably think of the millions you need to pour into expensive gear, or the hours required to get a high catacombs level.

But in fact, there is another aspect of dungeons that will help you on higher floors much, much more.... skill.

1. Know EVERY-SINGLE secret in EVERY-SINGLE room. Yes, this is required. Go put in the grind to memorize 100+ secrets and you will be greatly benefited. 

Secret Guide:


Spoiler: Discord












Join the Dungeon Secret Guide Discord Server!


This server helps people that play Hypixel Skyblock dungeons by supplying them with the guides they need. | 23,996 members




discord.gg








2. Use your tnt. When you see a crypt, blow it up if you don't have 5 crypts blown up. So many teams don't blow up crypts resulting in them getting slowed down. (crypts give bonus score). 

3. Know the power level of each mob. To survive, you not only have to have good gear, but have to know that a group of skeleton masters must be taken away by range. 

4. Have a dedicated route for every single room. A good route will allow you to get all the secrets as fast as possible. For example, for a certain room my route is to blow up the super-boom wall, go down the water stream, hit the lever, get the chest behind the lever wall, aote up, get the bat, get the chest. 

5. Make mage use thunderstorm to kill bats. If you have killed every mob in that room and the mage's thunderstorm doesn't his a bat, it died to something else and you move on. 

6. Don't. Skip. Rooms. If you see water puzzle or trap room, don't skip it for someone else to do, do it yourself. Or at bare minimum, call for a teammate to teleport to you. 

7. Speed. Just getting faster will help you. This can be done by splashing rabbit, for the mage to use rogue sword, for berserk and archer in Shadow Assassin to teleport, to put sugar rush on your boots, etc. 

8. Use your abilities when necessary. Abilities can speed up your run by a lot, so don't hold onto them. If you see a good scenario to use your ability, use it. As an archer, I used to save my Explosive Shot for minibosses, but now I use it on large clumps of normal mobs as well.

title: 2.5K SPECIAL! MAGMA BOSS UPDATE IDEA! (megathread) (45+ positive reactions)
body:
I worked hard on this for around 10 hours, so please bump and if you like it maybe either like or creative?

Magma boss:
Changes:

Health buffed from 150k->15 mil
There are three stages
Damage cap changed to 25k
Stage 1: The fight

The boss regenerates 10k health per second
Anyone who dies respawns
Attacks: Ground slam, Fireball, Summon help, Heat wave
Ground slam: The magma cube Jumps 50 blocks into the air, launching players up 20, then comes down creating a shockwave that goes 20 blocks out and deals 100-1000 true damage based on how close you were to the center. This attack has a 35% chance to be used every 20 seconds and is used when the boss gets to 10% health. It is immune to damage during this time.
Fireball: The boss shoots fireballs at the players that have the most health, each dealing 75 true damage. They have aiming 10, so they are almost impossible to avoid. The boss shoots 10 fireballs in rapid succession before the fight and has a 50% chance to do it again when it reaches 50% health.
Summon help: The boss summons four groups of blazes at the corners of the arena. Each group has 12 blazes. Each blaze has 50k health and shoots 3 fireballs in rapid succession every 5 seconds, each dealing 200 damage. They aim at random players. Until all of the blazes die, the magma cube has 90% damage resistance. This always happens when the boss hits 30% health.
Heat wave: Every second, the boss deals 2.5% of a player’s health in true damage to every player.
Stage 2: The team
While stage 1 is mostly about killing it, stage 2 is about teamwork and healing each other.
Parts: There are three parts of stage 2

Part 1: The box. A note block version of “The box” by Roddy Ricch is played as players are stuck in a 11x11x11 box made of bedrock, with a block of endstone in the middle. This block takes 30 minutes to break with a clean diamond pickaxe, but players can combine their efforts to break it. There is lava 75 blocks up that is falling down. When players break this super endstone block, there is a hole that they can go through, falling back into the arena. The lava does 500 true damage per second. The lava flows as though it is in the overworld. It is one block lower the farther towards the edge. This means that people with armor like mastiff should stand towards the edge so that other people can go in the hole first. This lava does 100 less true damage per second with lava talisman.
Part 2: The choosing. The magma boss summons the blazes from before, except their fireballs have aiming 1, and there are 8 groups. After they are defeated, the boss says that the third part will be even harder than the last two. You have to choose whether to be a swordsman (berserker), bowman (archer), or medic (healer). Swordsmen can only use melee weapons, bowmen can only use bows, and medics can only heal people. Then, part 3 happens.
Part 3: The reckoning. Stage 1 happens again, except the boss has 20 million health and +25% damage. This time, if you die, you get trapped in the nether prison, which requires completion of all dungeon puzzles to progress. If you fail one, you have to wait for someone else to die and complete the one you were on before you move on.
Stage 3: The reward

Unlike most boss fights, you are not competing against other players, you are competing against your past performances. There is nether weight.
Swordsman/Bowman rewards: 70-79% of highest damage: 10 weight. 80-89% of highest damage: 15 weight. 90-99% of highest damage: 20 weight. 100-120% of highest damage: 30 weight. 121%+ of highest damage: 50 weight. 1mil-2.99mil damage: 30 weight. 3mil+: 50 weight. 1st: 20 weight. (Note swordsman/bowman rankings separate)
Medic: 70-79% of highest healing: 10 weight. 80-89% of highest healing: 15 weight. 90-99% of highest healing: 20 weight. 100-120% of highest healing: 30 weight. 121%+ of highest healing: 50 weight. 100k-299k healing: 30 weight. 300k+: 50 weight. 1st: 20 weight.
Things you can get:
Enchanted magma cream 2.5% chance (guaranteed) (8th)
Ember frags: 10 weight each (guaranteed) (7th)
Ember hat: 30 weight ¼ chance (6th)
Ember chest plate: 40 weight ¼ chance (4th)
Ember pants: 35 weight ¼ chance (5th)
Ember boots: 25 weight ¼ chance (7th)
Magma travel scroll: 45 weight 1/6 chance (3rd)
Ember rod: 75 weight 1/10 chance (2nd)
Magma cube pet: 100 weight 1/10 chance (75% epic 25% legendary) (1st)
Example: you did 1,143,762 damage as a Bowman, which is 94.3 percent of your highest. That is 20+30 weight, so a total of 50. The highest thing you qualify for is the magma travel scroll, and then the chest plate, etc. You don’t get the scroll, so you roll for the chest plate. You don’t get that either, so you roll for the pants, and don’t get them. Time for the helmet, which you also fail to get. The boots are the last thing the rng rolls for before it gives you frags. You get the boots, and there is still 25 left, so you get two ember fragments and two enchanted magma cream.
Buffs:

Ember armor: Hat 40 hp->60 hp 35 def->55 def 5 int->20 int. Chest plate 65 hp->80 hp 60 def------>80 def 10 int->20 int. Pants 60 hp->75 hp 55 def->70 def 5 int->20 int. Boots 35->50 hp 30->45 def 5->20 int. Total: 200->265 hp 180->250 def 25->80 int. Full set bonus Nether lord---->Ember master: Increases stats of ember rod by 20 damage, strength, and intelligence
Ember rod: 80->185 dmg, 35->95 str, 50->200 int, Ability: Fire blast: shoots 3 fireballs in rapid succession. Each does 1000 damage. Mana cost 150. Intelligence scaling 0.5 per intelligence
Magma cube pet: Salt blade-->Cubic affinity. Buffs the stats of the cubic reforge and the cubism enchant by 0.05/0.1% per level. Strength bonus buffed from 0.2 to 0.33 per level. Lvl 100: 33 strength
New items:

Wither sword: Rare sword, drops from wither skeletons with a 2.5% drop chance. It does 125 damage and gives 35 strength. Item ability: Wither lord is a passive ability that gives immunity to the wither effect when held and inflicts the wither effect on an enemy when you hit it dealing 100 damage a second for 5 seconds
Magma cube hat: Epic Helmet, crafted with 64 enchanted magma cream in each slot surrounding a slime hat. It gives 250 health, 100 defense, and immunity to knockback while worn. It also gives you +50 strength against creatures affected by the cubism enchantment. It is unlocked in magma cube 8 collection.
Wither pet:

New area: Magma crypts.
Map
Notes: Pink is fairy soul, Green is magma soldiers, Blue is magma lords, Black is wither soldier, and Brown is wither lord




Mobs

Magma soldier: Level 30 monster, Has 3000 health. Shoots 3 fireballs rapidly every 5 seconds, dealing 100 damage and damage equal to 5% of your health. Its melee attack knocks you back half as much as the slime does and does 111 true damage. You have to be inside of the cube’s hitbox to take this damage. Its drops are: 100%: 2-5 magma cream. 1%: 1 enchanted magma cream. In addition, it also gives 25 combat experience.
Magma lord: Level 75 monster, Has 7500 health. Shoots 3 fireballs rapidly every 5 seconds, dealing 200 damage and damage equal to 10% of your health. Its melee attack knocks you back as much as a slime and does 222 true damage. You have to be inside the cube’s hitbox to take this damage. Its drops are: 100%: 3-6 magma cream. 3%: 1-2 enchanted magma cream. In addition, it also gives 40 combat experience.
Wither soldier: Level 150 monster, Has 15000 health. Shoots a wither skull with aiming one every 3 seconds, dealing 500 damage. Melee attack: Does 200 true damage. 2 blocks of reach. Its drops are: 100%: 2-5 coal. 2.5%: Wither sword 2%: 1 enchanted coal. 1%: Wither core. Also gives 75 combat experience.
Wither lord: Level 250 monster, Has 150000 health. Shoots a wither skull with aiming one every 3 seconds, dealing 2000 damage. Melee attack: Does 500 true damage. 3 blocks of reach. Its drops are: 100%: 4-8 coal. 2.5%: Wither sword 2%: 1-3 enchanted coal. 1%: Wither core. 0.004% (4/10000 or 1/2500): Wither pet, Epic: 80%, Legendary 20%. Also gives 75 combat experience.

title: [Idea] Challenges for Skyblock.
body:
Firstly, NO This is not a idea post for new stuff like ironman, this is for challenges that are finishable/give rewards. [I had to say this ok] ok lets begin now.


Some of you know about ironman profiles, but i wanted to do something that follows a progression system, where you can use a profile to benefit from another profile. Similar to profile boosting but wont get you banned and its actually fair. So i came up with challenges, to unlock A challenge, you need to get its requirements, Then to beat the challenge, get what it needs you to get. [Could be a certain skill level, damage on a mob, etc.] Once you have beat a challenge, it becomes a normal profile.

In all challenges the auction house, player trading and picking up items from other players is disabled, Bazaar is NOT disabled unless specified by the challenge, This is to prevent people getting a unfair boost in challenges

And as always im going to use the glorious table form for listing the challenges. [List of challenges that could be added] [First time rewards are in every profile]

Challenge NameMechanicsUnlock RequirementsCompletition Requirements/RewardExhausted 100% Of all the extra damage you deal to a mob when killing it is dealt to you, This increases by 5% for every combat level you have.
5% Of all the extra damage you deal to a mob when killing it, reduces your strength and intelligence by this amount for 20 seconds [Stacks]
If you die to this effect, lose all combat xp gained in the last 60sDeal over 500x its health as damage to a mobCompletition: Achieve Combat 25

First Time Reward: 1% of the extra damage you dealt to a mob on killing it is turned to health for you [Max 5% of your total health healed]

Every Time Reward: 1,500,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)SpacelessYou do not have a private island, Enderchest is disabled, You cannot use backpacks, Sacks are disabled, Accessory bag is disabled, Quiver is disabled, Fishing bag is disabled, Potion Bag is disabled.Get 18 Skill AverageCompletition: Achieve 25 Skill Average

First Time Reward: Gain +1 Minion Slot

Every Time Reward: 300,000 XP on Any Regular skill [Cant be runecrafting/carpentry/Dungeon classes/catacombs]FishermanYou cannot deal damage with anything that is not a fishing rod.Get Fishing 22 (XXII)Completition: Achieve Fishing 30 AND have dealt at least 100,000 Damage with a fishing rod.

First Time Reward: +5% Damage on all fishing Rods

Every Time Reward: 2,500,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)WeakeningOn Mob Kill lose 1% of your max health and 1% of your strength and intelligence. [Multiplicative] (Resets on death)

For every skill level, lose 1% of your max health [Multiplicative] (Until challenge end, Does not reset on death)

On death lose all the Skill XP you got from anything in the last 20 Minutes (You CAN level down by this)Get 20 Skill AverageCompletition: Get 22 Skill Average

First Time Reward: 1,000,000 XP on Any Regular skill [Cant be runecrafting/carpentry/Dungeon classes/catacombs]

Every Time Reward: 1,750,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)Epic FreeYou cannot use/obtain/craft Any item of Epic rarity or higher (Does not count Special/Very Special)Get 23 Skill AverageCompletition: Get 25000 EHP AND 500 Strength AND 1000 Intelligence (You dont have to get them all at the same time)

First Time Reward: Gain +1 Health for every Common/Uncommon/Rare talisman in your inventory/Accesory Bag

Every Time Reward: 500,000 XP on Any Regular skill [Cant be runecrafting/carpentry/Dungeon classes/catacombs]MagicianStrength Set to 0 at all times.
Mana regenerates every 10s now.

Any Magic Damage dealt, increases the damage the mob does permanently by 10% of the damage dealt [Capped at 50x original mob damage]Deal 2,000,000 Magic Damage outside of dungeons in 1s or less.Completition: Get Enchanting 33, Also you must Deal 30,000,000 Magic Damage in under 10s outside of dungeons.

First Time Reward: Gain +5 Intelligence And Strength

Every Time Reward: 3,500,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)ArmorlessYou cannot wear armor, As simple as thatGet 25 Skill AverageCompletition: Get Combat 35, Also be in combat for over 180 seconds in a row without dying.

First Time Reward: Growth is 10% more effective.

Every Time Reward: 7,500,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)

And here is the list of challenges that would be nice to add but might get hypixel sued. [Spot reserved for the first one to find why it would get hypixel sued]

Challenge NameMechanicsUnlock RequirementsCompletition Requirements/RewardBalanceMobs under level 10 do +135% damage, Mobs over level 10 do +17% damage. Killing a Mob over level 10 gives a stack of balance, Which reduces xp gained by 1% [Multiplicative] But increases health by 1% [Multiplicative] Killing a mob under level 10 removes a stack of balance. Balance stacks are capped at 250.Get 27 Skill AverageCompletition: Achieve Combat 40

First Time Reward: Deal +5% Damage Against mobs over level 10, Take -5% Damage Against mobs under level 10.

Every Time Reward: 10,000,000 Coins that can be picked up in any profile (Only in one profile)

First Time Challenge rewards are automatically applied to all profiles, While the every time rewards are at jerry under a new tab in deliveries called Challenge Rewards.

And heres a few Achievements for these new challenges:

Rares are lame anyways: Beat epic free without obtaining anything of rare rarity. (10 Achievement Points)

Who needs to be strong: Beat magician without using magic damage ever. (15 Achievement Points)

I thought it was weaponless: Beat armorless without using a weapon ever. (25 Achievement Points)

And heres a Achievement that wont be added because well it could get hypixel sued [Remember that above theres a spot reserved for the first one that finds the reason why]

Underbalanced: Beat balance without ever getting over 100 Balance Stacks (15 Achievement Points)

Thats all i got for now, i am probably Updating this, Please leave your Suggestions Below.

title: [EFFORT] Strong Dragon Armor VS Zombie Knight
body:
Note: I'm comparing these sets with AND without reforges and the Zombie knight armor varies defending on the quality and which floor it dropped in. Since i don't have the strong dragon helmet and use a tarantula helmet instead, the DAMAGE may be different. BTW my zombie knight armor is EPIC. Also, if you check my skylea, my Zombie knight armor all dropped from floor 6 and may be low in quality. Note that this is not in dungeons!
Strong Dragon: Legendary
Zombie Knight: Epic OR Legendary

Scenario 1: No Reforge:

Strong Dragon: 25 str per piece (100 total)
Zombie knight:
Helmet: 23 str
Chestplate: 43 str
Leggings: 33 str
Boots: 18 str
Total: 117 str

Scenario 2: With reforge (Fierce):

Strong dragon:
Strength: (25+10) * 4 = 140
Crit chance: 6 * 4 = 24
Crit damage: 18 * 4 = 72
Total: 140 str, 24 cc, 72 cd.

Zombie knight:
Strength: (23+8) + (43+8) + (33+8) + (18+8) = 149
Crit chance: 5 * 4 = 20
Crit damage: 14 * 4 = 56
Total: 149 str, 20 cc, 56 cd.

Scenario 3: EHP includes 100 HP at start, no growth or prot [formula: HP x (def/100 + 1)]:
Strong Dragon: 2700
Zombie Knight: 694

Scenario 4: EHP includes 100 HP at start, with growth 5 and prot 5
Strong Dragon: 4290
Zombie knight: 3016

1: Zombie knight (17 more strength)
2: Strong Dragon (9 less strength, but 4 more cc and 16 more cd)
3: Strong Dragon (2006 more EHP)
4: Strong Dragon (1274 more EHP)
Conclusion: Strong Dragon armor is better than my epic zombie knight set. (wins 3-1) Please excuse me since i did a LOT of math and now i just want to die.

Edit: If my zombie knight set was legendary, it would beat strong armor in scenario #2, which would make it a tie.

title: [STORY] The Catacombs Entrance (Part 1)
body:
Everything around me was cold and damp. Vines hung down from the ceiling, dead bodies lay in jail cells, and a rotten smell made me want to puke. In my peripheral vision, something caught my eye. Something red. Something that looked dangerous. I heard a heartbeat as I approached it. It got louder and louder as I creeped towards it. It was a door the color of blood. I opened it up... and started to scream.

One hour ago, I was in the mines with 4 of my friends, getting some coal for the barbeque we were going to have tonight. As I dug my pickaxe into the stone, the rock crumbled apart. Right in front of me was a small tunnel that led down to a musty cave. I unsheathed my sword and went down the steps. My friends followed behind me, looking around cautiously with every step. I sliced through cobwebs as I ventured further, trying to be brave. As I turned a corner, a giant door came into view. All 5 of us ran towards it. “Whoa, that’s creepy,” I said. The others nodded in agreement. I knocked on the door once. A low rumbling sound came from the other side of the door, and it slowly opened. “You first,” Henry, one of my friends said. I stepped into the dungeon, and everyone else came in after me. The sounds of footsteps echoed deeper within the Catacombs, making us all shiver. “Let’s get out of here,” Oliva whispered. “There is no chance we’ll survive this.” We all turned around to leave. Right as I got to the door, it slammed shut. We were locked in.

I will be updating the story in Creative Corner, go check it out! https://hypixel.net/threads/story-the-catacombs-unfinished.3497186/

Hello forumers, 

I've been getting into skyblock recently because I've been peer pressured I love the game, and I'm attempting to get in the top 50 for diamond collection (currently top 0.1%)

Naturally, I go to the spicy skyblock fandom site and much to my dismay, there was no mining crystal. This is a big sad moment for me. 

Is there a reason why there isn't a mining crystal, or did they just forget to add it? Comment your thoughts.

title: Healer is getting overrated
body:
So I have been healer since f4 release and once f5 came out people started recommending new players do healer because "parties will be easy to find".
The reality is, healers are flooding the dungeon finder and I cant find a party that doesn't already have a healer or even two in it without looking for 10-20 minutes.
my point is, if you want to start dungeons, its not best to always listen to everybody else, as the good advice may turn itself into bad advice.

title: Did this happen to you guys?
body:
So I was running Dungeons and then suddenly everything disappeared. It was like I had just started my pc the only difference being that I never restarted by pc+I could hear the gameplay sounds. Now if you say:"Oh you accidentally pressed alt+f4 and the noises are just lag and won't process." Nope, it kept processing like I had the game on another window BUT THERE WAS NO ACTIVE WINDOW. And then I could hear skeleton bones getting hit, skeletor bonemerang and everything and then me dying. Then I was in panic and restarted by pc. After this happened to me 3 times, I decided to investigate but soon lost interest. Well, after 5 days, I found what what the cause turns out I just switched into another desktop. A desktop is like a another tab, but with your pc. So how this is useful for gamers without time is that they can have ALL the games they want on 1 desktop and switch to another desktop which has well, the stuff u won't get trouble in it to avoid sus from your STRICT parents who won't let you play games but lets you go in your room. Now I can freely switch to another desktop.
I use THIS:




so if you lay four fingers on the touchpad and swipe it at the same time (depends if u wanna go to desktop 1 from 2, u swipe to the right, and if u want to go from 2 to 3, u swipe left)and it should take you there. Don't forget to ADD DESKTOPS.
If you're using windows, then you should be able to access the desktops by swiping 3 fingers to the left. Also arrange it 3 parts, like 3 seperate fingers and not on a line.

title: Farming update is going to be insane
body:
I'm not one to make threads about leak, but this one got me much more excited for the farm merchant dwelling community project that I got to share it.

So minikloon posted a short video showcasing some of the new items we may expect to see. If you haven't watched it I suggest you do. Search "Modern Farming" on youtube and it should be the one by Minikloon. If not you can watch it here:


Spoiler: video











To save you a bit of time I'll explain the new items showed here:

InfinDirt- Wand
Places a dirt block (costs 2 coins per block) 
You do not need dirt in inventory to use

Prismapump
Pumps water poured next to it
Essentially this just expands the water source all the way to the end of your farm. Great for sugar cane farms

Hoe of Great Tilling
Tills a 5x5 area of farmland at a time
This makes tilling land so much more of a breeze

Basket of Seeds
Allows you to store seeds in one place and then place rows of them
Really good for planting loads of carrots/potatoes at once since it goes to end of the farmland

We can assume that these items will be purchasable from the new Farm merchant which could be very costly, but very much worth it at the end of the day. In other words, farming is getting the attention it deserves, and now it will hopefully encourage more players to farm (which will drop the prices of crops but new tools to harvest them faster may be implemented to help you make bank off crops regardless of bazaar/npc price)

title: [IDEA] Skyblock Community Representatives (CRs)
body:
Hello players and staff,

I have recently conceived of an idea that may help you (staff) roll out more relevant updates and may help limit or even eliminate backlash from the community. So the idea is as follows. Staff pick players from the community at random, obviously there should be a way to eligibility requirements (see ^) for selection. Applications may be done through a link found in Jerry or on the forums. The idea is as follows we divide the player base into different stages such as early game/ mid game and late game. This can be edited later but the basics are, average skill levels as follows:
Un-represented (see *): Avg. Skill level 0-4
Early game: Avg. Skill level 5-14
Mid game: Avg. Skill level 15-24
Late game: Avg. Skill level 25+
Now 1 eligible person who may be a well respected for every 5000 people these categories should be selected randomly by a auto select/ raffle command. Then if there is an update the admins/ staff will contact these people who should be trusted with pre-update knowledge and they will be able to give feedback on how the community may react. I'm not saying that admins are out of touch but I find that people react differently when they are talking to admins then to each other. (I know that the /nick commands exists but to be frankly honest there aren't enough admins to circulate and find out the broad majority of opinion.) The CRs will also give feedback on what the community wants (eg. less dungeon floor updates, lower the price of items [idk]) There is also another option to add a different channel to submit the "[IDEA]" posts and with the additional manpower of the CRs and the staff (see `)they will be able to get through more suggestions and this will ease the pressure off admins and will allow them to moderate, review appeals, develop and release the glorious updates. The idea of having multiple people from different stages of the game will allow the CRs to represent their game level. For example a Late Game CR may approve of raising Bazaar requirement because it does not impact the Late Game players however a Early Game CR may have a serious problem with that idea. The CR should be in "office" for 1 month or so this will help give everyone time to have a turn and share their ideas as a CR. It should be stressed that this position should not be advertised, there shouldn't be a role or special recognition.

^
Eligibility requirements may include
Age: (eg. 15+)
Not already have a role of responsibility (eg. Staff, Youtube Role, Special roles ([PIG+++] etc. or mojang representative), this is to not sway their opinion and keep the CRs non-bias.
No punishments should have been inflicted on the player previously
Trustworthy enough to not leak information

*
These players should not be represented because people can progress through this stage extremely quickly and this stage is very short. Likely the CR/s will likely progress beyond this stage during office
`
Please note I have specified that the CRs and the staff as separate as that's what they are they are simply regular players with direct communication privileges.


After Note:
I realise that there are many flaws in this idea but I truly believe that if this is nurtured enough that this might become a thing.
After- After Note:
Please dont hate, I don't want that in my inbox, but do give CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISM

title: [Idea] The Ironman Exclusive Quest for the Potato Talisman! (+20 POS. REACTIONS)
body:
The Potato Talisman was a limited edition common talisman brought forward upon us by the Blood God himself. The issue is that it is now impossible to acquire on an Ironman profile because the NPC for it is a remnant of the past, and you’re barred off from the auction house and are unable to trade with other players...

But who cares? It’s just another common talisman...

I care, of course. Every talisman makes a difference on Ironman profiles, and even if you don’t think that +4 strength matters all that much, then imagine the OCD being flicked on all at once when players see 59/60 talismans on their Ironman sky.shiiyu

Thus, a solution!

A new NPC will appear in a small underground potato farm under the farm house in the hub, he will look quite similar to a certain Potato addict... If you click on him, he will speak the following:

[Potato Overlord] I have been farming potatoes for <Insert time here> and have yet to see the light of day...

[Potato Overlord] Heh? You wish to defeat me? You are not even close to being worthy of considering such a role, peasant! Begone!

And then... that’s it... why...?

That’s because you’re not on an Ironman profile, dummy. If you were to talk to him on an Ironman profile, however...

[Potato Overlord] I have been farming potatoes for <Insert time here> and have yet to see the light of day...

[Potato Overlord] Heh? You wish to defeat me, the Blood God of Potatoes?

[Potato Overlord] Very well... I am much too powerful for your feeble, mortal minds to comprehend my strategies, but perhaps... a consolation prize for your efforts...

New Quest! Farm <Insert Number> Potatoes

Once you have done that...

New Quest! Report back to the Potato Overlord

If you talk to him once again, a new set of dialogue appears...

[Potato Overlord] It seems to me that you have grown far too weak to continue any longer. You, a mere mortal, have exceeded my expectations... however.

[Potato Overlord] Now... about that consolation prize...

A screen will appear! In the middle, the fabled Potato Talisman! You happily claim it...

[Potato Overlord] If you wish to defeat me... farm for another five hundred years!

And the quest is now complete.

Potential issues

If implemented correctly, this should not pose any issues. The quest is exclusive to Ironman profiles, who are unable to trade with other players or use the auction house. The economy of potato talismans should not crash as a result of this addition.

If they are implementing this, Hypixel must go to every effort to make sure no loopholes is birthed from this addition, much like the dupe glitch from the co-op and private bank account like a month ago. I do not want Potato Talismans to suddenly lose that characteristic that made them unique in the first place.

am i worthy enough to tag the blood god himself

List of Potential Loopholes

Ironman player drops the potato talisman, allowing other players to pick it up. Wipe this problem by making it literally impossible to throw it out of your inventory

A person should NOT be able to claim the talisman on their main profile if they have completed the quest on their Ironman profile.

Make sure that the player is unable to claim the talisman if their inventory is full. This should be easy to patch, since the game already has a system to detect of the player’s inventory is full. If a players tries to do this, the Potato Overlord should say: You really believe you can outsmart me with such primitive tactics? I’ve studied the craft, and I’ll have you know that I’m twenty steps ahead of you! You’re playing checkers while I’m farming potatoes!!

title: [IDEA] WARDROBE ACCESSORY BUILDS (WITH IMAGES) (25+ POSITIVE REACTIONS)
body:
please bump, this keeps getting buried D:

So I had an idea, a while back, when I wanted to use a Frozen Scythe to kill zealots, but I had my accessories reforged to Shaded, to have a way of setting up accessory builds in the Wardrobe.
So I present to you, that exact concept!

So what this new idea would do is allow you to bind accessory reforges to armor sets. Want a mage setup with Demonic and Bizarre? Go for it! Want a berserker setup with Shaded and Hurtful? Easy to do! This would make switching builds so much easier, as you wouldn't have to reforge all of your talismans every time you wanted to switch.
Now, when you switched wardrobe slots, the reforge would be applied to all accessories in your inventory and accessory bag. If you had any new accessories than the last time you switched, it would cost a fee to switch but ONLY for that time, to prevent people reforging for free.



Spoiler: GUI Concept Images







This is just the wardrobe, but on right click, allows you to customize accessory build.





This is the GUI that would let you select which rarity of accessory you wanted to reforge, and what reforge to apply to it.





This is the reforge screen that would appear when you are going to change the reforge of the rarity. I forgot coin cost, but there will be a fee for doing this. The anvil in the top-left allows you to add reforge stones to your accessories.





Advanced reforging screen. Pretty self-explanatory.



Now this idea probably requires balancing, but I feel like something like this would make switching builds much easier and less tedious.
Please reply with any feedback, and thanks for reading!

title: [IDEA] Booster Pie (double booster cookie), Family Roast (100mf, 100pl, 50scc), Turkey Talisman (rare talisman), and Minikloon Talisman ( ;) )
body: The Booster Pie is a special consumable that can only be crafted during irl Thanksgiving day. It is crafted from 64 enchanted pumpkins, 64 enchanted sugar, and 16 enchanted eggs. It is very similar to the Booster Cookie, the only exception being that it has double the effects, lasts twice as long, and is unique because it can only be crafted on Thanksgiving day. The Family Roast is a special consumable can be obtained from the baker (which is in the hub all day during Thanksgiving) once, and when it is consumed, it grants +100 magic find, +100 pet luck, +50 sea creature chance, and 50% off on most shops for 1 day. It is very overpowered, but can only be obtained once only on irl Thanksgiving day. The Turkey Talisman is a rare accessory that grants +10 defense and +10 health, and can be obtained by the baker once on Thanksgiving day. The Minikloon Talisman is a mythic accessory that is granted to Minikloon, and cannot be picked up by other players, traded, sold, or auctioned. It grants +9999999999999999% stats.

title: 6 Reasons Why SkyCrypt is the Best Skyblock Site if you don't Already Think So
body:
1. You can see skills, collections, and minion slots. This prevents crafting scams because you can see their collections.
2. You can see all their weapons, armor sets, and talismans.
3. You can see peoples inventory, ender chest, potion bag, fishing bag, etc. This means you can see people's items in their inventory.
4. You can see their catacomb levels, slayer levels, and boss collections. With this, you can roast people and bully them on their trash slayer levels.
5. SkyCrypt leads to a bunch of sites such as auctions.craftlinks.xyz and Plancke.io.
6. You can see when you claimed Potato Talisman and Crab Hat so you know if someone is og or not.

title: [IDEA] Block Pusher
body:
So I'm building a maximum efficiency pumpkin farm where I place a water source every 8 blocks or smth like that. It gets really annoying when I have to go underneath my farm, add a block, then break the block above it just to have a 1x1 water source. I propose the block pusher. It is a piston that when you click on the block, depending on the direction you are facing, reletative to the block, it pushes the block that way by 1 block.

So, if i was standing on top of my farm, I could use the block pusher to push a dirt block down so I wouldn't have to place another dirt block under it and then break the one on top. 

Pretty much a portable piston.

It might be kind of hard to code but I feel like a lot of people would like this to be implemented into the game. Maybe have it sold at the bit's shop or farm merchant.

title: My Thoughts on Century Cake Buying
body:
So after some thought, I have decided to make a thread about Cake Buying.


Spoiler: When Should I Buy Cakes?



So the general consensus is that Cakes will continue to go down until maybe 1-2 weeks after today, and I usually would agree. However, not today.
I analyzed sharp 7 during the Darker Ah event, and these were my thoughts.
Sharp 7 Books
Day 1 : 25m
Day 2 : 12m
Day 3 : 16m
Day 4 : 18m
Day 5 : I think it was like 18.5m?
Keep in mind most books followed this pattern, but I only recorded sharp.
TLDR : Stuffy says to buy your books now.





Spoiler: If I want a full collection, how should I buy it?



There are two ways to get these.
1. Go to the ah.
2. Go out asking in the hubs.
AS FAR AS I AM CONCERNED, I DONT BELIEVE #2 WILL WORK THAT WELL, BUT PEOPLE IS SB CONTINUE TO AMAZE ME WITH THEIR AMAZING FINANCIAL DECISIONS, SO DO IT AT YOUR OWN RISK
I will now focus on point #1.
So you want to use BIN. When I checked earlier today, there was a lot of volatility. This means that there was a lot of people selling for way cheaper than they should have. I do not know if the market has smoothened out by now.
If you just want the cakes, just buy the lowest BIN for each.
If you are willing to wait and potentially save maybe 1m? on the total set, here is what you do.
1. Copy the phrase "Century"
2. Go to lowest price.
3. MEMORIZE the layout of the first row of the first page.
4. Continuously switch between page 1 and 2.
5. If the first row changes, then check the first row and see if you want to buy anything. If you buy anything, you will get kicked out of ah menu, so go back and type in the word century and keep going.
6. Go back to step 3.


Hope this was helpful : )

title: How to calculate minion money making in a day.
body:
We can find this out by dividing how many seconds there are in a day, by how fast the minion works, as an example, a tier 11-enchanted-lava snow minion works 5.2 seconds for 4 snowballs. So 86400 (how many seconds in a day) divided by 5.2 (minion speed) would work 16615 times in a day. We can then find out how much it really makes in a day with the next-next equation; if your minion made x4 things each time, it would make (find out via equation above)x(how many things your minion produces per interval)
in case of a snow minion, it would make 16615x4 snowballs a day, or 66460 snowballs.
So this equation we will find out how much money it makes. So all you have to do is multiply how much 1 thing, (i.e snowballs) would make in 24 hours, i.e snow (again)
so (how many of such thing your minion produces a day)66460x0.1(how much it costs) equating to 6646. Meaning a snow minion selling snowballs would make 6646 in a day. If prices for the compacted version of your item (snow is more yes). You would do the equations above and then; (single items produced by snow minion daily)
16615x9.1 (how much snow blocks sell on bazaar) the answer would equal
151916. Meaning a snow minion makes a crap ton of money. If you want to find out price for enchanted, just divide how many things it takes to make enchanted via minion (a lot have 160) divided by how many things your minion makes a day. Example; 16615/160 which will equal 103. Then you do common sense math (enchanted block)x(price of it) which for the example equals 103x600=61800. Meaning that out of all these methods (for snow minions at least) compacted snow minion is the best.

TL;DR do math AND compacted is best for snow minion

title: New money sink idea!
body: With the mayor update introduced, the hub also got a revamp. With that, came projects that players could contribute to--but only for a short while. If a project has a good effect, players will rush to get the highest tier of reward. However, some players might miss out on a few project donations and is unable to achieve the highest tier of reward. I suggest adding an NPC somewhere in the hub, where he allows you to contribute to the completed projects once for 3x the items and 300k. This would both take coins out of the economy and allow players to contribute to old projects that they weren't able to contribute to!

title: [Idea] Fisherman dungeon class
body:
due to all the new fishing items and stuff I believe there should be a fisherman dungeon class
it would rely on armor shredding to deal dmg

at the start they will have +50% fishing rod dmg and +100 defense


Spoiler: Dungeon level rewards



Every level of fisherman you get +1% dmg from fishing rods and +2 defense





Spoiler: Class passives



1. Iron hook: each successful hit with a fishing rod (not left click has to be the rod) decreases the mob's defense by 3% (cant go past 50% shredded).
Defense shredded increases by 0.1% per level
2. Hearty fisher: heal 0.001% of the damage you do with a successful hit with a fishing rod (not left click has to be the rod) 
Lifesteal increases by 0.00005% a level
I KNOW 0.001% LIFESTEAL DOESNT SEEM LIKE A LOT BUT YOU DO LIKE 2 MIL DMG AND THEN YOU ARE GOING TO HEAL 200 HEALTH





Spoiler: Class abilities



1. Final flail (left click from dungeon stone): throw a fishing line and the line rotates around you




the fishing line can pass through objects

every mob hit by the fishing line will take 20% more dmg for 5 seconds, and the decrease the time for the next final flail by 0.5 seconds for every mob hit
30 sec cooldown

2. Tentacle root (right click from dungeon stone): every mob within 10 blocks from you will be frozen for 7 seconds, but they can still attack if you get close enough. they will take 10% more dmg during this duration.
60 sec cooldown





Spoiler: Ghost abilities



1. Spirit of the sharks: the ability is a fishing rod. when you hit something with the fishing rod, the mob hit will get constant blood particles. they will do 10% less damage and attacks used on them will increase by 10%. this effect lasts for 10 seconds
10 second cooldown

2. call of the whales: all mobs within 10 blocks will stop moving for 2 seconds, and all teammates will get a 50 speed buff for 5 seconds
20 second cooldown



so yea that's my idea on the fisherman class

all the values for the abilities and such were very arbitrary and I made them up while I was typing, so maybe some are too op or too underpowered. with this said, I am totally open to ideas and comments.
