title: [QOL Concept] Portable Kennel and Portable Wardrobe!
body:
Hi! Today I'm bringing your attention to an idea I had that could make life in Skyblock just a tad bit easier!

Do you find yourself swapping pets/armor often? Does it bother you having to click on a bunch of different menus in order to swap from your dolphin pet to your squid pet? If you or a loved one has been diagnosed with disliking these things then I have the QOL invention for you!

Introducing the Portable Kennel and the Portable Wardrobe!






Now I know what you're thinking... it's a Gnome.

No, that is a placeholder because I am not good at making things and I don't know how to make custom items so I worked with the resources I had in game. Imagine it looks like a tiny bookshelf or a tiny doghouse.

Now to explain how this works!






Starting with the Portable Wardrobe. As demonstrated by the Gnome, it will be an item that sit's in your inventory. From your base wardrobe menu you can select two sets of armor to link with the portable wardrobe by right clicking on the pink dye. This will cause the dye to highlight purple, signifying that you have successfully linked that armor with the Port Wardrobe. Now the way the wardrobe works is simple. Similar to a Builder Wand, if you right click with the Port Wardrobe in your hand, it will allow you to swap between your two selected armor pieces instantly, removing the need to navigate through several menus. You can also left click the Port Wardrobe which will simply open up the regular wardrobe menu where you can freely switch to whatever armor you want on, or change your selected portable armor sets.

Now moving onto the Portable Kennel!










The Port Kennel works very similar to the Port Wardrobe, only it can be used to quickly swap between two pets. Right clicking the Port Kennel allows you to swap between your two selected pets with ease. This is perfect for fishermen who want to fish up as many sea creatures as they can, while also earning the most xp they can from said sea creatures. Left clicking of course brings you to your pet menu. In order to select which pets you want to swap between, the pets menu will have an icon for the Port Kennel as signified by my lil Gnome. Clicking the icon will bring you to a menu like the one in the second picture. From here you can click the different slots and choose which two pets you want to link to your Port Kennel.

And that is all for my QOL post! Feel free to leave other suggestions and comments!

Also sorry again for the poor quality, I'm not very good with this stuff!

title: [Dungeons] The Story of Goldor
body:
A man that fought for so many battles, was unbelievably strong, was rejected from being the commander of the troop.
That man dreamed of being the king of battles. He tried every single type of kits, and classes. He worked as a medic, a soldier, a doctor and many other types.
It was Goldor, the true Soldier.
However, no one accepted his heart. They were jealous of his powers. His skills were so powerful that no one can use their word to describe its strength. Not only he could read their thoughts, but he could also enhance it and make himself a better person.
This is his story...
Once upon a time, Goldor was a young kid waiting for his father to return home. He was playing with his toy car, and passers-by walked past him and ignored him as if he was invisible. Goldor was immune to that because it happens to anyone else. The heart of the town is blue, meaning it is very dark and cold-hearted.
His father returned. There was a paper on his hand.
"Dad, what's that?"
"You don't need to know about it, my son."
Goldor's father looks rather sad. He looked away from him. Goldor knew something was wrong. A few hours later, a group of soldiers came into the town.
"Independence, or death!" The leader said.
"If we get no revolution, we would rather die. This town will be the one that sacrifices themselves, for them to succeed at surviving!"
"Fathers, it is indescribable, but you will be the one that is the heroes. You are the only one that can protect us from the death war, which is coming soon."
Goldor cried when he heard that.
His father, old and weak. Even after the announcement, Goldor watched his father struggling with basic skills.
"Father, I will be the one that protects you," Goldor said.
"Son, you can't. You are only 6 years old. You are too young! Don't worry, son. Your father would not die." Father replied.
"No! I must protect you! You are old and weak! You will die if you are like this... please!" Goldor cried.
His father still refused. He hugged him and walked away.

That day after that night will be the day where fathers go to the army's dwelling. Goldor stole his father's armor. Thankfully, he was as tall as an adult for some reason. He ran away during that night...

A few years passed. The army fought with a lot of wars. It was as if a wind came, and blew the soldiers to death one... by one. Goldor, however, was still alive, safe and sound. His skills were indescribable.
Finally, the war had truly ended. Goldor, was the only one who survived. He left the troop. However, when he went home...

...his father was there, dead!

Goldor took a knife and killed himself. Later, he woke up at another place. This time round, it was cold. A face was right in front of him.

"Who... are you?" Goldor said.
"Necron, the world shall know... your father was dead during the war. However, I shall give you a new home. this time round, you are going to be my right hand man..."







"A true soldier never dies." -- Goldor

title: nons in hypixel skyblock - a major class division
body:
If we all look at major revolutions and uprisings in history, we can all see that it started with class division and class struggle. While the rich and the nobles maintained higher social privileges, and economic power, the poor commoners and peasants were breaking their backs while having to pay impossible amount of tax. This led to the French and the Russian revolution which we know, has shaped our course of history in the different ways. While Skyblock is just a game, it meets all of the conditions that France and Russia had before their revolution. There is the nobles(ranked players) and the bourgeoisie ( rich people), and there is the nons ( the peasants). It is no doubt that ranked players have much higher social and economic status than the nons. Ranked players will get richer as the game progresses while nons who cannot make millions of coins due to high competition will inevitably get poorer. But it is understandable why hypixel is giving ranked players more privileges as they need money. But trust me, if there is no reformation of social status in skyblock, the nons, who are apparently the majority of skyblock and hypixel players, will revolt. As i am a non myself, we do not want all nons to be as equal to ranked players. But we do not want ranked players to be given a game affecting privileges such as quick crafting. If this is not fixed, trust me, history will repeat it self.

-ps, i don't know why i wrote this thing so seriously, but i just like writing articles.
